berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is rich in animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for some people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it the dirtiest fish? that's what he said: a) Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish admirers, indeed not all catfish live or are cultivated in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in public ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish that he harvested every 3 months. once to the markets and restaurants on the roadside in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from several people, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated this fish. Several journalists took samples from the 7 ponds that store this catfish. Actually these seven ponds are all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, in the middle of these ponds there are many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed in the form of manure. If the conditions are like this, then catfish will be the same as jallalah animals, namely animals that consume dirty and unclean food until the law to consume it is haram. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined mudcat or separated from dirty places and given clean food. For a minimum of 3 days quarantine. Danger lurks when you eat catfish, one mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, the fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly once a doctor admitted that he often had patients with swollen thyroid disease and infections, with signs: swollen lower neck, around the neck something like a tumor, eyeballs like wanting to come out, heat around the neck, often coughing inside night is not there because. After being asked, in fact all patients often consume catfish and fried eel. This kind of thing can happen to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, the father, wife and child experience some of the symptoms as above. When this doctor asked one of the professors of doctors at Pluit, actually this catfish contains an easy poison, so that when it is fried, the clean oil will certainly turn black. Up to that point, it could be possible if the catfish's body contains three thousand cancer cells which are very likely for the human body. Friends for you catfish admirers, even though catfish is halal and not very worrying, as a wise customer you must and always be alert. You also don't understand when buying catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, do not need to consume. Or if you believe in its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not in large quantities through regular methods
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang kaya akan protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi sebagian orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa ikan paling kotor?Itulah yang dia katakan: a) ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang pengagum lele, memang tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibudidayakan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam publik.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari sesuatu yang kotor termasuk bangkai ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia hasilkan setiap 3 bulan.Sekali ke pasar dan restoran di pinggir jalan di provinsi Hainan tepatnya di haikou.Keluhan yang sering dari beberapa orang, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan ini.Beberapa jurnalis mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menyimpan ikan lele ini.Sebenarnya ketujuh kolam ini semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, di tengah -tengah kolam ini ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dalam bentuk kotoran.Jika kondisinya seperti ini, maka ikan lele akan sama dengan hewan jallalah, yaitu hewan yang mengonsumsi makanan kotor dan najis sampai hukum mengkonsumsinya adalah haram.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina mudcat atau terpisah dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Untuk minimal 3 hari karantina.Bahaya bersembunyi ketika Anda makan lele, satu seteguk ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan begitu seorang dokter mengakui bahwa ia sering memiliki pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan infeksi, dengan tanda -tanda: leher bawah bengkak, di sekitar leher seperti tumor, bola mata seperti ingin keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di dalam malam tidak ada di sana karena.Setelah ditanya, bahkan semua pasien sering mengonsumsi ikan lele dan belut goreng.Hal semacam ini dapat terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anak mengalami beberapa gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter ini bertanya kepada salah satu profesor dokter di Pluit, sebenarnya ikan lele ini mengandung racun yang mudah, sehingga ketika digoreng, minyak bersih tentu akan berubah menjadi hitam.Hingga saat itu, mungkin saja jika tubuh lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat mungkin bagi tubuh manusia.Teman untuk Anda pengagum lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan, sebagai pelanggan yang bijak Anda harus dan selalu waspada.Anda juga tidak mengerti saat membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, tidak perlu mengkonsumsi.Atau jika Anda percaya pada kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan tidak dalam jumlah besar melalui metode reguler

berita: Rumors circulated that there had been a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017). From the information compiled, as quoted by a social media channel, it was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were outraged by the news that the wardens were suspected of harassing the Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ..." That's the excerpt from the release of #AlfathChannel, which spread on social media. In addition, viral videos and photos were also circulated during the riots and the detainees waving the monotheism flag. In the video, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimbob detention cell looks shattered, there are also broken glass and wood that the prisoners break down. Meanwhile, the screams of takbir of the prisoners resounded. However, there were also other prisoners who tried to calm the atmosphere. After the riots, it was reported that the atmosphere was starting to become conducive, the warden of the Mako Brimob Detention Center was reported to have made efforts to invite the detainees to negotiate. Until this news was revealed, clearing there has been no release of clarification from the Mako Brimob Detention Center
berita_id: Rumor beredar bahwa telah terjadi kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Dari informasi yang disusun, seperti dikutip oleh saluran media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah oleh berita bahwa para penjaga diduga melecehkan Al -Qur'an dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako, situasi saat ini masih tegang ..." Itu adalah kutukan dari rilis #fathchannel, mana yang disebar sosial. "Selain itu, video viral dan foto juga diedarkan selama kerusuhan dan tahanan mengibarkan bendera monoteisme.Dalam video itu, suasana sel penahanan Mako Brimbob terlihat hancur, ada juga pecahan kaca dan kayu yang dihancurkan oleh para tahanan.Sementara itu, teriakan takbir para tahanan bergema.Namun, ada juga tahanan lain yang mencoba menenangkan suasana.Setelah kerusuhan, dilaporkan bahwa atmosfer mulai menjadi kondusif, sipir Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob dilaporkan telah melakukan upaya untuk mengundang tahanan untuk bernegosiasi.Sampai berita ini terungkap, kliring belum ada rilis klarifikasi dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob

berita: Recently, quite horrendous news circulated regarding toothbrushes. Some toothbrush products are said to use pig bristles as the main ingredient. One of the accounts on the Facebook social network uploaded a brand of brush and wrote that the toothbrush came from boar bristles. In fact, the status is already shared more than 1000 times by his friends An account with the name Hamirudin Hamzah said, if he was reprimanded by the cashier of a supermarket that the toothbrush he bought contained sea urchins. an account named Mindy Chin, who explains more about what bristles are. He wrote: "It's very funny that Bristles are one of the compositions of toothbrushes, but not ocean all of them come from pigs, it could be from other animals," Wednesday (5/10/2016) By Therefore, not all toothbrushes we use come from sea urchins. However, as a Muslim you need to be careful and choose a really halal toothbrush
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, berita yang cukup mengerikan beredar mengenai sikat gigi.Beberapa produk sikat gigi dikatakan menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan utama.Salah satu akun di jaringan sosial Facebook mengunggah merek kuas dan menulis bahwa sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Faktanya, statusnya sudah dibagikan lebih dari 1000 kali oleh teman -temannya sebuah akun dengan nama Hamirudin Hamzah mengatakan, jika dia ditegur oleh kasir supermarket yang dibeli oleh sikat gigi yang dibelinya berisi bulu babi.Akun bernama Mindy Chin, yang menjelaskan lebih banyak tentang apa itu bulu.Dia menulis: "Sangat lucu bahwa bulu adalah salah satu komposisi sikat gigi, tetapi tidak lautan semuanya berasal dari babi, itu bisa dari hewan lain," Rabu (5/10/2016) oleh karena itu, tidak semua sikat gigi yang kita gunakan berasal dari bulu babi.Namun, sebagai seorang Muslim Anda perlu berhati -hati dan memilih sikat gigi yang benar -benar halal

berita: This one news may be very useful for consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's new smartphone 5.5-inch jumbo sail that began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, The biggest screen iPhone turns out to be easy to bend when stored for too long in the trouser pocket. This incident was first reported by an owner The iPhone 6 is named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He claimed to keep the iPhone 6 Plus in a trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and perform daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw the middle His iPhone 6 Plus is slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, another user named Devin Pitcher also boundary expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin claims to keep the new iPhone 6 Plus his in his front trouser pocket. When removed, even the middle of the iPhone 6 Plus bent like a tank can withstand the pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. However, the problem of large dimensions limits the user's comfort when storing it in the pocket pants seems unthinkable to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have mistakes by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as a material iPhone 6 Plus frame base material. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. UTM Test serves to test the framework of the iPhone 6 plus by pressing and pulling to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend
berita_id: Berita yang satu ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone baru Smartphone 5,5 inci berlayar Jumbo yang mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk saat disimpan terlalu lama di saku celana.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengaku menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bagian tengah iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga Boundary menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum.Devin mengklaim menyimpan iPhone 6 baru ditambahnya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, bahkan tengah iPhone 6 plus bengkok seperti tangki dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Namun, masalah dimensi besar membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di celana saku tampaknya tidak terpikirkan oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap memiliki kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan bingkai bingkai iPhone 6 plus material.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Tes UTM berfungsi untuk menguji kerangka kerja iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menarik ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang diperlukan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk

berita: Catfish is one of the most popular dishes, especially the catfish pecel menu. Coupled with chili sauce and fresh vegetables, catfish has attracted all of us. Behind that, the benefits are also very large for health. Enjoy the Benefits of Catfish for Health Catfish is a type of fish that is familiar to the ears of fish lovers. With its savory taste and affordable price, catfish easily becomes the favorite food of all people, from adults to children. The nutritional content in catfish is also very abundant, one of which is omega-3 fatty acids. Consumption of omega-3 (and omega-6) is thought to be closely related to lowering blood pressure and demand the risk of certain cancers, and is useful for reducing inflammatory conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis. The American Heart Association even recommends that you eat at least 2 servings or 3.5 ounces of fish per week. For health, choose catfish that are farmed without being contaminated by mercury. For pregnant women, you must first check whether the catfish to be consumed is safe or not. Here are some nutritional content that you can get in catfish: Fat Catfish is a food rich in omega-3 fatty acids. Omega-3 fatty acids can help lower the risk of heart disease, especially by lowering triglycerides and fighting inflammation, and helping lower the risk of cancer and arthritis. Catfish protein does not contain carbohydrates but is dense with protein. About 53 percent of the total calorie content of 3 ounces of cooked catfish -- about 63 calories -- is protein. This amount meets 28 percent of the daily protein needs for men, and 34 percent of women's protein needs per day. Vitamin B Catfish is an excellent source of vitamin B12. Every 3 ounces of catfish contains 2.3 micrograms of vitamin B12, or nearly 100 percent of the 2.4 micrograms of B vitamins in adult men and women. Then, what is a good way to process catfish so that your cholesterol is maintained? Serve catfish by grilling or grilling. Or if you still want to fry, use oil made from soybeans or sunflower oil.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu hidangan paling populer, terutama menu Pecel Catfish.Ditambah dengan saus cabai dan sayuran segar, ikan lele telah menarik kita semua.Di belakangnya, manfaatnya juga sangat besar untuk kesehatan.Nikmati manfaat ikan lele untuk kesehatan ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang akrab bagi telinga pecinta ikan.Dengan rasa gurih dan harga yang terjangkau, ikan lele dengan mudah menjadi makanan favorit semua orang, dari orang dewasa hingga anak -anak.Kandungan nutrisi dalam ikan lele juga sangat berlimpah, salah satunya adalah asam lemak omega-3.Konsumsi omega-3 (dan omega-6) dianggap terkait erat dengan menurunkan tekanan darah dan menuntut risiko kanker tertentu, dan berguna untuk mengurangi kondisi peradangan seperti rheumatoid arthritis.American Heart Association bahkan merekomendasikan agar Anda makan setidaknya 2 porsi atau 3,5 ons ikan per minggu.Untuk kesehatan, pilih ikan lele yang ditanami tanpa terkontaminasi oleh merkuri.Untuk wanita hamil, Anda harus terlebih dahulu memeriksa apakah ikan lele yang akan dikonsumsi aman atau tidak.Berikut adalah beberapa kandungan nutrisi yang bisa Anda dapatkan dalam lele: Catfish lemak adalah makanan yang kaya asam lemak omega-3.Asam lemak omega-3 dapat membantu menurunkan risiko penyakit jantung, terutama dengan menurunkan trigliserida dan melawan peradangan, dan membantu menurunkan risiko kanker dan radang sendi.Protein lele tidak mengandung karbohidrat tetapi padat dengan protein.Sekitar 53 persen dari total kandungan kalori dari 3 ons ikan lele yang dimasak - sekitar 63 kalori - adalah protein.Jumlah ini memenuhi 28 persen kebutuhan protein harian untuk pria, dan 34 persen kebutuhan protein wanita per hari.Lele Vitamin B adalah sumber vitamin B12 yang sangat baik.Setiap 3 ons ikan lele mengandung 2,3 mikrogram vitamin B12, atau hampir 100 persen dari 2,4 mikrogram vitamin B pada pria dan wanita dewasa.Lalu, apa cara yang baik untuk memproses ikan lele sehingga kolesterol Anda dipertahankan?Sajikan ikan lele dengan memanggang atau memanggang.Atau jika Anda masih ingin menggoreng, gunakan minyak yang terbuat dari kedelai atau minyak bunga matahari.

berita: The Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Service, Afwan Lubis, is not convinced by the existence cerebrate of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016). about the boar-bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular. He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market.
berita_id: Sekretaris Layanan Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak diyakinkan oleh keberadaan Cerebrate sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," katanya melalui Cellular, Senin (7/3/2016).tentang sikat gigi berbulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal.Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler.Dia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan menerbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari pasar.

berita: People are shocked by toothbrush products that use pig bristles as the basic material used to clean our teeth every day. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging. As explained on the Wikipedia site, bristles products are obtained from pig derivatives in the form of feathers. These bristles are often used by industry as a cleaning tool for teeth, toilet brushes, household cleaning tools. The use of pig body parts, including the fur, is forbidden in Islam. As stated by the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market. Armed with this information, the Tribune then traced the written report truth of the use of sea urchins in dental cleaning products. As found in the minimarket on Jalan Denai, the toothbrush brand Or** * is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly explains the product, "Super thin Bristles". Meanwhile, regarding this, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016) He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal.
berita_id: Orang -orang terkejut dengan produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan dasar yang digunakan untuk membersihkan gigi kita setiap hari.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada penulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu meremehkan kemasan.Seperti yang dijelaskan di situs Wikipedia, produk Bristles diperoleh dari turunan babi dalam bentuk bulu.Bulu -bulu ini sering digunakan oleh industri sebagai alat pembersih untuk gigi, kuas toilet, alat pembersih rumah tangga.Penggunaan bagian tubuh babi, termasuk bulu, dilarang dalam Islam.Seperti yang dinyatakan oleh ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui seluler, Senin (7/3/2016) ia menambahkan, jika MUI yang terbukti akan diterbitkan kepada publik agar tidak menggunakan sikat gigi.Selain itu, MUI akan menarik produk dari pasar.Berbekal informasi ini, Tribune kemudian melacak laporan tertulis kebenaran tentang penggunaan bulu babi dalam produk pembersih gigi.Seperti yang ditemukan di Minimarket di Jalan Denai, merek sikat gigi atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menjelaskan produk, "bulu super tipis".Sementara itu, mengenai hal ini, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," katanya melalui Cellular, Senin (7/3/2016) dia menambahkan bahwa tes laboratorium dilakukan jika ada laporan dari publik mengenai sikat gigi bulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal.

berita: Call for a boycott of Traveloka by uninstalling the Traveloka trending topic application on Twitter. The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became trending due to the walk out action of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was said to have greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Considered as support for Ananda's action, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Even the hashtags #UninstallTraveloka and #BoikotTraveloka are among the trending topics on Twitter in Indonesia. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Support Ananda Harassing Anies Baswedan, Boycott and #UninstallTraveloka Trending Andanda and Traveloka officials who are "Ahokers" are considered to be intolerant. The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. The Muhammadiyah youth also issued a statement of attitude, namely boycotting Traveloka because of the support of its owner, Derianto Kususma, against the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," said Syahrul in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin piano player served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul.

berita: As someone who likes various processed catfish meats, I am curious about the amount of information circulating on social networks, which states that catfish is the filthiest and disgusting fish in the world. It is even said, in a piece of catfish meat there are 3000 cancer cells. Is that right? Catfish is indeed a fish that can eat anything (Omnivores) and is able to live in all kinds of waste in all the waters. Not infrequently we encounter household waste shelters, livestock waste channels, ditches or ditches that are used for catfish farming. Catfish or also known as Catfish are known as tough fish. In addition to breathing with gills, this fish also has an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth so that it can survive in muddy, dirty or even polluted water conditions. This fact is very likely to trigger the emergence of allegations about the accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. So that catfish is safe for consumption The issue that states that in a piece of catfish there are 3000 cancer cells is not all true. As long as the catfish is raised in waters that are not polluted by chemical waste or acute organic waste, then catfish is still safe for consumption. Some bacteria that are often found in the body of fish are E. coli, Shigella and Salmonella bacteria. These bacteria can be removed by proper processing. Make sure we wash the catfish meat and process it until it is completely cooked with proper heating. All bacteria in fish meat will die at a certain high temperature. We also need to be careful in buying catfish that we will process as cooking. Choose catfish whose skin is not moldy, the flesh is hard when pressed and is not damaged, does not smell bad, the eyes are clear and prominent, the gills are red and the fins and skin are not easily torn. Well, until here we don't have to worry about eating our favorite catfish meat. May be useful.
berita_id: Sebagai seseorang yang menyukai berbagai daging ikan lele olahan, saya ingin tahu tentang jumlah informasi yang beredar di jejaring sosial, yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan yang paling kotor dan menjijikkan di dunia.Bahkan dikatakan, dalam sepotong daging ikan lele ada 3000 sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Lele memang ikan yang bisa makan apa saja (omnivora) dan mampu hidup dalam semua jenis limbah di semua perairan.Tidak jarang kita menemukan tempat penampungan limbah rumah tangga, saluran limbah ternak, parit atau parit yang digunakan untuk pertanian ikan lele.Ikan lele atau juga dikenal sebagai ikan lele dikenal sebagai ikan tangguh.Selain bernafas dengan insang, ikan ini juga memiliki peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur, kotor atau bahkan tercemar.Fakta ini sangat mungkin memicu kemunculan tuduhan tentang akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Sehingga ikan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi masalah yang menyatakan bahwa dalam sepotong ikan lele ada 3000 sel kanker tidak semuanya benar.Selama ikan lele dibesarkan di perairan yang tidak tercemar oleh limbah kimia atau limbah organik akut, maka ikan lele masih aman untuk dikonsumsi.Beberapa bakteri yang sering ditemukan di tubuh ikan adalah bakteri E. coli, shigella dan salmonella.Bakteri ini dapat dihilangkan dengan pemrosesan yang tepat.Pastikan kami mencuci daging ikan lele dan memprosesnya sampai benar -benar dimasak dengan pemanasan yang tepat.Semua bakteri dalam daging ikan akan mati pada suhu tinggi tertentu.Kita juga perlu berhati -hati dalam membeli ikan lele yang akan kita proses sebagai memasak.Pilih ikan lele yang kulitnya tidak berjamur, dagingnya keras ketika ditekan dan tidak rusak, tidak berbau tidak enak, matanya jernih dan menonjol, insang berwarna merah dan sirip dan kulit tidak mudah robek.Nah, sampai di sini kita tidak perlu khawatir makan daging ikan lele favorit kita.Mungkin berguna.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application in the past two days have been circulating on social media timelines. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall aggravated D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. Ananda's action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka, including netizens from Banten. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. One of the netizens from Cilegon City who currently lives in Qatar, Rahmat (40) said that he did not agree with the attitude of Ananda and Derianto, the founder of Traveloka, who took the WO action at the Kanisius event. "Their attitude is intolerant because they mix politics and education," said Rahmat. The same thing was expressed by Rina (39), a garment entrepreneur from Tangerang who also uploaded her Facebook timeline. "From now on bye-bye Traveloka, it's better to buy tickets at neighboring travel," said Rina
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dalam dua hari terakhir telah beredar di jadwal media sosial.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall memperburuk D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka, termasuk netizen dari Banten.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Salah satu netizen dari Cilegon City yang saat ini tinggal di Qatar, Rahmat (40) mengatakan bahwa ia tidak setuju dengan sikap Ananda dan DeRianto, pendiri Traveloka, yang mengambil tindakan WO di acara Kanisius."Sikap mereka tidak toleran karena mereka memadukan politik dan pendidikan," kata Rahmat.Hal yang sama diungkapkan oleh Rina (39), seorang pengusaha pakaian dari Tangerang yang juga mengunggah garis waktu Facebook -nya."Mulai sekarang di Bye-Bye Traveloka, lebih baik membeli tiket di tetangga perjalanan," kata Rina

berita: Stroke is a disorder of the blood vessels of the brain. Disturbances that occur can be in the form of blockage or in the form of rupture of blood vessels. Stroke needs to be treated immediately, because the initial time of stroke is the time that determines the next therapy. Is it true that if someone has a stroke, then we have to bleed from the fingertips? What are the early symptoms of a stroke? The brain is the driving force of the human body. If there is a disturbance in the brain, it can occur in various other organ systems. The initial symptom of a stroke is weakness in the body, generally on one side testing only. Stroke patients will complain of slurred speech, or the eyes cannot open. If a person has a hemorrhagic stroke, there will be an increase in pressure in the brain. This increase in pressure will cause a sudden, severe headache. Stroke survivors may also complain of nausea and vomiting. Is it necessary to bleed from the fingertips? The following page is the answer: Initial treatment for stroke is not by removing blood from the fingertips. Bleeding from all the fingertips has no benefit in healing stroke patients. In fact, if the needle used is not clean, stroke sufferers can develop an infection due to the puncture. Bleeding from the fingertips is a dangerous procedure and is not helpful in treating a stroke. What is the initial treatment for stroke? The initial treatment for stroke is to maintain a patent airway and stabilize the patient's blood circulation. If the patient is unconscious, make sure the patient is in a safe environment, lying in a safe place. Position the patient with the body facing the left side, to prevent the entry of fluids into the respiratory tract (recovery position). Immediately call for help to take the patient to the nearest emergency room. The exact treatment of stroke depends on the type of stroke that occurred. This can be confirmed by carrying out supporting examinations such as CT scans and MRIs.
berita_id: Stroke adalah kelainan pembuluh darah otak.Gangguan yang terjadi dapat dalam bentuk penyumbatan atau dalam bentuk pecahnya pembuluh darah.Stroke perlu segera dirawat, karena waktu awal stroke adalah waktu yang menentukan terapi berikutnya.Benarkah jika seseorang mengalami stroke, maka kita harus berdarah dari ujung jari?Apa gejala awal stroke?Otak adalah kekuatan pendorong tubuh manusia.Jika ada gangguan di otak, itu dapat terjadi di berbagai sistem organ lainnya.Gejala awal stroke adalah kelemahan dalam tubuh, umumnya hanya pada pengujian satu sisi.Pasien stroke akan mengeluh tentang ucapan yang tidak jelas, atau mata tidak bisa terbuka.Jika seseorang mengalami stroke hemoragik, akan ada peningkatan tekanan di otak.Peningkatan tekanan ini akan menyebabkan sakit kepala yang tiba -tiba dan parah.Korban stroke juga dapat mengeluh mual dan muntah.Apakah perlu berdarah dari ujung jari?Halaman berikut adalah jawabannya: Perawatan awal untuk stroke bukan dengan mengeluarkan darah dari ujung jari.Pendarahan dari semua ujung jari tidak memiliki manfaat pada pasien penyembuhan stroke.Bahkan, jika jarum yang digunakan tidak bersih, penderita stroke dapat mengembangkan infeksi karena tusukan.Pendarahan dari ujung jari adalah prosedur berbahaya dan tidak membantu dalam mengobati stroke.Apa pengobatan awal untuk stroke?Perawatan awal untuk stroke adalah mempertahankan jalan napas paten dan menstabilkan sirkulasi darah pasien.Jika pasien tidak sadar, pastikan pasien berada di lingkungan yang aman, berbaring di tempat yang aman.Posisikan pasien dengan tubuh menghadap sisi kiri, untuk mencegah masuknya cairan ke saluran pernapasan (posisi pemulihan).Segera hubungi bantuan untuk membawa pasien ke ruang gawat darurat terdekat.Perawatan stroke yang tepat tergantung pada jenis stroke yang terjadi.Ini dapat dikonfirmasi dengan melakukan pemeriksaan pendukung seperti CT scan dan MRI.

berita: The walk out (WO) of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, turned out to have a long tail and tended to lead to strange slander. Ananda's action was followed by a crowd calling for the removal of the Traveloka application. What caused this walk out action to be followed by an invitation with the hashtag #uninstallTraveloka? Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Incidentally, in this event, the Canisius Awards will be presented to 5 alumni from various generations. A total of 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Based on the news circulating on the timeline, Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. This information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Traveloka to detikinet responded to the news about the call to boycott its services. This hotel and travel ticket booking application also provides clarification regarding the events at the Canisius College event. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra. Tribunnews also observed that, after getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the award recipients, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School. It was not written, Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma came and congratulated him. When receiving the award, Ananda also had the opportunity to deliver a 10-minute speech. “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we were taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to see the person as well. He obtained his position in ways that were inconsistent with Canisius' values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. Ananda Sukarlan's attitude and statement may indeed spark debate, pros and cons. The problem is, why is there news that the Traveloka boss greets everything, won't the Deriyanto come? If we follow this hashtag about Traveloka, some even enter it into the realm of jihad. Wow! "This is the easiest jihad, just use your thumb to uninstall Traveloka". beget That's about the tweet on twitter. It seems that we must learn to be wise, not to enjoy the emotions that surround the mind. If it's like this, I even remember the Madura proverb: Duck is attellor, ajam is ngeremme' ducks that lay eggs, chickens that incubate. Ananda who is a WO, Traveloka, who must be stiff in dealing with problems.
berita_id: Walk Out (WO) pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur Dki Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, ternyata memiliki ekor panjang dan cenderung memimpin untuk memimpin.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh kerumunan yang menyerukan penghapusan aplikasi Traveloka.Apa yang menyebabkan tindakan berjalan ini diikuti oleh undangan dengan tagar #uninstalltraveloka?Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Kebetulan, dalam acara ini, Canisius Awards akan diberikan kepada 5 alumni dari berbagai generasi.Sebanyak 5 alumni disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (komposer & pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Berdasarkan berita yang beredar di timeline, pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Informasi ini kemudian memicu beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Traveloka ke Detikinet menanggapi berita tentang panggilan untuk memboikot layanannya.Aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan ini juga memberikan klarifikasi mengenai acara di acara Canisius College.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tuan Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.Tribunnews juga mengamati bahwa, setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh penerima penghargaan, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.Itu tidak ditulis, Traveloka CTO DERIANTO KUSUMA datang dan memberi selamat kepadanya.Saat menerima penghargaan, Ananda juga memiliki kesempatan untuk menyampaikan pidato 10 menit."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia memperoleh posisinya dengan cara yang tidak konsisten dengan nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Sikap dan pernyataan Ananda Sukarlan mungkin memang memicu debat, pro, dan kontra.Masalahnya adalah, mengapa ada berita bahwa bos Traveloka menyapa semuanya, tidakkah deriyanto datang?Jika kita mengikuti tagar ini tentang Traveloka, beberapa bahkan memasukkannya ke ranah jihad.Wow!"Ini adalah jihad termudah, cukup gunakan ibu jari Anda untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka".Lakukan itu tentang tweet di Twitter.Tampaknya kita harus belajar bijak, bukan untuk menikmati emosi yang mengelilingi pikiran.Jika seperti ini, saya bahkan ingat pepatah Madura: Bebek adalah Attellor, Ajam adalah bebek Ngeremme yang bertelur, ayam yang diinkubasi.Ananda yang merupakan WO, Traveloka, yang harus kaku dalam menangani masalah.

berita: Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI)? denied that his party did not accept the masses of Action 212 Volume II who were going to perform the Fajr prayer there. Previously, it was reported that the administrator of the largest mosque in Southeast Asia had deliberately closed the fence because he did not want the masses to perform the Fajr prayer there. That in order to optimize the security of the BPPMI mosque, the Istiqlal Mosque since 2002 has implemented a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30 WIB and opening them again in the morning at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer is held. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI," said BPPMI Public Relations Officer Abu Hurairah Abd Salam Tuesday (21/2/2017). in the early hours of February 21 2017, the security of the Istiqlal Mosque had explained to the congregation gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure. Thus, the demonstrators understood and were willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. stay as in previous conditions when Muslims held Action 411, 212, or 112. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter," he added. Abu added that the Istiqlal Mosque administrators always serve the people and strive for national unity and unity and always maintain the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that news-beri The negative statements that have been traverse spread on social media regarding the above are not in accordance with reality and tend to be provocation," he explained. Abu hopes that the Muslims will not be influenced by this irresponsible news. "The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by the Imam, Ustadz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers was approximately 240 people or 170 men and 70 women," he said.
berita_id: Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTiqlal (BPPMI)?Dibantah bahwa partainya tidak menerima massa aksi 212 Volume II yang akan melakukan doa Fajr di sana.Sebelumnya, dilaporkan bahwa administrator masjid terbesar di Asia Tenggara dengan sengaja menutup pagar karena dia tidak ingin massa melakukan doa Fajr di sana.Bahwa untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid BPPMI, masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menerapkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan membukanya lagi di pagi hari pukul 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr diadakan.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di wilayah masjid Istiqlal kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin dari pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI, "kata petugas hubungan masyarakat BPPMI Abu Hurairah Abd Salames pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017.Masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur ini.Abu menambahkan bahwa administrator masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani rakyat dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita-eri pernyataan negatif yang telah melintasi penyebaran di media sosial mengenai hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung menjadi provokasi, "jelasnya. Abu berharap bahwa umat Islam tidak akan dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak bertanggung jawab ini," implementasi dari saleMS, SalmaM, Salmal, hari ini.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang atau 170 pria dan 70 wanita, "katanya.

berita: Call for a boycott of Traveloka by uninstalling the Traveloka trending topic application on Twitter. The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became trending due to the walk out action of pianist Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was said to have greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Considered as support for Ananda's action, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Even the hashtags #UninstallTraveloka and #BoikotTraveloka are among the trending topics on Twitter in Indonesia. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Support Ananda Harassing Anies Baswedan, Boycott and #UninstallTraveloka Trending Andanda and Traveloka officials who are "Ahokers" are considered to be intolerant. The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. The Muhammadiyah youth also issued a statement of attitude, namely boycotting Traveloka because of the support of its owner, Derianto Kususma, against the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," said Syahrul in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin piano player served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul.
