berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Related to this, Anies called on his supporters to respect differences. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So implement there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Terkait dengan ini, ANIES meminta para pendukungnya untuk menghormati perbedaan."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi, terapkan tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata Anies.

berita: Jakarta, There is a behavior in society that pricks a needle or cuts a little skin on people who have had a stroke until the blood comes out. It is said that the goal is to facilitate the flow of blood that is blocked due to a stroke. the part where the needle is pierced so that the blood comes out is done on all the fingertips or in the ear. Then there is also the act of tugging at the ear if you see a stroke patient whose mouth is sticking out. Unfortunately, this action has absolutely no evidence and even tends to injure the sufferer. There is no empirical evidence for treating needle pricks or ear tugging as first aid for stroke. There are so many things in society that are misunderstood about various ways to be done during an emergency, for example pricking with a needle. Actually, this method is not empirically proven to cure the early phase of stroke, said Dr. Manfaluthy Hakim, SpS (K) from the department of neurology FKUI when contacted by detikHealth, Wednesday (07/04/2012). Dr. Luthy said the most appropriate way to treat stroke is to immediately take him to the hospital, this is because the success of a stroke is strongly influenced by time. Dr Luthy used to call the golden period for a stroke 3 hours after the initial attack. If they are helped during this golden period, the chances of recovery are greater than those who are helped too  late, said the doctor who was born in Jakarta 49 years ago. If you experience or see symptoms like these, you suddenly experience paralysis on one side of the body, speak sluggishly, tingling in one part of the body or become unconscious, you should immediately be taken to the hospital for treatment and treatment. Do not delay any longer or try to help self-medicate, because how quickly the patient gets the right help, the damage to the brain caused by a stroke can be minimized. People sometimes recognize the term mild stroke if the symptoms that appear are not too severe or only a few signs and symptoms appear. But society should not underestimate this condition. If we don't have the term mild, moderate or severe stroke, everything is the same, namely stroke and the treatment is the same. Because if you call it a mild stroke and there is no treatment, it can become a serious condition, he said. For example, the blockage in the brain is only a little but if it is not immediately taken to the hospital it can become severe, other conditions such as a ruptured blood vessel that has expanded can make the patient unable to be helped. Dr. Luthy revealed that based on data from Riskesdas in 2007 it was known that at the age of 55-64 years, both people living in cities and villages, stroke was the main cause of death.
berita_id: Jakarta, ada perilaku dalam masyarakat yang menusuk jarum atau memotong sedikit kulit pada orang -orang yang mengalami stroke sampai darah keluar.Dikatakan bahwa tujuannya adalah untuk memfasilitasi aliran darah yang diblokir karena stroke.Bagian di mana jarum ditusuk sehingga darah keluar dilakukan pada semua ujung jari atau di telinga.Lalu ada juga tindakan menarik telinga jika Anda melihat pasien stroke yang mulutnya mencuat.Sayangnya, tindakan ini sama sekali tidak memiliki bukti dan bahkan cenderung melukai penderita.Tidak ada bukti empiris untuk mengobati tusukan jarum atau menarik telinga sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk stroke.Ada begitu banyak hal di masyarakat yang disalahpahami tentang berbagai cara yang harus dilakukan selama keadaan darurat, misalnya menusuk dengan jarum.Sebenarnya, metode ini tidak terbukti secara empiris untuk menyembuhkan fase awal stroke, kata Dr. Manfaluthy Hakim, SPS (K) dari Departemen Neurologi FKUI ketika dihubungi oleh DetikHealth, Rabu (07/04/2012).Luthy mengatakan cara yang paling tepat untuk mengobati stroke adalah dengan segera membawanya ke rumah sakit, ini karena keberhasilan stroke sangat dipengaruhi oleh waktu.Dr Luthy biasa memanggil periode emas untuk stroke 3 jam setelah serangan awal.Jika mereka dibantu selama periode emas ini, peluang pemulihan lebih besar daripada mereka yang dibantu terlambat, kata dokter yang lahir di Jakarta 49 tahun yang lalu.Jika Anda mengalami atau melihat gejala seperti ini, Anda tiba -tiba mengalami kelumpuhan di satu sisi tubuh, berbicara dengan lamban, kesemutan di satu bagian tubuh atau menjadi tidak sadar, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit untuk perawatan dan perawatan.Jangan menunda lagi atau mencoba membantu obat-obatan sendiri, karena seberapa cepat pasien mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat, kerusakan otak yang disebabkan oleh stroke dapat diminimalkan.Orang terkadang mengenali istilah stroke ringan jika gejala yang muncul tidak terlalu parah atau hanya beberapa tanda dan gejala yang muncul.Tetapi masyarakat tidak boleh meremehkan kondisi ini.Jika kita tidak memiliki istilah stroke ringan, sedang atau parah, semuanya sama, yaitu stroke dan pengobatannya sama.Karena jika Anda menyebutnya stroke ringan dan tidak ada perawatan, itu bisa menjadi kondisi yang serius, katanya.Sebagai contoh, penyumbatan di otak hanya sedikit tetapi jika tidak segera dibawa ke rumah sakit, ia bisa menjadi parah, kondisi lain seperti pembuluh darah yang pecah yang telah diperluas dapat membuat pasien tidak dapat dibantu.Luthy mengungkapkan bahwa berdasarkan data dari Riskesdas pada tahun 2007 diketahui bahwa pada usia 55-64 tahun, baik orang yang tinggal di kota-kota dan desa, stroke adalah penyebab utama kematian.

berita: Dream - Since this morning, news has circulated on social media that the Istiqlal Mosque has been locked, so that some of the congregants participating in the 212th volume II action cannot perform the Fajr prayer. However, the Public Relations Officer of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, denied the rumors. He stated that the news was a hoax. "BPPMI states that the negative news that has been spread on social media regarding this (the Istiqlal Mosque is locked), is not in accordance with reality and tends to contain provocations," said Abu Hurairah at the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, Tuesday, February 21 2017. Abu said the Fajr prayer in congregation was still being held at the Istiqlal Mosque this morning. He noted, there were about 240 people who performed the Fajr prayer in congregation. "There are 170 men and 70 women," he said. Regarding the closure of mosques, Abu explained that the regulation has been implemented since 2002. Outside of Ramadan, the Istiqlal Mosque will be closed after Isha prayers until Fajr. "Since 2002, BPPMI has enforced rules to close gates every night at william henry gates 21.30 WIB and reopen them in the morning at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer is held," he said. Abu added that there were indeed a number of worshipers who came and stayed at the Istiqlal Mosque. They arrived from East Java using five buses. However, he said, BPPMI stated that it had not received any notification regarding the planned stay. So, permission to stay overnight was not given to the group last night. Abu admitted that the Istiqlal Mosque did allow the congregation of Action 411, 212 volume I and 112 to stay overnight. However, the action coordinator was asked to provide written information beforehand. "The Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the congregation gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area," he said. Abu asked Muslims not to be influenced by the dubious and irresponsible news. The news that circulated was in the form of a photo showing the masses with a skullcap. They were in front of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque at night. The news said the congregation was not allowed to perform the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque. The news went viral on Twitter with the hashtag Istiqlal Padlocked. A number of photos show a number of people praying in congregation on the side of the road.
berita_id: Mimpi - Sejak pagi ini, berita telah beredar di media sosial bahwa masjid Istiqlal telah dikunci, sehingga beberapa jemaat yang berpartisipasi dalam aksi Volume II ke -212 tidak dapat melakukan doa Fajr.Namun, petugas hubungan masyarakat dari Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, membantah desas -desus.Dia menyatakan bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah disebarkan di media sosial mengenai hal ini (masjid ISTIQLAL terkunci), tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi," kata Abu Hurairah di Masjid Istiqlal yang diadakan di Jakarta Tengah, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017. Abu Doa Majral ini.Dia mencatat, ada sekitar 240 orang yang melakukan doa fajr di jemaat."Ada 170 pria dan 70 wanita," katanya.Mengenai penutupan masjid, Abu menjelaskan bahwa peraturan tersebut telah diterapkan sejak tahun 2002. Di luar Ramadhan, masjid Istiqlal akan ditutup setelah doa Isha sampai Fajr."Sejak 2002, BPPMI telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap malam di William Henry Gates 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr diadakan," katanya.Abu menambahkan bahwa memang ada sejumlah penyembah yang datang dan tinggal di masjid Istiqlal.Mereka tiba dari Jawa Timur menggunakan lima bus.Namun, katanya, BPPMI menyatakan bahwa mereka belum menerima pemberitahuan tentang masa menginap yang direncanakan.Jadi, izin untuk menginap tidak diberikan kepada kelompok tadi malam.Abu mengakui bahwa masjid Istiqlal memang memungkinkan jemaat aksi 411, 212 volume I dan 112 untuk menginap.Namun, koordinator tindakan diminta untuk memberikan informasi tertulis sebelumnya."Pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat yang dikumpulkan di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah Masjid Istiqlal," katanya.Abu meminta umat Islam untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang meragukan dan tidak bertanggung jawab.Berita yang beredar dalam bentuk foto yang menunjukkan massa dengan tengkorak.Mereka berada di depan gerbang masjid Istiqlal di malam hari.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa jemaat tidak diizinkan melakukan doa Fajr di masjid Istiqlal.Berita itu menjadi viral di Twitter dengan hashtag istiqlal yang digembok.Sejumlah foto menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang berdoa di jemaat di sisi jalan.

berita: Previously, the Oral B brand of toothbrush was suddenly being discussed because the material used was Bristles. From the search results on Google, it is known that Bristles means sea urchin. So not a few who think the toothbrush is made of pig hair. Responding to the news, the Head of the North Sumatra Health Service, Usma Polita, said that his party was still looking for the truth about the news that the alleged toothbrush was made of pig hair. "Now I want to see the truth of this, because it really needs to be investigated whether it contains sea urchins or not. If it is proven, there must be MUI readiness to declare halal or not halal, we will work if there is such a statement," said Polita when met on Jalan Mangkara, Tuesday (8/3/2016). Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, who was met on a different occasion, said that if the toothbrush was proven to be made of pig bristles, it could be ascertained that the toothbrush was forbidden to use. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via short message. He further said that if it was later proven to contain sea urchins, then the MUI would take steps to prohibit the public from using the toothbrush. Not only that, the MUI enounce will also take action so that toothbrush products containing sea urchins are withdrawn from the market. (tribunnews.com)
berita_id: Sebelumnya, merek oral B dari sikat gigi tiba -tiba dibahas karena bahan yang digunakan adalah bulu.Dari hasil pencarian di Google, diketahui bahwa bulu berarti landak laut.Jadi tidak sedikit yang berpikir sikat gigi terbuat dari rambut babi.Menanggapi berita itu, kepala Dinas Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Usma Polita, mengatakan bahwa partainya masih mencari kebenaran tentang berita bahwa dugaan sikat gigi itu terbuat dari rambut babi."Sekarang saya ingin melihat kebenaran ini, karena itu benar -benar perlu diselidiki apakah itu mengandung bulu babi atau tidak. Jika terbukti, harus ada kesiapan MUI untuk menyatakan halal atau tidak halal, kita akan bekerja jika ada pernyataan seperti itu," kata Polita ketika bertemu di Jalan Mangkara, Selasa (8/3/2016).Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, yang bertemu pada kesempatan yang berbeda, mengatakan bahwa jika sikat gigi terbukti terbuat dari bulu babi, dapat dipastikan bahwa sikat gigi dilarang digunakan."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui pesan pendek.Dia lebih lanjut mengatakan bahwa jika kemudian terbukti mengandung bulu babi laut, maka MUI akan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk melarang masyarakat menggunakan sikat gigi.Tidak hanya itu, MUI Enounce juga akan mengambil tindakan sehingga produk sikat gigi yang mengandung landak laut ditarik dari pasar.(tribunnews.com)

berita: tirto.id - Kanisius College held an award night to commemorate its 90th anniversary at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). The award was given to five alumni across generations. One of them, the famous pianist, Ananda Sukarlan. In the award, the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan was also present. Anies was also lined up to give a speech. When Anies was giving a speech, Ananda Sukarlan suddenly stood up and immediately walked out of the room. In fact, Ananda had originally received the award with Derianto Kusuma (the founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Ananda's action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other attendees. However, the incident did not last long. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the event, Ananda and a number of alumni who had walked out returned to their seats. Ananda then gave a speech after receiving the award. In his speech, the composer of Rapsodia Nusantara explained his attitude in leaving the room. Ananda criticized the committee for inviting Anies to attend the event. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught," Ananda said in a written statement received by Tirto, Monday (11/13/2017). When contacted by the Editor of Tirto, Ananda did not deny the incident and his statement. He explained the chronology of himself leaving the room where the event was taking place. “Just when Anies talked about the development of Jakarta. What kind of building, is Tanah Abang so chaotic. If it's chaotic, it's not development," said Ananda. At that time, according to Ananda, he was sitting in the second row walk of seats. When he stood up and walked to the exit at the back, he admitted, many people saw him. When he walked out, said Ananda, a number of alumni of Kanisius College also followed him. Ananda admitted that he did not invite his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his classmates, namely the class of 1986. "I came back in half an hour after Anies left," said Ananda. Ananda reiterated that his attitude was not a form of personal hatred. According to him, the move is a criticism of the committee. However, he didn't care if Anies was offended. "There is no personal grudge. This is a critique to the committee. Why invite someone who gets his position is different from the values ​​taught. Not (hatred) on Anies," said Ananda. This incident was also circulated in a video uploaded on Facebook. However, Governor Anies Baswedan even admitted that he did not know that there was a famous composer who walked out when he gave a speech. Anies revealed that he only found out about the incident after arriving at the office. Anies was relaxed in response to that. "According to Eros Djarot, that does not reflect Kanisius' attitude," said Anies at City Hall, Central Jakarta, Monday afternoon. The former Minister of Education and Culture admitted that he respects differences in attitudes and views. Anies also said that he gave the right to anyone to express themselves in their own way. Anies also mentioned the obligation of a governor to protect his citizens. "If then there is a negative reaction, that's just a bonus," he said.
berita_id: TIRTO.ID - Kanisius College mengadakan malam penghargaan untuk memperingati ulang tahun ke -90nya di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Utara, Sabtu (11/11).Penghargaan tersebut diberikan kepada lima alumni lintas generasi.Salah satunya, pianis terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan.Dalam penghargaan tersebut, gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan juga hadir.Anies juga berbaris untuk memberikan pidato.Ketika Anies memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba berdiri dan segera berjalan keluar dari ruangan.Faktanya, Ananda awalnya menerima penghargaan itu dengan DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (seorang tokoh Yesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Farma Kalbe).Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan peserta lainnya.Namun, insiden itu tidak bertahan lama.Setelah Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan acara tersebut, Ananda dan sejumlah alumni yang telah keluar kembali ke tempat duduk mereka.Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato setelah menerima penghargaan.Dalam pidatonya, komposer Rapsodia Nusantara menjelaskan sikapnya meninggalkan ruangan.Ananda mengkritik komite karena mengundang anies untuk menghadiri acara tersebut."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda dalam pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Tirto, Senin (11/13/2017).Ketika dihubungi oleh editor Tirto, Ananda tidak menyangkal kejadian dan pernyataannya.Dia menjelaskan kronologi dirinya meninggalkan ruangan tempat acara itu berlangsung."Tepat ketika Anies berbicara tentang perkembangan Jakarta. Bangunan seperti apa, Tanah Abang begitu kacau. Jika kacau, itu bukan pengembangan," kata Ananda.Pada waktu itu, menurut Ananda, dia duduk di jalan setapak kursi kedua.Ketika dia berdiri dan berjalan ke pintu keluar di belakang, dia mengakui, banyak orang melihatnya.Ketika dia berjalan keluar, kata Ananda, sejumlah alumni Kanisius College juga mengikutinya.Ananda mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengundang teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang keluar banyak adalah teman sekelasnya, yaitu kelas tahun 1986. "Saya kembali dalam setengah jam setelah Anies pergi," kata Ananda.Ananda menegaskan bahwa sikapnya bukanlah bentuk kebencian pribadi.Menurutnya, langkah itu adalah kritik terhadap komite.Namun, dia tidak peduli jika Anies tersinggung."Tidak ada dendam pribadi. Ini adalah kritik bagi komite. Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang mendapatkan posisinya berbeda dari nilai -nilai yang diajarkan. Bukan (kebencian) pada anies," kata Ananda.Kejadian ini juga diedarkan dalam video yang diunggah di Facebook.Namun, Gubernur Anies Baswedan bahkan mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada seorang komposer terkenal yang berjalan keluar ketika dia memberikan pidato.Anies mengungkapkan bahwa dia hanya mengetahui tentang insiden itu setelah tiba di kantor.Anies santai dalam menanggapi itu."Menurut Eros Djarot, itu tidak mencerminkan sikap Kanisius," kata Anies di City Hall, Central Jakarta, Senin sore.Mantan Menteri Pendidikan dan Budaya mengakui bahwa ia menghormati perbedaan sikap dan pandangan.Anies juga mengatakan bahwa dia memberikan hak kepada siapa pun untuk mengekspresikan diri dengan cara mereka sendiri.Anies juga menyebutkan kewajiban seorang gubernur untuk melindungi warganya."Jika kalau begitu ada reaksi negatif, itu hanya bonus," katanya.

berita: The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Jakarta Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, responded to the news that the 212 volume II masses were not allowed to enter the mosque. He emphasized that the photos circulating on social media on Tuesday (21/2/17) morning were hoaxes or lies. "The news that there were 212 protesters unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu, Tuesday (21/2/17). He explained that on Monday night after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. The mosque administrators invited them to worship and clean themselves. Furthermore, the mosque administrator coordinated with the group leader who was accompanied by the police. After talking, they then voluntarily left the Istiqlal Mosque. Abu again explained that in accordance with the procedure, the Istiqlal Mosque outside the month of Ramadan was closed at 21.30 WIB and reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. Meanwhile, the photo of the congregation queuing at the gate of the mosque is a group of pilgrims from outside the city. Abu said they wanted to enter the mosque but the door only opened at 03.45 WIB. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were several pilgrims from outside the city who were about to come with enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 03.45 WIB. We apologize for this," said Abu.
berita_id: Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari Masjid Jakarta Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, menanggapi berita bahwa massa 212 Volume II tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid.Dia menekankan bahwa foto -foto yang beredar di media sosial pada hari Selasa (21/2/17) pagi adalah tipuan atau kebohongan."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu, Selasa (21/2/17).Dia menjelaskan bahwa pada Senin malam setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Selain itu, administrator masjid berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang ditemani oleh polisi.Setelah berbicara, mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal.Abu sekali lagi menjelaskan bahwa sesuai dengan prosedur, masjid Istiqlal di luar bulan Ramadhan ditutup pada 21.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar.Sementara itu, foto jemaat yang antri di gerbang masjid adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota.Abu mengatakan mereka ingin memasuki masjid tetapi pintu hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan datang dengan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada 03.45 Wib. Kami mohon maaf untuk ini," kata Abu.

berita: You may have heard the news that eating catfish can cause cancer. For those of you who like to eat catfish, news like this can certainly make you confused. Actually this issue is just a myth or fact, right? Come on, first check the truth of the issue of catfish that causes cancer below. Not all catfish cause cancer. Catfish are freshwater fish that contain a variety of important nutrients for the body, including protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and B-complex vitamins. So, catfish itself actually does not contain toxins or harmful substances that are cancer-causing (carcinogenic) in the human body. However, a number of studies reveal that certain catfish can indeed increase your risk of developing cancer. This is because the catfish has been contaminated with carcinogenic substances, not because of the natural content in the catfish itself. So, not all types of catfish cause cancer. Catfish from polluted waters can trigger the growth of cancer cells. Catfish can be contaminated with carcinogenic substances because they are cultivated in waters that have been contaminated with various types of pollutants (pollution-causing substances). A team of experts from the University of Pittsburgh School of the Health Sciences in the United States proved this in their research. Experts took extracts of catfish that grow in highly polluted waters. This extract is injected into breast cancer cells in the laboratory. The result, after being injected with contaminated catfish extract, it turns out that the cancer cells grow to multiply. After further investigation, it turns out that the catfish contains chemicals that are like the hormone estrogen in the human body. Estrogen levels that are too high in the body are known to increase the risk of breast cancer. The catfish tested by a team of experts was taken from waters that have been mixed with factory waste and human waste. So, this case is very similar to the case of mercury poisoning due to seafood consumption. The fish themselves are harmless. However, because water pollution has become so serious, the fish that live in these waters can also be polluted and eventually consumed by humans. So, can we mudcat still eat catfish? Don't be afraid, only catfish from polluted waters can increase the risk of cancer. Meanwhile, catfish obtained from catfish farms are safe for consumption by you and your family. Currently, catfish farming in Indonesia is regulated and supervised by the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries. The government itself already has special requirements for catfish cultivation, for example water sources, cleanliness of facilities, use of chemicals, catfish feed, and others. This requirement is regulated in CBIB (Good Fish Cultivation Method). So as long as the fish you choose comes from a farm that has a CBIB certificate, you don't have to worry about rumors from neighbors that catfish causes cancer Tips for safe eating catfish Even though catfish is considered safe for your health, sometimes it's difficult to determine which waters your catfish comes from. buy. Therefore, it never hurts to reduce the risk by limiting how often you eat catfish. In general, catfish is safe to eat two to three times a week. In addition, you can also remove the skin of the catfish before it is processed into food. The problem is, fish skin is usually the most easily polluted by pollutant substances in dirty waters. You should also vary your choice of side dishes each day. The more varied, the richer and more balanced the nutritional intake for your family's body.
berita_id: Anda mungkin pernah mendengar berita bahwa makan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Bagi Anda yang suka makan lele, berita seperti ini pasti bisa membuat Anda bingung.Sebenarnya masalah ini hanyalah mitos atau fakta, bukan?Ayo, pertama -tama periksa kebenaran masalah ikan lele yang menyebabkan kanker di bawah ini.Tidak semua ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar yang mengandung berbagai nutrisi penting untuk tubuh, termasuk protein, asam lemak omega-3, dan vitamin B-kompleks.Jadi, ikan lele itu sendiri sebenarnya tidak mengandung racun atau zat berbahaya yang menyebabkan kanker (karsinogenik) dalam tubuh manusia.Namun, sejumlah penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa ikan lele tertentu memang dapat meningkatkan risiko terkena kanker.Ini karena ikan lele telah terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik, bukan karena kandungan alami dalam lele itu sendiri.Jadi, tidak semua jenis ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Lele dari perairan yang tercemar dapat memicu pertumbuhan sel kanker.Lele dapat terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik karena mereka dibudidayakan di perairan yang telah terkontaminasi dengan berbagai jenis polutan (zat penyebab polusi).Sebuah tim ahli dari University of Pittsburgh School of Health Sciences di Amerika Serikat membuktikan hal ini dalam penelitian mereka.Para ahli mengambil ekstrak ikan lele yang tumbuh di perairan yang sangat tercemar.Ekstrak ini disuntikkan ke dalam sel kanker payudara di laboratorium.Hasilnya, setelah disuntikkan dengan ekstrak ikan lele yang terkontaminasi, ternyata sel kanker tumbuh berkembang biak.Setelah penyelidikan lebih lanjut, ternyata ikan lele mengandung bahan kimia yang seperti estrogen hormon dalam tubuh manusia.Kadar estrogen yang terlalu tinggi di tubuh diketahui meningkatkan risiko kanker payudara.Lele yang diuji oleh tim ahli diambil dari perairan yang telah dicampur dengan limbah pabrik dan limbah manusia.Jadi, kasus ini sangat mirip dengan kasus keracunan merkuri karena konsumsi makanan laut.Ikan itu sendiri tidak berbahaya.Namun, karena polusi air telah menjadi begitu serius, ikan yang hidup di perairan ini juga dapat tercemar dan akhirnya dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Jadi, bisakah kita masih makan lele?Jangan takut, hanya ikan lele dari perairan yang tercemar yang dapat meningkatkan risiko kanker.Sementara itu, ikan lele yang diperoleh dari peternakan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi oleh Anda dan keluarga Anda.Saat ini, pertanian lele di Indonesia diatur dan diawasi oleh Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan.Pemerintah sendiri sudah memiliki persyaratan khusus untuk budidaya ikan lele, misalnya sumber air, kebersihan fasilitas, penggunaan bahan kimia, pakan ikan lele, dan lainnya.Persyaratan ini diatur dalam CBIB (metode budidaya ikan yang baik).Jadi selama ikan yang Anda pilih berasal dari sebuah peternakan yang memiliki sertifikat CBIB, Anda tidak perlu khawatir tentang rumor dari tetangga bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan tips kanker untuk ikan lele yang aman meskipun ikan lele dianggap aman untuk kesehatan Anda, kadang -kadang sulit untuk menentukan air dari ikan lele Anda.membeli.Karena itu, tidak ada salahnya untuk mengurangi risiko dengan membatasi seberapa sering Anda makan lele.Secara umum, ikan lele aman untuk makan dua hingga tiga kali seminggu.Selain itu, Anda juga dapat menghilangkan kulit ikan lele sebelum diproses menjadi makanan.Masalahnya adalah, kulit ikan biasanya yang paling mudah tercemar oleh zat polutan di perairan kotor.Anda juga harus memvariasikan pilihan lauk pilihan Anda setiap hari.Semakin bervariasi, semakin kaya dan lebih seimbang asupan nutrisi untuk tubuh keluarga Anda.

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and it is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma to reporters when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (30/10). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. Even neighboring countries, Malaysia claim it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning was related fri to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma kepada wartawan ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (30/10).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran adalah Jumat terkait dengan idola dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: Twitter social media is busy discussing the invitation to revoke the application or uninstall Traveloka. The invitation was the result of a walk out action by renowned pianist Ananda Sukarlan at the 90th anniversary event of Kanisius College which was attended by the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan, Saturday 11 November 2017. As soon as Ananda left the meeting room, news circulated that one of the founders of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma greeted the pianist. The attitude of the Traveloka founder was seen by the public as support for harassment of Anies who son was giving a speech. The invitation to revoke the Traveloka application then became a trending topic on Twitter, with the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka. Twitter users are split into two voices; there are those who support the boycott of the Traveloka application, there are those who regret the excessive action. Traveloka provides an official answer to the rolling issue. According to Traveloka, there was misinformation from the widely circulated news. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," explained Traveloka in an official statement to VIVA. via email, Tuesday 14 November 2017. Traveloka stated that it was proud that one of the founders received an award from Kanisius alumni at the event. "This award further motivates us to increase our contribution to society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life," said Traveloka. Traveloka provides clarification about the dragging of their founder's name. Derianto was not present at the event, in contrast to the news circulating so far. Traveloka said that the news that Derianto came and greeted Ananda was a hoax, because at that time Derianto was outside Jakarta. "However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier. He was not in Jakarta," said Traveloka.
berita_id: Twitter Social Media sibuk mendiskusikan undangan untuk mencabut aplikasi atau menghapus instalan Traveloka.Undangan itu adalah hasil dari aksi walk out oleh pianis terkenal Ananda Sukarlan di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College yang dihadiri oleh gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan, Sabtu 11 November 2017. Segera setelah Ananda meninggalkan Ruang Rapat, beredar berita bahwa salah satu pendiri Travelers dari Travelers, Dere Dherian.Sikap pendiri Traveloka dipandang oleh publik sebagai dukungan untuk pelecehan anies yang putra memberikan pidato.Undangan untuk mencabut aplikasi Traveloka kemudian menjadi topik yang sedang tren di Twitter, dengan tagar #uninstalltraveloka.Pengguna Twitter dibagi menjadi dua suara;Ada yang mendukung boikot aplikasi Traveloka, ada yang menyesali tindakan berlebihan.Traveloka memberikan jawaban resmi untuk masalah bergulir.Menurut Traveloka, ada informasi yang salah dari berita yang diedarkan secara luas."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," jelas Traveloka dalam pernyataan resmi kepada Viva.melalui email, Selasa 14 November 2017. Traveloka menyatakan bahwa itu bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius di acara tersebut."Penghargaan ini semakin memotivasi kami untuk meningkatkan kontribusi kami kepada masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup," kata Traveloka.Traveloka memberikan klarifikasi tentang menyeret nama pendiri mereka.DeRianto tidak hadir di acara tersebut, berbeda dengan berita yang beredar sejauh ini.Traveloka mengatakan bahwa berita bahwa DeRianto datang dan menyapa Ananda adalah tipuan, karena pada saat itu Deraianto berada di luar Jakarta."Namun, dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Dia tidak berada di Jakarta," kata Traveloka.

berita: Alarmed by rumors that the Pokemon video game has elements of Jewish religion and culture, a Muslim asks a rabbi from Jerusalem to find out. According to Ben Abrahamson, founder of the Al Sadiqin Organization, a center for the study of Islamic and Jewish history, Pokemon has no meaning in Jewish culture. "It has no meaning in our culture," explained Ben on his personal Facebook page. "It comes from Japan and comes from Japanese video game culture, most of its symbols and writing appear in Japanese animation." However, Ben admits that there are also many people who don't like Pokemon. "A lot of people don't like it because it's a waste of time, it's selfish, and it makes one go wild astray on the internet," he replied, when told that Pokemon caused a lot of trouble among Muslims. In the comment section, Ben also quoted verse 6, Surah Al-Hujurat from the Quran to answer the rumors posted on the internet. The verse advises Muslims to research any news to determine its truth so that undesirable things do not befall a race and lead to regret. According to his website, Ben and Al Sadiqin find and explain the common heritage of Islam and Judaism, and reject the notion that the two religions have been enemies since time immemorial. For years, the rumor that Pokemon is a Jewish invention and has religious elements has been spread to Muslims through social media and the internet. According to the baseless accusation, "Pokemon" means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while the creature's names "Pikachu" and "Charmander" mean "be a Jew", and "God is weak". "Pokemon" is published by the Nintendo company, and its name is an abbreviation of the word "Pocket Monsters", referring to the 722 cute creatures that players collect in the video game. Recently, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria has suggested that Malaysia ban the "augmented reality" game application Pokemon Go because it is considered gambling. Pahang Mufti Datuk Seri Abdul Rahman Osman also thinks it should be banned if it is proven to contain elements of gambling.
berita_id: Khawatir oleh desas -desus bahwa video game Pokemon memiliki unsur -unsur agama dan budaya Yahudi, seorang Muslim meminta seorang rabi dari Yerusalem untuk mengetahuinya.Menurut Ben Abrahamson, pendiri Organisasi Al Sadiqin, sebuah pusat studi tentang sejarah Islam dan Yahudi, Pokemon tidak memiliki arti dalam budaya Yahudi."Tidak ada arti dalam budaya kita," jelas Ben di halaman Facebook pribadinya."Itu berasal dari Jepang dan berasal dari budaya video game Jepang, sebagian besar simbol dan tulisannya muncul dalam animasi Jepang."Namun, Ben mengakui bahwa ada juga banyak orang yang tidak suka Pokemon."Banyak orang tidak menyukainya karena buang -buang waktu, itu egois, dan itu membuat seseorang tersesat liar di internet," jawabnya, ketika diberitahu bahwa Pokemon menyebabkan banyak masalah di kalangan Muslim.Di bagian komentar, Ben juga mengutip ayat 6, Surah al-Hujurat dari Al-Quran untuk menjawab rumor yang diposting di internet.Ayat ini menyarankan umat Islam untuk meneliti berita apa pun untuk menentukan kebenarannya sehingga hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan tidak menimpa perlombaan dan mengarah pada penyesalan.Menurut situs webnya, Ben dan Al Sadiqin menemukan dan menjelaskan warisan umum Islam dan Yudaisme, dan menolak anggapan bahwa kedua agama telah menjadi musuh sejak dahulu kala.Selama bertahun -tahun, desas -desus bahwa Pokemon adalah penemuan Yahudi dan memiliki unsur -unsur agama telah menyebar ke Muslim melalui media sosial dan internet.Menurut tuduhan yang tidak berdasar, "Pokemon" berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" di Syria, sementara nama makhluk itu "Pikachu" dan "Charmander" berarti "menjadi seorang Yahudi", dan "Tuhan itu lemah"."Pokemon" diterbitkan oleh Nintendo Company, dan namanya adalah singkatan dari kata "monster saku", merujuk pada 722 makhluk lucu yang dikumpulkan pemain dalam video game.Baru -baru ini, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria telah menyarankan agar Malaysia melarang aplikasi game "augmented reality" Pokemon Go karena dianggap perjudian.Pahang mufti datuk seri Abdul Rahman Osman juga berpikir itu harus dilarang jika terbukti mengandung elemen perjudian.

berita: The Surabaya City Government continues to raid pacifiers which are indicated to contain drugs. The raid on candy packaged in green targeted three sub-districts, namely Genteng District, Rungkut District, and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan, Surabaya City, Yunus said that the raids had been carried out on three schools. “We raided SDN Pakis I, SDN Pakis II, and germ SDN Pakis IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result is 20 pacifiers," said Yunus, Tuesday (7/3/2017). The pacifier is suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy doesn't look like drugs, but rather like regular candy. “These candies were sold by street vendors around the school, and they were immediately confiscated. We confiscated it and took it to the sub-district office,” said Yunus. The officers who raided food and drinks at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan also found a number of hard candies. This candy is suspected to contain formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. “For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also confiscated it,” said Yunus.
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus menyerang dot yang diindikasikan mengandung narkoba.Penggerebekan permen yang dikemas dalam warna hijau menargetkan tiga sub-distrik, yaitu Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut, dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala Sawahan, Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa penggerebekan telah dilakukan di tiga sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, Sdn Pakis II, dan Germ Sdn Pakis IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dot," kata Yunus, Selasa (7/3/2017).Dot diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan, tetapi lebih seperti permen biasa."Permen ini dijual oleh pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah, dan mereka segera disita. Kami menyitanya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Petugas yang menggerebek makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan juga menemukan sejumlah permen keras.Permen ini diduga mengandung formaldehyde yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga menyitanya," kata Yunus.

berita: The activity of brushing teeth is certainly carried out every day, there are many various forms of toothbrushes in supermarkets or traditional markets, and also many materials used in the manufacture of toothbrushes. As a Muslim, you must be careful and thorough in knowing the ingredients or making a toothbrush that is currently used for brushing your teeth. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Generally it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are the steps to check it: Look at the package, if it is recorded from bristles, so it is made of sea urchins. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from pig bristles. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Risks when using what is forbidden: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, smear cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. Meanwhile, brushes are useful when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know where the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, usually come from China. The imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, etc. Are you familiar with various forms. Beware of painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, etc. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and food brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for applying makeup, and knives & spatulas for applying food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that it looks like the fur of other animals. (AND) Thus the explanation of the toothbrush or brush made of pig bristles. As a Muslim, be careful. Give this info to your family and friends skirmish so that more people can read it so that they are free from non-halal products. May be useful.
berita_id: Aktivitas menyikat gigi tentu saja dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak bentuk sikat gigi di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, Anda harus berhati -hati dan menyeluruh dalam mengetahui bahan -bahannya atau membuat sikat gigi yang saat ini digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut langkah -langkah untuk memeriksanya: lihat paket, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti itu, itu berarti digunakan untuk plastik.Ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis) menyelamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Apakah Anda tahu dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah kuas rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Waspadalah terhadap kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dll. Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan kuas makanan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk mengoleskan riasan, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengoleskan makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga terlihat seperti bulu hewan lain.(Dan) dengan demikian penjelasan sikat gigi atau sikat yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, hati -hati.Berikan info ini kepada keluarga dan teman-teman Anda yang bertengkar sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk non-halal.Mungkin berguna.

berita: The Pokemon Go game fever is being experienced by several countries, including Indonesia. Recently there has been an issue regarding the meaning of the word Pikachu which in Syriac means Be a Jew. Not a few sites provocative people spread this fake news. Worse yet, there's something using Muslim frills and so on. Is this true? Let us see the following explanation. Pikachu comes from Japanese and not Syriac. Pika comes from the word pikapika taken from the Japanese onomatopoeia which means: sparkling. In context this, it means the sparkle of an electric spark being struck. While Chu is from the word chuuchuu which means the sound of a squeaking mouse. Pikachu's name is taken because it was inspired by the animal Pika. This animal belongs to the Family Ochtonidae almost extinct in the world. He is described as having the power of electric shock glittering and shaped like a mouse. While Pokemon comes moslem from from Japanese English: English: Pocket Monsters Japanese: Poketto Monsuta Shortened to Pokemon Charmander said or in Hitokage in Japanese means Hi: Fire and Tokage: Lizard, monitor lizard. In English, Charmander: Char: burn or burn and Mander is taken from the word Salamander It is a species of salamander that is on the verge of extinction. The name Salamander is used for describes the Charmander who is a fire salamander that has the power of fire and can burn his enemies. How about Syriac itself? Jewish Words in English Syriac means Judaiya. There are absolutely no leading words on Pokemon or Pikachu itself. The words Be in Syriac are britha. There are no words referring to Pokemon or Pikachu. God's word in Syriac is Divine. My Words in Bahasa Syriac is "iwin". From the words above, no words referring to Pokemon or Pikachu So don't think that That Pokemon or Pikachu means I'm Jewish or Weak God and such. Share this article so that Our nation is not easily provoked by trivial things, especially about language
berita_id: Pokemon Go Game Fever sedang dialami oleh beberapa negara, termasuk Indonesia.Baru -baru ini ada masalah mengenai arti kata Pikachu yang di Syria berarti menjadi seorang Yahudi.Tidak beberapa situs, orang -orang provokatif menyebarkan berita palsu ini.Lebih buruk lagi, ada sesuatu yang menggunakan embel -embel Muslim dan sebagainya.Apakah ini benar?Mari kita lihat penjelasan berikut.Pikachu berasal dari bahasa Jepang dan bukan Syria.Pika berasal dari kata pikapika yang diambil dari Onomatopoeia Jepang yang berarti: berkilau.Dalam konteks ini, itu berarti kilauan percikan listrik yang dipukul.Sementara Chu berasal dari kata Chuuchuu yang berarti suara tikus yang mencicit.Nama Pikachu diambil karena terinspirasi oleh hewan Pika.Hewan ini milik keluarga Ochtonidae hampir punah di dunia.Dia digambarkan memiliki kekuatan sengatan listrik berkilauan dan berbentuk seperti tikus.Sementara Pokemon datang dari Muslim dari dari Jepang Bahasa Inggris: Bahasa Inggris: Monster Pocket Jepang: Poketto Monsuta disingkat menjadi Pokemon Charmander berkata atau dalam hitokage dalam bahasa Jepang berarti HI: Api dan Tokage: Lizard, Monitor Lizard.Dalam bahasa Inggris, Charmander: Char: Burn atau Burn dan Mander diambil dari kata salamander itu adalah spesies salamander yang berada di ambang kepunahan.Nama Salamander digunakan untuk menggambarkan Charmander yang merupakan salamander api yang memiliki kekuatan api dan dapat membakar musuh -musuhnya.Bagaimana dengan Syria itu sendiri?Kata -kata Yahudi dalam bahasa Inggris Syria berarti judaiya.Sama sekali tidak ada kata -kata terkemuka di Pokemon atau Pikachu itu sendiri.Kata -kata berada di Syria adalah Britha.Tidak ada kata yang mengacu pada Pokemon atau Pikachu.Firman Tuhan di Syria adalah ilahi.Kata -kata saya di Syria Bahasa adalah "Iwin".Dari kata -kata di atas, tidak ada kata -kata yang mengacu pada Pokemon atau Pikachu jadi jangan berpikir bahwa Pokemon atau Pikachu berarti saya adalah dewa Yahudi atau lemah dan semacamnya.Bagikan artikel ini sehingga bangsa kita tidak mudah diprovokasi oleh hal -hal sepele, terutama tentang bahasa

berita: The current Pokemon Go has attracted so much interest from the world community. The game fever has also been disturbed by negative news about the game. There are links circulating on social media that say Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. But is it true? Here's the explanation. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. word Reporting from the Los Angeles Times edition of April 24, 2001, countries located in the Middle East region have indeed had problems with this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence to confirm the rumors. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. But whatever it means, we as Muslims should leave things that are useless or not useful, like the words of the Prophet SAW

Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi dengan ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Tapi apa pun artinya, kita sebagai Muslim harus meninggalkan hal -hal yang tidak berguna atau tidak berguna, seperti kata -kata yang dilihat Nabi

berita: In various local media, news spread widely that Mother Illiza (Mayor of Banda Aceh) forbade Pokemon Go. The reason is because it means 'I am Jewish'. This was obtained by the mother through various news related to the meaning of the word Pokemon which was shared with her through various online media. I came to know about this reason after Mother later apologized to the public regarding her statement that forbids Pokemon Go. "Sorry if anyone offended Pokemon GO fans. I didn't mean anything, I commented that because of the many news that was shared with me about the meaning of Pokemon," the mother requested. There is no point in exaggerating this matter. There is also no purpose to harass the Mother, let alone question the Mother's Indonesian spelling and grammar, which in my opinion there are still many mistakes here and there. I am quite appreciative of his apology. Because we rarely find leaders who voluntarily apologize if they are wrong. I remember very well reading an article about the meaning of the word Pokemon 3 months ago through an online media in Indonesia. This media quoted it from dailymirror. He said, in Iraq Pokemon cartoons were banned during the reign of Saddam Hussein. Furthermore, the media explained that the ban was revealed through an Iraqi state document confiscated by American troops in 2004. The document said that the ban was carried out because of its negative meaning in the Syriac language (Syrian language) used by that country. Still according to the document, Pokemon is said to be very similar to the same term in that language which if interpreted in Indonesian is 'I am Jewish'. Likewise with the characters Pikachu and Charmander. These two words respectively in Syriac mean 'Be a Jew' and 'God Is Weak'. That's why Saddam was "allergic" to the terms in this Pokemon cartoon that (still according to the document) he banned them to prevent Jewish influences from entering the nation's children and banning culture. I think this is where the initial news spread that Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". As a result, some people are against this term because they hate Jews (perhaps). Regardless of whether or not there is such a document or there is a “shrimp behind the dent” in the news by America, I try to find a common thread. I concluded then that there were some people who misunderstood the news. Either because I only heard from other people, just read the title, or misinterpreted it after reading it. Mistakes like that are commonplace because there is no ivory that is not cracked. However, it is very unfortunate because it can cause extraordinary commotion among the people due to the birth of a misleading "fatwa" without first crosschecking. If it is true that Saddam Husein banned Pokemon from showing in his country for reasons as quoted by the online media, we need to be careful to understand that he banned it because the word which is almost the same form is also in his language. It's just that coincidence has a negative meaning. So, in this case Saddam Husein compares the words produced by other countries (Japan as the country of Pokomen) with the language of his country. Attempts to interpret a word between one language and another because the form is the same, but the meaning is actually different in language review is commonplace and need not be a problem as long as it does not result in misunderstanding, let alone blind imitation. In fact, many of the world's language vocabularies have the same shape as other linguistic vocabularies, but have negative meanings, and this is not accidental. I remember exactly the largest car manufacturer in India, Tata Motors, changing the name of its newest car at that time, namely Zica. The reason, the name is similar to the name of a virus that is endemic in the United States. Likewise with the name of the Chevrolet Nova car made by General Motors which had to be replaced when it was sold in Spanish-speaking countries because it meant "not working". Likewise with the Mitsubishi Pajero. This car also does not sell well in Spanish-speaking countries because the Pajero in Spanish means 'lazy' or 'unreliable'. Even more ridiculous is the Mercedes Benz Vito. This car is guaranteed not to be sold in Sweden because "Vito" means 'female genitals'. So, because of the negative meaning of these words, many cars do not sell in the country of destination of the car manufacturer. All solely because of the negative meaning it carries. Perhaps there is a certain belief by the people who use the language if the car is purchased. Call it for example the Chevrolet Nova which means 'not working' or the Pajero 'lazy'. People who use this language may believe that if purchased, this car will not run or be tough in the field. However, in fact we do not see that. So, why did the car sell well in Indonesia, as well as in Aceh? Yes, of course because these words do not exist in our language. Now, after we know these names have negative meanings in Spanish, are we then reluctant to buy them or resell them to those who have already bought them? Of course not, not because these cars have proven to be tough in the field. Even if it is damaged or doesn't work, it's certainly not because of a negative meaning, but simply because of certain damage to the car. There is a similarity in the form of a word in a language with another language, but it has a negative meaning, of course, not only in the languages ​​of the world. We also have our language. Call it, for example, between the Acehnese language and the Gayo language. The Acehnese language has a utôh vocabulary which means 'builder'. However, when it comes to the Gayo language, words that are almost the same in form and pronunciation have negative meanings in that language. So, because of its negative meaning in the Gayo language, is it then forbidden to use the word utôh in the Acehnese language? Of course not not. The proof is that we still use it to this day and it doesn't need to be banned, it is said that it is again forbidden. Such cases do not only occur between languages, but also within a language. Call it the word ipôk (Acehnese language used by some people in the south-west region). In the Acehnese language in this area, ipôk means 'pocket', but will be laughed at by some Acehnese speakers in the eastern region because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese dialect of that area. Because of this, users of the Acehnese language in the south-west region certainly don't have to bother looking for other words or force themselves to use balum which is considered to have the same meaning as ipôk and does not seem negative. Likewise, the users of the Acehnese language in the eastern region. They certainly don't need to replace or use lumus to find another word for boh pik 'gambas' because of its negative meaning in the Acehnese language in the south-west region. The same case also occurs in Indonesian. We don't need to complain about finding a substitute for my word with another pronoun because the origin of the word is from sahaya which means 'slave'. Likewise, looking for a substitute for the word champion because of its negative initial meaning, namely the activity of fighting cocks. Of course it's pointless and pointless. Why did all that happen? The answer, of course, is that language has a close relationship with the culture of its speakers. The Acehnese language is very closely related to the culture of the Acehnese language user community itself. The same goes for the Spanish I mentioned above. This relationship, in my opinion, is one-way (only between the language and the user of that language). So, it can't be related to other people's cultures, which of course have different languages. Indonesian language associated with the Suriani language certainly does not "fit" because of its culture. Likewise, the word Pokemon used by Japan will never be compatible with the Suriani language, let alone with Indonesian. The Acehnese language associated with the Gayo language will also not be in sync, again because of the culture. It is unimaginable that quite a number of words must be replaced when two or more languages ​​are harmonized in meaning because of the same form and pronunciation. Even if it is forced, there will be a cultural clash that results in uproar in society. Therefore, be wise in language and understand the language. Remember, language can be a source of conflict if misused.

Some people believe that a needle prick in the ear is the first aid for a stroke. Turns out, the information was wrong. You may have read posts on social media or know information about the method of needling in the earlobe as first aid for stroke. This message even continues to be spread over and over and many still believe it. The message explains how the first action should be taken in stroke patients. If the patient falls like in the bathroom or bedroom, you are advised not to move him anywhere. Next, it is recommended that you take a needle and sterilize it and then insert it into your fingers. After that, spit out the victim's blood a drop or two. Still according to the message, if the patient's mouth is tilted, then pull the two earlobe until they are red and immediately pierce the bottom of the earlobe with a sterile needle until approximately 1-2 drops of blood comes out. This is believed to launch and help oxygen enter the body of stroke patients. What is the medical view regarding this information? Piercing the ear with a needle for a stroke is just a public belief, but has not been scientifically proven. We as nurses must be evidence based. I do not recommend it be done in stroke patients. Correct information must be conveyed, said Ns. Enny Mulyatsih, S.Kep, M.Kep, Sp. KMB, Head of Nursing at the National Brain Center Hospital, told Depok News after a Nursing Seminar and Workshop on Latest Effective Handling Innovations, Education and Home Care Opportunities for Stroke Patients by the Madaniah Health Training Center at the Nursing Sciences Clump, University of Indonesia, Saturday (22/8/ 2015). Ns. Dede Suhartini, S.Kep as the Head of the Stroke Unit of the RSCM also did not find a rational link between needling in the earlobe and stroke. What does this have to do with a stroke whose blood vessels free base are deprived of oxygen, and the blood is expelled? No data yet. If there is evidence based and results, we can do it, he said. Both emphasize, if you find a family member or someone having a stroke, immediately take first aid measures. Find a place that is roomy and safe, lie down with the patient's head at a 30-degree angle, and maintain a smooth airway by supporting the chin and not giving food or drink to prevent choking. Perform first aid on the way to the hospital. The first aid was proven to be able to maintain a smooth airway before the patient was taken to the hospital to be fitted with infusion and oxygen. Public road officers in Indonesia should be given first aid training against stroke attacks, such as traffic police, firefighters, and toll road officers, as well as the general public, concluded Enny.
berita_id: Beberapa orang percaya bahwa tusukan jarum di telinga adalah pertolongan pertama untuk stroke.Ternyata, informasinya salah.Anda mungkin telah membaca posting di media sosial atau mengetahui informasi tentang metode tusuk jarum di daun telinga sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk stroke.Pesan ini bahkan terus tersebar berulang -ulang dan banyak yang masih mempercayainya.Pesan tersebut menjelaskan bagaimana tindakan pertama harus diambil pada pasien stroke.Jika pasien jatuh seperti di kamar mandi atau kamar tidur, Anda disarankan untuk tidak memindahkannya ke mana pun.Selanjutnya, disarankan agar Anda mengambil jarum dan mensterilkannya dan kemudian memasukkannya ke jari -jari Anda.Setelah itu, keluarkan satu atau dua darah korban.Masih sesuai dengan pesan, jika mulut pasien dimiringkan, lalu tarik kedua daun telinga sampai merah dan segera menembus bagian bawah daun telinga dengan jarum steril sampai sekitar 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Ini diyakini meluncurkan dan membantu oksigen memasuki tubuh pasien stroke.Apa pandangan medis mengenai informasi ini?Menusuk telinga dengan jarum untuk stroke hanyalah keyakinan publik, tetapi belum terbukti secara ilmiah.Kita sebagai perawat harus berdasarkan bukti.Saya tidak merekomendasikan itu dilakukan pada pasien stroke.Informasi yang benar harus disampaikan, kata NS.Enny mulyatsih, s.kep, m.kep, sp.KMB, Kepala Perawat di Rumah Sakit Pusat Otak Nasional, mengatakan kepada Depok News setelah seminar keperawatan dan lokakarya tentang inovasi penanganan efektif terbaru, pendidikan dan peluang perawatan di rumah untuk pasien stroke oleh Madanaha Health Training Center di Ilmu Keperawatan Clump, University of Indonesia, Sabtu (22/8/2015).Ns.Dede Suhartini, S.Kep sebagai kepala unit stroke RSCM juga tidak menemukan hubungan rasional antara tusuk jarum di telinga dan stroke.Apa hubungannya ini dengan stroke yang pembuluh darahnya bebas dari oksigen, dan darah dikeluarkan?Belum ada data.Jika ada bukti dan hasilnya, kita bisa melakukannya, katanya.Keduanya menekankan, jika Anda menemukan anggota keluarga atau seseorang yang mengalami stroke, segera ambil tindakan pertolongan pertama.Temukan tempat yang lapang dan aman, berbaring dengan kepala pasien pada sudut 30 derajat, dan memelihara jalan napas yang halus dengan menopang dagu dan tidak memberikan makanan atau minuman untuk mencegah tersedak.Lakukan pertolongan pertama dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit.Pertolongan pertama terbukti dapat mempertahankan jalan napas yang halus sebelum pasien dibawa ke rumah sakit untuk dilengkapi dengan infus dan oksigen.Petugas jalan umum di Indonesia harus diberikan pelatihan pertolongan pertama terhadap serangan stroke, seperti polisi lalu lintas, petugas pemadam kebakaran, dan petugas jalan tol, serta masyarakat umum, menyimpulkan ENNY.

berita: Rumors circulated that there had been a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017). From the information compiled, as quoted by a social media channel, it was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were outraged by the news that the wardens were suspected of harassing the Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ..." That's the excerpt from the release of #AlfathChannel, which spread on social media. In addition, viral videos and photos were also circulated during the riots and the detainees waving the monotheism flag. In the video, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimbob detention cell looks shattered, there are also broken glass and wood that the prisoners break down. Meanwhile, the screams of takbir of the prisoners resounded. However, there were also other prisoners who tried to calm the atmosphere. After the riots, it was reported that the atmosphere was starting to become conducive, the warden of the Mako Brimod Detention Center was reported to have tried to invite the detainees to negotiate. Until this news inch was revealed, there has been no release of clarification from the Mako Brimob Detention Center
berita_id: Rumor beredar bahwa telah terjadi kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Dari informasi yang disusun, seperti dikutip oleh saluran media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah oleh berita bahwa para penjaga diduga melecehkan Al -Qur'an dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako, situasi saat ini masih tegang ..." Itu adalah kutukan dari rilis #fathchannel, mana yang disebar sosial. "Selain itu, video viral dan foto juga diedarkan selama kerusuhan dan tahanan mengibarkan bendera monoteisme.Dalam video itu, suasana sel penahanan Mako Brimbob terlihat hancur, ada juga pecahan kaca dan kayu yang dihancurkan oleh para tahanan.Sementara itu, teriakan takbir para tahanan bergema.Namun, ada juga tahanan lain yang mencoba menenangkan suasana.Setelah kerusuhan, dilaporkan bahwa atmosfer mulai menjadi kondusif, sipir Pusat Penahanan Brimod Mako dilaporkan telah mencoba mengundang tahanan untuk bernegosiasi.Sampai inci berita ini terungkap, belum ada rilis klarifikasi dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob

berita: Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta on Monday (05/06/2017) quoted from Qibla However, if negative content and bad content spreader accounts cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed and blocked, he judged that this action was in accordance with the law. "But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it is needed later, yes, it must be," he said.
