Furthermore, Rudy said he would establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa great deal is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he concluded.[]
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita wewenang, tentu saja menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta pada hari Senin (05/06/2017 yang dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat disebarkan, konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh Qibla."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, ya, itu pasti," katanya.Selain itu, Rudy mengatakan dia akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa yang sangat besar adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, saya akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," pungkasnya. []

berita: The Pokemon hunting fever with the latest game from Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs called Pokemon Go seems to have caused quite a lot of public opinion. Because of the trend of this game, various negative issues are milling about, through various social media, several individuals claim that Pokemon Go is a product that is deliberately created to destroy certain religions. What is surprising is that the name "Pokemon Go" is interpreted as the word "I am Jewish" which is said to be taken from the Syriac language, as well as the meaning of the names of Pokemon monsters such as Pikachu which means "Be Jewish" and the lizard monster named Charmander which means "God". It's Weak". Not a few lay people who believe this stimulate argument, even so the argument was immediately dismissed by Pokemon lovers who have studied the story from the beginning as quoted from the kaskus.com forum as follows: Pokemon is taken from the word Pocket monster. Monsters in a pocket, the theme of pokemon. Collect and train monsters (a fictional world where on earth everything is created by pokemon and pokemon are scattered everywhere instead of ordinary animals) to become the greatest trainer and master. Pikachu Derived from the combination of the words "Pika" and "Chu". Pika is the name of a Japanese rat-like animal. While "Chu" itself is a word used to describe the sound of a mouse (a kind of "cit-cit" here). In essence, yes a mouse-shaped monster. Raichu The difference is, "Rai" is a kanji reading which means lightning. Those who play yugioh know "Raigeki" (meaning lightning attack). Or does anyone know the god Raijin? Raichu means maybe the thunder that makes the sound of a mouse. Charmander Derived from the English "Char" which can mean charcoal or burn to charcoal and "Salamander" or fire lizard (because it is red). A salamander that can burn to charcoal. Charmeleon Same, only with the combination of the words "Chameleon", the lizard that can change color, bro. Charizard Same, the ending is "Lizard", meaning lizard. So now it's clear right?
berita_id: Pokemon Hunting Fever dengan game terbaru dari Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs yang disebut Pokemon Go tampaknya telah menyebabkan cukup banyak opini publik.Karena tren permainan ini, berbagai masalah negatif sedang berseliweran, melalui berbagai media sosial, beberapa orang mengklaim bahwa Pokemon Go adalah produk yang sengaja diciptakan untuk menghancurkan agama -agama tertentu.Yang mengejutkan adalah bahwa nama "Pokemon Go" ditafsirkan sebagai kata "Saya orang Yahudi" yang dikatakan diambil dari bahasa Syria, serta makna nama -nama monster Pokemon seperti Pikachu yang berarti "menjadi Yahudi" dan monster kadal bernama Charmander yang berarti "Tuhan".Itu lemah ". Tidak sedikit orang awam yang percaya argumen yang merangsang ini, meskipun demikian argumennya segera diberhentikan oleh pecinta Pokemon yang telah mempelajari kisah itu dari awal seperti yang dikutip dari forum Kaskus.com sebagai berikut: Pokemon diambil dari kata -kata monster di mana semua monster di mana saku di mana saku, tema pokemon. Kumpulkan dan kumpulkan dan pelatihan monster (sebuah monster di mana pun dari dunia dan monster di mana saku di mana saku, tema pokememon. Kumpulkan dan pelatihan monster (sebuah monster yang terisir dan monster di mana saku, tema pokememon. Kumpulkan dan pelatihan monster (sebuah monster yang terisir dan monster di mana saku, tema Pokemon. Kumpulkan dan melatih monster (sebuah monster ficion.hewan biasa) untuk menjadi pelatih dan tuan terbesar.Petir."Chameleon", kadal yang dapat berubah warna, bro.

berita: Head of the Press, Media and Information Bureau of the Presidential Secretariat (Setpres) Bey Machmudin denied that reports that President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) had received a salary increase were not true. Law Number 7 of 1978 express concerning Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President and Former Presidents and Vice Presidents, said Bey in a press release, Wednesday (28/6/2017) afternoon. The Presidential Decree states, in Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. According to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary of a state official (Chairman of the DPR, MA, BPK) is Thus, the amount of the President's Basic Salary per month is six times the salary, which is Rp. 30240000. Meanwhile, the Vice President's Basic Salary is four times that of the salary, which is Rp. 20160000, explained Bey. According to Bey, the Vice President every month, in accordance with Presidential Decree No. 68/2001, which is Rp. 32500000 for the President and Rp. 22000000 for the Vice-President. Thus, the amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001, said Bey.
berita_id: Kepala Biro Pers, Media dan Informasi Sekretariat Presiden (Setpres) Bey Machmudin membantah bahwa laporan bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) telah menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar.Hukum Nomor 7 dari 1978 Express tentang hak keuangan/administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden dan mantan presiden dan wakil presiden, kata Bey dalam siaran pers, Rabu (28/6/2017) sore.Dekrit presiden menyatakan, dalam Pasal 2 hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar presiden enam kali lipat gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat di Indonesia selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat negara (ketua DPR, MA, BPK) dengan demikian, jumlah gaji pokok presiden per bulan adalah enam kali gaji, yaitu RP.30240000. Sementara itu, gaji dasar Wakil Presiden adalah empat kali lipat dari gaji, yaitu RP.20160000, jelas Bey.Menurut Bey, wakil presiden setiap bulan, sesuai dengan Keputusan Presiden No. 68/2001, yang merupakan Rp.32500000 untuk Presiden dan RP.22000000 untuk Wakil Presiden.Dengan demikian, jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh Presiden dan Wakil Presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001, kata Bey.

berita: The circulation of candy allegedly containing hazardous materials for children was raided by Pol PP along with other teams in 14 sub-districts in Surabaya, Tuesday (7/3/2017). A joint team consisting of Satpol PP, Puskesmas officers, Polsek and Koramil raided the stalls of hawker and snack vendors looking for the candy. Quoted from Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Head of the Civil Service Police Unit (Kasatpol PP) of Surabaya City said that from the findings of candy snacks sold by food vendors near an elementary school in the Peneleh area, the packaging was confirmed to have a distribution permit. "Of the 3 types of candy that were raided (Hard candy, bottled candy in teat bottles and candy in the shape of a sheep) each package was equipped with a distribution permit, but it was suspected that the distribution permit was fake," said Irvan Widyanto to reporters who met him. From the findings in the field, the packaging of candy snacks in teat bottles is equipped with a distribution permit ML 224409003077. The writing on the distribution permit indicates the type of food from abroad and is produced by Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff, nestling China. As for the candy snacks with the brand of Hard Candy, and the Penguin brand, imported by PT. Petrona Inti Chemindo, West Jakarta, DKI Jakarta, with a distribution permit valid until 19-08-2018. Irvan added that the security for the hundreds of candy snacks will then be handed over to the Surabaya City Health Office (Dinkes) for laboratory testing at the Surabaya POM Center. "We want to know the content of hazardous materials in it. It will take approximately 1 week. Furthermore, the raids and security that we have started on Monday (6/3/2017) will be continued to 31 sub-districts throughout Surabaya," said Irvan Widyanto. Meanwhile, hazil security around 5 stalls of traders and 1 wholesaler of children's snacks in Wonokromo District, Tuesday (7/3/2017) found 340 bottles of candy with the brand "Permen Keras" which are included in the category that must be secured.(ss/j1)
berita_id: Sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung bahan berbahaya untuk anak-anak digerebek oleh Pol PP bersama dengan tim lain di 14 sub-distrik di Surabaya, Selasa (7/3/2017).Sebuah tim gabungan yang terdiri dari Satpol PP, Puskesmas Petugas, Polsek dan Koramil menggerebek kios penjaja dan penjual makanan ringan yang mencari permen.Dikutip dari Suarasurabaya.net, Irvan Widyanto, Kepala Unit Polisi Sipil (Kasatpol PP) dari Surabaya City mengatakan bahwa dari temuan camilan permen yang dijual oleh penjual makanan di dekat sekolah dasar di daerah Peneleh, kemasan dikonfirmasi memiliki izin distribusi."Dari 3 jenis permen yang digerebek (permen keras, permen botol dalam botol dot dan permen dalam bentuk domba) setiap paket dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi, tetapi diduga bahwa izin distribusi itu palsu," kata Irvan Widyanto kepada wartawan yang bertemu dengannya.Dari temuan di lapangan, pengemasan camilan permen dalam botol dot dilengkapi dengan izin distribusi ML 224409003077. Penulisan pada izin distribusi menunjukkan jenis makanan dari luar negeri dan diproduksi oleh Xiamen Yang Wan Fightuff, Nestling China.Adapun Candy Snacks dengan merek permen keras, dan merek penguin, diimpor oleh Pt.Petrona Ini Chemindo, Jakarta Barat, DKI Jakarta, dengan izin distribusi berlaku hingga 19-08-2018.Irvan menambahkan bahwa keamanan untuk ratusan camilan permen kemudian akan diserahkan ke Kantor Kesehatan Kota Surabaya (Dinkes) untuk pengujian laboratorium di Pusat Pom Surabaya."Kami ingin mengetahui kandungan bahan berbahaya di dalamnya. Butuh sekitar 1 minggu. Selain itu, penggerebekan dan keamanan yang telah kami mulai pada hari Senin (6/3/2017) akan dilanjutkan ke 31 sub-distrik di seluruh Surabaya," kata Irvan Widyanto.Sementara itu, keamanan hazil sekitar 5 kios pedagang dan 1 pedagang grosir anak -anak di distrik Wonokromo, Selasa (7/3/2017) menemukan 340 botol permen dengan merek "Permen Kera" yang termasuk dalam kategori yang harus diamankan. (SS/J1)

berita: The Pokemon GO game fever that has recently occurred, has in fact been able to attract a lot of attention from various circles, including high-ranking officials in this country. Even recently the Mayor of Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, instructed not to play the Pokemon GO game because it means I am Jewish. "And the pokemon have all been spread in electronic media, it turns out that it means that I am a Jew," said Illiza at a halal bi halal event with all officials and staff in the Banda Aceh City Government. Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal's statement was not only conveyed in a halal bi halal event, he also tweeted on his Twitter account about the dangers of playing Pokemon GO which means I am Jewish. Suddenly, the tweet immediately got a lot of responses from Indonesian netizens who were famous for being critical. mayor of banda aceh “@Illizaa Ma'am, I'm a Muslim too. Mother's statement is not true, and it becomes slander, Mom. Iqra, Mrs. Read a lot. Mayor, you have to be wise," said the @risa_te account. “@Illizaa Pokemon means it's Pocket Monster boo. The Japanese say 'Poketo Monsuta' that's why there is no c in the 'poke'. Is this the mayor? chirping @jsoekahar. Banda Aceh Mayor Illiza Sa'aduddi is not the first person to raise the strange bin magic theory about the meaning of the Pokemon. Previously, there were many broadcast messages and Facebook links floating around the issue that I was a Jew from Pokemon. It was explained that Pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means I am Jewish and Pikachu is be Jewish then Charmander means God is weak. What is Syriac, and does Pokemon really mean I'm Jewish? Although it is also known as the Syrian language, Syriac is not the official language of the country (Syria's official language is Arabic). Syriac is spoken mostly by the minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. The first news about the meaning of the word Pokemon from Syriac or Syriac emerged when the LA Times reported rumors of Arab countries' concerns about the invasion of Pokemon and other foreign cultures on April 24, 2001. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plan to corrupt the minds of generations it our youth for offending blasphemous thoughts, making fun of Allah and our moral values ​​so it is very dangerous for our young generation,” said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​a former member of the Jordanian parliament. The statement immediately received a rebuttal from the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church through the Jordanian Amman newspaper. It says that there is no connection between Syriac and the names of the characters in the Pokemon game, let alone to the point that it means I'm Jewish or be Jewish. As mentioned on the official website, Pokemon stands for Pocket Monster. Likewise with Pikachu which consists of two words, Pika and Chu, where Pika is the name for a small mouse and chu in Japanese means squeak. No wonder the most famous monster in Pokemon is in the form of a mouse. Or Charmander derived from Char (burning) and Salamander (amphibians such as lizards). It can be seen that the creators of this Pokemon only provide simple and easy to remember character names without the need to tire of learning Syriac or Syriac.
berita_id: Pokemon Go Game Fever yang baru-baru ini terjadi, sebenarnya mampu menarik banyak perhatian dari berbagai lingkaran, termasuk pejabat tinggi di negara ini.Bahkan baru -baru ini walikota Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, diperintahkan untuk tidak memainkan game Pokemon Go karena itu berarti saya Yahudi."Dan Pokemon semuanya telah tersebar di media elektronik, ternyata itu berarti bahwa saya seorang Yahudi," kata Illiza di acara halal halal halal dengan semua pejabat dan staf di pemerintah kota Banda Aceh.Pernyataan Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal tidak hanya disampaikan dalam acara halal halal halal, ia juga tweet di akun Twitter -nya tentang bahaya bermain Pokemon Go yang berarti saya orang Yahudi.Tiba -tiba, tweet itu segera mendapat banyak tanggapan dari netizen Indonesia yang terkenal karena kritis.Walikota Banda Aceh “@illizaa Ma'am, saya juga seorang Muslim. Pernyataan ibu tidak benar, dan itu menjadi fitnah, Bu. Iqra, Ny. Baca banyak. Walikota, Anda harus bijaksana," kata akun @risa_te.“@Illizaa pokemon berarti monster saku boo. Jepang mengatakan 'poketo monsuta' itu sebabnya tidak ada c di 'poke'. Apakah ini walikota? Kicauan @jsoekahar. Banda Aceh Walikota Illiza Sa'Aduddi bukan orang pertama yang mengangkat teori Facebook tentang Facebook tentang The Strange Sihir tentang Makna Facebook.masalah saya adalah seorang Yahudi dari Pokemon.Orang -orang Kristen yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak Utara dan Suriah timur laut.Allah dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita, ”kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota Parlemen Yordania. Pernyataan itu segera menerima sanggahan dari poinnya yang tidak ada hubungannya dengan hal -hal yang tidak ada hubungannya.Di situs web resmi, Pokemon singkatan dari Pocket Monster.Pokemon hanya memberikan nama karakter yang sederhana dan mudah diingat tanpa perlu bosan belajar Syria atau Syria.

berita: People who have a sudden stroke (falling from the bathroom), the blood vessels to the brain will burst little by little. Remember, to overcome this do not be nervous or panic. If the victim is at the scene such as in the bathroom, bedroom or living room. Do not move to another place, because it will accelerate the rupture of blood vessels and do not let the victim fall again. You can do this by removing the victim's blood using a needle that has been burned or sterilized and then inserted into the tip of each finger until 1-2 drops of blood come out. If the blood does not come out, it can be massaged until it comes out, after which the victim will be conscious after a few minutes. If the victim's mouth is tilted, pull the earlobe until it is red and directly pierce the bottom of the earlobe with the sterile needle until the blood drips out. After the victim is conscious and his mouth has recovered, then he is taken to a doctor or hospital. Usually, people who have a stroke will have their blood vessels burst more quickly due to shocks on the way to the hospital or net ball doctor. The person may not regain consciousness or faint when this happens it will usually be disabled or paralyzed. (We must remember BLOODING from the finger of a person who has a stroke, then we can help that person from a stroke).
berita_id: Orang yang tiba -tiba mengalami stroke (jatuh dari kamar mandi), pembuluh darah ke otak akan meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Ingat, untuk mengatasi hal ini jangan gugup atau panik.Jika korban berada di tempat kejadian seperti di kamar mandi, kamar tidur atau ruang tamu.Jangan pindah ke tempat lain, karena itu akan mempercepat pecahnya pembuluh darah dan jangan membiarkan korban jatuh lagi.Anda dapat melakukan ini dengan menghilangkan darah korban menggunakan jarum yang telah dibakar atau disterilkan dan kemudian dimasukkan ke ujung setiap jari sampai 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Jika darah tidak keluar, itu dapat dipijat sampai keluar, setelah itu korban akan sadar setelah beberapa menit.Jika mulut korban dimiringkan, tarik daun telinga sampai merah dan langsung menusuk bagian bawah daun telinga dengan jarum steril sampai darah keluar.Setelah korban sadar dan mulutnya pulih, maka ia dibawa ke dokter atau rumah sakit.Biasanya, orang yang mengalami stroke akan membuat pembuluh darah mereka meledak lebih cepat karena guncangan dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit atau dokter bola bersih.Orang tersebut tidak boleh mendapatkan kembali kesadaran atau pingsan ketika ini terjadi biasanya akan dinonaktifkan atau lumpuh.(Kita harus ingat darah dari jari seseorang yang mengalami stroke, maka kita dapat membantu orang itu dari stroke).

berita: Bitungnews – Reog Ponorogo culture is one of the cultural heritages of the Indonesian ancestors. This type of art has even been claimed seven times by neighboring countries, Malaysia, as their culture. The Indonesian people have always been reactive, protesting these claims. The incident at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines was the opposite, if Malaysia claimed the nation's cultural arts, a number of elements in the Indonesian Consulate General actually burned Barong Reog Ponorogo, along with gamelan decorations. According to information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, Acting Consulate General Davao called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragon snakes, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in Bisaya Tagalog: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's flying dragon a shame that the dragon is so good it keeps burning, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a bitungnews.com source. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And electronic messages to infomed@kemlu.go.id have not received a response either.
berita_id: Bitungnews - Budaya Reog Ponorogo adalah salah satu warisan budaya leluhur Indonesia.Jenis seni ini bahkan telah diklaim tujuh kali oleh negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia, sebagai budaya mereka.Rakyat Indonesia selalu reaktif, memprotes klaim ini.Insiden di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina adalah sebaliknya, jika Malaysia mengklaim seni budaya negara itu, sejumlah elemen dalam konsulat Jenderal Indonesia benar -benar membakar Barong Reog Ponorogo, bersama dengan dekorasi gamelan.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Bitungnews.com, pembakaran dilakukan pada hari Selasa, 20 Oktober 2015. Alasan pembakaran Barong Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan itu adalah idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Faktanya, Konsulat Akting Jenderal Davao disebut penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas ular reog dan 2 gamelan naga, penjaga keamanan itu begitu terkejut dan terkejut katanya dalam bisaya tagalog: "Hadluk Kaayu, saya scasay soatu gwapo gwapo kaugon,Naga memalukan bahwa naga itu begitu baik sehingga terus membakar, reog itu terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diberitahu), "kata Santander."Ketika dekorasi Barong Reog dan Dragon Gamelan dibakar, yang merupakan inventaris museum budaya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang mengetahuinya," kata sumber Bitungnews.com."Setelah kejadian ini, para pelaku dihujat oleh sebagian besar warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena mereka berpikir apa yang mereka lakukan adalah tepat di mata Tuhan," tambah sumber itu.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id juga belum menerima tanggapan.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. It does not exist and has never been discussed, he said on Monday. , March 12, 2018 While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that currently there are indeed many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. "Menpan (in social media) it is a hoax, that's what it is. In today's social media there is a lot program of information and documents that are made similar to those of the government and published," he said. I In this issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat.Itu tidak ada dan belum pernah dibahas, katanya pada hari Senin., 12 Maret 2018 sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Menpan (di media sosial) itu adalah tipuan, itulah adanya. Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak program informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Saya dalam edisi ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Sementara itu, wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: The Muslim community was shocked by the news about toothbrushes made of boar bristles. One of the markers is the content of the toothbrush, bristle, which is listed on the packaging. The word bristle is then interpreted as a sea urchin. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term bristle means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to the Websters Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, considerably or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For example, Boar Bristle Brush which means Pig Bristle Brush. Boar means wild boar or wild boar. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles, wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term bristle in their packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned. wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah kandungan sikat gigi, Bristle, yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata bulu kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai landak laut.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah bulu berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Websters, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, serat sintetis yang sangat atau sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Misalnya, sikat bulu babi yang berarti sikat bulu babi.Babi hutan berarti babi hutan atau babi hutan.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi, menulis lppom mui, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang berisi istilah bulu dalam kemasannya harus dibuat dari bulu babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.menulis lppom mui.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually approved. The amount is stated in the RPP material. the presidential wage salary index of 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law No. 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). The official receives a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. , this amount has not changed since 2001. The amount of the salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the big countries in the world Singapore's Minister (PM), Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year after Lee, there was Doris Leuthard, President of Switzerland who recorded a salary of USD 437,000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull with a salary of USD 403700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year President Jokowi's salary is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping is paid USD 20,500 or Rp. 283 million per year While the President of the United States Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course, this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal wealth of around USD 3 billion. Public policy observer from the University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of The government, duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. According to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, whose salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further on the civil servant salary increase scheme, the president and other state officials Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sipil sebenarnya disetujui.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Indeks gaji upah presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, menemukan angka RP 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum No. 7 tahun 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Pejabat itu menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000., Jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Jumlah gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di Dunia Menteri Singapura (PM), Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss yang mencatat gaji USD 437.000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull dengan gaji USD 403700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping dibayar USD 20.500 atau RP.283 juta per tahun sementara presiden Amerika Serikat Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja, ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik dari University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintah, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Istana belum dapat mengomentari lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji pegawai negeri, presiden dan juru bicara presiden pejabat negara lainnya Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: The night of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11/2017) has been a hot topic of conversation for the last few days. It is not about the existence of the Kanisius College educational institution which has succeeded in producing many outstanding children of the nation and occupying several important positions in this country, but what is being discussed is the walk out action (WO) carried out by the pianist who is also an alumni of Kanisius College, Ananda Sukarlan. This became a topic of discussion, because Ananda chose WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the event. Moreover, Ananda, who is one of the five recipients of the award given by Kanisius College, in his speech criticized the event committee for deliberately inviting figures who contradict the values ​​taught by Canisius. Although he did not mention names, but with the speech delivered after the WO action, it was judged by many parties that the figure in question was Anies, and related to the campaign situation in the 2017 DKI Pilkada. There were pros and cons to his attitude. Quoted from Metrotvnews.com, Wednesday (11/15/2017), Ananda confirmed that his WO action was a personal decision, and did not represent any party. In addition, he also denied various oblique issues that circulated by calling himself impolite. “Some people say I was screaming in my chair, that's not true. It happened, I sat in the VIP seat which was at the front, (bench) number two from the front, while the exit door was at the back," he said. "So, if I stand up, I can see it. I stand up and walk out politely because I don't want to disturb people who want to listen to Mr. Anies' speech. The situation is that I stand up and go back like someone wants to go to the toilet," continued Ananda. Regarding the allegation that he instigated several invitations to WO, Ananda also denied. “After that there were some who came out, but not because of my explain provocation. It's not a gang (action), we're not all out. My seat is separated from my friends, because I sit VIP to receive the award. I don't conspire with my friends. It was a spontaneous event. It was really my initiative, not from anyone," said Ananda. For the various rumors circulating, Ananda regretted the netizens who did not properly digest the information. Even the issue spread to other issues, around religion and politics. “There is a website that writes that I am a Christian. Please, if you want to slander research first, Canisius is Catholic. Not Christian. I myself am Muslim. If you want to slander me, it is better to slander me as a Catholic," said Ananda. "Please also explain that this has nothing to do with (College) Canisius. My speech actually criticized (College) Kanisius. My speech did not criticize Anies Baswedan. My speech criticized the event committee. My speech was also not screaming like Hitler. For me ( speech) was quite polite," he said. Ananda further explained about his background growing up in an environment full of diversity. Ananda studied the Koran as a child. He also reads a lot of books about other religions. Including studying the teachings of Catholicism, Hinduism, and Buddhism. "For me, what is good I apply. So, I don't think about any anti-religion, including my own religion. This is not about SARA and politics. For websites that slander me as a Christian, please change the slander to Catholic, because you want to attack Canisius. Please don't equate Catholics and Christians," he said. Previously, Governor Anies, who was asked to respond to the actions of WO Ananda and a number of alumni of Kanisius College, admitted that he did not know anything. But he insists that he has a good relationship with Kanisius. "I only found out after I was in the office. When I arrived this morning I didn't even know. I don't know. Because when I was in the room everyone was in there. In fact, Father Baskoro is my friend. He came here himself. Then Father Benny is a good friend," said Anies at Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13/2017). For what happened, Anies said, he respects any differences of opinion. He said everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. After all, he continued, as a leader, he has a duty to protect and greet all citizens, regardless of background. "I respect different views. I respect different views. And I give the right to anyone to express their way," said the former Minister of Education and Culture. "Our part is to greet everyone, protect everyone. So that's my responsibility as governor. So I will greet everyone and protect everyone if then there is a negative reaction, so that's just a bonus for me. There's nothing out of the ordinary. Relax," he concluded. . Interestingly, the pros and cons of this incident spread to the invitation to uninstall Traveloka in cyberspace. Reportedly, the invitation was triggered by the presence of one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who greeted and congratulated Ananda for his actions. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. No need to uninstall and so on," said Anies in response to an invitation to uninstall Traveloka, Tuesday (14/11/2017). The reason, continued the former Chancellor of Paramadina University, the Traveloka application so far has provided benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," explained Anies.

Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is dutch east indies the explanation The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou which he harvested 3 months very. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health. Apart from all that, are there any healthy benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption. That's some information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one bite contains three thousand cancer cells, but it turns out that this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan menu ini selalu tersedia karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah Hindia Belanda, penjelasan, kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran pinggir jalan di Provinsi Helah untuk menjadi tepat di Haikou yang ia hasilkan 3 bulan.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengkonsumsinya secara teratur secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada manfaat ikan lele yang sehat?Ternyata ikan yang satu ini selain lezat juga mengandung beberapa zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu gigitan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi ternyata ikan ini juga memiliki nilai gizi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.

berita: Trending News – Who among you doesn't play Pokemon GO? This Nintendo game has managed to make every human being lower their head and focus their eyes on the smartphone they are holding while playing Pokemon GO. The Pokemon GO game does present a different experience and sensation compared to games that have existed before, so it's no wonder that this game is much loved even though it has not yet reached one month. Controversy regarding Pokemon GO is growing, especially in our own homeland, Indonesia. Yes, in this country, various controversies have occurred due to the presence of Pokemon GO in the world of mobile games. Not only civilians who spoke, even the vice president of Indonesia also voiced his opinion about Pokemon GO. In addition, recently there was news about the 'ban' Pokemon GO by MUI Indramayu. Curious? Is Pokemon GO Really Banned? The Indonesian Ulema Council or abbreviated as MUI is a non-governmental organization that accommodates ulama, zu'ama and Islamic scholars to guide Muslims in Indonesia. Well, it is reported that the MUI Indramayu, West Java Regency, has issued a fatwa that the Pokemon GO game is illegal. Wow, why is that so? Why is the Pokemon GO game banned? That's right, the MUI Indramayu has banned the Pokemon GO game. The reason is, playing Pokemon GO can indeed make you hypnotized. What does hypnotized mean? Yes, you can unknowingly trespass and break through a number of places just to look for Pokemon. Therefore, this is the reference for MUI Indramayu to forbid Pokemon GO. According to the deputy chairman of the MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri explained, "So the game is likened to a person who is drunk with alcohol so that he forgets his work and obligations." In addition, he also emphasized that it is not allowed to play Pokemon GO, even the game is forbidden. Because there have been many negative impacts, such as wasting time looking for Pokemon, even though there are many things that are more useful than hunting Pokemon. Sofyan gave a clear example, namely due to the Pokemon GO game, students are not studying and employees are not working even if they neglect to worship. Not only that, he also reiterated, "Allah SWT forbids wine because it is intoxicating like the Pokemon Go game, in the word of God in the letter Al Maidah verse 90 which reads, 'O you who believe, actually drinking wine (drunk) is an act of the devil'. ." It means, it can be concluded that according to Sofyan, playing Pokemon GO is an act of the devil, because the impact can be intoxicating. Some Say Pokemon Means "I'm Jewish", Really? Hearing the word Pokemon, right now your mindset will definitely run to the Pokemon GO game. Well, if you don't know, it turns out that there are rumors that reveal that the meaning of the word Pokemon is "I'm Jewish". This is interpreted through the Syriac language, or Syriac language which if translated will have such meaning. Wow, this can be proof that Pokemon GO is haram, right? There have been many incidents from Pokemon GO that ended up endangering lives Pokemon GO is a very popular game. However, because of the presence of Pokemon GO, many people are less aware of the surrounding situations and conditions. What is the impact? As previously discussed, the writer from JalanTikus himself had an unpleasant experience as a result of playing Pokemon GO, because the smartphone he used wanted to be snatched. The government is ready to block Pokemon GO if it proves to be unsafe A few days earlier, there was news that if it proved dangerous, the Pokemon GO game was ready to be blocked by the Ministry of Communication and Information The reason is, judging from standstill the fatwa of the MUI Indramayu and the events that have happened, it is possible that the government will actually block Pokemon GO from Indonesia. Things like this further support the banning of the game Pokemon GO. So, Playing Pokemon GO is Satanic and Haram? Actually, it depends on how you play Pokemon GO. According to the MUI Indramayu, they forbid it because Pokemon GO players neglect their duties and even forget to pray. In fact, if you can manage the time, you can finish your task first before playing Pokemon GO, complete your worship obligations first before playing Pokemon GO, maybe it won't be a problem. Thus, the government will not block access to Pokemon GO from Indonesia. In addition, Pokemon itself actually stands for Pocket Monsters which comes from Japanese ???????????? Poketto Monsuta. Then, Pokemon also refers to 721 fictional species that must appear in all Pokemon series. Therefore, there seems to be a misunderstanding in the meaning of the Syriac language. If it's true that Pokemon GO means "I'm Jewish" and should be left behind, will you also leave social media Facebook which in fact was created by Jews?
berita_id: Berita Trending - Siapa di antara Anda yang tidak bermain Pokemon Go?Game Nintendo ini telah berhasil membuat setiap manusia menundukkan kepala dan memfokuskan mata mereka pada smartphone yang mereka pegang saat bermain Pokemon Go.Game Pokemon Go memang menghadirkan pengalaman dan sensasi yang berbeda dibandingkan dengan game yang telah ada sebelumnya, jadi tidak heran bahwa game ini sangat dicintai meskipun belum mencapai satu bulan.Kontroversi tentang Pokemon Go sedang tumbuh, terutama di tanah air kita sendiri, Indonesia.Ya, di negara ini, berbagai kontroversi telah terjadi karena kehadiran Pokemon Go di dunia game mobile.Tidak hanya warga sipil yang berbicara, bahkan wakil presiden Indonesia juga menyuarakan pendapatnya tentang Pokemon Go.Selain itu, baru -baru ini ada berita tentang 'larangan' Pokemon Go oleh Mui Indramayu.Penasaran?Apakah Pokemon benar -benar dilarang?Dewan Ulama Indonesia atau disingkat sebagai MUI adalah organisasi non-pemerintah yang mengakomodasi ulama, Zu'ama dan para sarjana Islam untuk membimbing Muslim di Indonesia.Nah, dilaporkan bahwa MUI Indramayu, Kabupaten Java Barat, telah mengeluarkan fatwa bahwa permainan Pokemon Go adalah ilegal.Wow, kenapa begitu?Mengapa game Pokemon Go dilarang?Itu benar, MUI Indramayu telah melarang permainan Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah, bermain Pokemon Go memang bisa membuat Anda terhipnotis.Apa arti dihipnotis?Ya, Anda dapat tanpa sadar melanggar dan menerobos sejumlah tempat hanya untuk mencari Pokemon.Oleh karena itu, ini adalah referensi untuk MUI Indramayu untuk melarang Pokemon Go.Menurut wakil ketua MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri menjelaskan, "Jadi permainan itu disamakan dengan seseorang yang mabuk dengan alkohol sehingga ia lupa pekerjaan dan kewajibannya."Selain itu, ia juga menekankan bahwa itu tidak diizinkan untuk bermain Pokemon Go, bahkan permainan dilarang.Karena ada banyak dampak negatif, seperti membuang -buang waktu mencari Pokemon, meskipun ada banyak hal yang lebih berguna daripada berburu Pokemon.Sofyan memberi contoh yang jelas, yaitu karena permainan Pokemon Go, siswa tidak belajar dan karyawan tidak bekerja bahkan jika mereka lalai untuk beribadah.Tidak hanya itu, ia juga menegaskan kembali, "Allah SWT melarang anggur karena memabukkan seperti permainan Pokemon Go, dalam firman Tuhan dalam huruf Al Maidah ayat 90 yang berbunyi, 'O Anda yang percaya, benar -benar minum anggur (mabuk) adalah tindakan iblis' ..."Artinya, dapat disimpulkan bahwa menurut Sofyan, bermain Pokemon Go adalah tindakan iblis, karena dampaknya bisa memabukkan.Ada yang bilang pokemon berarti "Aku orang Yahudi", sungguh?Mendengar kata Pokemon, sekarang pola pikir Anda pasti akan berjalan ke game Pokemon Go.Nah, jika Anda tidak tahu, ternyata ada desas -desus yang mengungkapkan bahwa arti kata Pokemon adalah "I'm Jewish".Ini ditafsirkan melalui bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang jika diterjemahkan akan memiliki makna seperti itu.Wow, ini bisa menjadi bukti bahwa Pokemon Go adalah Haram, kan?Ada banyak insiden dari Pokemon Go yang akhirnya membahayakan kehidupan Pokemon Go adalah permainan yang sangat populer.Namun, karena adanya Pokemon GO, banyak orang kurang sadar akan situasi dan kondisi di sekitarnya.Apa dampaknya?Seperti yang dibahas sebelumnya, penulis dari Jalankus sendiri memiliki pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan sebagai hasil dari bermain Pokemon Go, karena smartphone yang ia gunakan ingin disambar.Pemerintah siap untuk memblokir Pokemon Go jika terbukti tidak aman beberapa hari sebelumnya, ada berita bahwa jika terbukti berbahaya, permainan Pokemon Go siap untuk diblokir oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Alasannya adalah, menilai dari penghentian pemerintah MUI Indramayu dan peristiwa yang telah terjadi, dimungkinkan bahwa pemerintah akan benar -benar akan memblokir Pokon GO.Hal -hal seperti ini lebih lanjut mendukung pelarangan game Pokemon Go.Jadi, bermain pokemon go adalah setan dan haram?Sebenarnya, itu tergantung pada bagaimana Anda bermain Pokemon Go.Menurut MUI Indramayu, mereka melarangnya karena pemain Pokemon Go mengabaikan tugas mereka dan bahkan lupa untuk berdoa.Bahkan, jika Anda dapat mengatur waktu, Anda dapat menyelesaikan tugas Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, selesaikan kewajiban ibadah Anda terlebih dahulu sebelum bermain Pokemon Go, mungkin itu tidak akan menjadi masalah.Dengan demikian, pemerintah tidak akan memblokir akses ke Pokemon pergi dari Indonesia.Selain itu, Pokemon itu sendiri benar -benar singkatan dari monster saku yang berasal dari bahasa Jepang ????????????Poketto Monsuta.Kemudian, Pokemon juga mengacu pada 721 spesies fiksi yang harus muncul di semua seri Pokemon.Karena itu, tampaknya ada kesalahpahaman dalam arti bahasa Syria.Jika benar bahwa Pokemon Go berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" dan harus ditinggalkan, apakah Anda juga akan meninggalkan Facebook media sosial yang sebenarnya dibuat oleh orang Yahudi?

berita: TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Surabaya Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM) issued a report on the results of the lab test for pacifiers suspected of containing drugs. The candy dot was confiscated by the Civil Service Police Unit during a joint operation, and then handed over by the Surabaya City psychotropic Government for investigation. Apparently, the results of laboratory tests stated that the pacifier candy was negative. "The test results were negative for the parameters we tested," said acting Head of BBPOM Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, when contacted by Tempo, Thursday, March 9, 2017. Retno said the candy samples from China produced by Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff passed four drug parameters. One example of a psychoactive substance with these parameters is amphetamine, which causes addiction. "Negative, does not contain amphetamine." The candies imported by PT Petrona Inti Chermindo in West Jakarta also do not contain rhodamine. In fact, it is officially registered as foreign food and has the BPOM RI label ML 224409003077. Even so, Retno refuses to conclude that there is a possibility of business competition behind the news that the candy is suspected to contain drugs. "That's not my domain," he said. The results of the laboratory tests will later be submitted to the Surabaya City Government. BPOM is still waiting for the results of laboratory tests for other types of candy submitted by the Surabaya City Government. In addition to the dot candy, there are also jelly stick candy and sheep-shaped candy. The Surabaya Satpol PP stated that it was conducting a raid on pacifiers suspected of containing addictive substances and disturbing the public because they went viral. On the orders of Mayor Tri Rismaharini, the Satpol PP has cooperated in combing elementary schools with the Sector Police (Polsek), puskesmas, and Koramil, since Monday, March 6 2017. From the joint operation, Satpol PP confiscated 345 bottles of candy.
berita_id: Tempo.co, Jakarta - Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Surabaya (BBPOM) mengeluarkan laporan tentang hasil tes laboratorium untuk dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Permen DOT disita oleh Unit Kepolisian Layanan Sipil selama operasi bersama, dan kemudian diserahkan oleh Pemerintah Psikotropika Kota Surabaya untuk penyelidikan.Rupanya, hasil tes laboratorium menyatakan bahwa permen dot negatif."Hasil tes negatif untuk parameter yang kami uji," kata Penjabat Kepala BBPOM Surabaya, Retno Kurpaningsih, ketika dihubungi oleh Tempo, Kamis, 9 Maret 2017. Retno mengatakan sampel permen dari Cina yang diproduksi oleh Xiamen Yang Wan Foodstuff meloloskan empat parameter narkoba.Salah satu contoh zat psikoaktif dengan parameter ini adalah amfetamin, yang menyebabkan kecanduan."Negatif, tidak mengandung amfetamin."Permen yang diimpor oleh Pt Petrona Inti Chermindo di Jakarta Barat juga tidak mengandung rhodamine.Faktanya, secara resmi terdaftar sebagai makanan asing dan memiliki label BPOM RI ML 224409003077. Meski begitu, Retno menolak untuk menyimpulkan bahwa ada kemungkinan persaingan bisnis di balik berita bahwa permen diduga mengandung obat -obatan."Itu bukan domainku," katanya.Hasil tes laboratorium nantinya akan diserahkan kepada pemerintah kota Surabaya.BPOM masih menunggu hasil tes laboratorium untuk jenis permen lain yang diajukan oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya.Selain permen titik, ada juga permen tongkat jeli dan permen berbentuk domba.Surabaya Satpol PP menyatakan bahwa mereka melakukan penggerebekan pada dot yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif dan mengganggu masyarakat karena mereka menjadi viral.Atas perintah Walikota Tri Rismaharini, PP Satpol telah bekerja sama dalam menyisir sekolah -sekolah dasar dengan Polisi Sektor (Polsek), Puskesmas, dan Koramil, sejak Senin, 6 Maret 2017. Dari operasi bersama, Satpol PP menyita 345 botol permen.

berita: The Traveloka hotel and travel ticket booking application clarified the news circulating against Traveloka's Founder and CTO, Derianto Kusuma. According to PR Manager Traveloka Busrya Oryza, Derianto Kusuma was not present at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, Saturday (11/11). Indeed, Derianto was present to be one of the recipients of the award at the event which was attended by the Governor of DKI Anies Baswedan. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day which had been planned months in advance. So if it is said that Pak Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra, Tuesday afternoon (14/11). Previously, the timeline in cyberspace highlighted the Traveloka boycott. This is indicated by the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka which has lasted from Monday night to Tuesday afternoon. The Traveloka boycott was carried out by netizens because they thought that Derianto have had participated in applauding Ananda Sukarlan who took the Walk Out action when DKI Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Ananda assessed that the committee should not have invited Governor Anies because it was against Kanisius' values. "We have just seen a lot of people about this, we are also still investigating. What I can say is that he was unable to attend and we have not taken any action,” he said. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Aplikasi pemesanan Tiket Traveloka Hotel dan Tiket Perjalanan mengklarifikasi berita yang beredar terhadap pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.Menurut manajer PR Traveloka Busrya Oryza, DeRianto Kusuma tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Sabtu (11/11).Memang, DeRianto hadir sebagai salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara yang dihadiri oleh Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan."Sebenarnya, Tn. Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu yang telah direncanakan berbulan -bulan sebelumnya. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Pak Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra, Selasa sore (14/11).Sebelumnya, garis waktu di Cyberspace menyoroti boikot Traveloka.Ini ditunjukkan oleh tagar #uninstalltraveloka yang telah berlangsung dari Senin malam hingga Selasa sore.Boikot Traveloka dilakukan oleh netizen karena mereka berpikir bahwa Deraianto telah berpartisipasi dalam bertepuk tangan Ananda Sukarlan yang mengambil tindakan berjalan ketika Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Ananda menilai bahwa Komite seharusnya tidak mengundang Gubernur karena itu bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius."Kami baru saja melihat banyak orang tentang ini, kami juga masih menyelidiki. Apa yang dapat saya katakan adalah bahwa ia tidak dapat hadir dan kami belum mengambil tindakan apa pun," katanya.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada Pastor Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha)

berita: JAKARTA - Head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, stated that the news about the locking of the mosque so that people could not pray at dawn was a hoax or a lie. According to him, the closure of the mosque is already a regulation or a standard procedure at Istiqlal. "The news is a thousand percent hoax, please check who wrote the news," said Hurairah, when contacted, Tuesday (21/2). Hurairah explained, outside the month of Ramadan, Istiqlal was closed after the Isha prayer, around 21.30 WIB, and was based on the law. Then it is reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. "On last night's incident, only five buses came from East Java. They entered after Isha, then they were given the opportunity to worship, clean up, have a good surgical incision talk with the chairman, we gave understanding, and thank God they understood and left Istiqlal voluntarily," he said. In addition, he said, the group did not know that today's action would be as large as last December 2 and 411. Meanwhile, the group that was queuing at the mosque this morning because it was raining, was Walisongo's group, who came every day.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Kepala bagian Protokol untuk Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, menyatakan bahwa berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak bisa berdoa saat fajar adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Menurutnya, penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau prosedur standar di Istiqlal."Berita itu adalah tipuan seribu persen, silakan periksa siapa yang menulis berita," kata Hurairah, ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2).Hurairah menjelaskan, di luar bulan Ramadhan, Istiqlal ditutup setelah doa Isha, sekitar 21.30 WIB, dan didasarkan pada hukum.Kemudian dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Pada insiden tadi malam, hanya lima bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur. Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk beribadah, membersihkan, melakukan pembicaraan bedah yang baik dengan ketua, kami memberikan pengertian, dan syukurlah mereka mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Selain itu, katanya, kelompok itu tidak tahu bahwa tindakan hari ini akan sebesar 2 dan 411 Desember lalu. Sementara itu, kelompok yang mengantri di masjid pagi ini karena hujan, adalah kelompok Walisongo, yang datang setiap hari.

berita: Important info for Muslims about toothbrushes made of pig bristles, immediately check the toothbrush you are using, If it says "bristle" you can be sure it's made of sea urchin. Bristle itself is the same as Hog Bristle which means domesticated pig. The Longman Dictionary of Contemprary English defines hog is a large pig that is kept for its meat, China bristle is made from hogs raised in China. Also, the website says that the hog/bristle is made of pig back hair. So how to tell which toothbrush is made of Bristle? Look at the wrapper, if it's from bristles, then it's made from sea urchins. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from pig bristles. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. Apart from toothbrushes, there are also other products commonly used in everyday life, namely brushes, not a trivial matter, brushes are widely used to paint houses, prayer rooms to mosques, The following are tips to avoid brushes from sea urchins Now, it is important for you and all of us to know how to tell which brush is which who wears sea urchins or not? To determine whether the brush you are using comes from feathers/ pig hair, can take very easy and simple steps. Hair or fur is a protein called keratin. Keratin is one of a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Fiber protein has a long structure. Every animal has the protein keratin in the dermis (surface) of the skin, hooves, beaks, sides of fish, horns, and hooves of animals. As with proteins, Then the hair / fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. The distinctive smell is the same when we smell the aroma of grilled meat. Meanwhile, if the brush is made of fibers or coir when burned, it will immediately burn. and does not emit a specific odor other than the smell of burning ash. When compared to a broom Burnt palm fiber is very clear there is a very noticeable difference in smell. Let's clean it from this invisible unclean hopefully The Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics (LPPOM) does not pass the product containing Bristle in Indonesia According to Imam vulcanized fiber Syafii, if a brush made of sea urchins is used to paint a mosque, then the paint also becomes unclean and must be removed. Then, how if it is used as a toothbrush to brush our teeth? Beware
berita_id: Info penting untuk umat Islam tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi, segera periksa sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan, jika dikatakan "bulu" Anda bisa yakin itu terbuat dari landak laut.Bristle sendiri sama dengan Hog ​​Bristle yang berarti babi peliharaan.Longman Dictionary of Contempary English mendefinisikan babi adalah babi besar yang disimpan untuk dagingnya, bulu Cina terbuat dari babi yang dibesarkan di Cina.Juga, situs web mengatakan bahwa babi/bulu terbuat dari rambut babi.Jadi bagaimana cara mengetahui sikat gigi mana yang terbuat dari bulu?Lihatlah pembungkusnya, jika itu dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari bulu babi.Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti itu dari bulu babi.Tetapi jika meleleh dan menjadi sulit, itu berarti terbuat dari plastik dan aman untuk digunakan.Risiko menggunakan apa itu haram: ibadah ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Terlepas dari sikat gigi, ada juga produk lain yang biasa digunakan dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, yaitu kuas, bukan bahan sepele, sikat banyak digunakan untuk melukis rumah, ruang doa ke masjid, berikut ini adalah tips untuk menghindari sikat dari landak laut sekarang, penting bagi Anda dan semua dari kita untuk mengetahui bagaimana cara memberi tahu sikat mana yang mengenakan landak laut atau tidak?Untuk menentukan apakah kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal dari bulu/ rambut babi, dapat mengambil langkah yang sangat mudah dan sederhana.Rambut atau bulu adalah protein yang disebut keratin.Keratin adalah salah satu dari sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Protein serat memiliki struktur yang panjang.Setiap hewan memiliki protein keratin di dermis (permukaan) kulit, kuku, paruh, sisi ikan, tanduk, dan kuku hewan.Seperti halnya protein, kemudian rambut / bulu yang mengandung keratin saat dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Bau khasnya sama ketika kita mencium aroma daging panggang.Sementara itu, jika kuas terbuat dari serat atau coir saat terbakar, itu akan segera terbakar.dan tidak memancarkan bau tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Bila dibandingkan dengan sapu serat kelapa sapu sangat jelas ada perbedaan bau yang sangat nyata.Mari kita bersihkan dari najis yang tidak terlihat ini semoga lembaga studi tentang makanan, obat -obatan, dan kosmetik (LPPOM) tidak melewati produk yang mengandung bulu di Indonesia menurut Imam Vulcanized Fiber Syafii, jika kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi digunakan untuk melukis masjid, maka cat juga menjadi tidak jelas dan harus dikeluarkan.Lalu, bagaimana jika digunakan sebagai sikat gigi untuk menyikat gigi?Awas

berita: Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar said, from several articles he read on the internet, the meaning of the word Pokemon itself in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an admission of you who oppress our brothers like Palestine. It is also against the teachings," he said. According to him, the district government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. According to Irvan, from some news circulating if Pokemon Go can cause accidents. The reason is a it game that requires users to leave the house and walk to look for this pokemon will interfere with concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research, whether it is dangerous or not. But it's definitely better to anticipate before all the bad things happen. So don't focus too much on the game. When on the road look around. Don't let your busy playing learning games be neglected, everything must be balanced," he said.
berita_id: Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar mengatakan, dari beberapa artikel yang ia baca di internet, arti kata pokemon itu sendiri dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan Anda yang menindas saudara -saudara kita seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran," katanya.Menurutnya, pemerintah distrik saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan diresmikan di Indonesia dalam waktu dekat."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Menurut Irvan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar jika Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Alasannya adalah permainan IT yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon ini akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian, apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi pasti lebih baik untuk mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk terjadi. Jadi jangan terlalu fokus pada permainan. Ketika di jalan melihat -lihat. Jangan biarkan Anda bermain game yang sibuk diabaikan, semuanya harus seimbang," katanya.

berita: Jakarta, There is an assumption that first aid for people who have a stroke is to pierce their ears with a needle. It is said that this is to prevent severe bleeding in the brain. Unfortunately there is no scientific evidence to substantiate these claims and doctors don't even recommend it. Blood that comes out when the ear is pierced by a needle is believed to reduce the volume of blood flowing around the brain. Reduced blood volume will lower its pressure, so the risk of bleeding due to ruptured blood vessels will decrease. But a stroke expert from Florida, Jose Vega MD, PhD insists that a o doctor is unlikely to suggest that. The best step when a stroke occurs is to immediately call an ambulance, so that the victim can get better help at the hospital. Within 3 hours, stroke people should get t-PA (a drug to break up blood clots). Every minute is precious so never waste time, said Dr John Vega in his writings as quoted from About.com, Wednesday (06/08/2011). Piercing the ear with a needle until it bleeds will not treat a stroke triggered by a blood clot, also known as an ischemic stroke. Even though his ear was bleeding, the brain still didn't get oxygen because the blood vessels were still blocked. As for strokes due to brain bleeding or hemorrhagic strokes, until now there is no scientific evidence that ear piercing can help. This method actually risks triggering infection if the needle is not sterile, or uncontrolled bleeding if the puncture method is wrong. Stroke occurs when brain cells are damaged due to interrupted blood supply, either due to blockage or other causes. Different causes, different handling so it is impossible to do it alone without the help of sophisticated monitoring tools such as in a hospital. Given that there are various types of stroke and each has different trigger factors, the best step is to take the patient to the hospital as soon as possible. At the hospital, the doctor will examine and determine the most appropriate type of therapy.
berita_id: Jakarta, ada asumsi bahwa pertolongan pertama bagi orang -orang yang mengalami stroke adalah untuk menembus telinga mereka dengan jarum.Dikatakan bahwa ini untuk mencegah pendarahan yang parah di otak.Sayangnya tidak ada bukti ilmiah untuk mendukung klaim ini dan dokter bahkan tidak merekomendasikannya.Darah yang keluar ketika telinga ditusuk oleh jarum diyakini mengurangi volume darah yang mengalir di sekitar otak.Berkurangnya volume darah akan menurunkan tekanannya, sehingga risiko pendarahan karena pembuluh darah yang pecah akan berkurang.Tetapi seorang ahli stroke dari Florida, Jose Vega MD, PhD menegaskan bahwa seorang dokter tidak mungkin menyarankan itu.Langkah terbaik ketika stroke terjadi adalah segera memanggil ambulans, sehingga korban bisa mendapatkan bantuan yang lebih baik di rumah sakit.Dalam 3 jam, stroke orang harus mendapatkan T-PA (obat untuk memecah gumpalan darah).Setiap menit sangat berharga sehingga tidak pernah membuang waktu, kata Dr John Vega dalam tulisannya seperti dikutip dari sekitar.com, Rabu (06/08/2011).Menusuk telinga dengan jarum sampai berdarah tidak akan mengobati stroke yang dipicu oleh gumpalan darah, juga dikenal sebagai stroke iskemik.Meskipun telinganya berdarah, otak masih tidak mendapatkan oksigen karena pembuluh darah masih terhalang.Adapun stroke karena pendarahan otak atau goresan hemoragik, sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti ilmiah bahwa tindik telinga dapat membantu.Metode ini sebenarnya berisiko memicu infeksi jika jarum tidak steril, atau pendarahan yang tidak terkendali jika metode tusukan salah.Stroke terjadi ketika sel -sel otak rusak karena pasokan darah yang terganggu, baik karena penyumbatan atau penyebab lainnya.Penyebab yang berbeda, penanganan yang berbeda sehingga tidak mungkin untuk melakukannya sendiri tanpa bantuan alat pemantauan canggih seperti di rumah sakit.Mengingat bahwa ada berbagai jenis stroke dan masing -masing memiliki faktor pemicu yang berbeda, langkah terbaik adalah membawa pasien ke rumah sakit sesegera mungkin.Di rumah sakit, dokter akan memeriksa dan menentukan jenis terapi yang paling tepat.

berita: Currently the government is preparing a draft government regulation (RPP) on salaries, benefits, and facilities for civil servants. If the RPP is actually ratified, the salary of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically. Reaching Rp 500 million per month or Rp 6.6 billion per year. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With a presidential salary index of 96,000 points, the president's salary reaches Rp 553 million.
