However, the photos that have gone viral and have even been distributed by local "online" media Bitung News, show that there is a certain ritual before the burning. In one of the photos it also appears that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao would not only provide a detailed explanation of the burning of the reog, but also broadcast clarifications on the burning of the reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Juru Bicara untuk Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir mengatakan partainya sedang melakukan inspeksi internal mengenai pembakaran yang rendah dari Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi dari konsulat jenderal di Davao mengenai masalah reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk memastikan bahwa barang tersebut adalah aset lembaga negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, Minggu (8/11)..Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang telah viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media "online" Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum terbakar.Dalam salah satu foto juga muncul bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik yang berkaitan dengan pembakaran Ponorogo Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao tidak hanya akan memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran REOG, tetapi juga menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni Reog di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: Netizens are busy talking about social media, Facebook in Indonesia will be closed on April 24, 2018. Is that right? We tried to find out the truth of the news, it turned out to be a hoax or not true. So far, there has been no firm statement from the Ministry of user Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo) confirming that Facebook Indonesia will be blocked or closed on April 24, 2018. However, the Ministry of Communication and Information does not hesitate to block Facebook in Indonesia like Telegram, if it is proven that there is a criminal element in the leakage of Facebook user data in Indonesia. If indeed Facebook Indonesia will be blocked, even then it will only be temporary and if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, we will close temporarily," said Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018) at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," added Rudiantara. Reported by CNN Indonesia, the Facebook data leak scandal in Indonesia recorded as many as 1,095,918 users who could potentially be affected by data abuse. From November 2013 to 2015 there were 748 people in Indonesia who installed thisisyourdigitallife application. The application, which is a personality test quiz, is known to use Facebook account access. "There are a total of 1,096,666 people in Indonesia or around 1.26 percent of the total number of people affected globally," explained Facebook Indonesia's Head of Public Policy Ruben Hattari during a Hearing Meeting (RDP) with members of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4). According to Ruben, the figure is known to not include people who have downloaded the application, but then deleted their Facebook account. The company owned by Mark Zuckerberg claims not to store the data of individual users who download the application. To note, there are about 87 million global Facebook user data stolen by Cambridge Analytica (CA). Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims.
berita_id: Netizen sibuk berbicara tentang media sosial, Facebook di Indonesia akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Apakah itu benar?Kami mencoba mencari tahu kebenaran berita itu, ternyata itu adalah tipuan atau tidak benar.Sejauh ini, belum ada pernyataan tegas dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi Pengguna (Kemenkominfo) yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir atau ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Namun, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook di Indonesia seperti Telegram, jika terbukti bahwa ada elemen kriminal dalam leahage di Facebook di Facebook.Jika memang Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir, meskipun itu hanya akan bersifat sementara dan jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, kami akan menutup sementara," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018) di gedung Kepomo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," tambah Rudiantara.Dilaporkan oleh CNN Indonesia, skandal kebocoran data Facebook di Indonesia mencatat sebanyak 1.095.918 pengguna yang berpotensi dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data.Dari November 2013 hingga 2015 ada 748 orang di Indonesia yang memasang aplikasi ThisisyyourDigitallife.Aplikasi, yang merupakan kuis tes kepribadian, diketahui menggunakan akses akun Facebook."Ada total 1.096.666 orang di Indonesia atau sekitar 1,26 persen dari jumlah total orang yang terkena dampak global," jelas kepala kebijakan publik Ruben Hattari di Indonesia di Indonesia selama pertemuan pendengaran (RDP) dengan anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Jakarta, Selasa (17/4).Menurut Ruben, angka tersebut diketahui tidak termasuk orang yang telah mengunduh aplikasi, tetapi kemudian menghapus akun Facebook mereka.Perusahaan yang dimiliki oleh Mark Zuckerberg mengklaim tidak menyimpan data pengguna individu yang mengunduh aplikasi.Untuk dicatat, ada sekitar 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook yang dicuri oleh Cambridge Analytica (CA).Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak.

berita: Jakarta - Complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users that their handsets bend easily have been denied by Apple. According to Apple, as long as users are careful, the incident doesn't need to happen. Apple does admit that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to his spokesman, as of Wednesday (9/24/2014), only 9 people had complained about this issue. "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect its body parts. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry," said an Apple spokesman, as quoted by CNBC, Friday (26/9). /2014). Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. The iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend problem has been reported by several users, complete with photos. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is  in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, he found the middle of his new smartphone was a bit 'bent'. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he's been putting it on, but it's clearly quite warped.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mudah ditekuk handset mereka dengan mudah ditolak oleh Apple.Menurut Apple, selama pengguna berhati -hati, insiden itu tidak perlu terjadi.Apple memang mengakui bahwa ada iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut juru bicaranya, pada hari Rabu (9/24/2014), hanya 9 orang yang mengeluh tentang masalah ini."IPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi bagian -bagian tubuhnya. Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone," kata seorang juru bicara Apple, seperti dikutip oleh CNBC, Jumat (26/9)./2014).Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus Easy to Bend telah dilaporkan oleh beberapa pengguna, lengkap dengan foto.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, ia menemukan bagian tengah smartphone barunya sedikit 'bengkok'.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia mengenakannya, tapi jelas cukup bengkok.

berita: Recently, there has been information that has been troubling the public, namely the issue of using sea urchins for the production of toothbrushes. On social media recently someone uploaded a photo of a toothbrush packaging. The presence of the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging made social media users feel restless. Because, the word "bristle" is defined as sea urchin. The Indonesian people, who are predominantly Muslims, are certainly worried about this issue, because pork is considered unclean and unclean. Using boar bristles to brush teeth is of course considered to have violated religious rules. So what is the attitude of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI)? Is it true that the attitude of the teeth in the packaging that reads "bristle" is haram? Reporting from the halalmui.org site, it is stated that the lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. MUI considers that not everything labeled bristle must come from sea urchins, because the scope of the meaning of the word is indeed so broad. The MUI official website also explains that in the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. The MUI explained that, if the ingredients used were confirmed from pigs, it would absolutely be haram. Because any material that comes from pork is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. MUI continues to explain that the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush made from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. An example presented by MUI is a product sold on the Amazon online store. If a product offered is made from sea urchins, the manufacturer will usually list “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. MUI closes its explanation by stating that brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made of pork even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still general in nature. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. slob An information compiled from the halalcorner.id page states that if you look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. Then the page gives advice if you want to make sure whether the toothbrush is made of pig bristles or something else, you should look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada informasi yang telah meresahkan publik, yaitu masalah menggunakan landak laut untuk produksi sikat gigi.Di media sosial baru -baru ini seseorang mengunggah foto kemasan sikat gigi.Kehadiran kata -kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi membuat pengguna media sosial merasa gelisah.Karena, kata "bulu" didefinisikan sebagai landak laut.Orang -orang Indonesia, yang sebagian besar adalah Muslim, tentu saja khawatir tentang masalah ini, karena babi dianggap najis dan najis.Menggunakan bulu babi untuk menyikat gigi tentu saja dianggap telah melanggar aturan agama.Jadi apa sikap Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI)?Benarkah sikap gigi dalam kemasan yang bertuliskan "bristle" adalah haram?Melaporkan dari situs halalmui.org, dinyatakan bahwa makna leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.MUI menganggap bahwa tidak semuanya berlabel bulu harus berasal dari bulu babi, karena ruang lingkup makna kata itu memang begitu luas.Situs web resmi MUI juga menjelaskan bahwa di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.MUI menjelaskan bahwa, jika bahan yang digunakan dikonfirmasi dari babi, itu benar -benar Haram.Karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.MUI terus menjelaskan bahwa masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Contoh yang disajikan oleh MUI adalah produk yang dijual di toko online Amazon.Jika produk yang ditawarkan terbuat dari landak laut, produsen biasanya akan mendaftarkan "sikat gigi fuchs murni alami (babi). Catatan V Adult Soft (Paket 5) Warna yang Dibuat oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes" Boar adalah istilah babi Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi liar.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.MUI menutup penjelasannya dengan menyatakan bahwa kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari daging babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih bersifat umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Slob sebuah informasi yang disusun dari halaman halalcorner.ID menyatakan bahwa jika Anda melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi yang awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberia).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Kemudian halaman memberikan saran jika Anda ingin memastikan apakah sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi atau yang lainnya, Anda harus mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan bertanya langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.

berita: Rumors of a riot at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, circulated on social media, Friday, November 10, 2017. The news became netizens' consumption and spread virally on virtual media. Information received by Criminology, Friday, November 10, 2017, through the short message application Whatsapp, a screenshot of the text informing that the riot occurred because the guard officer named Ahmad threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. #Updates #mako_brimob #riot There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Until now, the rioting at the Brimob Command Headquarters is still ongoing, 3 blocks burned and all the doors destroyed, pray for our brothers and sisters who are being held captive at the Brimob Command Headquarters. #AlfathChannel Brimob Mako riot Based on criminology searches on social media, a number of accounts also uploaded the information by including several videos. A Facebook account called Aswaja Garis Lurus uploaded a video related to the riots. The uploaded 2 minute 4 second video shows the messy atmosphere in the prison room and a number of prisoners screaming. Some of them chant takbir. Since the video was uploaded, within an hour it has been viewed by more than 10 thousand accounts and shared by 645 Facebook users. Meanwhile, another Facebook account claiming to be named Lone Wolf also uploaded a similar video. In the video, you can see the atmosphere in the detention room. The detainees shouted and said that they did not want the Koran to be treated indiscriminately. Brimob Mako riot The 1 minute 27 second video shows the atmosphere outside the detention room. They shouted takbir and saw two black flags with the symbol of ISIS affixed to the prison wall. Some prisoners were also seen carrying wood and breaking windows. Regarding the circulation of information and videos, the Karo Penmas of the Public Relations Division of the Police, Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto, confirmed it. His party confirmed that there was a commotion at the Mako Bimob terrorist detention center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java. In a written statement received by Criminology, Friday, November 10, 2017, Rikwanto stated that on Friday, November 10, 2017, at around 16.00 WIB there had been a commotion at the Mako Korbrimob terrorist detention center, Salemba detention center. He explained that the commotion was carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of the prison facilities. "It's like the door of the prison cell being broken down, the gate of the Block hallway, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. In the written statement, Rikwanto also mentioned the facts found by the police in the incident. Here are the facts revealed by the police. 1. That it is true that after Friday prayers the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the picket cell, the Densus removed the key in rooms A5 and C5 (RB) because there was a key slot from the inside. For the sake of enwrapped security and make it easier for the picket officer to open the cell door. 2. That it is true that while carrying out these activities, the Densus picket carried out a search in the room and found 4 cellphones belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. 3. That it is true that with the examination activities one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there are members who are provoked by their words. And there is a prisoner who while takbir loudly so that it provokes the prisoner of the block next to it. 4. The picket members from Sat III Pioneer took action by shooting upwards to indicate a loss occurred and to give warnings to the inmates. 5. Until now the atmosphere has been suppressed by the Densus picket, after that the members are on standby in the picket while waiting for developments, but the prisoners still have takbir-takbir which triggers others. 6. The steps taken by AKP Ahmat as the Wartah Head are coordinating with Brimob colleagues to back up Pam Rutan Salemba.
berita_id: Rumor kerusuhan di markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, beredar di media sosial, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Berita itu menjadi konsumsi netizen dan menyebar secara viral di media virtual.Informasi yang diterima oleh Criminology, Jumat, 10 November 2017, melalui aplikasi pesan pendek WhatsApp, tangkapan layar teks yang menginformasikan bahwa kerusuhan itu terjadi karena petugas penjaga bernama Ahmad melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.#Updates #mako_brimob #riot Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Sampai sekarang, kerusuhan di markas komando Brimob masih berlangsung, 3 blok terbakar dan semua pintu dihancurkan, berdoa untuk saudara -saudari kita yang ditahan di markas komando Brimob.#AlfathChannel Brimob Mako Riot Berdasarkan pencarian kriminologi di media sosial, sejumlah akun juga mengunggah informasi tersebut dengan memasukkan beberapa video.Akun Facebook bernama Aswaja Garis Lurus mengunggah video yang terkait dengan kerusuhan.Video 4 menit 4 detik yang diunggah menunjukkan suasana yang berantakan di ruang penjara dan sejumlah tahanan berteriak.Beberapa dari mereka melantunkan Takbir.Sejak video diunggah, dalam waktu satu jam telah dilihat oleh lebih dari 10 ribu akun dan dibagikan oleh 645 pengguna Facebook.Sementara itu, akun Facebook lain yang mengklaim bernama Lone Wolf juga mengunggah video serupa.Dalam video, Anda dapat melihat suasana di ruang penahanan.Para tahanan berteriak dan mengatakan bahwa mereka tidak ingin Alquran diperlakukan tanpa pandang bulu.Brimob Mako Riot Video 1 menit 27 detik menunjukkan suasana di luar ruang penahanan.Mereka meneriakkan Takbir dan melihat dua bendera hitam dengan simbol ISIS yang ditempelkan di dinding penjara.Beberapa tahanan juga terlihat membawa kayu dan memecahkan jendela.Mengenai sirkulasi informasi dan video, Karo Penmas dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Pol Rikwanto, mengkonfirmasi.Partainya mengkonfirmasi bahwa ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Bimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat.Dalam pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Criminology, Jumat, 10 November 2017, Rikwanto menyatakan bahwa pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, sekitar pukul 16.00 yang telah terjadi keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Korbrimob, Pusat Penahanan Salemba.Dia menjelaskan bahwa keributan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang mengakibatkan penghancuran fasilitas penjara."Ini seperti pintu sel penjara yang dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Dalam pernyataan tertulis, Rikwanto juga menyebutkan fakta -fakta yang ditemukan oleh polisi dalam insiden itu.Inilah fakta -fakta yang diungkapkan oleh polisi.1. Bahwa benar bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah memasuki sel piket, densus melepas kunci di kamar A5 dan C5 (RB) karena ada slot kunci dari dalam.Demi keamanan yang diberkahi dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel.2. Memang benar bahwa saat melakukan kegiatan ini, piket densus melakukan pencarian di ruangan itu dan menemukan 4 ponsel milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali.3. Bahwa benar bahwa dengan kegiatan pemeriksaan salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata.Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka.Dan ada seorang tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga memprovokasi tahanan blok di sebelahnya.4. Anggota piket dari perintis SAT III mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas untuk menunjukkan kerugian terjadi dan memberikan peringatan kepada para tahanan.5. Sampai sekarang suasananya telah ditekan oleh piket Densus, setelah itu para anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan, tetapi para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir-Takbir yang memicu orang lain.6. Langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh AKP Ahmat sebagai kepala Wartah berkoordinasi dengan rekan -rekan Brimob untuk mendukung Pam Rutan Salemba.

berita: iPhone 6 Plus is rumored to bend easily and bends easily when under pressure. Based on reports from a number of websites, a number of users of this sophisticated iPhone 6 Plus phablet have warped or bent the chassis after being put in the user's pocket. Why does the iPhone 6 Plus bend easily? Many speculate that the iPhone 6 Plus material is not strong enough. Not long ago a user uploaded a video showing the rumor iPhone 6 Plus chassis strength test which can be seen below this article. Based on the video, this sophisticated phablet iPhone 6 Plus looks so easy to bend or bend without spending much energy. The weak point of the iPhone 6 Plus is at the bottom of the volume rocker. There are several opinions regarding the reason why the iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend apart from the material being less strong. The iPhone 6 Plus phablet is reportedly easy to bend because it is the 'victim' of the unibody aluminum casing design combined with a thin body. This may be the reason why the iPhone 6 Plus case looks less strong. This iPhone 6 Plus comes with a 5.5-inch touch screen with an HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels Retina HD which still uses an IPS technology panel with a screen density of 400 pixels per inch. Just like the iPhone 6, the iPhone 6 Plus screen is also protected by Ion-strengthened glass. iPhone 6 Plus running iOS 8. The iPhone 6 Plus is powered by a 64-bit dual-core Apple A8 processor which is claimed to be able to produce 25% faster performance than the Apple A7 used by the iPhone 5S. iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 6 are powered by a quad-core PowerVR G6450 GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) graphics processor. So far, there has been no response from Apple regarding the problem of easily bending or bending the iPhone 6 Plus, as reported by GSM Arena (23/09/2014)
berita_id: iPhone 6 Plus dikabarkan akan menekuk dengan mudah dan menekuk dengan mudah saat berada di bawah tekanan.Berdasarkan laporan dari sejumlah situs web, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 plus phablet yang canggih ini telah melengkung atau menekuk sasis setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku pengguna.Mengapa IPhone 6 Plus Mudah menekuk?Banyak yang berspekulasi bahwa materi iPhone 6 Plus tidak cukup kuat.Belum lama ini pengguna mengunggah video yang menunjukkan rumor iPhone 6 Plus Chassis Strength Test yang dapat dilihat di bawah artikel ini.Berdasarkan video, phablet iPhone 6 Plus yang canggih ini terlihat sangat mudah untuk ditekuk atau ditekuk tanpa menghabiskan banyak energi.Titik lemah iPhone 6 Plus adalah di bagian bawah volume rocker.Ada beberapa pendapat tentang alasan mengapa iPhone 6 Plus mudah untuk membungkuk terpisah dari materi yang kurang kuat.Phablet iPhone 6 Plus dilaporkan mudah ditekuk karena itu adalah 'korban' dari desain casing aluminium unibody yang dikombinasikan dengan tubuh yang tipis.Ini mungkin alasan mengapa case iPhone 6 Plus terlihat kurang kuat.IPhone 6 Plus ini hadir dengan layar sentuh 5,5 inci dengan resolusi HD 1920 x 1080 piksel Retina HD yang masih menggunakan panel teknologi IPS dengan kepadatan layar 400 piksel per inci.Sama seperti iPhone 6, layar iPhone 6 Plus juga dilindungi oleh kaca yang diperkuat ion.iPhone 6 Plus Running iOS 8. IPhone 6 Plus ditenagai oleh prosesor Apple A8 dual-core 64-bit yang diklaim dapat menghasilkan kinerja 25% lebih cepat daripada Apple A7 yang digunakan oleh iPhone 5s.iPhone 6 Plus dan iPhone 6 ditenagai oleh prosesor grafis PowerVR G6450 GPU (Unit Pemrosesan Grafis).Sejauh ini, belum ada tanggapan dari Apple mengenai masalah dengan mudah membungkuk atau menekuk iPhone 6 Plus, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh GSM Arena (23/09/2014)

berita: Liputan6.com, California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million addition units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. "The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry," an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products.
berita_id: LIPUTAN6.com, California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit tambahan iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang mengalami masalah melengkung iPhone 6 plus.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple."Iphone baru adalah baja/titanium yang diresapi untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi masalah miring yang beredar liar di internet.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.

berita: Rumors circulated in the world of social media, that there was a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017) at around 16.00 Wib. On Twitter, the riots were widely discussed. The owner of the Grand Duke of Condet Twitter account? @CondetWarrior wrote: Mako Brimob rioted this afternoon. Reportedly 3 blocks of the detention room caught fire & the doors were destroyed. According to my source, the reason was because a group of Police there threw the Al-Qur'an and hadith books belonging to the detainees. To complete the story, this account completes its tweet with a video that the owner of the account says the source sent him. The video shows a number of people who appear to be convicted of terrorism, making gestures that indicate that they are in a tense atmosphere, and then the camera, which appears to be from a cell phone, moves to reveal a shattered window. Grand captive Duke of Condet? @CondetWarrior : Just now my intelligence said it was a deliberate riot so that Ahok could be transferred from the Mobile Brigade Headquarters to be under house arrest. All possibilities exist, but what is clear is that if it is true that the police threw the Qur'an, then it is your business with the entire Muslim Ummah! While the LaskarPribumi account? @anggarabatubata mentions: viral & spread in the group that in mako there is a riot between ikhwah aseer vs Brimob. The cause of the incident that spread was that the Danbrimob detention center came to the isolation rooms of the asatidz then they randomly scrambled the rooms of the clerics to look for cellphones even though there was an ustad who was sick and they didn't care. NET public? @publik_net: riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, depok, terrorist prisoners set fire to and destroyed the room. because the guard ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Quoted from Panjimas, it was stated that a social media channel reported that the riots occurred because the prisoners who were charged with terrorism cases were angry when they heard the news that there were guards who were suspected of harassing the Koran and the books of the clerics belonging to the prisoners. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ...," reads an excerpt from #AlfathChannel which is spread throughout the world. social media.
berita_id: Rumor beredar di dunia media sosial, bahwa ada kerusuhan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017) di sekitar 16.00 WIB.Di Twitter, kerusuhan dibahas secara luas.Pemilik akun Grand Duke of Condet Twitter?@CondetWarrior menulis: Mako Brimob Rioted sore ini.Dilaporkan 3 blok ruang penahanan terbakar & pintu dihancurkan.Menurut sumber saya, alasannya adalah karena sekelompok polisi di sana melemparkan buku-buku al-Qur'an dan Hadits milik para tahanan.Untuk melengkapi cerita, akun ini melengkapi tweetnya dengan video bahwa pemilik akun mengatakan sumber mengirimnya.Video ini menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang tampaknya dihukum karena terorisme, membuat gerakan yang menunjukkan bahwa mereka berada dalam suasana tegang, dan kemudian kamera, yang tampaknya berasal dari ponsel, bergerak untuk mengungkapkan jendela yang hancur.Grand Captive Duke of Condet?@CondetWarrior: Baru saja kecerdasan saya mengatakan itu adalah kerusuhan yang disengaja sehingga Ahok dapat ditransfer dari markas brigade seluler yang ditahan di rumah.Semua kemungkinan ada, tetapi yang jelas adalah bahwa jika benar bahwa polisi melemparkan Al -Qur'an, maka itu adalah bisnis Anda dengan seluruh umat Muslim!Sedangkan akun Laskarpribumi?@ANGGARABATUBATA menyebutkan: viral & menyebar dalam kelompok bahwa di Mako ada kerusuhan antara ikhwah aseer vs brimob.Penyebab kejadian yang menyebar adalah bahwa pusat penahanan Danbrimob datang ke ruang isolasi Asatidz kemudian mereka secara acak mengacak -acak kamar para ulama untuk mencari ponsel Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Dikutip dari Panjimas, dinyatakan bahwa saluran media sosial melaporkan bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena para tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah ketika mereka mendengar berita bahwa ada penjaga yang diduga melecehkan Alquran dan buku -buku para ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako di seluruh dunia yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.media sosial.

berita: Maybe some of the readers have read articles circulating on social media about needling as first aid for stroke patients as shown in the image below. Is this true or just a hoax / myth? Stroke is a neurological emergency characterized by symptoms such as weakness on one side of the body, a tilted face to one side, and difficulty speaking. These symptoms generally appear suddenly. This disorder in general can be caused patient role by a blockage in a blood vessel in the brain (ischemic stroke) or a rupture of a blood vessel in the brain (hemorrhagic stroke). Stroke Relief. If you feel or find a relative with symptoms of a stroke, you must immediately be taken to the hospital. As much as possible, the destination hospital at least has CT Scan facilities. With the CT Scan, medical personnel can determine the type of stroke experienced by the patient. This is very important because the treatment for ischemic stroke and hemorrhagic stroke is different. In ischemic stroke, the goal of help is to destroy the blood clot that is blocking the blood vessels of the brain. The method that is commonly done is with drugs, it can also be with endovascular procedures. Meanwhile, in hemorrhagic stroke, the main goal of treatment is to stop the bleeding. Needlestick in Stroke Aid There is no official reference that recommends this method for first aid in stroke patients. In ischemic stroke patients, this method is clearly not useful for destroying the blockage in the brain because there is no relationship at all. In the case of hemorrhagic stroke, it is true that patients generally have high blood pressure so that the brain blood vessels burst. However, bleeding through the fingertips cannot lower blood pressure and stop bleeding in the brain. This is because the blood that is removed by inserting the needle in the fingertip is very little so that it does not have a significant effect on blood pressure. In addition, the human brain gets 20% of its blood supply from the heart pump and the body will always try to maintain this amount. So, even though we have removed the patient's blood, the heart will still pump blood to the brain. Dangers of Needling in Stroke Aid In addition to not providing good benefits to patients, it turns out that needling also has a negative impact on patients. The bad impact is that the patient is late in getting the right help because time is wasted on sterilizing needles and performing punctures. The stabbing process causes wounds and can cause infection. Conclusion It can be concluded that finger pricking with a needle in stroke patients is not beneficial and can actually harm the patient. If you find a patient with symptoms of a stroke, the help we can provide is to take the patient as quickly as possible to the hospital.
berita_id: Mungkin beberapa pembaca telah membaca artikel yang beredar di media sosial tentang tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke seperti yang ditunjukkan pada gambar di bawah ini.Apakah ini benar atau hanya tipuan / mitos?Stroke adalah keadaan darurat neurologis yang ditandai dengan gejala seperti kelemahan di satu sisi tubuh, wajah miring ke satu sisi, dan kesulitan berbicara.Gejala -gejala ini umumnya muncul tiba -tiba.Gangguan ini secara umum dapat disebabkan peran pasien dengan penyumbatan pada pembuluh darah di otak (stroke iskemik) atau pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak (stroke hemoragik).Bantuan stroke.Jika Anda merasakan atau menemukan kerabat dengan gejala stroke, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Sebisa mungkin, rumah sakit tujuan setidaknya memiliki fasilitas CT scan.Dengan CT scan, tenaga medis dapat menentukan jenis stroke yang dialami oleh pasien.Ini sangat penting karena pengobatan untuk stroke iskemik dan stroke hemoragik berbeda.Dalam stroke iskemik, tujuan bantuan adalah untuk menghancurkan gumpalan darah yang menghalangi pembuluh darah otak.Metode yang biasanya dilakukan adalah dengan obat -obatan, itu juga bisa dengan prosedur endovaskular.Sementara itu, dalam stroke hemoragik, tujuan utama pengobatan adalah untuk menghentikan pendarahan.Needlestick in Stroke Aid Tidak ada referensi resmi yang merekomendasikan metode ini untuk pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Pada pasien stroke iskemik, metode ini jelas tidak berguna untuk menghancurkan penyumbatan di otak karena tidak ada hubungan sama sekali.Dalam kasus stroke hemoragik, memang benar bahwa pasien umumnya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi sehingga pembuluh darah otak meledak.Namun, pendarahan melalui ujung jari tidak dapat menurunkan tekanan darah dan menghentikan pendarahan di otak.Ini karena darah yang dihilangkan dengan memasukkan jarum di ujung jari sangat sedikit sehingga tidak memiliki efek signifikan pada tekanan darah.Selain itu, otak manusia mendapat 20% dari suplai darahnya dari pompa jantung dan tubuh akan selalu berusaha mempertahankan jumlah ini.Jadi, meskipun kami telah menghilangkan darah pasien, jantung masih akan memompa darah ke otak.Bahaya tusuk jarum dalam bantuan stroke selain tidak memberikan manfaat yang baik bagi pasien, ternyata tusuk jarum juga memiliki dampak negatif pada pasien.Dampak buruknya adalah bahwa pasien terlambat mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat karena waktu terbuang sia -sia pada jarum sterilisasi dan melakukan tusukan.Proses penikaman menyebabkan luka dan dapat menyebabkan infeksi.Kesimpulan Dapat disimpulkan bahwa tusukan jari dengan jarum pada pasien stroke tidak menguntungkan dan benar -benar dapat membahayakan pasien.Jika Anda menemukan pasien dengan gejala stroke, bantuan yang dapat kami berikan adalah membawa pasien secepat mungkin ke rumah sakit.

berita: The effect of the viral incident at Kanisius College was a boycott of one of the hotel booking applications and travel tickets, Traveloka. It all started when pianist Ananda Sukarlan walked out when Governor Anies Baswedan regulator gave a speech. After that, according to information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted Ananda, who was considered as support for the action. However, launching Detik, Governor Anies regretted the viral invitation to boycott Traveloka by uninstalling it. According to him, the Traveloka application has so far provided positive benefits and benefits for the community. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies, Tuesday (11/14). Also read: Ahok's rebuttal regarding the allegation that the salaries of the governor's team were paid privately by Anies Baswedan "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies. In fact, the presence of Traveloka founder, Derianto, is a hoax. I don't know who started it, but this information provoked a boycott and became one of the trending topics of Twitter Indonesia. Traveloka PR Manager Busrya Oryza confirmed that Derianto Kusuma was invited and should have received the award, but was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued.
berita_id: Efek dari insiden viral di Kanisius College adalah boikot dari salah satu aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan, Traveloka.Semuanya berawal ketika pianis Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika Gubernur Anies Baswedan Regulator memberikan pidato.Setelah itu, menurut informasi yang beredar, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut Ananda, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan tersebut.Namun, meluncurkan Detik, Gubernur Anies menyesali undangan viral untuk memboikot Traveloka dengan menghapus pemasangannya.Menurutnya, aplikasi Traveloka sejauh ini memberikan manfaat dan manfaat positif bagi masyarakat."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang dengan pandangan. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata Anies, Selasa (11/14).Juga dibaca: Sanggahan Ahok mengenai tuduhan bahwa gaji tim gubernur dibayar secara pribadi oleh anies baswedan "Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, itu adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan hal -hal yang tidak ada di dalamnya.Faktanya, kehadiran pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto, adalah tipuan.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, tetapi informasi ini memicu boikot dan menjadi salah satu topik tren Twitter Indonesia.Manajer PR Traveloka, Busrya Oryza, mengkonfirmasi bahwa DeRianto Kusuma diundang dan seharusnya menerima penghargaan, tetapi tidak dapat hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. Catfish has a special characteristic in the form of a fairly long mustache and dark skin such as brown, gray to black. This fish is a very familiar fish, almost every food stall provides a menu of catfish. The dangers of eating catfish are still largely unknown to the general public because after consuming it, they have not felt any symptoms or complaints. Catfish is a favorite food for young and old because it has a savory and delicious taste and has very good nutritional content for the health of the body. Nutritional value Nutrient content in catfish: High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Iron 21.2 mgr Sodium 150.90 mgr Unsaturated fat 1.10.7 g Phosphorus 260.156 mgr Calcium 15.9 mg Vitamin B1 (Thiamine) 0.100.06 mgr Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) 0.05 0.03 mgr Niacin around 2.0 1.2 mgr High protein around 18.7 11.2 g Getting to know catfish The basic properties possessed by catfish are surprising: Can survive in bad conditions and dirty containing household waste, namely with a low oxygen content capacity of 6 ppm, Co2 less than 12 ppm, a fairly stable temperature between 23 to 26 degrees, surviving in locations containing less than 1 ppm NH3. Catfish and African catfish are basically easy to adapt and like places that are relatively dirty, muddy, moist and tend to be dark. These conditions can cause the growth of new catfish to grow rapidly. Likes rotten food from any micro-organisms including animal and human waste. No wonder the catfish is listed as an omnivorous animal or an animal that eats almost the same thing as a broom fish. Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken and pig coops According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou which he harvested 3 months Because there are so many complaints from the community, the journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. The dangers of eating catfish: Hyperthyroidism Many breeders use animal carcasses, animal dung because they are close to livestock cages such as chickens, goats, pigs or cows and deliberately dispose of all household waste or waste which is suspected to contain heavy metals which if entered into the body. catfish and is consumed by humans in the long term, so the danger of eating catfish that will be experienced by consumers is in the form of disturbances in the thyroid gland around the neck. The neck will feel pain, swelling and inflammation and infection will occur. This condition is caused by increased fluid in the thyroid. Abnormal cell growth. Processing of catfish that uses used oil or that has been used repeatedly will contain free radicals in which there are solid saturated fatty acids and are chorinogenic triggers the appearance of abnormal cells in the body's DNA. Too often consume catfish fried in black cooking oil which contains the poison trans 2 hydroxyloktenal (HNE) which has been proven to have the potential to cause a person to develop liver cancer, stomach cancer and others. Did you know that the dangers of eating catfish that cause cancer have been proven to have happened a lot in neighboring China. Contains various kinds of active bacteria. Many catfish are kept in a bad way, for example, fish ponds are deliberately built where there are latrines for human waste disposal. Catfish is a type of fish that can survive in dirty water and contains mud which has been contaminated with bacteria, heavy metals and germs produced from rotting animal carcasses. Catfish will eat whatever is around it. Catfish that eat human waste can cause nutritional quality to be lost and contain a lot of bacteria including e-coli bacteria that cause stomach pain and diarrhea. Some contain metal. As long as catfish are kept in ponds and ponds that are far from livestock cages and latrines and use clean water and good feed, the condition of catfish meat will be protected from metals, bacteria and deposition of toxic waste particles that cause cancer and tumor growth. . When kept in a dirty place with indiscriminate food, the catfish will contain a lot of metal or mercury that causes cancer. Heart disease The condition of catfish that is kept with poor cultivation and then added with cooking methods using trans oil will multiply the danger to the body, including triggering blockages in the arteries of the heart which in the long run can cause heart disease. This heart disorder will not only attack adults but has the potential for young people regardless of consuming catfish that contains toxins that are fried in saturated oil or not. The danger of eating catfish is the emergence of heart disease consisting of coronary heart disease, heart failure and others which are the most dangerous threats. Contains Mercury In this modern era technology is increasingly advanced but environmental conditions are increasingly being neglected with a lot of environmental pollution. Almost all fish contain mercury, which is a substance that can harm your nervous system. But you don't need to worry because you can still eat catfish, except for catfish that grow on high mercury contamination. Most research reveals that catfish is a fish that contains very little mercury. The environmental watchdog also states that catfish is a fish that is safe for consumption. The best tips so that you can enjoy catfish that are rich in benefits without problems: Buy live catfish that are cared for and cultivated by farmers using clean water and special feed for catfish or healthy foods such as tofu, small fish, rice, cassava, sweet potato and others. At least the ponds or ponds used in the vicinity do not have livestock cages and are far from latrines or public toilets. Cook catfish at home with good oil to avoid the dangers of eating catfish in the form of free radical attacks generated from the air or avoid unsaturated fats that contain chorinogenic substances that trigger cancer cells which are usually used by naughty roadside traders. Consuming catfish should be combined with other nutritious foods so that the level of nutrition produced can be maximally absorbed by the body and improve health from day to day without problems. For example, eating catfish with eggs and tempeh so that we never experience the dangers of eating catfish. Do not eat catfish meat in a half-cooked state in order to avoid microorganisms that may take be in it even though the fish is kept in good cultivation. Cooking until cooked whatever meat we like is better than half cooked let alone raw. The process of boiling or frying allows all microorganisms present in catfish to be easily neutralized.

Netizens are busy talking about social media, Facebook in Indonesia will be closed on April 24, 2018. We tried to find out the truth of the news, it turned out to be a hoax or not true. So far, there has been no firm statement from the Ministry of Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo) confirming that Facebook Indonesia will be blocked or closed on April 24, 2018. However, the Ministry of Communication and Information does not hesitate to block Facebook in Indonesia like Telegram, if it is proven that there is a criminal element in the leakage of Facebook user data in Indonesia. If indeed Facebook Indonesia will be blocked, even then it will only be temporary and if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, we will close temporarily," said Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018) at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," closed in added Rudiantara. Reported by CNN Indonesia, the Facebook data leak scandal in Indonesia recorded as many as 1,095,918 users who could potentially be affected by data abuse. From November 2013 to 2015 there were 748 people in Indonesia who installed thisisyourdigitallife application. The application, which is a personality test quiz, is known to use Facebook account access. "There are a total of 1,096,666 people in Indonesia or around 1.26 percent of the total number of people affected globally," explained Facebook Indonesia's Head of Public Policy Ruben Hattari during a Hearing Meeting (RDP) with members of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Jakarta. According to Ruben, the figure is known to not include people who have downloaded the application, but then deleted their Facebook account. The company owned by Mark Zuckerberg claims not to store the data of individual users who download the application. To note, there are about 87 million global Facebook user data stolen by Cambridge Analytica (CA). Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims.
berita_id: Netizen sibuk berbicara tentang media sosial, Facebook di Indonesia akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Kami mencoba mencari tahu kebenaran berita, ternyata bohong atau tidak benar.Sejauh ini, belum ada pernyataan tegas dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kemenkominfo) yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir atau ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Namun, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook di Indonesia seperti Telegram, jika terbukti ada elemen kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook.Jika memang Facebook Indonesia akan diblokir, meskipun itu hanya akan bersifat sementara dan jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika semakin buruk, kami akan menutup sementara," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018) di gedung Kepomo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang memblokirnya," tutup di tambahan Rudiantara.Dilaporkan oleh CNN Indonesia, skandal kebocoran data Facebook di Indonesia mencatat sebanyak 1.095.918 pengguna yang berpotensi dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data.Dari November 2013 hingga 2015 ada 748 orang di Indonesia yang memasang aplikasi ThisisyyourDigitallife.Aplikasi, yang merupakan kuis tes kepribadian, diketahui menggunakan akses akun Facebook."Ada total 1.096.666 orang di Indonesia atau sekitar 1,26 persen dari jumlah total orang yang terkena dampak global," jelas kepala kebijakan publik Ruben Hattari di Facebook Indonesia selama pertemuan pendengaran (RDP) dengan anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Jakarta.Menurut Ruben, angka tersebut diketahui tidak termasuk orang yang telah mengunduh aplikasi, tetapi kemudian menghapus akun Facebook mereka.Perusahaan yang dimiliki oleh Mark Zuckerberg mengklaim tidak menyimpan data pengguna individu yang mengunduh aplikasi.Untuk dicatat, ada sekitar 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook yang dicuri oleh Cambridge Analytica (CA).Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak.

berita: On Tuesday morning, news circulated on social media about closing the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque to visitors. The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) felt the need to provide clarification. In an official statement received by the secretary of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi clarified that what had been circulating so far did not result in misunderstandings. BPPMI also appeals to all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The news about the locking of the mosque so that people cannot pray Fajr is a hoax or a lie. The closing of the mosque is already a regulation or procedure at Istiqlal. And here's the explanation: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency since 2002 has enforced a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30. The mosque was reopened in the morning at 03.40, ahead of the Fajr prayer service. This rule (SOP) was enforced in order to optimize mosque security at night. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission societal of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. Regarding the conditions at night from 20 to the early hours of February 21 2017, the Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. The Istiqlal Mosque always serves the people and strives for national unity and unity, and always maintains the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above matters did not correspond to reality and tended to contain provocations. BPPMI appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by Ustaz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people (170 men and 70 women).
berita_id: Pada hari Selasa pagi, berita beredar di media sosial tentang menutup gerbang masjid Istiqlal kepada pengunjung.Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) merasa perlu untuk memberikan klarifikasi.Dalam pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Sekretaris Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi mengklarifikasi bahwa apa yang telah beredar sejauh ini tidak mengakibatkan kesalahpahaman.BPPMI juga menarik bagi semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak dapat berdoa fajr adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau prosedur di ISTIQLAL.Dan inilah penjelasannya: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menegakkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30.Masjid dibuka kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40, di depan Layanan Doa Fajr.Aturan ini (SOP) ditegakkan untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid di malam hari.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di wilayah masjid Istiqlal, kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin masyarakat pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Mengenai kondisi pada malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari 2017, pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid Istiqlal.BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: The current Pokemon Go game has attracted so much interest from the world community. The game fever has also been disturbed by negative news about the game. There are links circulating on social media that say Pokemon has a negative meaning and corners one religion. Many circulating on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly box become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. Reporting from the Los Angeles Times edition of April 24, 2001, countries located in the Middle East region have indeed had problems with this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, rumors circulated that Pokemon games had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence to confirm the rumors. He said if he had even asked directly to the party who popularized Pokemon. Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. Meanwhile Pikachu is a combination of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name of an animal that is still in the same family as rabbits, while Chu in Japanese means squeak. So the naming of Pokemon and Pikachu actually has nothing to do with religion at all. Especially to corner certain religions.
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go saat ini telah menarik begitu banyak minat dari komunitas dunia.Game Fever juga terganggu oleh berita negatif tentang permainan.Ada tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang mengatakan Pokemon memiliki makna negatif dan sudut satu agama.Banyak yang beredar di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi debat panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Pelaporan dari Los Angeles Times edisi 24 April 2001, negara -negara yang berlokasi di Wilayah Timur Tengah memang memiliki masalah dengan ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, desas-desus beredar bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat untuk mengkonfirmasi rumor tersebut.Dia mengatakan apakah dia bahkan bertanya langsung kepada pesta yang mempopulerkan Pokemon.Pokemon sebenarnya hanya singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Named Pocket Monster karena Pokemon ini memiliki bola saku yang dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Sementara itu Pikachu adalah kombinasi dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama hewan yang masih berada di keluarga yang sama dengan kelinci, sementara Chu dalam bahasa Jepang berarti mencicit.Jadi penamaan Pokemon dan Pikachu sebenarnya tidak ada hubungannya dengan agama sama sekali.Terutama untuk menyudutkan agama -agama tertentu.

berita: The Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. Muhammadiyah Youth also issued a statement of stance, namely boycotting Traveloka because its owner, Derianto Kususma, allegedly supported the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan who was WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Province, Anies Rasyid Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary Event of Kanisius College in Jakarta. Derianto did WO following the attitude of pianist Ananda Sukarlan. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO piano player action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values, this is far from being burned," Syahrul said in a release received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (14/11). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch. When Din Syamsudin served as chairman of the Muhammadiyah Central Executive for the period 2005-2010 and 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, whose office was on Jl Menteng Raya 62, was next to the Kanisius College building. "Muhammadiyah always provides parking space for Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building for activities carried out by the Kanisius College extended family as a real and authentic manifestation of the tolerance of the Muhammadiyah extended family. Anies Baswedan, of course, as part of the Muhammadiyah extended family has the same attitude in maintaining tolerance and unity among people religion that has been going well so far, because he is also the grandson of the founder of the Republic of Indonesia whom we both love," said Syahrul. He hopes that even though there are incidents like this, the harmony and unity between religious communities that have been well established so far can be maintained for the sake of upholding the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia. The management of PT Trinusa Travelindo or Traveloka denied the walkout attitude of Traveloka founder Derianto Kusuma during a speech by the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan in celebration of the 90th Kanisius College. Traveloka PR Manager, Busyra Oryza stated that Derianto Kusuma was unable to attend the event to receive the award from the Kanisius Alumni, so there was no walkout. "He was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned a few months earlier. He was not in Jakarta," said Busyra Oryza to Republika, Tuesday (14/11). Busyra stated that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values, said Busyra, are always applied to employees and external stakeholders. According to him, the award achieved by Derianto Kusuma motivates him to increase his contribution in society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life.
berita_id: Pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta menilai bahwa pemogokan (WO) yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan ke Anies Baswedan adalah sikap yang tidak toleran.Pemuda Muhammadiyah juga mengeluarkan pernyataan sikap, yaitu memboikot Traveloka karena pemiliknya, DeRianto Kususma, diduga mendukung sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan yang berada ketika gubernur provinsi Dki Jakarta, Anies Rasyid Baswedan memberikan pidato pada harian 90 tahun.DERIANTO MELAKUKAN WO mengikuti sikap pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Ketua pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta, Syahrul Hasan, mengatakan bahwa aksi pemain piano WO yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan beberapa lainnya menggambarkan sikap intoleransi dan moral yang buruk sebagai tuan rumah dalam menerima tamu.Di mana kehadiran Anies Baswedan sebagai tamu atas permintaan resmi tuan rumah sendiri."Tindakan pemogokan Ananda Sukarlan menuduh Anies Baswedan memenangkan kursi gubernur tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius, ini jauh dari dibakar," kata Syahrul dalam rilis yang diterima oleh Republika.co.id, Selasa (14/11).Syahrul menjelaskan, Anies Baswedan adalah bagian dari keluarga besar Muhammadiyah, baik secara struktural maupun budaya.Saat ini, ia dipercayakan dengan peran penasihat cabang Muhammadiyah dari Pondok Labu di mana Din Syamsudin Ma berfungsi sebagai kepala cabang.Ketika Din Syamsudin menjabat sebagai Ketua Eksekutif Pusat Muhammadiyah untuk periode 2005-2010 dan 2010-2015, PP Muhammadiyah, yang kantornya berada di JL Menteng Raya 62, berada di sebelah gedung Kanisius College."Muhammadiyah selalu menyediakan tempat parkir untuk Muhammadiyah Da'wah Building untuk kegiatan yang dilakukan oleh Kanisius College Besar Keluarga sebagai manifestasi nyata dan otentik dari toleransi Toleransi dari Muhammadiyah yang ada di antara keluarga yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan hal -hal yang bersamaan dengan keluarga.Karena dia juga cucu pendiri Republik Indonesia yang kami berdua cintai, "kata Syahrul.Dia berharap bahwa meskipun ada insiden seperti ini, harmoni dan persatuan antara komunitas agama yang telah mapan sejauh ini dapat dipertahankan demi menjunjung tinggi negara kesatuan Republik Indonesia.Manajemen PT Trinusa Travelindo atau Traveloka membantah sikap pemogokan pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma selama pidato oleh Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dalam perayaan Kanisius ke -90.Manajer PR Traveloka, Busyra Oryza menyatakan bahwa DeRianto Kusuma tidak dapat menghadiri acara tersebut untuk menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius, jadi tidak ada pemogokan."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Dia tidak berada di Jakarta," kata Busyra Oryza ke Republika, Selasa (14/11).Busyra menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Nilai -nilai ini, kata Busyra, selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal.Menurutnya, penghargaan yang dicapai oleh DeRianto Kusuma memotivasi dia untuk meningkatkan kontribusinya dalam masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup.

berita: The discourse of the Minister of Communication and Informatics Rudiantara to stop social media services is the last step taken if there is no change from them giving space to spread hoax content. "Actually, Indonesia does not intend to close, but if it is too late, we can close wish it," said Rudiantara in Jakarta, last weekend. The man who is familiarly called Chief RA demanded that social media platforms move actively to help the government overcome the negative content milling about. However, differences in policies make the government's wishes often hampered. He gave an example of the obstacles that occur with Facebook. As the most popular social media in the country with 110 million users, Facebook is a fertile field for those who like to promote hate content and fake news. Rudiantara admitted that his ministry often asked Facebook to withdraw such content in a short time. However, because Facebook's policy requires that requests coming from the government be discussed with its legal team in the United States, it will take a long time. Meanwhile, the government doubts Facebook's US policy towards its requests can understand the context of the national situation. "I respect their policies, but this is happening in Indonesia, so you should follow the rules here," Rudiantara continued. He wants Facebook and other social media that are quite popular in the community to have representatives in Indonesia. This is intended so that coordination can run faster. Nukman Luthfie, a social media activist, admits that the distance factor is an obstacle to efforts to counteract negative content on social media. According to him, the adoption of a country's law is faster if the social media company has a representative office in the country concerned. "The handling of content on Twitter is better because they have representatives here," admits Nukman. The statement to close social media was first made by Rudiantara when he introduced the MUI fatwa regarding the use of social media. At that time he would firmly hold social media companies responsible for the content they have.
berita_id: Wacana Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara untuk menghentikan layanan media sosial adalah langkah terakhir yang diambil jika tidak ada perubahan dari mereka yang memberikan ruang untuk menyebarkan konten tipuan."Sebenarnya, Indonesia tidak bermaksud untuk menutup, tetapi jika sudah terlambat, kita bisa menutup berharap itu," kata Rudiiantara di Jakarta, akhir pekan lalu.Pria yang akrab bernama Chief Ra menuntut agar platform media sosial bergerak aktif untuk membantu pemerintah mengatasi konten negatif yang berseliweran.Namun, perbedaan dalam kebijakan membuat keinginan pemerintah sering terhambat.Dia memberi contoh hambatan yang terjadi dengan Facebook.Sebagai media sosial paling populer di negara ini dengan 110 juta pengguna, Facebook adalah bidang subur bagi mereka yang suka mempromosikan konten kebencian dan berita palsu.Rudiantara mengakui bahwa kementeriannya sering meminta Facebook untuk menarik konten tersebut dalam waktu singkat.Namun, karena kebijakan Facebook mensyaratkan bahwa permintaan yang datang dari pemerintah dibahas dengan tim hukumnya di Amerika Serikat, itu akan memakan waktu lama.Sementara itu, pemerintah meragukan kebijakan AS Facebook terhadap permintaannya dapat memahami konteks situasi nasional."Saya menghormati kebijakan mereka, tetapi ini terjadi di Indonesia, jadi Anda harus mengikuti aturan di sini," lanjut
