Rudiantara.Dia ingin Facebook dan media sosial lainnya yang cukup populer di masyarakat memiliki perwakilan di Indonesia.Ini dimaksudkan sehingga koordinasi dapat berjalan lebih cepat.Nukman Luthfie, seorang aktivis media sosial, mengakui bahwa faktor jarak adalah hambatan bagi upaya untuk menangkal konten negatif di media sosial.Menurutnya, adopsi hukum suatu negara lebih cepat jika perusahaan media sosial memiliki kantor perwakilan di negara yang bersangkutan."Penanganan konten di Twitter lebih baik karena mereka memiliki perwakilan di sini," aku Nukman.Pernyataan untuk menutup media sosial pertama kali dibuat oleh Rudiantara ketika ia memperkenalkan MUI Fatwa mengenai penggunaan media sosial.Pada saat itu ia akan dengan tegas meminta perusahaan media sosial yang bertanggung jawab atas konten yang mereka miliki.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. There, the co-founder and CEO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, was also present. He greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Derianto's gesture was considered as support for Ananda's actions which were considered insulting to Governor Anies. I don't know who started it, this incident then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. Among netizens, there are also those who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel and travel ticket booking application. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. regulator Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Di sana, salah satu pendiri dan CEO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, juga hadir.Dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies.Gerakan DeRianto dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda yang dianggap menghina gubernur.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, kejadian ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Di antara netizen, ada juga orang -orang yang membela dan menilai bahwa boikot Traveloka tidak akan berdampak pada aplikasi pemesanan tiket hotel dan perjalanan.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Regulator Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pramuka) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma)

berita: Pianist and composer Ananda Sukarlan has been constantly criticized by a number of groups for protesting by leaving the event or walking out, when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan made a speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11/2017). . On social media Twitter, there is a lot of debate between those who support his attitude and those who make fun of him. Musician and politician Erros Djarot even spoke up, regretting Ananda Sukarlan's attitude. Even writings circulating in the name of the clergy Frans Magnis Suseno on social media---although there was no confirmation from Father Frans-Magnis whether it was really his writing. Ananda was invited to attend the event because he received the Canisius Award along with four other Kanisius College alumni who sat in the VIP seats. His WO action attracted the attention of other guests, and several other alumni even participated. KBR journalist Asrul Dwi interviewed Ananda Sukarlan and talked about why he chose to leave the room during Anies Baswedan's speech. Why did you choose to walk out when Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech? I have always disagreed with Anies Baswedan's method during the DKI Jakarta Pilkada campaign. Also what has he been doing for the past three weeks, where whatever the previous Governor of DKI, Ahok, has been countered. So I'm not really his pick. Then I walked out because I didn't want to hear more of his speech. You said that Anies Baswedan's integrity was in doubt. What does it mean? I was taught by my parents and school about the value of difference. From elementary to high school, I studied at a Catholic school. While I myself am Muslim. That's no problem and not exaggerated. My good friends are also from any ethnicity and any religion. That's no reason to divide. And, like my speech, we make a difference together to be better. Not to divide. Do you see Anies Baswedan still doing that? Yes, you just listen to his speech when he was governor. (During his inauguration as the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Monday, October 16 2017, Anies Baswedan delivered a speech, one of which touched on the indigenous issue. "Jakarta is one of the few places in Indonesia that has felt the presence of colonialists in everyday life for centuries. The indigenous people were oppressed and defeated by colonialism. Now that we are independent, it's time for us to be the host in our own country. Don't let Jakarta be like what is written in the Madura proverb, "Duck se atellor, ajam se ngeremmi." incubating. We are working hard to win independence, we are working hard to repel colonialism.") You are said to have failed to move on after the election for the new governor of Jakarta. Your response? Yes, I have moved on, that's why I don't want to hear his speech. Want anything else? He was democratically elected and I accepted him as governor. But if I had to listen to his speech, to be honest I was a bit lazy. On social media, there are more and more enemies about the DKI Jakarta election. Moreover, there is already polarization in society. Doesn't it make things worse? Of course. But it's not me that confuses me. That is, some start by making a website that I'm Christian, all sorts of things. I've uploaded on my Instagram about how to slander. If you want to slander me, don't say I'm Christian, just say Catholic. Because Canisius is a Catholic school. So if you want to slander, the research must be more correct. That's them in waves. Then I once made a joke on Twitter in English. It reads like this: Hey I'm guy and I'm fall in love with that guy in front of me. And then I realize, its a mirror. And it was retweeted by them hundreds of times. Then I thought he was gay. So here it is, now there is a google translate before slandering translate it first. Father Frans Magnis reportedly also commented and stated that he did not agree with your attitude. Your comments? It must be clarified to him (about writing on social media). Because Father Magnis came only for a short time and he was sick. Can't be bothered about this either. At that time he was kind enough to come to receive the award. So it's a bit difficult to explain. Recently, there have been calls for a boycott of the Traveloka application because the CEO supports your stance. The Traveloka CEO wasn't there. If you want to boycott Traveloka, you must first download the application. It's hard to boycott if you don't have an application. But I don't know how they boycotted it. Just don't slam the phone. How many people took part in the walk-out at that time? My age, class of 1986. Then we took pictures and immediately posted on Facebook. That's roughly wish how many. So don't think of walking out and riding a motorbike in the hall while carrying a flag. My walkout is very polite, like someone going to the toilet. And I don't want to bother other people. So I stood up, very silent, and walked out. I just happened to be sitting in the VIP seat. But how did it get so crowded in the first place? I don't know why it went viral. It was like I was talking on Facebook, and it went viral. That's why our generation made a statement that we came out on our own initiative. Not conspiracy. Nor in the name of Canisius. After all, I am in the same position as Anies Baswedan or Father Magnis, namely invited guests. In my speech, I criticized the organizing committee. No one else.

The draft government regulation (RPP) on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants (PNS), dragging the name of Jokowi Finance Minister Sri Mulyani denied that the president's salary was proposed to increase to Rp. 553 million per month as it appears in the RPP. It does not exist and has never been discussed, and "In my opinion, what the Menpan said was just a hoax," said Sri Mulyani at the Bogor Palace, Monday (12/3/2018). Sri Mulyani explained that currently, the president's basic salary is around Rp. 30 million per month. 12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest. The president's income index is simulated to reach about Rp. 96000, so he will earn Rp. 553.4 million per month. per month from the previous basic salary of Rp. 20 million because the income index is Rp. 64000 However, Sri Mulyani reiterates the government has not yet discussed the plan to increase the president's salary. Currently, there is a lot of information that is produced, and documents that are made similar to the government are then published, it is clear that the best minister in the world Sri Mulyani admits that there has never been a discussion about it at all
berita_id: Rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji dan manfaat pegawai negeri (PNS), menyeret nama Menteri Keuangan Jokowi Sri Mulyani membantah bahwa gaji presiden diusulkan untuk meningkat menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan seperti yang muncul di RPP.Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas, dan "menurut saya, apa yang dikatakan Menpan hanya tipuan," kata Sri Mulyani di Istana Bogor, Senin (12/3/2018).Sri Mulyani menjelaskan bahwa saat ini, gaji dasar presiden adalah sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan.12698 antara gaji pegawai negeri sipil peringkat terendah dan tertinggi.Indeks pendapatan presiden disimulasikan untuk mencapai sekitar RP.96000, jadi dia akan mendapatkan RP.553,4 juta per bulan.per bulan dari gaji dasar RP sebelumnya.20 juta karena indeks pendapatan adalah RP.64000 Namun, Sri Mulyani menegaskan kembali pemerintah belum membahas rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden.Saat ini, ada banyak informasi yang diproduksi, dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah kemudian diterbitkan, jelas bahwa menteri terbaik di dunia Sri Mulyani mengakui bahwa tidak pernah ada diskusi tentang hal itu sama sekali

berita: Catfish is a food that is quite popular in Indonesia. However, recently, news has spread that eating catfish is harmful to the health of the body. It is reported that one bite of catfish contains hundreds or even thousands of cancer cell triggers. Really? Let's get to know a little more about the ins and outs of catfish. Catfish (Clarias spp.) is a type of fish that lives in fresh water. The characteristics of the catfish are easily recognizable from its slippery body, slightly flattened lengthwise, and having something like a long mustache, which sticks out from around the mouth. The catfish's habitat is generally in rivers with slow currents, swamps, lakes, reservoirs, flooded/muddy rice fields. , sewers and sewers. The ability of catfish to live in a dirty and polluted environment is influenced by an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth that functions as a filter for dirt from the environment where the catfish live. Catfish is also known as the dirtiest fish. This refers to the nature of the catfish that likes to consume all kinds of waste in the waters where it lives. Every 100 grams of catfish meat contains 229 kilocalories of energy. The protein content of catfish with that portion is about 18 grams, carbohydrates about 8 grams, fiber 0.7 grams and fat by 13 grams. Catfish also contains various vitamins and minerals such as vitamin C, vitamin A, vitamin B complex, vitamin B12, as well as calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, potassium, sodium, and zinc. Catfish is also rich in vitamin D. Catfish meat also contains 220 mg of omega 3 fatty acids and 875 mg of omega 6 and there are approximately 15.6 grams of protein in 1 catfish. The nutrients contained in catfish are closely related to good growth, especially in children who are in their infancy and are useful for maintaining heart and brain health. Based on exposure to the nutritional content of catfish, it can be concluded that catfish is very rich in benefits for the human body. Then why should people worry about eating catfish? Basically a dirty environment that can trigger catfish to be dangerous for consumption. Catfish that live in a dirty water environment have the potential to be exposed to hazardous chemical compounds such as heavy metals and pollutants found in water pollutants. The most dangerous chemical compound that catfish may consume is mercury. Mercury (Hg) is a highly toxic organic chemical compound that can disrupt the human nervous system when consumed. But we don't need to worry too much about the issue of catfish which is said to have the potential to trigger cancer. Catfish that are generally on  the market are not catfish that come from the wild but are catfish that have been cultivated in ponds and have been controlled to be free from pollution. The feed given to cultured catfish is also generally non-waste feed so that the catfish is not exposed to harmful chemical compounds. Cultivated catfish even contain high enough amino acids. High levels of this amino acid itself can reduce the risk of certain types of cancer and rheumatoid arthritis inflammation. In addition, there is no official research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer. However, we also have to be careful about everything we consume. To obtain the benefits of catfish while preventing the risk, it is better to limit catfish consumption. In addition, it is better to vary the intake of fish from other types so that the nutritional adequacy of fish commodities can be more fulfilled. One thing that is no less important to eat catfish is to cook catfish in the right and healthy way so that the catfish we eat is really good, halal and beneficial for our bodies.
berita_id: Catfish adalah makanan yang cukup populer di Indonesia.Namun, baru -baru ini, berita telah menyebar bahwa makan lele itu berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh.Dilaporkan bahwa satu gigitan ikan lele mengandung ratusan atau bahkan ribuan pemicu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Mari kita ketahui lebih banyak tentang seluk beluk ikan lele.Catfish (Clarias spp.) Adalah jenis ikan yang hidup di air tawar.Karakteristik ikan lele mudah dikenali dari tubuhnya yang licin, sedikit rata memanjang, dan memiliki sesuatu seperti kumis panjang, yang menonjol dari sekitar mulut.Habitat lele umumnya berada di sungai dengan arus lambat, rawa, danau, reservoir, sawah banjir/berlumpur., selokan dan selokan.Kemampuan ikan lele untuk hidup di lingkungan yang kotor dan tercemar dipengaruhi oleh peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin yang berfungsi sebagai filter untuk kotoran dari lingkungan tempat ikan lele tinggal.Lele juga dikenal sebagai ikan paling kotor.Ini mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengkonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan tempat tinggalnya.Setiap 100 gram daging ikan lele mengandung 229 kilokalori energi.Kandungan protein ikan lele dengan porsi itu adalah sekitar 18 gram, karbohidrat sekitar 8 gram, serat 0,7 gram dan lemak dengan 13 gram.Lele juga mengandung berbagai vitamin dan mineral seperti vitamin C, vitamin A, kompleks vitamin B, vitamin B12, serta kalsium, magnesium, fosfor, kalium, natrium, dan seng.Lele juga kaya akan vitamin D. Daging lele juga mengandung 220 mg asam lemak omega 3 dan 875 mg omega 6 dan ada sekitar 15,6 gram protein dalam 1 lele.Nutrisi yang terkandung dalam ikan lele terkait erat dengan pertumbuhan yang baik, terutama pada anak -anak yang masih dalam masa pertumbuhan dan berguna untuk menjaga kesehatan jantung dan otak.Berdasarkan paparan kandungan nutrisi ikan lele, dapat disimpulkan bahwa ikan lele sangat kaya akan manfaat bagi tubuh manusia.Lalu mengapa orang khawatir makan ikan lele?Pada dasarnya lingkungan kotor yang dapat memicu ikan lele menjadi berbahaya untuk dikonsumsi.Ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan air yang kotor berpotensi terpapar senyawa kimia berbahaya seperti logam berat dan polutan yang ditemukan dalam polutan air.Senyawa kimia paling berbahaya yang mungkin dikonsumsi lele adalah merkuri.Merkuri (HG) adalah senyawa kimia organik yang sangat beracun yang dapat mengganggu sistem saraf manusia saat dikonsumsi.Tetapi kita tidak perlu terlalu khawatir tentang masalah ikan lele yang dikatakan memiliki potensi untuk memicu kanker.Lele yang umumnya di pasaran bukanlah ikan lele yang berasal dari alam liar tetapi lele yang telah dibudidayakan di kolam dan telah dikendalikan untuk bebas dari polusi.Pakan yang diberikan untuk ikan lele yang dikultur juga umumnya merupakan pakan non-limbah sehingga ikan lele tidak terpapar senyawa kimia yang berbahaya.Ikan lele yang dibudidayakan bahkan mengandung asam amino yang cukup tinggi.Tingkat tinggi asam amino ini sendiri dapat mengurangi risiko jenis kanker dan radang sendi rheumatoid tertentu.Selain itu, tidak ada penelitian resmi yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker.Namun, kita juga harus berhati -hati tentang semua yang kita konsumsi.Untuk mendapatkan manfaat ikan lele sambil mencegah risiko, lebih baik membatasi konsumsi ikan lele.Selain itu, lebih baik untuk memvariasikan asupan ikan dari jenis lain sehingga kecukupan nutrisi komoditas ikan dapat lebih terpenuhi.Satu hal yang tidak kalah penting untuk makan lele adalah memasak ikan lele dengan cara yang benar dan sehat sehingga ikan lele yang kita makan benar -benar baik, halal dan bermanfaat bagi tubuh kita.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is rumored to be increasing by up to Rp 500 million per month (Rp 6 billion) per year. The increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually ratified. With a presidential salary index of 96,000 points, then the figure is Rp 553 million as is known, in article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, it is stated that the president's salary is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia compared to other officials such as the chairman of the DPR, MA and BPK. Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the basic salary of the president is Rp. 30240000 per month. According president to Presidential Decree 68/2001 it also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. Thus, the total money received by the president each month is Rp. 62740000 or Rp. 752880000 per year The Palace said, this number has not changed since 17 years ago (2001) Indeed, the number The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of major countries in the world. The Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong, recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. The following sequence is after Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, President of Switzerland who recorded a salary of USD 437,000 or IDR 6 billion per year The following position was Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trumbull with a salary of USD 403700 or IDR 5.5 billion per year. year Of course, this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal wealth of around USD 3 billion. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than that of PRC President Xi Jinping, who is paid USD 20,500 or Rp. 283 million per year. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it is very natural for the President to have a very large income index, so that the income received by people is number one In Indonesia, it is very high. He explained that as the head of state as well as the head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, his salary is greater than the president. Another government whose salary is higher than the President Regarding that, the palace has not been able to comment further on the civil servant salary increase scheme, the President and other state officials Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said that his party had not received sufficient information about it.
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia dikabarkan akan meningkat hingga Rp 500 juta per bulan (Rp 6 miliar) per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sebenarnya diratifikasi.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, maka angkanya adalah Rp 553 juta seperti yang diketahui, dalam Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, dinyatakan bahwa gaji presiden enam kali lipat gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat di Indonesia dibandingkan dengan pejabat lain seperti ketua DPR, MA dan BPK.Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30240000 per bulan.Menurut Presiden untuk Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000. Dengan demikian, total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah RP.62740000 atau RP.752880000 per tahun istana mengatakan, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak 17 tahun yang lalu (2001) memang, jumlah gaji presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong, mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Urutan berikut adalah setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss yang mencatat gaji USD 437.000 atau IDR 6 miliar per tahun posisi berikut adalah Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trumbull dengan gaji USD 403700 atau IDR 5,5 miliar per tahun.Tahun tentu saja, ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping, yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau RP.283 juta per tahun.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar, sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang -orang adalah nomor satu di Indonesia, sangat tinggi.Dia menjelaskan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Pemerintah lain yang gajinya lebih tinggi dari presiden mengenai hal itu, istana belum dapat mengomentari lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji pegawai negeri, presiden dan juru bicara presiden pejabat negara lainnya Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan bahwa partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu.

berita: In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to make up, paint, clean dust, grouping paint the house, grease cake pans, to smear food such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors Do you know what brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely from sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than other animal hairs, such as squirrels, goats, civets, camels, and dogs. period January – June 2001, Indonesia imported “Boar Bristle and Pig or Boar Hair” amounting to 282,983 tons or USD 1713309 What's interesting? Just so you know, Anping is a company that has a history of 400 years in processing bristle and animal tail feathers. This company is the largest distribution center for animal tail feathers in the north of China. It is said that more than 50000 people are involved in the production process and have more than 1000 workshops spread all over the world. various countries The keyword that shows the identity of this white brush is the writing BRISTLE on the brush handle, which in the Webster Dictionary means PIG HAIR (boar bristle). or the other is done in a very easy and simple way Animal hair contains a protein called KERATIN Keratin is a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Like protein, hair or fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. it's the same when we c smell of roasted meat Meanwhile, if the brush is made of palm fiber, fiber, or plastic, then it will definitely not emit a specific smell other than the smell of burning ash. The brush is unclean, so if it is used to spread bread, then the bread is unclean. In short, it is unlawful to eat unclean objects. NOTE: This unclean brush is also widely used to apply seasonings to grilled corn, pecel catfish, grilled fish, grilled chicken, barbeque, etc. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM, no matter how small, the material from pigs is forbidden to be consumed and to be applied. The illustrations in this article are examples of brushes and bristle brushes (the term is PIG or BOAR or HOG or BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as markets, painting supply stores, building material stores, make-up shops and salons, online shops, etc ll Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, barber or barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID THE USE OF BRUSHS AND BORN BRUSHS: Use 100% synthetic brushes and brushes, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, at slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for toothbrushes. Use other alternatives than brushes. Examples of paint rollers for painting, sponges and cotton buds for applying make-up, as well as knives and spatulas for greasing food. Beware of foods that use a pig brush to cook and clean their tools Sea urchin brushes are sold in white and black. However, manufacturers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam
berita_id: Dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk membuat, melukis, membersihkan debu, mengelompokkan cat rumah, wajan kue minyak, untuk mengolesi makanan seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai, apakah Anda tahu kuas dan sikat apa yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada rambut hewan lainnya, seperti tupai, kambing, sipil, unta, dan anjing.Periode Januari - Juni 2001, Indonesia mengimpor "bulu babi dan rambut babi atau babi" sebesar 282.983 ton atau USD 1713309 Apa yang menarik?Asal tahu saja, Anping adalah perusahaan yang memiliki sejarah 400 tahun dalam memproses bulu dan bulu ekor hewan.Perusahaan ini adalah pusat distribusi terbesar untuk bulu ekor hewan di utara Cina.Dikatakan bahwa lebih dari 50000 orang terlibat dalam proses produksi dan memiliki lebih dari 1000 lokakarya yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.Berbagai negara Kata kunci yang menunjukkan identitas sikat putih ini adalah bulu tulisan pada pegangan sikat, yang dalam kamus Webster berarti rambut babi (bulu babi).Atau yang lain dilakukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan sederhana rambut hewan mengandung protein yang disebut keratin keratin adalah sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Seperti protein, rambut atau bulu yang mengandung keratin ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Itu sama ketika kita berbau daging panggang sementara itu, jika kuas terbuat dari serat kelapa, serat, atau plastik, maka pasti tidak akan memancarkan aroma tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Sikatnya najis, jadi jika digunakan untuk menyebarkan roti, maka roti itu najis.Singkatnya, tidak sah untuk memakan benda najis.Catatan: Sikat najis ini juga banyak digunakan untuk mengoleskan bumbu pada jagung panggang, ikan lele pecel, ikan bakar, ayam panggang, barbeque, dll. Untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram, tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan diterapkan.Ilustrasi dalam artikel ini adalah contoh kuas dan sikat bulu (istilah ini adalah babi atau babi atau babi atau sikat rambut bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko make-up dan salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda akrab dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur atau tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Kiat Hindari penggunaan kuas dan kuas yang lahir: Gunakan sikat dan kuas sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif lain selain kuas.Contoh rol cat untuk lukisan, spons dan cotton buds untuk mengoleskan make-up, serta pisau dan spatula untuk makanan yang berminyak.Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang menggunakan sikat babi untuk memasak dan membersihkan alat -alat mereka sikat landak laut dijual putih dan hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.Wallahu Ta'ala A'lam

berita: Needlestick First Aid For Stroke Sufferers? Suspicious We often hear a chain message spread about First Aid for stroke survivors is to pierce needles at several points from the fingertips to the ear. Reading the news, of course I did not necessarily believe the truth. Finally I decided to find out more about stroke sufferers and how to do first aid for stroke sufferers correctly. Some websites from the internet say that this news is a mere hoax. Why? Because a stroke is caused by the rupture of a blood vessel in the brain. The blood that comes out can actually suppress the surrounding brain tissue so that its function is disrupted. A medical expert dr. somebody Devika Y, on the aladokter.com website said that finger pricking with a needle in stroke sufferers is of no benefit. Puncture with a needle can actually pose a risk of infection if the needle used is not sterile. The first aid we need to do if someone has a stroke is to take the patient to a safe place Position the person in a state of the body facing the left side Immediately contact the nearest hospital and ask for an ambulance to come to the location Or you can take the person directly to the hospital. The sooner a stroke is treated, the better the results. Subsequent treatment will be carried out by the medical team at the hospital. So, if someone has a stroke near us, don't hesitate to immediately take him to the nearest hospital so that he can be handled by an expert.
berita_id: Perlu pertolongan pertama yang perlu untuk penderita stroke?Mencurigakan kita sering mendengar pesan rantai menyebar tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penyintas stroke adalah untuk menembus jarum di beberapa titik dari ujung jari ke telinga.Membaca berita, tentu saja saya tidak perlu mempercayai kebenaran.Akhirnya saya memutuskan untuk mencari tahu lebih banyak tentang penderita stroke dan bagaimana melakukan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke dengan benar.Beberapa situs web dari internet mengatakan bahwa berita ini hanyalah tipuan.Mengapa?Karena stroke disebabkan oleh pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Darah yang keluar sebenarnya dapat menekan jaringan otak di sekitarnya sehingga fungsinya terganggu.Seorang ahli medis DR.Seseorang Devika Y, di situs web Aladokter.com mengatakan bahwa jari tusukan dengan jarum pada penderita stroke tidak bermanfaat.Tusukan dengan jarum sebenarnya dapat menimbulkan risiko infeksi jika jarum yang digunakan tidak steril.Pertolongan pertama yang perlu kita lakukan jika seseorang mengalami stroke adalah membawa pasien ke tempat yang aman posisi orang dalam keadaan tubuh yang menghadap ke sisi kiri segera menghubungi rumah sakit terdekat dan meminta ambulans untuk datang ke lokasi atau Anda dapat membawa orang tersebut langsung ke rumah sakit.Semakin cepat stroke diobati, semakin baik hasilnya.Perawatan selanjutnya akan dilakukan oleh tim medis di rumah sakit.Jadi, jika seseorang memiliki stroke di dekat kami, jangan ragu untuk segera membawanya ke rumah sakit terdekat sehingga ia dapat ditangani oleh seorang ahli.

berita: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) denies the news circulating on social media about the Istiqlal Mosque closing implement the door for worshipers who will stay overnight on Monday night, February 20 2017, and not allowing dawn prayers at Istiqlal. According to the manager, this is not true. "Since 2002, the Istiqlal Mosque has enforced the rule to close the gate every 21.30 WIB and reopen it at 03.40 WIB before the dawn prayer," said BPPMI Secretary Rusli Efendi at the Istiqlal Mosque, Jakarta, Tuesday, February 21 2017. He said all pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. He had explained to the congregation gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the rules, and they understood and were willing to leave the mosque area. "Besides, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight, as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212, or 112 actions. In addition, there was no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter," said Rusli. BPPMI stated that negative news about the Istiqlal Mosque which was locked and allowed the mass of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) outside to be inconsistent with reality and tend to be filled with provocations. "All Muslims are requested not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," said Rusli. He said, at dawn, the dawn prayer was carried out well, led by Imam Salim Ghazali and attended by 170 male and 70 female members of the congregation. The Istiqlal Mosque calls on the people to strive for national unity and unity and always maintain the comfort of worship.
berita_id: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) menyangkal berita yang beredar di media sosial tentang penutupan masjid ISTiqlal mengimplementasikan pintu bagi para penyembah yang akan menginap pada Senin malam, 20 Februari 2017, dan tidak mengizinkan doa fajar di Istiqlal.Menurut manajer, ini tidak benar."Sejak tahun 2002, masjid Istiqlal telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali pada 03.40 WIB sebelum doa fajar,” kata Sekretaris BPPMI Rusli Efendi di atas dan di bawah ini, Mosque, tidak ada yang mengizinkan Mosque, Jakarta, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017. Dia mengatakan bahwa semua pimplal di Pilgrim, Jakarta, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017. Dia mengatakan, Pilgrims, Pilgrims, tidak ada yang mengizinkan Mosque di Mosque, Selasa, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017.Pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Dia telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat yang berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang aturan, dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah masjid."Selain itu, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap, seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika umat Islam diadakan 411, 212, atau 112 tindakan. Selain itu, tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini," kata Rusli.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif tentang masjid Istiqlal yang terkunci dan memungkinkan massa Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) di luar untuk tidak konsisten dengan kenyataan dan cenderung diisi dengan provokasi."Semua Muslim diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," kata Rusli.Dia mengatakan, saat fajar, doa fajar dilakukan dengan baik, dipimpin oleh Imam Salim Ghazali dan dihadiri oleh 170 laki -laki dan 70 anggota jemaat.Masjid Istiqlal menyerukan kepada orang -orang untuk berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan attended the 90th anniversary of the establishment of the Kanisius College educational institution, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11) night. On that occasion Anies was given time to make a speech in front of the invited guests. However, while giving a speech there were some guests who walked out of the room. When confirmed, Anies admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember it, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13). Even so, Anies admitted to respecting and appreciating all opinions and views from all parties towards him. Because as the governor of Jakarta, he must greet all his citizens without any difference, protecting all parties is the duty of a governor. Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. Previously, in a video circulating on social media, pianist Ananda Sukarlan, who is an alumni of the picture Kanisius school, protested the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan. There was also a press release from the Kanisius 86 Alumni Association, which was sent by Ananda Sukarlan, which contained the following: In commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, this school which has been consistent until now only for boys located in Menteng Raya for the first time gave the Canisius Awards to 5 alumni from various generations. These 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Present and giving the opening speech at the grand event at JIFest which was attended by thousands of Kanisius alumni yesterday, Saturday, November 11, was the governor of Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. When he gave a speech, Ananda Sukarlan stood up from his VIP seat and walked out showing his disapproval of Anies' speech. This action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other members of the audience. After giving his speech which was greeted coldly by the remaining audience, Anies Baswedan left the venue. The audience who had walked out entered the room again. During the awarding of these 5 figures, Ananda got a turn for a 10-minute speech. In the speech after he said thank you, he also criticized the organizing committee. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to look at the person as well. He got his position in ways that are not in accordance with the values -Canisius values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. After getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the nominees for the award, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menghadiri peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Lembaga Pendidikan Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu (11/11) malam.Pada kesempatan itu Anies diberi waktu untuk berpidato di depan para tamu yang diundang.Namun, saat memberikan pidato ada beberapa tamu yang keluar dari ruangan.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Anies mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat bahwa seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak mengingatnya, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Senin (11/13).Meski begitu, Anies mengaku menghormati dan menghargai semua pendapat dan pandangan dari semua pihak kepadanya.Karena sebagai gubernur Jakarta, ia harus menyapa semua warganya tanpa perbedaan, melindungi semua pihak adalah tugas seorang gubernur.Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Sebelumnya, dalam sebuah video yang beredar di media sosial, pianis Ananda Sukarlan, yang merupakan alumni dari gambar Sekolah Kanisius, memprotes kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan.Ada juga siaran pers dari Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius 86, yang dikirim oleh Ananda Sukarlan, yang berisi yang berikut: dalam peringatan peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, sekolah ini yang konsisten sampai sekarang untuk anak laki -laki yang berlokasi di berbagai generasi.5 alumni ini disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (Komposer & Pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr Boenjamin setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Hadir dan memberikan pidato pembukaan di acara besar di Jifest yang dihadiri oleh ribuan alumni Kanisius kemarin, Sabtu, 11 November, adalah gubernur Jakarta, Anies Baswedan.Ketika dia memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar menunjukkan ketidaksetujuannya terhadap pidato anies.Tindakan ini diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan anggota audiensi lainnya.Setelah memberikan pidatonya yang disambut dengan dingin oleh penonton yang tersisa, Anies Baswedan meninggalkan tempat itu.Penonton yang berjalan keluar memasuki ruangan lagi.Selama pemberian 5 angka ini, Ananda mendapat giliran untuk pidato 10 menit.Dalam pidatonya setelah dia mengucapkan terima kasih, dia juga mengkritik komite pengorganisasian."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia mendapatkan posisinya dengan cara yang tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai -Nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nilainya dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh nominasi untuk penghargaan tersebut, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.

berita: Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said the Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 photo WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Foto -foto peserta aksi 212 Volume Dua beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21.30 foto WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (di malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di ISTIQLAL, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada pukul 03.40 dengan masjid dibuka kembali "dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: Acupuncture has been used for thousands of years as a healing method, but only recently has it been evaluated for medical conditions by the standards used in Western medicine. One of them is the role of acupuncture as a stroke treatment. What should I know before undergoing acupuncture? Acupuncture is a type of eastern medicine that uses special needles, which are injected into targeted areas of the body to relieve symptoms and ailments. Some of the consequences of stroke may indeed be improved with acupuncture. Strokes can cause severe side effects so sufferers about often seek every possible option to maximize neural recovery. Acupuncture is one of the alternative treatment methods that most stroke sufferers try. If you choose to try acupuncture for the treatment of your stroke symptoms, be sure to tell your doctor. Get referrals and make sure that your acupuncturist is certified and experienced. What are the benefits that can be obtained from stroke treatment with acupuncture? 1. Overcoming the problem of difficulty swallowing After a stroke, difficulty swallowing can be a problem and can even lead to choking, which can be dangerous. So far, rehabilitation and physical therapy for swallowing muscle problems caused by stroke have not been entirely effective. However, a study was conducted, involving 120 stroke patients with swallowing problems, and then comparing patients who received swallowing therapy and patients who received swallowing training as well as acupuncture. The group that underwent swallowing therapy along with acupuncture scored significantly better than the group that only received therapy without acupuncture. No side effects were noted in the acupuncture group. This means if you have swallowing problems that don't go away after a stroke, acupuncture may be safe and an option that can help you. 2. Overcoming muscle stiffness (spasticity) Spasticity is a type of muscle stiffness that occurs after a stroke. Several studies have evaluated the benefits of acupuncture for the treatment of post-stroke spasticity. Results published in the January 2015 issue of the journal showed that acupuncture compared with conventional treatment or sham acupuncture (acupuncture that was intentionally injected in the wrong place for research purposes) significantly reduced post-stroke spasticity, especially in the wrists, knees and elbows. 3. Helps post-stroke healing An article published in March 2015 in the Journal of Acupuncture Medicine evaluated the effects of acupuncture on stroke recovery. The authors of the article concluded that overall, acupuncture appears to be beneficial. However, because not all trials were of the same quality, they were not convinced that acupuncture was beneficial for stroke survivors. So far, there is no evidence that acupuncture helps prevent stroke or helps reduce the area of ​​damage from an ischemic stroke in the brain. However, several high-quality trials evaluating the specific effects of acupuncture on swallowing ability and post-stroke spasticity look promising.
berita_id: Akupunktur telah digunakan selama ribuan tahun sebagai metode penyembuhan, tetapi baru -baru ini telah dievaluasi untuk kondisi medis menurut standar yang digunakan dalam kedokteran barat.Salah satunya adalah peran akupunktur sebagai pengobatan stroke.Apa yang harus saya ketahui sebelum menjalani akupunktur?Akupunktur adalah jenis obat timur yang menggunakan jarum khusus, yang disuntikkan ke area tubuh yang ditargetkan untuk meringankan gejala dan penyakit.Beberapa konsekuensi dari stroke mungkin memang ditingkatkan dengan akupunktur.Stroke dapat menyebabkan efek samping yang parah sehingga penderita tentang sering mencari setiap opsi yang mungkin untuk memaksimalkan pemulihan saraf.Akupunktur adalah salah satu metode pengobatan alternatif yang dicoba oleh sebagian besar penderita stroke.Jika Anda memilih untuk mencoba akupunktur untuk perawatan gejala stroke Anda, pastikan untuk memberi tahu dokter Anda.Dapatkan rujukan dan pastikan bahwa ahli akupunktur Anda bersertifikat dan berpengalaman.Apa manfaat yang dapat diperoleh dari pengobatan stroke dengan akupunktur?1. Mengatasi masalah kesulitan menelan setelah stroke, kesulitan menelan bisa menjadi masalah dan bahkan dapat menyebabkan tersedak, yang bisa berbahaya.Sejauh ini, rehabilitasi dan terapi fisik untuk menelan masalah otot yang disebabkan oleh stroke belum sepenuhnya efektif.Namun, sebuah penelitian dilakukan, melibatkan 120 pasien stroke dengan masalah menelan, dan kemudian membandingkan pasien yang menerima terapi menelan dan pasien yang menerima pelatihan menelan serta akupunktur.Kelompok yang menjalani terapi menelan bersama dengan akupunktur mencetak secara signifikan lebih baik daripada kelompok yang hanya menerima terapi tanpa akupunktur.Tidak ada efek samping yang dicatat pada kelompok akupunktur.Ini berarti jika Anda memiliki masalah menelan yang tidak hilang setelah stroke, akupunktur mungkin aman dan opsi yang dapat membantu Anda.2. Mengatasi kekakuan otot (kelenturan) kelenturan adalah jenis kekakuan otot yang terjadi setelah stroke.Beberapa penelitian telah mengevaluasi manfaat akupunktur untuk pengobatan kelenturan pasca-stroke.Hasil yang diterbitkan dalam jurnal edisi Januari 2015 menunjukkan bahwa akupunktur dibandingkan dengan perlakuan konvensional atau akupunktur palsu (akupunktur yang sengaja disuntikkan di tempat yang salah untuk tujuan penelitian) secara signifikan mengurangi kelenturan pasca-stroke, terutama di pergelangan tangan, lutut dan siku.3. Membantu Penyembuhan Pasca-Stroke Sebuah artikel yang diterbitkan pada bulan Maret 2015 dalam Journal of Acupuncture Medicine mengevaluasi efek akupunktur pada pemulihan stroke.Para penulis artikel menyimpulkan bahwa secara keseluruhan, akupunktur tampaknya bermanfaat.Namun, karena tidak semua uji coba memiliki kualitas yang sama, mereka tidak yakin bahwa akupunktur bermanfaat bagi penderita stroke.Sejauh ini, tidak ada bukti bahwa akupunktur membantu mencegah stroke atau membantu mengurangi area kerusakan akibat stroke iskemik di otak.Namun, beberapa uji coba berkualitas tinggi yang mengevaluasi efek spesifik akupunktur pada kemampuan menelan dan kelenturan pasca-stroke terlihat menjanjikan.

berita: Terrorist inmates at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters (Mako) branch of the Salemba Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, rioted Friday (10/11/2017) afternoon at around 17.00 WITA. This resulted in a number of damages. However, the situation at the site is now conducive. This statement was conveyed by Karo Penmas of the Public Relations Division of the Indonesian National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto in his statement as quoted by detikcom, Friday. He explained that when a prisoner rioted, the authorities immediately took action to control the situation. “Members of the picket from Sat III Pioneer took action by firing warning shots upwards. At this time the atmosphere can be calmed down by the Densus picket. After that, members are on standby while waiting for developments," he said. According to Rikwanto, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. It was explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells and searched by the Densus 88 team. The result was that four readiness cellphones were found. "Four cellphones were found, belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. One of the detainees did not accept it and then provoked him. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there are members who are provoked by their words. Then there are prisoners who takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them,” he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the detention center were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in block C and block B)," said Rikwanto. Meanwhile, the Head of the Public Relations Division of the Police Public Relations Division, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, also straightened out a wild issue on social media that said the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the officers. He said it was a hoax. “It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard, there were the officers conducting an examination of the books and objects in the cell. Currently the conditions of the detention house are conducive and the residents of the detention center are calm,” he said. The head of the Mobile Brigade Corps, Inspector General Murad Ismail, said the same thing. He emphasized that it was not true that there were throwing of Korans and the burning of prison facilities as rumored. "Hoax," he said when asked for confirmation.
berita_id: Narapidana teroris di Cabang Markas Markas Markas Mobile Brigade (Mako) dari Pusat Penahanan Salemba, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Kerusuhan Jumat (10/11/2017) Sore sekitar pukul 17.00 Wita.Ini mengakibatkan sejumlah kerusakan.Namun, situasi di lokasi sekarang kondusif.Pernyataan ini disampaikan oleh Karo Penmas dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Nasional Indonesia Rikwanto dalam pernyataannya sebagaimana dikutip oleh Detikcom, Jumat.Dia menjelaskan bahwa ketika seorang tahanan kerusuhan, pihak berwenang segera mengambil tindakan untuk mengendalikan situasi."Anggota piket dari SAT III Pioneer mengambil tindakan dengan menembakkan tembakan peringatan ke atas. Pada saat ini atmosfer dapat ditenangkan oleh piket Densus. Setelah itu, anggota siaga sambil menunggu perkembangan," katanya.Menurut Rikwanto, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Dijelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing dan dicari oleh tim Densus 88.Hasilnya adalah bahwa empat ponsel kesiapan ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan, milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan kemudian memprovokasi dia."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata. Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka. Lalu ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memancing tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Sementara itu, kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, juga meluruskan masalah liar di media sosial yang mengatakan kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Dia bilang itu tipuan."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga, ada petugas yang melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda di dalam sel. Saat ini kondisi rumah penahanan kondusif dan penduduk pusat penahanan tenang," katanya.Kepala Korps Brigade Mobile, Inspektur Jenderal Murad Ismail, mengatakan hal yang sama.Dia menekankan bahwa itu tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan koran dan pembakaran fasilitas penjara seperti yang dikabarkan."Berbagai suara," katanya ketika diminta untuk konfirmasi.

berita: The issue of the iPhone 6 Plus which users claim is easy to bend has attracted great attention from the world. However, according to an American magazine, Consumer Reports, this issue is actually too exaggerated. According to a Ubergizmo report, Consumer Reports has conducted a self-test to test the iPhone 6 Plus. They also included other devices namely the iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, LG G3, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 and HTC One M8 for comparison. The experiment was carried out with an Instron compression machine which puts pressure on the center of the device with various pressure variations. As a result, HTC One M8 and iPhone 6 were found to be the weakest devices. They are only able to withstand a load of 31.7 kg as well before bending. Then, the iPhone 6 Plus followed with the ability to hold 40.8 kg. The strongest were the LG G3 and Galaxy Note 3 which held up to 59 kg and 68 kg respectively. Based on this discovery, Consumer Reports dares to state that the iPhone 6 and Plus are not as bad as the news circulating. "They may not be the strongest phones on the market, but concerns about serious structural design errors in the iPhone 6 and Plus seem overblown," said Consumer Reports. Previously, Apple had also shown a test facility at its factory to ease the rumors that were being talked about through the hashtag #BendGate on various social media. They have also explained that the iPhone 6 and Plus are made of strong steel or titanium inserts. The Cupertino company itself has also formulated the aluminum it uses with glass ions to make it stronger.
berita_id: Masalah iPhone 6 Plus yang diklaim pengguna mudah ditekuk telah menarik perhatian besar dari dunia.Namun, menurut sebuah majalah Amerika, Consumer melaporkan, masalah ini sebenarnya terlalu berlebihan.Menurut laporan Ubergizmo, Consumer Reports telah melakukan tes swadaya untuk menguji iPhone 6 Plus.Mereka juga memasukkan perangkat lain yaitu iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, LG G3, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 dan HTC One M8 untuk perbandingan.Eksperimen dilakukan dengan mesin kompresi instron yang memberi tekanan pada pusat perangkat dengan berbagai variasi tekanan.Akibatnya, HTC One M8 dan iPhone 6 ditemukan sebagai perangkat terlemah.Mereka hanya mampu menahan beban 31,7 kg juga sebelum membungkuk.Kemudian, iPhone 6 Plus diikuti dengan kemampuan untuk menahan 40,8 kg.Yang terkuat adalah LG G3 dan Galaxy Note 3 yang masing -masing menampung hingga 59 kg dan 68 kg.Berdasarkan penemuan ini, Laporan Konsumen berani menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 dan Plus tidak seburuk berita yang beredar."Mereka mungkin bukan ponsel terkuat di pasaran, tetapi kekhawatiran tentang kesalahan desain struktural yang serius di iPhone 6 dan plus tampak berlebihan," kata Consumer melaporkan.Sebelumnya, Apple juga telah menunjukkan fasilitas uji di pabriknya untuk memudahkan rumor yang sedang dibicarakan melalui tagar #Bendgate di berbagai media sosial.Mereka juga telah menjelaskan bahwa iPhone 6 dan Plus terbuat dari sisipan baja atau titanium yang kuat.Perusahaan Cupertino itu sendiri juga telah merumuskan aluminium yang digunakannya dengan ion kaca untuk membuatnya lebih kuat.

berita: Is catfish the dirtiest fish? yes. Catfish is one of the favorite food menus & even in every Javanese food stall and this menu is always available, because the price is very cheap & delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious & cheap in price, catfish is the dirtiest animal among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty & surrounded by chicken & pig coops according to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to street markets & restaurants in Hainan province in Haikou city which he harvested 3 once a month. Because there were many complaints from the public, journalists investigated the fish from the local fisheries & marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken & pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. So why can catfish live in dirty water? that's because this catfish can live in muddy slums with food. Usually this catfish board is cow dung, chicken manure, and goat manure, so it is only natural that this catfish is fat because it is satisfied to eat in a dirty place. Catfish are fish that consume waste. Catfish are the dirtiest animals that are easy to breed in dirty places. Why can catfish live in dirty water? because these fish consume waste in the form of chicken, cow, and pig manure, even these fish can also consume human waste. So it can be ascertained that the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's a variety of information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers & they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So there is soundly no doubt that consuming catfish in Indonesia is clean, but as a wise consumer you must still be aware of the content of this fish & consuming catfish in large quantities can cause disturbing our health. Apart from all that, is there a healthy function of catfish? in fact this one fish is not only delicious but also contains various substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 functions in catfish Healthy heart & brain Catfish contains omega-3 & omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and in fact in a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good value In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue & strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12, a serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin functions in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish, because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content and is safe for consumption. That's a variety of information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells, but in fact this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly. Thank you for reading catfish the dirtiest fish 1 mouthful contains thousands of cancer cells and it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish in the world.
berita_id: Apakah ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor?Ya.Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit & bahkan di setiap kios makanan Jawa dan menu ini selalu tersedia, karena harganya sangat murah & lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat & harganya murah, ikan lele adalah hewan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor & dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam & babi menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalanan & restoran di Provinsi Hainan di Kota Haikou yang ia panen 3 sekali sebulan.Karena ada banyak keluhan dari publik, jurnalis menyelidiki ikan dari perikanan & departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam & babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Jadi mengapa ikan lele bisa hidup di air kotor?Itu karena ikan lele ini bisa hidup di daerah kumuh berlumpur dengan makanan.Biasanya papan ikan lele ini adalah kotoran sapi, kotoran ayam, dan pupuk kambing, jadi wajar jika ikan lele ini gemuk karena puas makan di tempat yang kotor.Ikan lele adalah ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah hewan paling kotor yang mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Mengapa ikan lele bisa hidup di air kotor?Karena ikan ini mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi dapat dipastikan bahwa tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah berbagai informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele & mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Jadi tidak ada keraguan bahwa mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia itu bersih, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda masih harus menyadari kandungan ikan ini & mengonsumsi ikan lele dalam jumlah besar dapat menyebabkan mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada fungsi ikan lele yang sehat?Sebenarnya ikan yang satu ini tidak hanya lezat tetapi juga mengandung berbagai zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 fungsi dalam catfish Healthy Heart & Brain Catfish mengandung omega-3 & omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan pada kenyataannya dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan nilai baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot & memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12, porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berfungsi dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan ikan lele, karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah dan aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu adalah berbagai informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu suap berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi pada kenyataannya ikan ini juga memiliki nilai gizi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.Terima kasih telah membaca Catfish, ikan paling kotor 1 suapan berisi ribuan sel kanker dan ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di dunia.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies express Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies. Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Express Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata ANIES.Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.

berita: A netizen shared news of the riots that occurred at the Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok. The news circulating take widely on social media said that the rioting started after the prison officers threw the Koran. There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. The chronology of the beginning of the riots is also written. The cause of the incident that spread was that Karutan and Brimob came to the isolation rooms of the asatidz, then they ransacked the rooms of the clerics to look for cellphones even though there was a cleric who was sick and they didn't care. The peak of Ikhwah's anger was when Brimob shuffled books of monotheism and threw books and the Koran. Then the brothers who did not accept takbir because they did not accept the Brimob treatment that abused Asatidz and the Koran. After the ikhwah shouted takbir, the Brimob shouted YOU ALL DOG Then they beat some of our brothers, and that's where the anger of the brothers caused a riot in the prison. The riots at the detention center and Brimob had fired several warning shots at the brothers who were out of control because the Koran was being abused. POLRI'S OFFICIAL RESPONSE The rioting took place at the Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, West Java, this afternoon. According to the police, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. According to Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, a commotion occurred at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center at the Salemba detention center, Depok, West Java, this afternoon at around 16.00 WIB, Friday (11/10/2017). Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found. They belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," he said. detikcom notes, they are convicts of terrorism cases. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. "It is true that with the inspection activities, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," said Rikwanto. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Rikwanto also denied that there was a wild issue on social media that said this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the authorities. "Hoax," he insisted.
