berita_id: Netizen berbagi berita tentang kerusuhan yang terjadi di Mako Brimob Rutan, Depok.Berita yang beredar secara luas di media sosial mengatakan bahwa kerusuhan dimulai setelah petugas penjara melemparkan Alquran.Ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk.Kronologi awal kerusuhan juga ditulis.Penyebab kejadian yang menyebar adalah bahwa Karutan dan Brimob datang ke ruang isolasi Asatidz, kemudian mereka menggeledah kamar -kamar ulama untuk mencari ponsel meskipun ada ulama yang sakit dan mereka tidak peduli.Puncak kemarahan Ikhwah adalah ketika Brimob mengocok buku -buku monoteisme dan melemparkan buku dan Alquran.Kemudian saudara -saudara yang tidak menerima Takbir karena mereka tidak menerima perlakuan Brimob yang melecehkan Asatidz dan Alquran.Setelah Ikhwah meneriakkan Takbir, brimob meneriakkan Anda semua anjing kemudian mereka mengalahkan beberapa saudara kita, dan di situlah kemarahan saudara -saudara menyebabkan kerusuhan di penjara.Kerusuhan di pusat penahanan dan Brimob telah menembakkan beberapa tembakan peringatan pada saudara -saudara yang di luar kendali karena Alquran dilecehkan.Tanggapan resmi Polri, kerusuhan itu terjadi di Brimob Mako Rutan, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini.Menurut polisi, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Menurut Karo Penmas, Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Brigadir Jenderal Rikwanto, keributan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob di Pusat Penahanan Salemba, Depok, Jawa Barat, sore ini sekitar 16.00 WIB, Jumat (11/10/2017).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan. Mereka milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," katanya.Detikcom mencatat, mereka adalah narapidana kasus terorisme.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Rikwanto juga membantah bahwa ada masalah liar di media sosial yang mengatakan kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh pihak berwenang."Berbagai arah," tegasnya.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall look at D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall melihat D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.

berita: Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta on Monday (05/06/2017) quoted from Qibla However, if negative content and bad content spreader accounts cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed and blocked, he judged that this action was in accordance with the law. "But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it is needed later, yes, it must be," he said. Furthermore, Rudy said he would establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa great deal is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he concluded.[]
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita wewenang, tentu saja menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta pada hari Senin (05/06/2017 yang dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh qibla, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat disebarkan, konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook, jika konten negatif dan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan oleh Qibla."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, ya, itu pasti," katanya.Selain itu, Rudy mengatakan dia akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa yang sangat besar adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, saya akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," pungkasnya. []

berita: Not yet finished the iPhone 5 was thrown into the market, Apple already has an idea for the 6th generation of their smartphone. Reportedly, Apple will introduce a new product with a curved touch screen democratic next year. The Californian company has contacted iPad and iPhone screen suppliers, Lens Technology, G-Tech and Fuji Crystal, and will supply them with equipment for polishing the indentation of the glass. The use of a touch screen with curved glass, according to some users feels more comfortable during phone calls. The indentation also protects the screen from scratches when the smartphone or tablet is placed face down. Corning, which provides scratch-resistant screens for a number of smartphones, has developed a curved version of their popular Gorilla Glass display. but it is not clear if this screen will be used in future Apple products. This is not the first time the design has been used on a smartphone device. Google and Samsung also provide the Nexus S smartphone with a concave screen. Dell has also played around with a curved display on the Venue Pro smartphone which has a Windows phone platform. Although the popularity of the concave screen seems to be increasing, some observers see the design as a temporary trend.
berita_id: Belum selesai iPhone 5 dilemparkan ke pasar, Apple sudah memiliki ide untuk generasi ke -6 dari smartphone mereka.Dilaporkan, Apple akan memperkenalkan produk baru dengan layar sentuh melengkung Demokrat tahun depan.Perusahaan California telah menghubungi pemasok layar iPad dan iPhone, teknologi lensa, G-Tech dan Fuji Crystal, dan akan memasok mereka dengan peralatan untuk memoles lekukan kaca.Penggunaan layar sentuh dengan kaca melengkung, menurut beberapa pengguna merasa lebih nyaman selama panggilan telepon.Indentasi juga melindungi layar dari goresan ketika smartphone atau tablet ditempatkan menghadap ke bawah.Corning, yang menyediakan layar tahan gores untuk sejumlah smartphone, telah mengembangkan versi melengkung dari tampilan kaca gorila populer mereka.Tetapi tidak jelas apakah layar ini akan digunakan dalam produk Apple di masa depan.Ini bukan pertama kalinya desain digunakan pada perangkat smartphone.Google dan Samsung juga menyediakan smartphone Nexus dengan layar cekung.Dell juga bermain -main dengan layar melengkung di smartphone Venue Pro yang memiliki platform Windows Phone.Meskipun popularitas layar cekung tampaknya meningkat, beberapa pengamat melihat desain sebagai tren sementara.

berita: Last year, Apple had a bit of a problem with releasing their latest iPhone 6 series. The reason is, the smartphone is rumored to be easily bent and looks frail. In response to this problem, Apple also introduced changes to the latest iPhone series iPhone 6s and 6s plus. One of the changes made by Apple is to use new materials in the manufacturing process. Last year, a number of iPhone 6 Plus users reported that the handset was curved. Apple admits that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to Apple, as long as users are careful, the incident doesn't need to happen. Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect its body parts. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry," said an Apple spokesman at the time. Apple finally uses the 7000 series aluminum which is claimed to be more sturdy and solid. However, after all, the issue of the iPhone being bent easily is already attached. So will the use of this new material affect the latest iPhone when it is bent? What is the toughness of the 7000 series aluminum material in the latest iPhone? Is it more powerful than the previous iPhone generation? A journalist from FoneFox also conducted a test on this latest iPhone. He decided to test the toughness of this new material. In the video, it appears that someone will bend the iPhone 6s Plus with the strength of both hands like the previous test on the iPhone 6. As a result, the body of the iPhone 6s Plus does not bend at all. Still curious about the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus, now with the help of his colleagues, the iPhone 6  Plus is trying to bend it with all his might and the result is that there is a change in the shape of the body even though it doesn't bend too badly. It only looks a little bent on the body, but the iPhone 6 Plus can still be used well. This test may not be fair. Because this bending test should be done using a machine because not all human power is the same. However, this test has at least proven that the iPhone 6s plus with the new material is more sturdy and strong. So, you don't have to worry when buying iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s plus.
berita_id: Tahun lalu, Apple memiliki sedikit masalah dengan merilis seri iPhone 6 terbaru mereka.Alasannya adalah, smartphone dikabarkan mudah ditekuk dan terlihat lemah.Menanggapi masalah ini, Apple juga memperkenalkan perubahan pada iPhone Seri iPhone 6s dan 6s Plus iPhone terbaru.Salah satu perubahan yang dibuat oleh Apple adalah menggunakan bahan baru dalam proses pembuatan.Tahun lalu, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa handset itu melengkung.Apple mengakui bahwa ada pengguna iPhone 6 Plus yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut Apple, selama pengguna berhati -hati, insiden itu tidak perlu terjadi.Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus."IPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi bagian tubuhnya. Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone," kata seorang juru bicara Apple pada saat itu.Apple akhirnya menggunakan aluminium seri 7000 yang diklaim lebih kokoh dan solid.Namun, bagaimanapun, masalah iPhone yang ditekuk dengan mudah sudah terpasang.Jadi akankah penggunaan materi baru ini mempengaruhi iPhone terbaru saat ditekuk?Apa ketangguhan bahan aluminium seri 7000 di iPhone terbaru?Apakah ini lebih kuat dari generasi iPhone sebelumnya?Seorang jurnalis dari Fonefox juga melakukan tes pada iPhone terbaru ini.Dia memutuskan untuk menguji ketangguhan materi baru ini.Dalam video, tampaknya seseorang akan menekuk iPhone 6s Plus dengan kekuatan kedua tangan seperti tes sebelumnya di iPhone 6. Akibatnya, tubuh iPhone 6s Plus tidak menekuk sama sekali.Masih ingin tahu tentang kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus, sekarang dengan bantuan rekan -rekannya, iPhone 6 Plus sedang mencoba untuk menekuknya dengan sekuat tenaga dan hasilnya adalah bahwa ada perubahan dalam bentuk tubuh meskipun tidak terlalu buruk.Ini hanya terlihat sedikit bengkok pada tubuh, tetapi iPhone 6 Plus masih dapat digunakan dengan baik.Tes ini mungkin tidak adil.Karena tes lentur ini harus dilakukan dengan menggunakan mesin karena tidak semua kekuatan manusia sama.Namun, tes ini setidaknya telah membuktikan bahwa iPhone 6s Plus dengan materi baru lebih kokoh dan kuat.Jadi, Anda tidak perlu khawatir saat membeli iPhone 6s dan iPhone 6s Plus.

berita: BeritaTeknologi.com Smartphones with curved screens, such as the Galaxy Round and G Flex, have not achieved significant results in leave the market. Especially with the very expensive price. However, this reportedly did not stop other smartphone companies from producing phones with curved screens. Apple's latest iPhone in 2014 was reportedly not left behind by using a curved screen. In a report written by Bloomberg, Apple's iPhone 6 will come with a major upgrade compared to the iPhone 5S. Sources from Bloomberg say that the iPhone 6 will not only come with a curved screen design. Apple is also said to be using additional sensors that can detect different pressure levels. In addition, Apple is also said to be preparing two iPhone 6 models, one of which will come with a 5.5-inch screen while the other will have a 4.7-inch screen. Both iPhone 6 models will come with a curved screen design.
berita_id: Smartphone BERITITKNOLOGI.com dengan layar melengkung, seperti Galaxy Round dan G Flex, belum mencapai hasil yang signifikan dalam meninggalkan pasar.Apalagi dengan harga yang sangat mahal.Namun, ini dilaporkan tidak menghentikan perusahaan smartphone lain dari memproduksi ponsel dengan layar melengkung.IPhone terbaru Apple pada tahun 2014 dilaporkan tidak tertinggal dengan menggunakan layar melengkung.Dalam sebuah laporan yang ditulis oleh Bloomberg, iPhone 6 Apple akan datang dengan peningkatan besar dibandingkan dengan iPhone 5s.Sumber dari Bloomberg mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 tidak hanya akan datang dengan desain layar melengkung.Apple juga dikatakan menggunakan sensor tambahan yang dapat mendeteksi tingkat tekanan yang berbeda.Selain itu, Apple juga dikatakan menyiapkan dua model iPhone 6, salah satunya akan datang dengan layar 5,5 inci sementara yang lain akan memiliki layar 4,7 inci.Kedua model iPhone 6 akan datang dengan desain layar melengkung.

berita: News about Pokemon being a Jewish product became a trending topic on the Muslim Journal's Fanpage. Four posts titled Pokemon topped the list as the most read posts in mid-July. Here are some titles of articles that have had many viewers in the last few days on the Muslim Journal website as of 19/7/16: 1. Meaning of Pokemon in Syriac: "I'm Jewish," with 152,269 views by blogger. (Read the article here) clause 2. Did you know? Pokemon Products Are Jewish Missions, Contains Defamatory Elements of Islam with views reaching 110,028 by blogger. (Read the article here) 3. Game 'Pokemon Go' fever is spreading, this is the positive and negative impact, with viewers reaching 85,707 by blogger. (Read the article here) 4. Meaning of Pikachu in Syriac: "Be a Jew," with 76,887 views by blogger. (Read the article here) The popularity of the above articles has become the subject of discussion by many netizens, especially social media users such as Facebook, Twitter, etc. The reason is, the article that talks about the relationship between Jews and Pokemon reaps the pros and cons. A few hours ago there were several electronic letters that entered the Muslim Journal contact, either via Facebook or Email, as we have provided contact information on the Jurnalmuslim.com website. Some of them asked the validity of the articles mentioned above. There were even some who stated that the article was a hoax and the Muslim Journal website was accused of spreading slander. The link between Judaism and Pokemon Movies is an old 'issue' Our team of journalists, Nisyi, is motivated to raise the issue of the relationship between Pokemon and Jews because of the recent boom in Niantic's game product, Pokemon Go. When we clarified his motivation and reason for writing the article, he replied that it was an old issue that was brought up again. The issue of a link between Jews and Pokemon has existed since the Pokemon movie was broadcast on private televisions, namely in 2001 and was first broadcast by SCTV (Read about Pokemon for the first time airing on private television: wikipedia). "There were many leaflets about the relationship between Pokemon and Jews that were distributed in several cities when the Pokemon Movie was shown on the screen. Not only Pokemon, but several children's TV series were also included in the content of the leaflets. All of which talked about the existence of Jewish elements in children's cartoon series at the time." Nishi said. Muslim Journalists never post articles/news unless they include the source Because the data from the opinion of the relationship between Jews and Pokemon is no longer available. Our journalist, nisyi, tries to retrieve the data through the Internet. And indeed, a lot of writings that talk about the topic of Jews and Pokemon. Here are some articles that discuss the relationship between Jews and Pokemon: Article about Pokemon and Jews by Reika on her blog, posted in 2013 Article about Pokemon and Jews by smzblog on his blog, posted in 2008 Article about Pokemon and Jews by Dudung on his website, posted in 2011 It can be seen that the issue between Jews and Pokemon existed in the years before the Pokemon Go game was released. From here, our journalists take their opinion from an article sourced from the neutralitas.com site. For those who want to know about the neteritas.com website profile, please read here. In full, sources of opinion writing about Pokemon and Jews can be found here. The pros and cons of the issue of the connection between Jews and Pokemon is also an old issue In the article about Judaism and Pokemon, there are sensitive matters concerning Religion, especially Islam. That is about the meaning of Pokemon and some names of monsters in the Pokemon TV series. For example, it is stated that the Syriac meaning of Pokemon is "I am Jewish." Unfortunately, that statement is an opinion, and there are many pros and cons of that meaning. Among those who dispute this statement is an article quoted by a web developer who is also a Division of Information Technology at Bank BTPN Head Office, Dudung, on his website dudung.net, taken from the source ia-wutsqo. It was stated that leaflets about the relationship between Jews and Pokemon as well as several children's cartoons were not only spread in Indonesia, but also in Saudi, Jordan, Egypt and several other Middle Eastern regions. However, it was also mentioned that after being confirmed by a number of linguists, they generally rejected the notion that the word Pokemon and some of the monsters in Pokemon had a relationship with the Syriac language. Which means that the assumptions contained in the leaflet itself are not necessarily true. Reporting from solo.tribunnews (18/7/16), the LA Times news noted that Nintendo refuted the perception of the connection between Pokemon and Judaism. It is said that Pokemon is actually just an abbreviation of Pocket Monster or pocket monster. Named Pocket Monster because this pokemon has a pocket ball that can be put in a pocket. (Read here) What is interesting here is that it was informed on the dudung.net and tribune sites that Pokemon shows in several countries, such as Jordan, had attracted the attention of residents and even the local government. Quoted by Dudung, that a number of youths and children in Jordan have carried out mass arson actions against goods containing images of Pokemon. The problem is not only related to the meanings that are not necessarily true, but the Pokemon game has had quite a negative impact on children. The full article can be read here (posted in 2001). Regardless of the pros and cons of that perception, in this post, the editor of the Muslim Journal will clarify an article about the relationship between Pokemon and Jews by our journalist, Nisyi, a few days ago. That the article is the opinion of several writings in several media, be it leaflets, or other electronic media. Each of these articles has been given a clear source, and is not just a made-up opinion without any reference review. In this post, we as the editors thank you for the suggestions, input, and constructive criticism submitted through our contact information on the Jurnalmuslim.com site. We will definitely respond to suggestions, input and constructive criticism and are always used as material for evaluation for the Muslim Journal site. May Allah open the hearts of His servants to be able to receive guidance. Al Haq min rabbika falaa takunanna minal mumtarin, the truth is from your Lord Allah and do not be of those who doubt.

JAKARTA, During the 212 action on Tuesday (21/2/2017) yesterday, a photo of the Istiqlal Mosque was circulated which was closed so that participants could not enter. Regarding this, the manager emphasized that this was not true. "In player the early morning (red Tuesday) there were five bus participants who came from Madura. They entered the mosque after Isha time," explained the Head of Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam. as reported by Republika After approaching 10 (evening), Abu explained, he met with the head of his entourage, he announced to his entourage the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be reopened later an hour before Shubuh Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understand. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened "And what is in the photo, it looks like people are lining up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Jakarta, selama aksi 212 pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017) kemarin, sebuah foto masjid Istiqlal diedarkan yang ditutup sehingga peserta tidak bisa masuk.Mengenai hal ini, manajer menekankan bahwa ini tidak benar."Pada pemain pagi hari (Selasa merah) ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Madura. Mereka memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha," jelas kepala bagian protokol masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Republika setelah mendekati 10 (malam), Abu menjelaskan, ia bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, ia mengumumkan kepada rombongannya aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka kembali nanti satu jam sebelum Shubuh Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur yang dipahami dan dipahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada pukul 03.40 dengan masjid dibuka kembali "dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang berbaris untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: Head of the East Java Provincial Narcotics Agency (BNNP), Brigadier General Pol Fatkhur Rahman, appealed to the public not to worry about the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs. Met after the 36th Narotama University Anniversary event in Surabaya, Thursday (9/3), Fatkhur deemed it take necessary to convey this because the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) Narcotics Laboratory Center and the central Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) have stated no found narcotic substances in the candy. "The results of this lab test are valid, that the pacifier candy which was a shocker in Surabaya does not contain drugs. So, people should not be too worried about the issue of pacifier candy containing drugs," he said. Even though it does not contain drugs, Fatkhur still appeals to parents to monitor the snacks their children buy. He said parents should be aware of the very conspicuous coloring content in pacifiers. According to him, it would be nice for parents to bring lunch from home for their sons and daughters. Fatkhur added that the lab results from the BNN and the central BPOM can be justified. But once again, he hopes that parents who have sons and daughters can control their children's snacks, especially on food coloring. "Even though it doesn't contain drugs, parents must be aware of the coloring matter in pacifiers and children's snacks," said Fatkhur. Asked about the results of the lab tests conducted by the Forensic Laboratory Center (Puslabfor) at the Surabaya branch of the National Police at Polda Jatim, he admitted that there were no results from the Puslabfor lab tests. However, his party admitted that the lab test results from the National Narcotics Agency and the central BPOM were sufficient and representative. "The lab results from the National Narcotics Agency and the central BPOM alone are quite valid and can be used as a benchmark that this pacifier does not contain drugs," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Badan Narkotika Provinsi Jawa Timur (BNNP), Brigadir Jenderal Pol Fatkhur Rahman, mengimbau publik untuk tidak khawatir tentang sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Bertemu setelah acara ulang tahun Narotama University ke -36 di Surabaya, Kamis (9/3), Fatkhur dianggap perlu untuk menyampaikan ini karena Pusat Laboratorium Narkotika Narkotika Nasional (BNN) dan Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Pusat (BPOM) telah menyatakan tidak ada zat narkotik yang ditemukan di kandy."Hasil tes lab ini valid, bahwa permen dot yang mengejutkan di Surabaya tidak mengandung narkoba. Jadi, orang tidak terlalu khawatir tentang masalah permen dot yang mengandung obat -obatan," katanya.Meskipun tidak mengandung narkoba, Fatkhur masih menarik bagi orang tua untuk memantau makanan ringan yang dibeli anak -anak mereka.Dia mengatakan orang tua harus menyadari konten mewarnai yang sangat mencolok di dot.Menurutnya, akan menyenangkan bagi orang tua untuk membawa makan siang dari rumah untuk putra dan putri mereka.Fatkhur menambahkan bahwa lab hasil dari BNN dan BPOM pusat dapat dibenarkan.Tapi sekali lagi, dia berharap bahwa orang tua yang memiliki putra dan putri dapat mengendalikan makanan ringan anak -anak mereka, terutama pada pewarna makanan."Meskipun tidak mengandung narkoba, orang tua harus menyadari materi mewarnai pada dot dan makanan ringan anak -anak," kata Fatkhur.Ditanya tentang hasil tes laboratorium yang dilakukan oleh Pusat Laboratorium Forensik (Puslabfor) di cabang Surabaya dari Polisi Nasional di Polda Jatim, ia mengakui bahwa tidak ada hasil dari tes laboratorium Puslabfor.Namun, partainya mengakui bahwa tes lab hasil dari Badan Narkotika Nasional dan BPOM pusat cukup dan representatif."Hasil lab dari Badan Narkotika Nasional dan BPOM pusat saja cukup valid dan dapat digunakan sebagai tolok ukur yang tidak mengandung obat -obatan ini," katanya.

berita: The riots that occurred at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Kelapa Dua, Depok, Friday (10/11) night, became a serious concern for the Police. The incident began because the terrorist prisoners did not receive their cell phones confiscated by officers. However, the police confirmed that during the riots there were no incidents of throwing the Koran. Therefore, the news is not true alias hoax. The Head of the Public Relations Division of fri the National Police Headquarters Inspector General Pol Setyo Wasisto said that his party would seek information who spread information regarding the throwing of the Koran during the riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters. "That (the issue of throwing the Koran) is a hoax, we will find the perpetrators," said Setyo Wasisto at the Police Headquarters Complex, Trunojoyo Street, South Jakarta, Monday (13/11). The hoax information appeared on social media after the riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters occurred. According to Setyo, the information is false and provocative so that it can trigger a commotion. "We'll find out who uploaded it later, provoking news is dangerous," said Setyo. In this regard, Setyo appealed to the public not to be easily provoked by information that is not true. "It can be destructive and you have to be careful," said Setyo.
berita_id: Kerusuhan yang terjadi di markas Mobile Brigade Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jumat (10/11) malam, menjadi perhatian serius bagi polisi.Insiden itu dimulai karena para tahanan teroris tidak menerima ponsel mereka yang disita oleh petugas.Namun, polisi mengkonfirmasi bahwa selama kerusuhan tidak ada insiden untuk melempar Alquran.Oleh karena itu, berita itu bukan tipuan alias yang benar.Kepala Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Jumat, Markas Besar Kepolisian Nasional, Inspektur Jenderal Pol Setyo Wasisto mengatakan bahwa partainya akan mencari informasi yang menyebarkan informasi mengenai pelemparan Alquran selama kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile."Itu (masalah melempar Alquran) adalah tipuan, kami akan menemukan pelaku," kata Setyo Wasisto di kompleks markas polisi, Trunojoyo Street, Jakarta Selatan, Senin (13/11).Informasi tipuan muncul di media sosial setelah kerusuhan di markas Brigade Mobile terjadi.Menurut Setyo, informasinya salah dan provokatif sehingga dapat memicu keributan."Kami akan mengetahui siapa yang mengunggahnya nanti, memprovokasi berita berbahaya," kata Setyo.Dalam hal ini, Setyo mengimbau publik untuk tidak mudah diprovokasi oleh informasi yang tidak benar."Ini bisa merusak dan Anda harus berhati -hati," kata Setyo.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia has the potential to experience a very significant increase to reach Rp. 6.6 billion a year or around Rp. 500 million per month. This can happen if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is passed. According to the RPP material, the president's salary is Rp 533 million. As for the tranquillize vice president, he receives an income of Rp. 368.9 million per month. The proposal for a salary increase if it is legalized is suspected to be inconsistent with the polemics that often occurred during the Jokowi regime. It's no secret that in the regime led by "Khalifah" Jokowi, there were various controversies such as the criminalization of ulama, the disbandment of mass organizations, the omission of hoax spreader accounts, and the failure to fulfill campaign promises. Previously, in 2017, the Executive Director of the Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika emphasized that many of Jokowi's promises were still being violated. Quoted from detik.com, broken promises such as the implementation of the e-Government system in just two weeks. "Maybe you still remember, don't you?," he said during the 3rd Jokowi-JK discussion at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, Jakarta, on Friday, (10/20/2017). Another promise that was denied was to choose a minister of education from among members of the Indonesian Teachers Association (PGRI). In fact, within three years of his administration, Jokowi appointed Anies Baswedan and Muhadjir Effendy who previously served as university rectors. Another thing that Jokowi-JK does not comply with in the field of education is canceling the National Examination for school students. Jokowi-JK also did not keep their promise when drafting the Working Cabinet, namely that they would not divide ministerial seats for their supporting parties. Meanwhile, in the agricultural sector, Jokowi-JK is considered to have failed to fulfill the promise of food self-sufficiency in three years. "(Promise) 7 percent economic growth is still far away," said Andika sadly. Should Jokowi, who is considered a caliph by Said Aqil Siradh, have a salary increase?
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia memiliki potensi untuk mengalami peningkatan yang sangat signifikan untuk mencapai RP.6,6 miliar setahun atau sekitar Rp.500 juta per bulan.Ini dapat terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri disahkan.Menurut materi RPP, gaji presiden adalah Rp 533 juta.Adapun wakil presiden yang tenang, ia menerima pendapatan RP.368,9 juta per bulan.Proposal untuk kenaikan gaji jika dilegalkan diduga tidak konsisten dengan polemik yang sering terjadi selama rezim Jokowi.Bukan rahasia lagi bahwa dalam rezim yang dipimpin oleh jokowi "khalifah", ada berbagai kontroversi seperti kriminalisasi ulama, pembubaran organisasi massa, penghilangan akun penyebar tipuan, dan kegagalan untuk memenuhi janji kampanye.Sebelumnya, pada tahun 2017, direktur eksekutif Institute for Policy Studies (IPS) M. Tri Andika menekankan bahwa banyak janji Jokowi masih dilanggar.Dikutip dari Detik.com, janji-janji yang rusak seperti implementasi sistem e-government hanya dalam dua minggu."Mungkin Anda masih ingat, bukan?," Katanya selama diskusi Jokowi-JK ke-3 di kompleks parlemen, Senayan, Jakarta, pada hari Jumat, (10/20/2017).Janji lain yang ditolak adalah memilih Menteri Pendidikan dari antara anggota Asosiasi Guru Indonesia (PGRI).Bahkan, dalam waktu tiga tahun pemerintahannya, Jokowi menunjuk Anies Baswedan dan Muhadjir Effendy yang sebelumnya menjabat sebagai rektor universitas.Hal lain yang tidak dipatuhi oleh Jokowi-JK di bidang pendidikan adalah membatalkan ujian nasional untuk siswa sekolah.Jokowi-JK juga tidak menepati janji mereka ketika menyusun kabinet yang bekerja, yaitu bahwa mereka tidak akan membagi kursi menteri untuk pesta pendukung mereka.Sementara itu, di sektor pertanian, Jokowi-JK dianggap gagal memenuhi janji swasembada pangan dalam tiga tahun."(Janji) 7 persen pertumbuhan ekonomi masih jauh," kata Andika dengan sedih.Haruskah Jokowi, siapa yang dianggap khalifah oleh Aqil Siradh tersebut, memiliki kenaikan gaji?

berita: California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. "The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry," an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the tone internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products.
berita_id: California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang mengalami masalah melengkung iPhone 6 plus.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple."Iphone baru adalah baja/titanium yang diresapi untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi isu -isu miring yang beredar dengan liar di internet nada.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.

berita: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Remember the crooked cellphone phenomenon that happened to the iPhone 6 Plus? Galaxy S6 Edge owners can also experience the same thing. The initial launch of the iPhone 6 Plus was immediately hit by an unpleasant issue, namely the body of the cellphone which turned out to be easy to bend when pressed. This apparently also happened to the latest Samsung phones. SquareTrade, an electronics company, conducted tests on the iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. All three try to be pressed with the same machine. From the results of these tests, it can be  seen that the iPhone 6 Plus starts to bend when it receives a pressure of 50 Kg, and looks broken when pressed up to 81 Kg. While the Galaxy S6 Edge turns out to have the same resistance. The screen and body look completely damaged when under pressure weighing 81 Kg. "Is this the second bendgate issue? No. Samsung fans will experience worse, they will not find a bent phone, but a broken glass in their pocket," said the voice actor in the video. As for the HTC One M9. The screen already looks bent when it takes 54 kg of pressure, and because the power button is right in the middle, the damage prevents the phone from working at all. Here is a video of the testing done by SquareTrade From the results of these tests, it can be seen that the scathing criticism directed at Apple about the iPhone 6 Plus being easily bent was also experienced by its competitors, the Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. But it should also be noted. Even to make the three phones curved is not easy, because it requires quite hard pressure at one point.
berita_id: JAKARTA, CNN Indonesia - Ingat fenomena ponsel bengkok yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus?Pemilik Galaxy S6 Edge juga dapat mengalami hal yang sama.Peluncuran awal iPhone 6 Plus segera dilanda masalah yang tidak menyenangkan, yaitu tubuh ponsel yang ternyata mudah ditekuk saat ditekan.Ini tampaknya juga terjadi pada ponsel Samsung terbaru.Squaretrade, sebuah perusahaan elektronik, melakukan tes pada iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Ketiganya mencoba ditekan dengan mesin yang sama.Dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mulai menekuk ketika menerima tekanan 50 kg, dan terlihat rusak ketika ditekan hingga 81 kg.Sementara Galaxy S6 Edge ternyata memiliki resistensi yang sama.Layar dan tubuh terlihat benar -benar rusak ketika di bawah tekanan dengan berat 81 kg."Apakah ini masalah Bendgate kedua? Tidak. Penggemar Samsung akan mengalami lebih buruk, mereka tidak akan menemukan telepon bengkok, tetapi pecahan gelas di saku mereka," kata aktor suara dalam video.Adapun HTC One M9.Layar sudah terlihat bengkok ketika mengambil tekanan 54 kg, dan karena tombol daya tepat di tengah, kerusakan mencegah ponsel bekerja sama sekali.Berikut adalah video pengujian yang dilakukan oleh Squaretrade dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa kritik pedas yang diarahkan pada Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah ditekuk juga dialami oleh para pesaingnya, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Tapi itu juga harus dicatat.Bahkan untuk membuat tiga ponsel melengkung tidak mudah, karena membutuhkan tekanan yang cukup keras pada satu titik.

berita: As someone who is active every day and meets many people, you need to know about first aid for stroke sufferers. Maybe you meet someone who has had a stroke, so you can help him and at least save his life. Stroke attacks occur suddenly without the knowledge of the sufferer even though sometimes the body has shown symptoms. A stroke can occur because blood flow to the brain is blocked due to blockage or narrowing of blood vessels. Because the brain lacks blood, it causes the death of cells in the brain. This condition makes stroke sufferers experience partial or complete paralysis when the attack comes. This disease is very serious and must be treated immediately. In the past, stroke only attacked the elderly, but now it's different. An irregular and healthy lifestyle makes children susceptible to stroke. If you have had a stroke, there will be a lot of suffering that a person faces both physically, mentally and financially. This condition will make the sufferer's spirit of life decreases and they don't want to fight to live anymore. Neither you nor the people around you want to have a stroke. Therefore, you must be aware of the symptoms of stroke that are shown by the body before the attack occurs. Take immediate action if you experience stroke symptoms. If you meet a stroke patient, give him or her first aid to save a stroke patient. There is a unique way that can save stroke sufferers, namely by using a needle. Needles that are usually used for sewing, but can treat several diseases including stroke. You must be familiar with the method of healing diseases with needles or acupuncture. The first aid method when a stroke occurs is using a needle, introduced by a professor from China. Before finally bringing the stroke patient to the hospital, apply a needle. This needle makes stroke sufferers can prevent the severity of stroke. When you are faced with a stroke sufferer, don't panic. Calm down and find the needle. Avoid moving or lifting the stroke sufferer from that place. Use any needles, whether sewing needles, syringes or safety pins. Then make sure the needle is sterile or you can sterilize it by burning it first, before applying it to stroke sufferers. Use the sterile needle to insert 10 fingers of stroke sufferers. Insert the needle slowly, but not too deep. Make sure the blood is flowing from the fingers you pricked. If it doesn't bleed, press firmly until it bleeds. After everything bleeds, let it sit for a few minutes. Hopefully the patient will wake up after getting first aid for this stroke sufferer. If the skin of the sufferer of a strike attack is discolored or sideways all you have to do is massage the ear until it turns red. Then, prick the ear with the soft skin with the needle until blood comes out. Do that way on both ears of stroke sufferers. Wait, until a few minutes and hopefully his mouth returns to normal. Take the patient to the nearest hospital, even if under normal circumstances or not. So that stroke patients get further examination and treatment. hold open This method has been proven to be able to save stroke sufferers and as a proper first aid for stroke sufferers. The discovery of this method can save people from sudden strokes. We are also no longer confused in dealing with someone who has a sudden stroke. Rest assured that you can help and do not hesitate to do the above treatment.
berita_id: Sebagai seseorang yang aktif setiap hari dan bertemu banyak orang, Anda perlu tahu tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke.Mungkin Anda bertemu seseorang yang mengalami stroke, sehingga Anda dapat membantunya dan setidaknya menyelamatkan hidupnya.Serangan stroke terjadi tiba -tiba tanpa sepengetahuan penderita meskipun kadang -kadang tubuh telah menunjukkan gejala.Stroke dapat terjadi karena aliran darah ke otak diblokir karena penyumbatan atau penyempitan pembuluh darah.Karena otak kekurangan darah, itu menyebabkan kematian sel di otak.Kondisi ini membuat penderita stroke mengalami kelumpuhan parsial atau total ketika serangan itu terjadi.Penyakit ini sangat serius dan harus segera dirawat.Di masa lalu, stroke hanya menyerang orang tua, tetapi sekarang berbeda.Gaya hidup yang tidak teratur dan sehat membuat anak -anak rentan terhadap stroke.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, akan ada banyak penderitaan yang dihadapi seseorang baik secara fisik, mental dan finansial.Kondisi ini akan membuat semangat hidup penderita berkurang dan mereka tidak ingin berjuang untuk hidup lagi.Baik Anda maupun orang -orang di sekitar Anda ingin melakukan stroke.Karena itu, Anda harus menyadari gejala stroke yang ditunjukkan oleh tubuh sebelum serangan terjadi.Ambil tindakan segera jika Anda mengalami gejala stroke.Jika Anda bertemu dengan pasien stroke, berikan pertolongan pertama dia untuk menyelamatkan pasien stroke.Ada cara unik yang dapat menyelamatkan penderita stroke, yaitu dengan menggunakan jarum.Jarum yang biasanya digunakan untuk menjahit, tetapi dapat mengobati beberapa penyakit termasuk stroke.Anda harus terbiasa dengan metode penyembuhan penyakit dengan jarum atau akupunktur.Metode pertolongan pertama ketika stroke terjadi menggunakan jarum, diperkenalkan oleh profesor dari Cina.Sebelum akhirnya membawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit, oleskan jarum.Jarum ini membuat penderita stroke dapat mencegah keparahan stroke.Saat Anda dihadapkan dengan penderita stroke, jangan panik.Tenang dan temukan jarum.Hindari memindahkan atau mengangkat penderita stroke dari tempat itu.Gunakan jarum apa pun, apakah jarum jahit, jarum suntik atau pin pengaman.Kemudian pastikan jarumnya steril atau Anda dapat mensterilkannya dengan membakarnya terlebih dahulu, sebelum mengoleskannya ke penderita stroke.Gunakan jarum steril untuk memasukkan 10 jari penderita stroke.Masukkan jarum perlahan, tetapi tidak terlalu dalam.Pastikan darah mengalir dari jari yang Anda tusukan.Jika tidak berdarah, tekan dengan kuat sampai berdarah.Setelah semuanya berdarah, diamkan selama beberapa menit.Semoga pasien akan bangun setelah mendapatkan pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke ini.Jika kulit penderita serangan mogok berubah warna atau menyamping yang harus Anda lakukan adalah memijat telinga sampai berubah merah.Kemudian, tusuk telinga dengan kulit lembut dengan jarum sampai darah keluar.Lakukan cara itu di kedua telinga penderita stroke.Tunggu, sampai beberapa menit dan semoga mulutnya kembali normal.Bawa pasien ke rumah sakit terdekat, bahkan jika dalam keadaan normal atau tidak.Sehingga pasien stroke mendapatkan pemeriksaan dan perawatan lebih lanjut.Tahan Buka Metode ini telah terbukti dapat menyelamatkan penderita stroke dan sebagai pertolongan pertama yang tepat untuk penderita stroke.Penemuan metode ini dapat menyelamatkan orang dari pukulan mendadak.Kami juga tidak lagi bingung dalam berurusan dengan seseorang yang mengalami stroke mendadak.Yakinlah bahwa Anda dapat membantu dan tidak ragu untuk melakukan perawatan di atas.

berita: The Traveloka application suddenly went viral on social media. Quoted from various existing sources, an invitation to uninstall the Traveloka application circulated on Twitter. This was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. As we know, the walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday 11/11/2017, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' mr speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. This information then spread and provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Meanwhile, Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. However, Derianto was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on an official trip that day. So if you say Mr. Deri was there and it is said to provide support (to Ananda), he was not there," said Busyra.
berita_id: Aplikasi Traveloka tiba -tiba menjadi viral di media sosial.Dikutip dari berbagai sumber yang ada, undangan untuk menghapus pemasangan aplikasi Traveloka yang diedarkan di Twitter.Ini dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Seperti yang kita ketahui, walk out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu 11/11/2017, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan dan pidato Mr, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Informasi ini kemudian menyebar dan memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Sementara itu, manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Namun, DeRianto tidak dapat hadir."Sebenarnya, Tn. Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi hari itu. Jadi jika Anda mengatakan Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dikatakan memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.

berita: Head of Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, admitted that his party had never prohibited the 212 protest crowd from visiting the Istiqlal mosque. He denied that if the Istiqlal Mosque had its gates locked, it would be used by the masses "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu explained, the gate of the Istiqlal mosque was closed at 21.310 WIB, and would be reopened an hour before the dawn prayer. "Outside the fasting month, the Isha prayer ends, around 21.30 WIB according to the law, it is closed, sterile. Then it is opened again one hour before dawn. fast That is outside the fasting month," he explained. He said that the crowd who came to the Istiqlal mosque last night was a group from East Java, as many as 5 buses. They enter after Isha, then are given the opportunity to worship clean, talk nicely with the chairman, "We gave understanding, and thank God we understood and left istiqlal voluntarily," he said. He reiterated that if the Istiqlal Mosque had never banned the 212 mass demonstration, he said the issue of the ban was not true. "The intruders are the people who wrote accusing the PKI. Except for Axis 212, 411, which we expelled the day before and it was an emergency. There was no coordination, they didn't take action like 212," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Protokol Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, mengakui bahwa partainya tidak pernah melarang kerumunan protes 212 untuk mengunjungi masjid Istiqlal.Dia membantah bahwa jika masjid Istiqlal memiliki gerbang terkunci, itu akan digunakan oleh massa "seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu menjelaskan, gerbang masjid Istiqlal ditutup pada 21.310 WIB, dan akan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Di luar bulan puasa, doa Isha berakhir, sekitar 21.30 WIB menurut hukum, ditutup, steril. Kemudian dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum fajar. Cepat di luar bulan puasa," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa kerumunan yang datang ke masjid Istiqlal tadi malam adalah kelompok dari Jawa Timur, sebanyak 5 bus.Mereka masuk setelah Isha, kemudian diberi kesempatan untuk beribadah bersih, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, "Kami memberi pemahaman, dan syukurlah kami mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Dia menegaskan bahwa jika masjid Istiqlal tidak pernah melarang demonstrasi massal 212, dia mengatakan masalah larangan itu tidak benar."Para penyusup adalah orang -orang yang menulis menuduh PKI. Kecuali untuk Axis 212, 411, yang kami ungkapkan sehari sebelumnya dan itu adalah keadaan darurat. Tidak ada koordinasi, mereka tidak mengambil tindakan seperti 212," katanya.

berita: The walk out action by Kanisius College alumni including well-known composer Ananda Sukarlan and Traveloka owner Derianto Kusuma when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech turned out to be a long one. So the public spotlight, now netizens are busy calling for an invitation to delete or uninstall the Traveloka application from their smartphones. The invitation to uninstall it echoed on Twitter's timeline, even becoming one of the trending topics on Twitter Indonesia. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from the VIP seat provided for him and walked out when Anies gave a speech. Unfortunately, the action was followed by a number of other alumni. Judging from the information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies Baswedan's speech. Of course this is considered as support for Ananda's walk out. After the incident, we don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott the Traveloka application. The hashtags #BoikotTraveloka and #UninstallTraveloka echoed and continued to grow along with the widespread invitation of netizens to delete the hotel and transportation booking application. Peeking at the Twitter timeline, the owner of the @dimasprakbar account tweeted the reason the hashtag was crowded. “The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka is a follow-up to the participation of the Traveloka boss in the walkout when the governor of DKI Jakarta gave a speech. Break even," he tweeted. Netizens with the @hizzatullah account wrote something similar. According to him, the owner of Traveloka has exemplified the dishonorable act of walking out at Kanisius. He also said that the price discount provided by Traveloka was not worth the honor. Instead of many Twitter users inviting other netizens to delete the Traveloka application, it turned out that there were also funny replies from other netizens, like my owner @ardeks. He said users who deleted the transportation user application but could still use the service through the website.
berita_id: Tindakan Walk Out oleh alumni Kanisius College termasuk komposer terkenal Ananda Sukarlan dan pemilik Traveloka Dantu Kusuma ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato ternyata panjang.Jadi sorotan publik, sekarang netizen sibuk meminta undangan untuk menghapus atau menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dari smartphone mereka.Undangan untuk menghapus instalannya bergema di timeline Twitter, bahkan menjadi salah satu topik tren di Twitter Indonesia.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP yang disediakan untuknya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato.Sayangnya, aksinya diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Dilihat dari informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato Anies Baswedan.Tentu saja ini dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk perjalanan Ananda.Setelah insiden itu, kami tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot aplikasi Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka dan #uninstalltraveloka bergema dan terus tumbuh seiring dengan undangan luas netizen untuk menghapus aplikasi hotel dan pemesanan transportasi.Mengintip di timeline Twitter, pemilik akun @Dimasprakbar tweeted alasan tagar itu ramai."Tagar #uninstalltraveloka adalah tindak lanjut dari partisipasi bos Traveloka di pemogokan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta memberikan pidato. Break Even," ia tweeted.Netizens dengan akun @hizzatullah menulis sesuatu yang serupa.Menurutnya, pemilik Traveloka telah mencontohkan tindakan berjalan yang tidak terhormat di Kanisius.Dia juga mengatakan bahwa diskon harga yang diberikan oleh Traveloka tidak sebanding dengan kehormatannya.Alih -alih banyak pengguna Twitter yang mengundang netizen lain untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka, ternyata ada juga balasan lucu dari netizen lain, seperti pemilik saya @ardeks.Dia mengatakan pengguna yang menghapus aplikasi pengguna transportasi tetapi masih bisa menggunakan layanan melalui situs web.

berita: It hasn't been a month since its official release and sales, a number of iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users have started complaining and criticizing Apple for some reason. Most often, these users complain that their iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus bend immediately after being put in their pocket. Reported by the Daily Mail, there are at least a number of iPhone 6 and identification number iPhone 6 Plus users who have experienced this and reported it to Apple and its CEO, Tim Cook via social media while uploading photos of their bent devices. "Hey Tim Cook! Actually I really like my new iPhone 6 Plus, the feature I like the most about this iPhone 6 Plus is the flexibility it bends like this!" one user tweeted. Meanwhile, another user also mentioned that he carried his new iPhone 6 in his pocket and immediately curved it when he took it out. According to him, this is because the materials used are very susceptible to such things. Also read: This New Smartphone Made in North Korea 'Combines' iPhone and Samsung Galaxy "I went to drive and put my iPhone 6 in my pocket, I got off and then sat drinking coffee in the cafe. When I took out my iPhone 6, how surprised I was to see how it was not like it used to be. Disappointing, "said a user named Hanzoh. The size of the iPhone 6 Plus which reaches 5.5 inches with materials made of metal is not as expected. Although only a few have experienced this, the number of users whose iPhone 6 is bent is starting to grow. Of course this is a disappointment for those who have to pay up to tens of millions of rupiah for these devices.
berita_id: Belum satu bulan sejak rilis dan penjualan resminya, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus sudah mulai mengeluh dan mengkritik Apple karena beberapa alasan.Paling sering, pengguna ini mengeluh bahwa IPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus Bend segera setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku mereka.Dilaporkan oleh Daily Mail, setidaknya ada sejumlah iPhone 6 dan nomor identifikasi iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang telah mengalami ini dan melaporkannya ke Apple dan CEO -CEO, Tim Cook melalui media sosial sambil mengunggah foto perangkat bengkok mereka."Hei Tim Cook! Sebenarnya aku sangat suka iPhone 6 Plus baru saya, fitur yang paling saya sukai dari iPhone 6 Plus ini adalah fleksibilitas yang ditekuk seperti ini!"satu pengguna tweeted.Sementara itu, pengguna lain juga menyebutkan bahwa ia membawa iPhone 6 barunya di sakunya dan segera melengkung ketika ia mengeluarkannya.Menurutnya, ini karena bahan yang digunakan sangat rentan terhadap hal -hal seperti itu.Baca juga: Smartphone baru yang dibuat di Korea Utara ini 'menggabungkan' iPhone dan Samsung Galaxy "Saya pergi untuk mengemudi dan meletakkan iPhone 6 saya di saku saya, saya turun dan kemudian duduk minum kopi di kafe. Ketika saya mengeluarkan iPhone 6 saya, betapa terkejutnya saya melihat bagaimana itu tidak seperti dulu. Kecap," kata seorang pengguna bernama Hanzoh.Ukuran iPhone 6 Plus yang mencapai 5,5 inci dengan bahan yang terbuat dari logam tidak seperti yang diharapkan.Meskipun hanya sedikit yang mengalami hal ini, jumlah pengguna yang iPhone 6 sedang bengkok mulai tumbuh.Tentu saja ini mengecewakan bagi mereka yang harus membayar hingga puluhan juta rupiah untuk perangkat ini.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives will finally react to the data leak of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cites Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook has violated. "As a sovereign country, the laws that exist in Indonesia must be fulfilled and anyone who violates them will be subject to sanctions in accordance with applicable legal regulations ...," Meutya chirped when contacted via WhatsApp, on Thursday (5/4/2018) ). In addition, Meutya explained that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is very worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose from the three options." Meanwhile, time lag Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has also proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data. "We will hold an internal meeting and will immediately send an official letter to them," said Hanafi. The time for the summons is still unknown, but Hanafi emphasized that the agenda was more directed at asking for clarification from Facebook. Previously, representatives of Facebook Indonesia had met the summons of the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara. The call is an effort to clarify the government's disclosure of the data of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia from a total of 87 million users worldwide related to the Cambridge Analytica scandal. An important outcome of the meeting between Rudiantara and Facebook was to ask third-party applications running on the Facebook platform to be temporarily closed. On this occasion, Rudiantara emphasized that he would not hesitate to close Facebook services in Indonesia if they stubbornly did not comply with the government's request. “If the third party app is not shut down, want me to shut it down completely?” he said.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya akan bereaksi terhadap kebocoran data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara berdaulat, undang -undang yang ada di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar mereka akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan peraturan hukum yang berlaku ...," Meutya berkicau ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4/2018)).Selain itu, Meutya menjelaskan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia sangat khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menjadi preseden yang buruk bagi perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih dari tiga opsi."Sementara itu, Time Lag Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan juga telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor."Kami akan mengadakan pertemuan internal dan akan segera mengirim surat resmi kepada mereka," kata Hanafi.Waktu untuk panggilan masih belum diketahui, tetapi Hanafi menekankan bahwa agenda lebih diarahkan untuk meminta klarifikasi dari Facebook.Sebelumnya, perwakilan Facebook Indonesia telah memenuhi panggilan Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara.Panggilan ini merupakan upaya untuk mengklarifikasi pengungkapan pemerintah terhadap data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia dari total 87 juta pengguna di seluruh dunia terkait dengan skandal Cambridge Analytica.Hasil penting dari pertemuan antara Rudiantara dan Facebook adalah meminta aplikasi pihak ketiga yang berjalan di platform Facebook untuk sementara ditutup.Pada kesempatan ini, Rudiantara menekankan bahwa dia tidak akan ragu untuk menutup layanan Facebook di Indonesia jika mereka dengan keras kepala tidak memenuhi permintaan pemerintah.“Jika aplikasi pihak ketiga tidak ditutup, ingin saya menutupnya sepenuhnya?”katanya.

berita: A chain message about vigilance against toothbrushes made from pig bristles is spreading in the community. Because of this, there is the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. The message is not really new. The message was spread a year ago, but now it's crowded again. "Let's check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means pig hair. As soon as the sound of the message fragments spread again through the chat application. Not only on toothbrushes, the message maker also suggested that people check the bread brushes. He said the brush usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". As with other hoax messages, the appeal was accompanied by a request to share the message with family and friends in the group so that more people would be spared from non-halal products. It turned out that the informant had misunderstood. Maybe, when he wrote the message, he had not had coffee. Because, the term bristle is not only used for sea urchins. According to the official website of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) Food, Drug and Cosmetic Research Institute, the term bristle is lexically a short, stiff hair, and fiber. So, all stiff hair fibers can be called bristle. In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used for making brushes or brushes (including toothbrushes). However, not all of them come from sea urchins. Bristle for brushes and brushes can be sourced from animal hair. Be it pigs, goats, horses, or camels. Apart from animal hair, for industrial purposes, bristle can also be made from synthetic materials, either nylon or silicone. Plant fiber has also been used as a brush or brush material. The fiber is commonly known as palm fiber. The MUI has firmly stated that if a brush or brush uses pork bristles, it is unlawful. However, manufacturers usually write down in detail the raw material used for fur. Usually, for brushes or brushes with boar bristle material, it is written boar bristle brush. Boar itself is an English term that refers to a wild boar. Recognizing the raw material for a brush or toothbrush is not easy. However, you can determine whether the fur comes from tranquillize animal hair or synthetic material by slightly burning it. If you smell hair, you can be sure that the fur comes from an animal. If it is made of synthetic material or coconut fiber, the smell will be different. Referring to a number of sources, the use of bristles on toothbrushes was first carried out by the Chinese in the 15th century. At that time, the hair on the pig's neck was used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. And, the fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. Modern technology has finally found nylon can be used as bristles on brushes. The technology was introduced in 1938. Since 1950, the toothbrush industry has mostly used nylon bristles. So, don't be in a hurry to think of the bristle writing on your toothbrush packaging as a sea urchin.
berita_id: Pesan rantai tentang kewaspadaan terhadap sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi menyebar di masyarakat.Karena itu, ada kata bulu pada kemasan merek sikat gigi global.Pesannya tidak terlalu baru.Pesan itu tersebar setahun yang lalu, tapi sekarang sudah ramai lagi."Mari kita periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan" berbulu "pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi. Bulu berarti rambut babi. Begitu suara fragmen pesan menyebar lagi melalui aplikasi obrolan. Tidak hanya pada sikat gigi," Pacar juga menyarankan agar orang -orang memeriksa sikat roti.Banding ini disertai dengan permintaan untuk berbagi pesan dengan keluarga dan teman-teman dalam kelompok itu sehingga lebih banyak orang akan terhindar dari produk non-halte.Rambut yang kaku.Nylon atau Silicone.Babi.Mengenali bahan baku untuk sikat atau sikat gigi tidak mudah.15th century. At that time, the hair on the pig's neck was used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. And, the fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. ModernTeknologi akhirnya menemukan nilon dapat digunakan sebagai bulu pada kuas.

berita: This afternoon the Makobrimob was tense, due to the Seizing and Throwing of Al-Qur'ans by Unscrupulous Members of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Prison this afternoon. It is known that the perpetrator of the throwing of the Qur'an is a prison officer who is known to be cruel to Muslim prisoners. violent disorder Even this news was published by CNN Indonesia, but unfortunately this news was published in a piece, and was also twisted by the CNN Indonesia Editor. CNN Indonesia reported that prisoners who went on a rampage because their cellphones were confiscated, even though the rampage began when Brimob Prison Officers threw the detainees' Al-Qur'an. Prisoners are also willing to have their cellphones confiscated, but the prisoners are not willing to have their Holy Books and Al-Qur'ans thrown into the trash by prison officers.
berita_id: Sore ini Makobrimob tegang, karena perebutan dan melempar al-Qur'ans oleh anggota yang tidak bermoral dari penjara markas brigade seluler sore ini.Diketahui bahwa pelaku lemparan Al -Qur'an adalah seorang perwira penjara yang dikenal kejam terhadap tahanan Muslim.Gangguan kekerasan Bahkan berita ini diterbitkan oleh CNN Indonesia, tetapi sayangnya berita ini diterbitkan dalam sebuah karya, dan juga dipelintir oleh editor CNN Indonesia.CNN Indonesia melaporkan bahwa para tahanan yang mengamuk karena ponsel mereka disita, meskipun mengamuk dimulai ketika petugas penjara Brimob melemparkan al-Qur'an dari tahanan.Tahanan juga bersedia melakukan ponsel mereka, tetapi para tahanan tidak bersedia memiliki kitab suci dan al-Qur'ans yang dilemparkan ke tempat sampah oleh petugas penjara.

berita: The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, emphasized that the government would not hesitate to close the Facebook platform if the world's largest social media site became a place for spreading false news, as happened to the Rohingya. "I take a position, I threaten to close Facebook and the government has no doubts if it has to close Facebook if it is used for hoaxes," said Rudiantara at the Ministry of Communication and Information Building, Jakarta, Thursday (5/4) yesterday. After Facebook admitted to being used as an anti-Rohingya propaganda tool in Myanmar, Rudiantara said he did not want something similar to happen in Indonesia. In addition, indications of the leakage of one million user data from Indonesia in the Cambridge Analytica case require a cooperative attitude from Facebook in following up on requests from the Ministry of Communication and Information. Rudiantara said that his party would not just take action to close social media platforms, but through a process and with the right profit reasons. Although he assessed that so far, Facebook is among the three platforms that are less cooperative, namely only fulfilling 50 percent of the Ministry of Communication and Information's requests to close content that was considered not according to the norm since two years ago. "This is what I want to convey to the public, that this is the situation, I personally have no intention of closing anything like that, it must be guarded for the benefit of the state and society," said Rudiantara. The Minister of Communication and Information emphasized that all social media must be willing to participate in maintaining the stability of the country if they want to do business in Indonesia, if it causes instability in Indonesia, the government will act decisively. There are also Facebook users in Indonesia who access social media every month more than 115 million people, of the 2.07 billion people who access Facebook every month worldwide.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiiantara, menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak akan ragu untuk menutup platform Facebook jika situs media sosial terbesar di dunia menjadi tempat untuk menyebarkan berita palsu, seperti yang terjadi pada Rohingya."Saya mengambil posisi, saya mengancam untuk menutup Facebook dan pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan jika harus menutup Facebook jika digunakan untuk tipuan," kata Rudiiantara di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Pembangunan Informasi, Jakarta, Kamis (5/4) kemarin.Setelah Facebook mengaku digunakan sebagai alat propaganda anti-Rohingya di Myanmar, Rudiantara mengatakan dia tidak ingin sesuatu yang serupa terjadi di Indonesia.Selain itu, indikasi kebocoran satu juta data pengguna dari Indonesia dalam kasus Cambridge Analytica membutuhkan sikap kooperatif dari Facebook dalam menindaklanjuti permintaan dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa partainya tidak akan hanya mengambil tindakan untuk menutup platform media sosial, tetapi melalui suatu proses dan dengan alasan keuntungan yang tepat.Meskipun ia menilai bahwa sejauh ini, Facebook adalah salah satu dari tiga platform yang kurang kooperatif, yaitu hanya memenuhi 50 persen dari kementerian komunikasi dan permintaan informasi untuk menutup konten yang dianggap tidak sesuai dengan norma sejak dua tahun lalu."Inilah yang ingin saya sampaikan kepada publik, bahwa inilah situasinya, saya pribadi tidak punya niat untuk menutup hal seperti itu, itu harus dijaga untuk kepentingan negara bagian dan masyarakat," kata Rudiiantara.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi menekankan bahwa semua media sosial harus bersedia untuk berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia, jika itu menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak secara tegas.Ada juga pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang mengakses media sosial setiap bulan lebih dari 115 juta orang, dari 2,07 miliar orang yang mengakses Facebook setiap bulan di seluruh dunia.

berita: Iksan, South Korea, Needlework practitioners may claim various benefits from this alternative medicine. However, in stroke, research has shown that acupuncture cannot restore conditions after an attack. Apart from failing to improve the ability to perform daily activities, acupuncture also fails to improve neurological or nerve function in general. If any, the effect was not significant when compared with placebo. Dr. Jae Cheol Kong, a scientist from Wonkwang University concluded this after tracing 10 related studies. Quoted from Reuters, Wednesday (29/9/2010), most all of them concluded acupuncture is not beneficial for stroke patients. The search included a number of databases and journals in Korea, to represent the Asian population. Admitted by Dr Kong, one of the limitations in acupuncture research is the lack of representation of the Asian population because it is carried out by Western scientists. There are 2 kinds of placebo used as a comparison in acupuncture studies. In 8 studies, the placebo was a sham acupuncture technique while the other 2 studies used electrostimulation or electrical stimulation in the comparison group. Unlike real acupuncture, fake acupuncture is performed at points that are not real meridians. In addition, the needle is inserted not too deep or even only in the outermost layer. However, Dr Hongmei Wu from West China Hospital doesn't want to rush into concluding that acupuncture is completely useless. Precisely because acupuncture and placebo both had little effect, he saw the potential for developing new acupuncture methods. Especially for other health disorders, the benefits of acupuncture can be scientifically proven. For example, to increase the success of IVF embryo implantation and relieve acute and chronic pain.
