jika Anda menghindari kolesterol. Ini adalah proses yang lebih baik dari ikan lele dengan mengukus / mendidih dan jangan goreng

berita: As we know, drugs are goods whose circulation is prohibited in Indonesia. However, in this modern era, there are just ideas for dealers to be able to disseminate these illicit goods. Not only adults, even children can't be separated from the targets of their operations. Recently found cases of drug trafficking in the form of candy. Of course, this case is reminiscent of what happened several years ago. The following are four candies that are known to contain drugs. pacifier candy One of the saddest cases in Indonesia is the circulation of pacifiers among minors. The candy is known to be very in demand in the school environment. Naturally, its cute shape is easy to attract minors. The case was first revealed after a student skipped school in the East Surabaya area. The child claimed to be dizzy after eating pacifier candy. The police also moved quickly by conducting raids on sweets suspected of containing drugs. The Satpol PP also cooperates with the local puskesmas to check every candy pacifier circulating in the stalls. However, after testing in the laboratory, it can be ascertained that the candy does not contain drugs. The BPOM has also held a press conference to clarify the issue of drug candy. 'Happy Feet' penguin candy No one would have guessed that this cute candy in the form of an animated sacrifice character turned out to be drugs. The prohibited item is a type of ecstasy with blue and pink colors. The owner of the cute candy is a 28-year-old woman. Initially, the police also believed that the item was ordinary candy. However, after conducting an inspection, it turned out that it was true that the candy contained MDMA preparations. The woman who peddled drug candy in Denpasar was arrested on July 10, 2015. From the arrest, it was revealed that he had a gang that circulated shabu not far from the Denpasar area. Finger Candy The discovery of the finger candy case began with the case of a child from Ciledug, Tangerang who fell asleep for five hours after enjoying the candy. Following up on the report, BPOM immediately checked the candy importer who came from China. The colorful candy is known to come from a Chinese company called Chaozhou Chaoan Wangging Foods China. The BPOM immediately took the initiative to monitor the products suspected of containing the drug. Chocolate wrap candy In 2008, there was a case where children in Kindergarten 5, South Jakarta got high after eating sweets given to them by friends. After being investigated by the police, their urine found Benzodiazepine drugs which have the same effect as tranquilizers or anesthetics. The candy is wrapped in brown paper. Each strip contains 10 seeds. After investigation, it turned out that the candy belonged to one of the fathers of TK 5 Jakarta students. Since then, parents have been advised to supervise their children so that they do not easily accept the sweets that people give them. The number of reports about the circulation of candy containing drugs is indeed worrying. Moreover, the candy is packaged so attractively. One of the anticipations to avoid drug candy can be done by choosing local candy that has been declared safe by the POM.
berita_id: Seperti yang kita ketahui, obat -obatan adalah barang yang sirkulasi dilarang di Indonesia.Namun, di era modern ini, hanya ada ide bagi dealer untuk dapat menyebarkan barang -barang terlarang ini.Tidak hanya orang dewasa, bahkan anak -anak tidak dapat dipisahkan dari target operasi mereka.Baru -baru ini menemukan kasus perdagangan narkoba dalam bentuk permen.Tentu saja, kasus ini mengingatkan pada apa yang terjadi beberapa tahun yang lalu.Berikut ini adalah empat permen yang diketahui mengandung obat -obatan.Permen dot salah satu kasus paling menyedihkan di Indonesia adalah sirkulasi dot di antara anak di bawah umur.Permen diketahui sangat diminati di lingkungan sekolah.Secara alami, bentuknya yang lucu mudah menarik di bawah umur.Kasus ini pertama kali terungkap setelah seorang siswa melewatkan sekolah di daerah Surabaya Timur.Anak itu mengaku pusing setelah makan permen dot.Polisi juga bergerak cepat dengan melakukan penggerebekan pada permen yang diduga mengandung narkoba.Satpol PP juga bekerja sama dengan Puskesmas lokal untuk memeriksa setiap dot permen yang beredar di kios.Namun, setelah pengujian di laboratorium, dapat dipastikan bahwa permen tidak mengandung obat.BPOM juga mengadakan konferensi pers untuk mengklarifikasi masalah permen narkoba.Permen Penguin 'Happy Feet', tidak ada yang menduga bahwa permen lucu ini dalam bentuk karakter pengorbanan animasi ternyata menjadi narkoba.Item terlarang adalah jenis ekstasi dengan warna biru dan merah muda.Pemilik permen yang lucu adalah seorang wanita berusia 28 tahun.Awalnya, polisi juga percaya bahwa barang itu adalah permen biasa.Namun, setelah melakukan inspeksi, ternyata memang benar bahwa permen berisi persiapan MDMA.Wanita yang menjajakan permen narkoba di Denpasar ditangkap pada 10 Juli 2015. Dari penangkapan, terungkap bahwa ia memiliki geng yang mengedarkan Shabu tidak jauh dari daerah Denpasar.Finger Candy Penemuan kasus permen jari dimulai dengan kasus seorang anak dari Ciledug, Tangerang yang tertidur selama lima jam setelah menikmati permen.Menindaklanjuti laporan itu, BPOM segera memeriksa importir permen yang datang dari Cina.Permen berwarna -warni diketahui berasal dari sebuah perusahaan Cina bernama Chaozhou Chaoan Wangging Foods China.BPOM segera mengambil inisiatif untuk memantau produk yang diduga mengandung obat.Permen Bungkus Cokelat pada tahun 2008, ada kasus di mana anak -anak di TK 5, Jakarta Selatan menjadi tinggi setelah makan permen yang diberikan kepada mereka oleh teman -teman.Setelah diselidiki oleh polisi, urin mereka menemukan obat benzodiazepine yang memiliki efek yang sama dengan penenang atau anestesi.Permen dibungkus dengan kertas cokelat.Setiap strip berisi 10 biji.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata permen itu milik salah satu ayah dari siswa Tk 5 Jakarta.Sejak itu, orang tua telah disarankan untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka sehingga mereka tidak mudah menerima permen yang diberikan orang kepada mereka.Jumlah laporan tentang sirkulasi permen yang mengandung obat memang mengkhawatirkan.Selain itu, permen dikemas begitu menarik.Salah satu antisipasi untuk menghindari permen narkoba dapat dilakukan dengan memilih permen lokal yang telah dinyatakan aman oleh POM.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives will finally react to the data leak of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cites Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook has violated. "As a sovereign country, the laws that exist in Indonesia must be fulfilled and anyone who violates them will be subject to sanctions in accordance with applicable legal regulations ...," Meutya chirped when contacted via WhatsApp, on Thursday (5/4/2018) ). In addition, Meutya explained that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is very worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose from the three options." Meanwhile, time lag Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has also proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data. "We will hold an internal meeting and will immediately send an official letter to them," said Hanafi. The time for the summons is still unknown, but Hanafi emphasized that the agenda was more directed at asking for clarification from Facebook. Previously, representatives of Facebook Indonesia had met the summons of the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara. The call is an effort to clarify the government's disclosure of the data of 1 million Facebook users in Indonesia from a total of 87 million users worldwide related to the Cambridge Analytica scandal. An important outcome of the meeting between Rudiantara and Facebook was to ask third-party applications running on the Facebook platform to be temporarily closed. On this occasion, Rudiantara emphasized that he would not hesitate to close Facebook services in Indonesia if they stubbornly did not comply with the government's request. “If the third party app is not shut down, want me to shut it down completely?” he said.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya akan bereaksi terhadap kebocoran data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara berdaulat, undang -undang yang ada di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar mereka akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan peraturan hukum yang berlaku ...," Meutya berkicau ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4/2018)).Selain itu, Meutya menjelaskan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia sangat khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menjadi preseden yang buruk bagi perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih dari tiga opsi."Sementara itu, Time Lag Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan juga telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor."Kami akan mengadakan pertemuan internal dan akan segera mengirim surat resmi kepada mereka," kata Hanafi.Waktu untuk panggilan masih belum diketahui, tetapi Hanafi menekankan bahwa agenda lebih diarahkan untuk meminta klarifikasi dari Facebook.Sebelumnya, perwakilan Facebook Indonesia telah memenuhi panggilan Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara.Panggilan ini merupakan upaya untuk mengklarifikasi pengungkapan pemerintah terhadap data 1 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia dari total 87 juta pengguna di seluruh dunia terkait dengan skandal Cambridge Analytica.Hasil penting dari pertemuan antara Rudiantara dan Facebook adalah meminta aplikasi pihak ketiga yang berjalan di platform Facebook untuk sementara ditutup.Pada kesempatan ini, Rudiantara menekankan bahwa dia tidak akan ragu untuk menutup layanan Facebook di Indonesia jika mereka dengan keras kepala tidak memenuhi permintaan pemerintah.“Jika aplikasi pihak ketiga tidak ditutup, ingin saya menutupnya sepenuhnya?”katanya.

berita: The circulation of pacifiers fifteen suspected of containing drug substances is still visible in schools in Bekasi, one of which is at Madrasah Ibtidaiyah At-taqwa 15 on Jalan Raya Babelan, Bekasi Regency. In order to anticipate things that are not desired, the school conducts socialization in each class. One of the teachers, Affan Umar said, "we are doing socialization so that our children do not buy products that are still being investigated by the police," he said. Affan added, in order to anticipate dependence due to the drug content in the candy, the school carried out socialization in each class so that students did not buy the candy branded Hard Candy or DOT candy. "We socialize in every class, from grade one to grade six, everything is not too late," he added. In addition, the school will also prohibit traders from selling DOT candy. "We have also banned the traders, because it is useless if we ban the students but the traders are still selling the dangerous candy," he concluded.
berita_id: Sirkulasi dot lima belas yang diduga mengandung zat obat masih terlihat di sekolah-sekolah di Bekasi, salah satunya di Madrasah Ibtidaiyah di-taqwa 15 di Jalan Raya Babelan, Kabupaten Bekasi.Untuk mengantisipasi hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan, sekolah melakukan sosialisasi di setiap kelas.Salah satu guru, Affan Umar mengatakan, "Kami melakukan sosialisasi sehingga anak -anak kami tidak membeli produk yang masih diselidiki oleh polisi," katanya.Affan menambahkan, untuk mengantisipasi ketergantungan karena kandungan narkoba dalam permen, sekolah melakukan sosialisasi di setiap kelas sehingga siswa tidak membeli permen keras bermerek atau permen titik."Kami bersosialisasi di setiap kelas, dari kelas satu hingga kelas enam, semuanya belum terlambat," tambahnya.Selain itu, sekolah juga akan melarang pedagang menjual DOT Candy."Kami juga telah melarang para pedagang, karena tidak ada gunanya jika kami melarang siswa tetapi para pedagang masih menjual permen berbahaya," pungkasnya.

berita: Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarifying the issue of having burned Reog Ponorogo related to efforts exorcism of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had destroyed the reog ponorogo on October 20, 2015. Reog ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. "The destruction by burning had to be done because the Ponorogo reog was already in the ground damaged condition and eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to destroy or eliminate reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Destruction of the asset has been carried out carefully and with full respect for reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. "The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City would also like to emphasize that the arson was completely unrelated with attempts to exorcise idols or spirits." The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to try to find a new replacement Ponorogo reog. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news Reog Ponorogo who deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, is not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were ornament damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, mengklarifikasi masalah telah membakar Reog Ponorogo terkait dengan upaya pengusiran setan atau roh.The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had destroyed the reog ponorogo on October 20, 2015. Reog ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. "The destruction by burning had to be done because the Ponorogo reog was already in the ground damaged condition and eaten by termites," wroteKonsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Konsulat Jenderal menegaskan bahwa pembakaran itu bukanlah upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Penghancuran aset telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran itu sama sekali tidak terkait dengan upaya untuk mengusir idola atau roh."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan pihak -pihak di Indonesia untuk mencoba menemukan pengganti baru Ponorogo Reog.Sebelumnya, Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengatakan bahwa berita Reog Ponorogo yang sengaja terbakar di kantor Jenderal Konsulat Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Dekorasi reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk kepala naga dibakar karena ornamen rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks.

berita: JAKARTA – The Reyog Ponorogo Community (KRP) met with Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi to question as well the Reyog Ponorogo burning incident at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines. Foreign Minister Retno, who received it, immediately clarified and asked reyog lovers to exercise restraint. According to Deputy Chairperson of the Reyog Ponorogo Community (KRP) Suparno Nojeng, the meeting took place Monday (9/11) from 14:00 to 15:00 in the Foreign Minister's Meeting Room, Jalan Pejambon 6, Central Jakarta. KRP conveyed several things, namely, among others, asking for a press release "clarification" issued by the Consulate General in Davao City, Republic of the Philippines, Saturday, October 31, 2015 (without any signature and issuing official) full of irregularities, such as the 1988 asset year. "We also questioned the team formed by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs regarding the incident, as conveyed by the Director of Information and Media, Siti Shofia Sudarma on Monday 2 November 2015 at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs," said Suparno in a release received by the editors, Monday night. According to him, currently it is necessary to escort the team formed by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs so that it runs in an open, transparent and honest manner. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs' sensitivity to this incident is eagerly awaited by Reyog activists and lovers. In his opinion, this incident must be resolved legally (both criminal and civil) so that the "intellectual actor" is revealed. "Protection and security guarantees for Indonesian citizens in Davao, especially Indonesian citizens who have exposed this incident," he said, adding that the news of the burning of reyog had made the atmosphere hot, especially in Ponorogo. Calming Reyog Lovers Meanwhile, said Suparno, Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi who was accompanied by the Director General of Information and Public Diplomacy, Esti Andayani, conveyed several things. "Among them, asking the KRP to calm the reaction of the people who love Reyog, and understand the spiritual atmosphere of reyog lovers and no attempt to disrespect culture because it has been inherent in diplomats," he quoted the Foreign Minister as saying. It was also said that the Foreign Minister had received information from the Consulate General Eko Hartono that the rickety property had been damaged and there were instructions to immediately replace it. Also, an internal audit was carried out by the Consulate General in Davao, while an external audit was carried out by the Inspectorate General, in the form of a team to find out what actually happened at the Consulate General in Davao, the progress and results will be open and accessible to the public. It was also emphasized that the principle of presumption of innocence must still be put forward against the reyog burning incident. The Foreign Minister also guaranteed that Indonesian citizens in Davao City who reported incidents of reyog burning, nothing would happen, let alone violence. On that occasion, continued SUparno, the KRP submitted files such as photos of the reyog burning procession, photos of reyog artists who appeared at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in 2005, copies of the KJRI clarifications, copies of statements of apology from the Indonesian Consulate General staff, names of people who must be examined by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Team, and other files
berita_id: Jakarta - Komunitas Reyog Ponorogo (KRP) bertemu dengan Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi untuk mempertanyakan insiden pembakaran Reyog Ponorogo di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina.Menteri Luar Negeri Retno, yang menerimanya, segera mengklarifikasi dan meminta pecinta Reyog untuk menahan diri.Menurut Wakil Ketua Komunitas Reyog Ponorogo (KRP) Suparno Nojeng, pertemuan itu berlangsung Senin (9/11) dari pukul 14:00 hingga 15:00 di ruang pertemuan menteri luar negeri, Jalan Pejambon 6, Jakarta Tengah.KRP menyampaikan beberapa hal, yaitu, antara lain, meminta siaran pers "klarifikasi" yang dikeluarkan oleh konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao, Republik Filipina, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015 (tanpa tanda tangan dan pejabat penerbit) yang penuh dengan penyimpangan, seperti tahun aset 1988."Kami juga mempertanyakan tim yang dibentuk oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri mengenai insiden tersebut, sebagaimana disampaikan oleh Direktur Informasi dan Media, Siti Shofia Sudarma pada hari Senin 2 November 2015 di Kementerian Luar Negeri," kata Suparno dalam rilis yang diterima oleh editor, Senin malam.Menurutnya, saat ini perlu untuk mengawal tim yang dibentuk oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri sehingga berjalan dengan cara yang terbuka, transparan dan jujur.Sensitivitas Kementerian Luar Negeri terhadap kejadian ini ditunggu -tunggu oleh para aktivis dan kekasih Reyog.Menurut pendapatnya, kejadian ini harus diselesaikan secara hukum (baik kriminal maupun sipil) sehingga "aktor intelektual" terungkap."Perlindungan dan jaminan keamanan untuk warga negara Indonesia di Davao, terutama warga negara Indonesia yang telah mengekspos insiden ini," katanya, seraya menambahkan bahwa berita pembakaran Reyog telah membuat suasana panas, terutama di Ponorogo.Sementara itu, pecinta Reyog yang menenangkan, kata Suparno, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi yang ditemani oleh Direktur Jenderal Informasi dan Diplomasi Publik, Esti Andayani, menyampaikan beberapa hal."Di antara mereka, meminta KRP untuk menenangkan reaksi orang -orang yang mencintai Reyog, dan memahami suasana spiritual pecinta Reyog dan tidak ada upaya untuk tidak menghormati budaya karena telah melekat pada diplomat," katanya mengutip menteri luar negeri.Dikatakan juga bahwa menteri luar negeri telah menerima informasi dari konsulat Jenderal Eko Hartono bahwa properti reyot telah rusak dan ada instruksi untuk segera menggantinya.Juga, audit internal dilakukan oleh konsulat jenderal di Davao, sementara audit eksternal dilakukan oleh Jenderal Inspektorat, dalam bentuk tim untuk mencari tahu apa yang sebenarnya terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, kemajuan dan hasil akan terbuka dan dapat diakses oleh publik.Juga ditekankan bahwa prinsip anggapan tidak bersalah masih harus diajukan terhadap insiden pembakaran Reyog.Menteri Luar Negeri juga menjamin bahwa warga negara Indonesia di Kota Davao yang melaporkan insiden Reyog Burning, tidak ada yang akan terjadi, apalagi kekerasan.Pada kesempatan itu, berkelanjutan Suparno, KRP mengirimkan file -file seperti foto -foto prosesi Reyog Burning, foto -foto seniman Reyog yang muncul di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada tahun 2005, salinan klarifikasi KJRI yang lain, salinan pernyataan permintaan maaf dari Konsulat Indonesia, nama -nama orang yang harus diuji oleh Kidal dari Kidal Luar Negeri Indonesia, staf umum, nama -nama orang yang harus diuji oleh Kids.

berita: The activity of brushing teeth is certainly carried out every day, there are many various forms of toothbrushes in supermarkets or traditional markets, and also many materials used in the manufacture of toothbrushes. As a Muslim, you must be careful and thorough in knowing the ingredients or making a toothbrush that is currently used for brushing your teeth. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Generally it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are the steps to check it: Look at the package, if it is recorded from bristles, so it is made of sea urchins. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from pig bristles. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Risks when using what is forbidden: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, smear cake pans, to smear food. As in processing grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. Meanwhile, brushes are useful when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know where the brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, usually come from China. The imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places such as traditional markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, cosmetic shops, beauty salons, etc. Are you familiar with various forms. Beware of painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, clothes brushes, etc. HERE ARE SOME TIPS AVOIDING THE USE OF PIG BRUSHS AND BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and food brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for applying makeup, and knives & spatulas for applying food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT PROCESSES COOKING AND CLEANING utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers can process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that it looks like the fur of other animals. (AND) Thus the explanation of the toothbrush or brush made of pig bristles. As a Muslim, be careful. Give this info to your family and friends skirmish so that more people can read it so that they are free from non-halal products. May be useful.
berita_id: Aktivitas menyikat gigi tentu saja dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak bentuk sikat gigi di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, Anda harus berhati -hati dan menyeluruh dalam mengetahui bahan -bahannya atau membuat sikat gigi yang saat ini digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada kemasannya, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut langkah -langkah untuk memeriksanya: lihat paket, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti itu, itu berarti digunakan untuk plastik.Ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis) menyelamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Apakah Anda tahu dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah kuas rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Waspadalah terhadap kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dll. Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan kuas makanan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk mengoleskan riasan, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengoleskan makanan.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga terlihat seperti bulu hewan lain.(Dan) dengan demikian penjelasan sikat gigi atau sikat yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sebagai seorang Muslim, hati -hati.Berikan info ini kepada keluarga dan teman-teman Anda yang bertengkar sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk non-halal.Mungkin berguna.

berita: Jurnaldigital.com – Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will prohibit Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of wish the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, like the Palestinians. It also contradicts religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research on whether it is dangerous or not. But what is clear is that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen,” he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed
berita_id: Jurnaldigital.com - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan game online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan harapan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti orang -orang Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten Cianjur saat ini hanya akan mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain di Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di THOD, yang baru -baru ini secara resmi diluncurkan di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan disalahgunakan di Indonesia di Indonesia."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di markas besar.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata bersenjata

berita: Catfish is a fish that is quite popular in Indonesia. But recently there has been a lot of news that eating catfish is harmful to the body. Then is it true? Many news circulating on social networks say that catfish is the filthiest fish. There is an article entitled In a mouthful of catfish, there are 3000 cancer cells. The title of the article made a hot topic of conversation on social media. The news made catfish farmers nervous, because it could threaten the continuity of their business. The article posted on July 29, 2015 describes the confession of a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who is a supplier of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the catfish and tried to observe seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. As reported by kompas.com (28/10/2015), the article was a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market whose market prospects continued to increase, said the Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service. Basically catfish that are dangerous to eat are catfish that live in dirty environments. Catfish that live in a dirty environment have the potential to be exposed to very dangerous chemical compounds such as metals and substances that can be polluted through water pollutants. The most dangerous chemical compound that catfish can possibly eat is mercury. Mercury itself is an organic chemical compound that is very toxic and can damage the human nervous system when consumed. But you don't have to worry about the widespread rumor that catfish contain cancer cells. In Indonesia, generally the catfish that are marketed are not those from the wild, but catfish that are cultivated in ponds that have been treated and protected from pollution. The food for catfish also comes from non-waste feed, so it is not exposed to harmful chemical compounds. According to detik.com (23/10/2015), currently there is no research that states that consuming catfish can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Quoted from alodokter.com, every 100 grams of catfish contains 229 kilocalories of energy. Catfish protein with this portion is about 18 grams, carbohydrates as much as 8 grams, fiber 0.7 grams and fat as much as 13 grams. Catfish also contains various vitamins and minerals such as vitamins A, C, D, B complex, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, sodium, potassium, and zinc. mudcat For those of you who believed the news yesterday, from now on, you already know. There are a lot of useful content in catfish. From now on, don't hesitate to eat catfish.
berita_id: Catfish adalah ikan yang cukup populer di Indonesia.Namun baru -baru ini ada banyak berita bahwa makan lele itu berbahaya bagi tubuh.Lalu apakah itu benar?Banyak berita yang beredar di jejaring sosial mengatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor.Ada sebuah artikel yang berjudul dalam seteguk ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Judul artikel membuat topik hangat percakapan di media sosial.Berita itu membuat petani lele gugup, karena itu bisa mengancam kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Artikel yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015 menjelaskan pengakuan seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang merupakan pemasok ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran pinggir jalan di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan lele dan mencoba mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Kompas.com (28/10/2015), artikel itu adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele yang prospek pasar terus meningkat, kata kepala perikanan Java Timur dan layanan kelautan.Pada dasarnya lele yang berbahaya untuk dimakan adalah ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan yang kotor.Ikan lele yang hidup di lingkungan yang kotor memiliki potensi untuk terpapar senyawa kimia yang sangat berbahaya seperti logam dan zat yang dapat tercemar melalui polutan air.Senyawa kimia paling berbahaya yang bisa dimakan ikan lele adalah merkuri.Merkuri sendiri adalah senyawa kimia organik yang sangat beracun dan dapat merusak sistem saraf manusia saat dikonsumsi.Tetapi Anda tidak perlu khawatir tentang rumor yang meluas bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Di Indonesia, umumnya ikan lele yang dipasarkan bukanlah yang dari alam liar, tetapi ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam yang telah diperlakukan dan dilindungi dari polusi.Makanan untuk ikan lele juga berasal dari pakan non-limbah, sehingga tidak terpapar senyawa kimia yang berbahaya.Menurut Detik.com (23/10/2015), saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa mengkonsumsi ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Dikutip dari Alodokter.com, setiap 100 gram ikan lele mengandung 229 kilokalori energi.Protein lele dengan bagian ini sekitar 18 gram, karbohidrat sebanyak 8 gram, serat 0,7 gram dan lemak sebanyak 13 gram.Lele juga mengandung berbagai vitamin dan mineral seperti vitamin A, C, D, kompleks B, kalsium, fosfor, magnesium, natrium, kalium, dan seng.Mudcat bagi Anda yang mempercayai berita kemarin, mulai sekarang, Anda sudah tahu.Ada banyak konten yang berguna dalam lele.Mulai sekarang, jangan ragu untuk makan lele.

berita: Traveloka provides clarification regarding rumors that one of its founders, Derianto Kusumo, took a walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan, gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College in Kemayoran on Saturday (11/11/2017). The travel and hotel ticket booking service provider denied that Derianto was present at the event, so it was impossible for him to be involved in the walk out. Traveloka PR Manager, Busyra Oryza, said Derianto was one of the recipients of the award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, Derianto, who is now the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) of Traveloka, could not attend because he was out of town. (Also read: Chinese Capital Boosts Local Startups) "He was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier," said Busyra in his official statement, Tuesday (11/14/2017). Regarding Anies' speech at the Kanisius College event, Busyra stated that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by supplier Indonesian children, promoting the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance, and innovation. "These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he said. Previously, rumors circulated that Derianto was one of the alumni of Kanisius who left the room when Anies gave a speech. This information then triggered an invitation to no longer use the Traveloka application and made #UninstallTraveloka a popular topic on Twitter. The walk out action when Anies gave a speech was started by renowned composer Ananda Sukarlan standing up from the VIP chair and leaving the room to show his displeasure. This action was then followed by hundreds of other alumni who attended.
berita_id: Traveloka memberikan klarifikasi tentang desas -desus bahwa salah satu pendirinya, DeRianto Kusumo, berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan, memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Kemayoran pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017).Penyedia layanan pemesanan tiket perjalanan dan hotel membantah bahwa DeRianto hadir di acara tersebut, jadi tidak mungkin baginya untuk terlibat dalam perjalanan keluar.Manajer PR Traveloka, Busyra Oryza, mengatakan DeRianto adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius.Namun, DeRianto, yang sekarang menjadi Chief Technology Officer (CTO) dari Traveloka, tidak dapat hadir karena dia berada di luar kota.(Baca Juga: Modal Tiongkok meningkatkan startup lokal) "Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata Busyra dalam pernyataan resminya, Selasa (11/14/2017).Mengenai pidato Anies di acara Kanisius College, Busyra menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh pemasok anak-anak Indonesia, mempromosikan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi."Nilai -nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," katanya.Sebelumnya, desas -desus beredar bahwa DeRianto adalah salah satu alumni Kanisius yang meninggalkan ruangan ketika Anies memberikan pidato.Informasi ini kemudian memicu undangan untuk tidak lagi menggunakan aplikasi Traveloka dan menjadikan #uninstalltraveloka topik populer di Twitter.Tindakan Walk Out ketika Anies memberikan pidato dimulai oleh komposer terkenal Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP dan meninggalkan ruangan untuk menunjukkan ketidaksenangannya.Tindakan ini kemudian diikuti oleh ratusan alumni lain yang hadir.

berita: The fever of the game "Pokemon Go" has spread to all corners of the world. Indonesia is no exception, this game really distracts almost everyone. There are also those who have to be willing to stop their work for the sake of this one game. The game "Pokemon Go" developed by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps and Niantic Labs has claimed many victims. Some even had accidents because of this game. Pokemon GO has not been officially released in Indonesia, but this game is very loved by people from children to adults even to the point of causing addiction. All gamers' eyes are fixed on the screen of their smart phone regardless of the surrounding conditions and even tend to endanger themselves, not a few become victims of this game there was an accident plunged into the sea and then drowned and some fell from a height to death and some were trapped in underground caves and not a few were caught going into other people's residential areas and their military agencies were caught, this is all because to follow the ambition of hunting down the pokemon monster figures they want. The word Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely the word (Poke) which is an abbreviation of the word (Pocket), which means pocket or pocket. And the word (Mon) which stands for the word (Monster), means Monster. So it means pocket monster. The point is an expression of how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. The name Pikachu, who is a famous character in this cartoon, is also formed from two words (Pika) in Japanese which show the meaning of shining. While the word (Chu) is an expression of the sounds that come out of the mouth of a mouse. Why is it called Pikachu? Because (this character) is shaped like a mouse armed with an electric shock. The words (Charmander) show the meaning: a burning fire. Taken from the English word (Char). While the word (Amander) is a word that gives a signal to an animal such as a lizard that resembles a burning fire. This information was mentioned by the Japanese Cultural Attaché in Jordan; Kuji Taharo, as written by the Jordanian newspaper ar-Rayu in its 4/4/2001 edition. From this description, it appears that people are mistaken in assuming that the meaning of Pokemon according to the Syriac language is "I am Jewish", or other similar meanings. Syriac is the language used by some Syrians, although it is not an official language, Syrians usually use this language for daily communication as a second language after Arabic. The New York Times magazine in its March 26, 2001 issue stated the statement of a spokesman for this cartoon producer in Tokyo whose identity was withheld: "That he denies that the company uses religious symbols in its products". The Jordanian newspaper "ad-Dustur" Monday edition 8 Muharam 1422 H. also mentions the statements of several Syriac linguists at Yarmuk University, as well as the statement of the Syrian Social Institute in Jordan, that the words Pokemon, Pikachu and other names in Pokemon cartoons, absolutely nothing to do with Syriac, even the names are foreign to Syriac. The same thing is also believed that the names are in Japanese. Similarly, the assumption that it uses Hebrew. ORIGIN OF POKEMON The Pokemon cartoon doll came from the idea of ​​a Japanese boy named Satushi Tajiri. He is a person who likes to collect insects. Then he fantasized that the world would be invaded by these insects and by strange animals from outer space in great numbers and later discovered by humans. Continue in turn these animals develop and improve to be more perfect with the release of new limbs. Then a giant Japanese company called Nintendo adopted the idea by producing electronic toys and developing them into (cartoon) small, pocket-sized monsters that (according to their idea of ​​a pen) had magical powers to fight. Then these toys spread significantly in the late nineties to dominate all corners of the world in the form of electronic toys, cartoons, live films, comics, story journals and (even up) on websites. Internet. POKEMON GAME It's been spread among children, pocket games, especially with Pokemon characters. This game takes place using certain rules and guidelines, which from there form various kinds of games. Some of them are complicated because they use dice as well as pictorial tools and certain tables. This game takes time to learn. It is based on the principle of collecting pictures of small monsters (terrible animals), then training them in fighting and fighting techniques. Each monster (considered) has certain strengths and privileges, and is divided into ten factions. The winner of the game is the person who is not only able to collect a large number of images of the monster, but also can make good use of the privileges of each image of the monster, can train it well and classify it; to be developed in his battle against the enemy. Among the games again there are easy ones, which conclude in mastering special cards that contain (pictures of) certain monsters with certain magical powers. The objective (of this game) is to gain profit by collecting as many cards as possible. Meanwhile, cards containing monsters that have more abilities and are dangerous (as opposed to the contents of their specially numbered pictures, codes and cues), are sold at a higher price. Small children compete and compete to get it. The child who wins is the one who is considered to be able to beat his opponent's card. Then he is entitled to his opponent's cards, or the opponent must redeem them with money. (Victory in the second kind of game) this happens purely by fate and chance, no skill is needed other than being able to pay the price of the card. This game (Pokemon) will never end unless God wills, because there are always renewals and developments of new monster characters and new playing fields are always created, on a large scale. THINGS THAT IS PROHIBITED IN SHARIA IN POKEMON 1. Shirk and Damaging Muslim Aqeedah There is no need to doubt that there are fictitious imaginary living creatures, let alone possessing extraordinary and miraculous features and abilities, including the most corrupted ideas (thoughts) that can poison children's minds. Even there there is propaganda for the existence of extraordinary things that match and even surpass the miracles of the prophets. This will make a child believe in this miraculous power and provide a defense against the existence of that power. All of this clearly includes the destruction of the aqidah of children who are still fitrah and straight. There, in addition, there is also an element of challenge to the power of al-Khaliq k and wanting to compete with the provisions of Allah Subhanahu wa Ta'ala. Naudzu billah. This all clearly contradicts the authentic Islamic Aqeedah and contradicts the straight educational manhaj. 2. Lying blatantly to a small child and making something harmful to him. It happens through the appearance of a fictional being who has magical abilities, but who doesn't actually exist. This will encourage and motivate children to believe such things. And that is clearly a blatant lie and is a disservice to children's minds and imaginations. Basically children's toys, that the children themselves determine (control) the toys. But that's not the case with Pokemon. In fact the opposite happened. Because (in Pokemon) it is Pokemon that determine, control and direct children. What is also worrying and even more dangerous is that toys, forever show something of culture. Pokemon also offers a culture. But it is an imaginary culture that is sweeping away children all over the world. It is a culture that is far from the nature of non-Muslim children, and far from the aqidah and culture of Muslim children. So it is a form of cultural miniature, because with the rampant Pokemon cartoons throughout the world, it will make children think with the same mindset and will play with the same form of toys. It's as if Pokemon is preparing children and then fostering realize them towards the same behaviors and values. It's a form of experimental mania that ignores a lot of other things, so you see Pokemon cartoons that can bind parents and take their children's toys out of their control. This in turn removes the barrier between Pokemon and children. And so finally these cartoons control them. 3. The False Theory of Evolution Understood through the evolutionary development of these little monsters that had this magical ability all by themselves. This is in line with Darwin's theory of kufr and vanity, which states that there is a development and improvement of creatures by themselves, and negates the involvement of al-Khaliq in that development. And this is clear disbelief.

Clarias or what we usually call catfish has recently become a hot topic of conversation around the world of health. Some associate it with fish that live in dirty water all day long, some say that a mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells. It is very strange that such news can scare so many people. In an instant it became viral information in cyberspace. Please note that receiving information from the internet should not only read the title, but also read the contents of the article to the end. Indeed, misleading titles often make people curious, not only that, the rating obtained from the creator of the title immediately skyrocketed. However, there are also netizens who when they see the title, they immediately believe that catfish actually contains cancer cells. Imagine if the untrue news was then believed and disseminated by many readers, the catfish pond entrepreneurs might go out of business because no one else wants to buy this fish. Catfish is not as bad as imagined, in fact this fish provides very many benefits for humans. What are the benefits? Here we provide the benefits and the actual explanation of catfish. Catfish Can Digest Any Food Into Protein. This fish that lives in fresh water is considered a very special fish, one of its features is the ability of the digestive tract of this fish to convert whatever it eats into a very high source of protein, including feces. into protein through the digestive system. Not only as a complementary menu when eating, the protein content consumed from catfish is also able to improve the digestive process and growth in humans. Besides being able to help repair muscle damage, the content contained in catfish is also known to cure herpes. Has a Higher Phosphorus Content than Eggs Eggs are known as food ingredients that contain 100 mg (milligrams) of phosphorus, but in fact this amount is still smaller than the phosphorus content found in catfish meat, which amounts to 168 mg per 100 grams. The phosphorus content in catfish is able to improve metabolism in the body and provide energy. Not only that, the most famous benefit of the content of catfish is to strengthen teeth and gums. turn Helps Control Blood Pressure in the Brain Unlike the title of information obtained in other articles which say that catfish is a source of disease. Here, catfish is known as a food that can prevent stokes. The content of sodium and potassium found in catfish is able to clean dirty blood cells, improve blood circulation to the brain. Until this fish is believed to be a fish that is able to prevent its eaters from being disturbed by stokes. Very Good for Pregnant Women Besides being easy to digest, this fish has a lot of nutritional content for pregnant women. The low-fat content and rich in Omega 3 contained in the meat is believed to be able to help the mother's digestive process and the development of the fetus it contains. In addition to the above, the benefits of catfish are also known as the most powerful drug for treating heart disease to cleaning dirty blood cells that are channeled through the blood vessels.
berita_id: Clarias atau apa yang biasanya kita sebut Catfish baru -baru ini menjadi topik hangat percakapan di seluruh dunia kesehatan.Beberapa mengaitkannya dengan ikan yang hidup dalam air kotor sepanjang hari, beberapa mengatakan bahwa seteguk ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Sangat aneh bahwa berita semacam itu dapat menakuti begitu banyak orang.Dalam sekejap itu menjadi informasi viral di dunia maya.Harap dicatat bahwa menerima informasi dari Internet tidak hanya harus membaca judulnya, tetapi juga membaca konten artikel sampai akhir.Memang, judul yang menyesatkan sering membuat orang mengandung sel kanker.Bayangkan jika berita yang tidak benar kemudian dipercaya dan disebarluaskan oleh banyak pembaca, pengusaha tambak ikan lele mungkin gulung tikar karena tidak ada orang lain yang mau membeli ikan ini.Lele tidak seburuk yang dibayangkan, sebenarnya ikan ini memberikan banyak manfaat bagi manusia.Apa manfaatnya?Di sini kami memberikan manfaat dan penjelasan sebenarnya tentang ikan lele.Lele dapat mencerna makanan apa pun menjadi protein.Ikan yang hidup dalam air tawar ini dianggap sebagai ikan yang sangat istimewa, salah satu fiturnya adalah kemampuan saluran pencernaan ikan ini untuk mengubah apa pun yang dimakannya menjadi sumber protein yang sangat tinggi, termasuk tinja.menjadi protein melalui sistem pencernaan.Tidak hanya sebagai menu pelengkap saat makan, kandungan protein yang dikonsumsi dari ikan lele juga dapat meningkatkan proses pencernaan dan pertumbuhan pada manusia.Selain bisa membantu memperbaiki kerusakan otot, konten yang terkandung dalam ikan lele juga diketahui menyembuhkan herpes.Memiliki kandungan fosfor yang lebih tinggi daripada telur telur dikenal sebagai bahan makanan yang mengandung 100 mg (miligram) fosfor, tetapi pada kenyataannya jumlah ini masih lebih kecil dari kandungan fosfor yang ditemukan dalam daging ikan lele, yang berjumlah 168 mg per 100 gram.Kandungan fosfor dalam ikan lele mampu meningkatkan metabolisme dalam tubuh dan memberikan energi.Tidak hanya itu, manfaat paling terkenal dari kandungan ikan lele adalah untuk memperkuat gigi dan gusi.Turn membantu mengendalikan tekanan darah di otak tidak seperti judul informasi yang diperoleh dalam artikel lain yang mengatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah sumber penyakit.Di sini, ikan lele dikenal sebagai makanan yang dapat mencegah Stokes.Kandungan natrium dan kalium yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele mampu membersihkan sel darah kotor, meningkatkan sirkulasi darah ke otak.Sampai ikan ini diyakini sebagai ikan yang mampu mencegah pemakannya terganggu oleh Stokes.Sangat baik untuk wanita hamil selain mudah dicerna, ikan ini memiliki banyak kandungan nutrisi untuk wanita hamil.Kandungan rendah lemak dan kaya akan Omega 3 yang terkandung dalam daging diyakini dapat membantu proses pencernaan ibu dan pengembangan janin yang dikandungnya.Selain hal di atas, manfaat ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai obat paling kuat untuk mengobati penyakit jantung untuk membersihkan sel darah kotor yang disalurkan melalui pembuluh darah.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that contains a lot of animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for many people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it called the dirtiest fish? The following is an explanation: Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish fans, not all catfish live or are bred in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or a pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in ordinary ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish that mudcat he harvests every 3 months to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from the community, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated the fish. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed with manure. If the condition is like that, then the catfish becomes like a jallalah animal, that is, an animal that eats dirty and unclean food so that it is unlawful to eat it. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined or separated from dirty places and given clean food. Minimum quarantine time is 3 days. Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, this fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even this fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly, a doctor once admitted that he often had patients with swollen and infected thyroid disease, with symptoms: swelling of the lower neck, swelling around the neck that looked like a tumor, the eyeballs felt like they were about to come out, heat around the neck, frequent coughing in the middle of the night. without cause. After being asked, it turns out that all the patients often eat catfish and fried eel. This also happened to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, his father, wife and child experienced the symptoms as above. When the doctor asked one of the professors at Pluit, it turned out that the catfish contains a mild poison, so that if it is fried, the clean oil will turn black. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Friends for those of you who are catfish fans, even though catfish is halal and not too worrying as a wise consumer you must and remain careful. You also don't know when you buy catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, don't eat it. Or if you are sure of its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not to use large amounts on a regular basis.
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang mengandung banyak protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi banyak orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa disebut ikan paling kotor?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang merupakan penggemar lele, tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibiakkan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam biasa.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari apa pun yang kotor termasuk karkas ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan untuk dipasarkan dan restoran di pinggir jalan di Hainan, Hainan Hain.Keluhan yang sering dari masyarakat, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan tersebut.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dengan pupuk kandang.Jika kondisinya seperti itu, maka ikan lele menjadi seperti binatang jallalah, yaitu hewan yang memakan makanan kotor dan najis sehingga tidak sah untuk memakannya.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina atau dipisahkan dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Waktu karantina minimum adalah 3 hari.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengkonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan, seorang dokter pernah mengakui bahwa ia sering menderita pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan terinfeksi, dengan gejala: pembengkakan leher bawah, pembengkakan di sekitar leher yang tampak seperti tumor, bola mata terasa seperti akan keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di tengah malam.tanpa sebab.Setelah ditanya, ternyata semua pasien sering makan lele dan belut goreng.Ini juga terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anaknya mengalami gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter bertanya kepada salah satu profesor di Pluit, ternyata ikan lele berisi racun ringan, sehingga jika digoreng, minyak bersih akan berubah menjadi hitam.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Teman -teman untuk Anda yang penggemar lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda harus dan tetap berhati -hati.Anda juga tidak tahu kapan Anda membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, jangan memakannya.Atau jika Anda yakin akan kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan untuk tidak menggunakan jumlah besar secara teratur.

berita: Warganet is still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. There are even those who are desperate to do nude actions so that Facebook is not closed. Understandably, the article is that Facebook users in Indonesia have reached 140 million, and this platform has become a place for sharing among many people. Don't worry, because the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara will not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara. Rudiantara is reluctant to talk about closing Facebook operations permanently, he is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. The House of Representatives also had asked Kominfo to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, it data point is also possible to - suggest - a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, a member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there must be information, where this misused data is and what it is used for," he said. Case Beginning The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes. The data taken is also not the content of the message, but data that is publicly listed on a person's profile. Unfortunately, the rice has become porridge. There has been confusion about this, to the point that the DPR also summoned Facebook to ask for an explanation. As a result, the discourse of blocking Facebook arises. "That Facebook data is not leaked. If it leaks, the term is like a pipe with water, you don't know where the leak is, this data is compromised," said Rudiantara. Facebook has been given SP 2 The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent SP 2 to Facebook, but there is no information about SP 3 which means closing. When asked about the validity period of SP 2 to the next SP, Rudiantara has not yet given a definitive answer. "Yes, it could be a day, a month, see the situation first," concluded Rudiantara. He claimed to have received an explanation from the Irish Facebook office which manages Facebook in Indonesia. In a statement by Facebook Ireland to Rudiantara, they provided information on numbers related to misuse of data that afflicted users. Rudiantara also continues to monitor the development of Indonesian user data on Facebook.
berita_id: Warganet masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Bahkan ada orang -orang yang sangat ingin melakukan tindakan telanjang sehingga Facebook tidak ditutup.Maklum, artikelnya adalah bahwa pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah mencapai 140 juta, dan platform ini telah menjadi tempat untuk berbagi di antara banyak orang.Jangan khawatir, karena Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen, ia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta Kominfo untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, titik data itu juga dimungkinkan untuk - menyarankan - moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus menjadi cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kasus yang memulai kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Sayangnya, nasi telah menjadi bubur.Telah ada kebingungan tentang hal ini, sampai -sampai DPR juga memanggil Facebook untuk meminta penjelasan.Akibatnya, wacana memblokir Facebook muncul."Data Facebook itu tidak bocor. Jika bocor, istilahnya seperti pipa dengan air, Anda tidak tahu di mana bocornya, data ini dikompromikan," kata Rudiantara.Facebook telah diberikan SP 2 Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim SP 2 ke Facebook, tetapi tidak ada informasi tentang SP 3 yang berarti penutupan.Ketika ditanya tentang periode validitas SP 2 ke SP berikutnya, Rudiantara belum memberikan jawaban yang pasti."Ya, itu bisa jadi sehari, sebulan, melihat situasinya terlebih dahulu," pungkas Rudiantara.Dia mengaku telah menerima penjelasan dari kantor Facebook Irlandia yang mengelola Facebook di Indonesia.Dalam sebuah pernyataan oleh Facebook Irlandia ke Rudiantara, mereka memberikan informasi tentang angka -angka yang terkait dengan penyalahgunaan data yang pengguna yang menderita.Rudiantara juga terus memantau pengembangan data pengguna Indonesia di Facebook.

berita: The Head of the Public Information Section of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that prison house the issue of the throwing of the holy book of the Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta on Friday, was not true. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added that the condition of the prison is now back to being conducive. "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Publik Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa rumah penjara masalah lemparan kitab suci Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah pada hari Jumat, tidak benar."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan bahwa kondisi penjara sekarang kembali menjadi kondusif."Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya

berita: Catfish is one of the foodstuffs favored by the people of the country. One type of freshwater fish can be processed into a variety of dishes and still has a good taste. Unfortunately, recently circulated information that states that catfish have cancer cells so it is better not to be consumed. Unmitigated, in the body of catfish it is said that there are about 3 thousand cancer cells. Is the information true? Health experts say that fish, which is known for its mustache, is included in foods that are low in cholesterol. Catfish are also rich in various nutrients that are good for the body, especially omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids. What is interesting is that these two types of fatty acids can actually provide benefits in the form of lowering blood pressure in the body. In fact, these fatty acids are said to be able to reduce the risk of various types of cancer. For information that states that in catfish there are cancer cells, until now there has been no scientific research that proves the truth. This means, this information is not true. Health experts say that even though catfish has a variety of nutrients that are good for the body, it's good for us not to consume catfish carelessly. In Indonesia itself, catfish is included in eccentric the fish that can be obtained easily and at the same time has a low price. Usually, the catfish sold in this market come from special farms that do provide catfish as food ingredients for households or places to eat. This type of catfish is clearly safe for consumption and clean. Unfortunately, there are some people who turn out to use catfish as a cleaner for dirt or pests in the fields. This catfish is certainly less clean and less safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu bahan makanan yang disukai oleh orang -orang di negara itu.Salah satu jenis ikan air tawar dapat diproses menjadi berbagai hidangan dan masih memiliki rasa yang baik.Sayangnya, baru -baru ini beredar informasi yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele memiliki sel kanker sehingga lebih baik tidak dikonsumsi.Tanpa tanggung jawab, di dalam tubuh lele, dikatakan bahwa ada sekitar 3 ribu sel kanker.Apakah informasinya benar?Pakar kesehatan mengatakan bahwa ikan, yang dikenal karena kumisnya, termasuk dalam makanan yang rendah kolesterol.Lele juga kaya akan berbagai nutrisi yang baik untuk tubuh, terutama omega 6 dan asam lemak omega 3.Yang menarik adalah bahwa kedua jenis asam lemak ini sebenarnya dapat memberikan manfaat dalam bentuk menurunkan tekanan darah di dalam tubuh.Faktanya, asam lemak ini dikatakan dapat mengurangi risiko berbagai jenis kanker.Untuk informasi yang menyatakan bahwa dalam lele ada sel kanker, sampai sekarang belum ada penelitian ilmiah yang membuktikan kebenaran.Ini berarti, informasi ini tidak benar.Pakar kesehatan mengatakan bahwa meskipun ikan lele memiliki berbagai nutrisi yang baik untuk tubuh, ada baiknya bagi kita untuk tidak mengonsumsi ikan lele dengan ceroboh.Di Indonesia sendiri, ikan lele termasuk dalam eksentrik ikan yang dapat diperoleh dengan mudah dan pada saat yang sama memiliki harga murah.Biasanya, ikan lele yang dijual di pasar ini berasal dari peternakan khusus yang memberikan ikan lele sebagai bahan makanan untuk rumah tangga atau tempat makan.Jenis ikan lele ini jelas aman untuk dikonsumsi dan bersih.Sayangnya, ada beberapa orang yang ternyata menggunakan ikan lele sebagai pembersih untuk kotoran atau hama di ladang.Ikan lele ini tentu kurang bersih dan kurang aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: Medan 13/02/2017, Responding to news in several print and online media about the circulation of Candy Dot which is suspected to contain drugs and other hazardous materials which was first discovered in Surabaya - East Java, so that it made the public nervous, especially those who have small children. In response to this, BB Pom Medan in collaboration with the North Sumatra BNN and feel the District / City Health Office carried out field supervision and from the results of the supervision that the bonbon dot was already circulating in several regions / districts in the North Sumatra region. Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose, DL-Phenylalanie, Methy Ester, Methyl Stearate, Palmitic Acid and according to the Medan Branch of Labfor that all substances detected in the bonbon are generally used as sweeteners, not narcotics / psychotropics. . With the results from the Medan Branch Labfor Laboratory, it is appealed to the public not to panic, but so that people are wiser in consuming food products that have a distribution permit, and look at the expiration date so that it does not cause health.
