berita_id: Medan 13/02/2017, menanggapi berita di beberapa media cetak dan online tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dan bahan berbahaya lainnya yang pertama kali ditemukan di Surabaya - Jawa Timur, sehingga membuat publik gugup, terutama mereka yang memiliki anak kecil.Menanggapi hal ini, BB Pom Medan bekerja sama dengan Sumatra Utara BNN dan merasa kantor kesehatan distrik / kota melakukan pengawasan lapangan dan dari hasil pengawasan bahwa titik bonbon sudah beredar di beberapa wilayah / distrik di wilayah Sumatra Utara.Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose,DL-phenylalanie, mety ester, metil stearat, asam palmitat dan menurut cabang Medan laboratorium bahwa semua zat yang terdeteksi dalam bonbon umumnya digunakan sebagai pemanis, bukan narkotika / psikotropika..Dengan hasil dari laboratorium Medan Cabang Labfor, ia menarik bagi publik untuk tidak panik, tetapi sehingga orang lebih bijaksana dalam mengonsumsi produk makanan yang memiliki izin distribusi, dan melihat tanggal kedaluwarsa sehingga tidak menyebabkan kesehatan.

berita: Since a month ago, news about catfish which allegedly contains 3000 cancer cells is growing rapidly. In the news circulating, it is known that the catfish in Haikou, Hainan province, China is cultivated in a pond with strong smelling garbage, surrounded by pig and chicken cages. Then, is it true that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells? Knowing the Ins and Outs of Catfish There are many species of catfish in Indonesia. Clarias batrachus is one of the favorite breeds of farmed catfish. There is also the African catfish (also known as king cat fish, king catfish, ed.) which is the result slob of crossbreeding female catfish from Taiwan and males from Kenya, Africa. However, it is not known which of the F1, F2, or F3 breeds produced this type of catfish. Have you ever heard of sangkuriang catfish? Sangkuriang catfish is the result of genetic engineering from the Sukabumi Freshwater Cultivation Center (BBAT) derived from African catfish. Catfish live in fresh water, precisely in rivers where the water is not too heavy, for example in lakes or small puddles. Stigma catfish are dirty and dirty, right? Catfish have additional gills, so they can take oxygen from the air. That is the reason why catfish can live even in oxygen-poor water environments. This fish is also able to live even though the environment is polluted with organic materials. Catfish are carnivores that like to eat water fleas, larvae, worms, and snails. The remains of rotting objects and human waste also like to be eaten by catfish. However, catfish do not like plants. This behavior makes people think of catfish as dirty fish. Compared to grouper and carp, catfish is favored by the public because the price is more affordable. Catfish connoisseurs are generally people with middle to lower economic levels. The high demand for catfish makes catfish farming more attractive to the public. Make no mistake, catfish in Indonesia is now cultivated with good quality cultivation. Unlike the news circulating. Providing good feed and regular pond maintenance will prevent the development of disease in catfish. So of course it will make catfish safe for consumption. It is not true that catfish is said to contain 3000 Cancer Cells. Several issues circulating also discuss that the size of the catfish can detect what food he eats during his life. According to rumors, the large size of the catfish indicates that the catfish is raised with feed from human waste or in a septic tank. However, this issue is questionable. The reason is, there are also catfish that harvest late because they failed to buy a middleman or seller so that their body size continues to grow because it is past the harvest period. What about catfish on the market? In general, all catfish on the market come from catfish farms. The seller must have a relationship with catfish farmers who are able to supply a number of catfish every day continuously with a certain size. This is difficult to do if catfish farming is only done in a natural way, which takes many years until the fish are big. Not only cultivators, the government also continues to monitor fish hatcheries and cultivation, especially catfish. In an interview with detik.com, the Head of the East Java Provincial Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, explained that his party had tested samples of hormone, antibiotic, and heavy metal residues in catfish farming units in East Java. As a result, no samples containing the three residues were found. So, don't be afraid to eat catfish, okay?
berita_id: Sejak sebulan yang lalu, berita tentang ikan lele yang diduga mengandung 3000 sel kanker tumbuh dengan cepat.Dalam berita yang beredar, diketahui bahwa ikan lele di haikou, provinsi Hainan, Cina dibudidayakan di sebuah kolam dengan sampah berbau yang kuat, dikelilingi oleh kandang babi dan ayam.Lalu, benarkah ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker?Mengetahui seluk beluk ikan lele ada banyak spesies ikan lele di Indonesia.Clarias Batrachus adalah salah satu ras favorit ikan lele yang dibudidayakan.Ada juga lele Afrika (juga dikenal sebagai King Cat Fish, King Catfish, ed.) Yang merupakan hasil jorok dari ikan lele betina dari Taiwan dan laki -laki dari Kenya, Afrika.Namun, tidak diketahui ras F1, F2, atau F3 yang mana yang menghasilkan jenis ikan lele ini.Pernahkah Anda mendengar tentang ikan lele Sangkuriang?Lele Sangkuriang adalah hasil dari rekayasa genetika dari Sukabumi Freshwater Cultivation Center (BBAT) yang berasal dari ikan lele Afrika.Ikan lele hidup di air tawar, tepatnya di sungai di mana airnya tidak terlalu berat, misalnya di danau atau genangan air kecil.Stigma lele itu kotor dan kotor, kan?Lele memiliki insang tambahan, sehingga mereka dapat mengambil oksigen dari udara.Itulah alasan mengapa ikan lele dapat hidup bahkan di lingkungan air yang miskin oksigen.Ikan ini juga dapat hidup meskipun lingkungannya tercemar bahan organik.Lele adalah karnivora yang suka makan kutu air, larva, cacing, dan siput.Sisa -sisa benda yang membusuk dan limbah manusia juga ingin dimakan oleh ikan lele.Namun, ikan lele tidak suka tanaman.Perilaku ini membuat orang menganggap ikan lele sebagai ikan kotor.Dibandingkan dengan kerapu dan ikan mas, ikan lele lebih disukai oleh publik karena harganya lebih terjangkau.Penikmat lele umumnya adalah orang -orang dengan tingkat ekonomi menengah hingga lebih rendah.Tingginya permintaan ikan lele membuat ikan lele lebih menarik bagi publik.Jangan salah, ikan lele di Indonesia sekarang dibudidayakan dengan penanaman berkualitas baik.Berbeda dengan berita yang beredar.Memberikan pakan yang baik dan pemeliharaan kolam rutin akan mencegah perkembangan penyakit dalam ikan lele.Jadi tentu saja itu akan membuat ikan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi.Tidak benar bahwa ikan lele dikatakan mengandung 3000 sel kanker.Beberapa masalah yang beredar juga membahas bahwa ukuran ikan lele dapat mendeteksi makanan apa yang dia makan selama hidupnya.Menurut rumor, ukuran besar ikan lele menunjukkan bahwa ikan lele dibangkitkan dengan pakan dari limbah manusia atau di septic tank.Namun, masalah ini dipertanyakan.Alasannya adalah, ada juga ikan lele yang memanen terlambat karena mereka gagal membeli perantara atau penjual sehingga ukuran tubuh mereka terus tumbuh karena sudah melewati periode panen.Bagaimana dengan ikan lele di pasaran?Secara umum, semua ikan lele di pasaran berasal dari peternakan ikan lele.Penjual harus memiliki hubungan dengan petani ikan lele yang mampu memasok sejumlah ikan lele setiap hari terus menerus dengan ukuran tertentu.Ini sulit dilakukan jika pertanian ikan lele hanya dilakukan secara alami, yang membutuhkan waktu bertahun -tahun sampai ikannya besar.Tidak hanya pembudidaya, pemerintah juga terus memantau tempat penetasan dan budidaya ikan, terutama ikan lele.Dalam sebuah wawancara dengan Detik.com, kepala perikanan provinsi Jawa Timur dan dinas kelautan, Heru Tjahjono, menjelaskan bahwa partainya telah menguji sampel hormon, antibiotik, dan residu logam berat di unit pertanian ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Akibatnya, tidak ada sampel yang berisi tiga residu yang ditemukan.Jadi, jangan takut makan lele, oke?

berita: The news that Facebook was closed or blocked for Indonesian social media (Medsos) users on April 24, 2018 has gone viral since this week. Netizens, especially those who use Facebook, are busy posting the status "Facebook will be closed", there are also those who upload "before Facebook is closed, post a status or photo first." The news of the closure of Facebook has constituent also become the pros and cons among netizens. Even so, the viral rumors circulating widely on social media, especially Facebook, are certainly not true or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Camridge Analityca scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of communication and information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. Also Read: Features of Stolen Facebook Account, 1 Million Indonesian Users Affected In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must comply with procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement regarding blocking FB is if there is evidence that FB is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, they are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. “If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook in Indonesia to conduct an audit and submit the results of the audit since a week after the announcement of the data on Facebook users in Indonesia being leaked in the CA scandal.
berita_id: Berita bahwa Facebook ditutup atau diblokir untuk pengguna media sosial Indonesia (MEDSOS) pada 24 April 2018 telah menjadi viral sejak minggu ini.Netizen, terutama mereka yang menggunakan Facebook, sibuk memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", ada juga yang mengunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup, memposting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita tentang penutupan Facebook telah menjadi konstituen juga menjadi pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor viral yang beredar luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Camridge Analityca.Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Juga dibaca: Fitur akun Facebook yang dicuri, 1 juta pengguna Indonesia yang terpengaruh pada kenyataannya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mematuhi prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir FB adalah jika ada bukti bahwa FB digunakan sebagai cara menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, mereka masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak punya keraguan tentang pemblokiran," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook di Indonesia untuk melakukan audit dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia bocor dalam skandal CA.

berita: Dream - The Muslim community was shocked by the news about a toothbrush made from pig bristles. One of the markers is the ingredient in the toothbrush, 'bristle', which is listed on the packaging. The word 'bristle' is then interpreted as 'sea urchin'. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. But, does 'bristle' really mean 'sea urchin'? Regarding this case, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) provided an explanation. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term 'bristle' means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to Webster's Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For care example, 'Boar Bristle Brush' which means 'Boar Bristle Brush. 'Boar' means 'boar' or 'boar'. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. "This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles," wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term 'bristle' in the packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. "When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material." "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off that characteristic smell when burned." wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Dream - Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah bahan di sikat gigi, 'Bristle', yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata 'bristle' kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai 'landak laut'.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Tapi, apakah 'Bristle' benar -benar berarti 'landak laut'?Mengenai kasus ini, Institut untuk Studi Makanan, Obat -obatan dan Kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) memberikan penjelasan.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah 'bulu' berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Webster, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Sebagai contoh, 'Boar Bristle Brush' yang berarti 'Boar Bristle Brush.'Babi' berarti 'babi hutan' atau 'babi hutan'.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan."Ini berarti bahwa produk ini adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar. Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi," tulis LPPOM MUI, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang mengandung istilah 'bristle' dalam kemasan harus dibuat dari Bristles babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka."Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber material, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan. Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.""Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan aroma khas saat dibakar."menulis lppom mui.

berita: Jakarta - The Istiqlal Mosque management said it had nothing to do with the 212 volume II demonstration on February 21, 2017. "The Istiqlal Mosque has never invited crowds, but we are open," said Head of the Istiqlal Protocol Section, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, Monday, February 20. 2017. The plan is that the Islamic Community Forum and a number of other Islamic organizations will hold a 212 action in front of the House of Representatives building. Reportedly, there were participants staying at the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta. Abu Hurairah explained, this mosque is a symbol of diversity. When entering the Istiqlal Mosque, it is not allowed to carry the identity of the group and party. "If it post is used as a meeting place, that's okay. But, for speeches, we don't allow it," he said. According to him, Istiqlal can be visited by anyone, but not for the interests of certain groups. Chairman of the Indonesian Muslim Brotherhood (Parmusi) Usamah Hisyam explained that the participants of the 212 action would perform the morning prayer in congregation. Then, the action participants moved to the DPR building in Senayan, South Jakarta. Osama claimed to lead the action. There are three demands that will be voiced by the participants of the 212 action, namely to stop Ahok as Governor of DKI, stop criminalizing ulama, and arrest Ahok.
berita_id: Jakarta - Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal mengatakan tidak ada hubungannya dengan demonstrasi 212 Volume II pada 21 Februari 2017. "Masjid ISTIQLAL tidak pernah mengundang orang banyak, tetapi kami terbuka," kata Kepala Paket ISTIQLAL, ABU HURAIRAH ABD ABD SALAM, Senin 20, 2017. Paket Protokol ISTI, ABU HURAIRAH ABD ABD SALAM, Senin 20 Februari.Tindakan 212 di depan gedung DPR.Dilaporkan, ada peserta yang tinggal di Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah.Abu Hurairah menjelaskan, masjid ini adalah simbol keragaman.Saat memasuki masjid Istiqlal, tidak diizinkan untuk membawa identitas kelompok dan partai."Jika posting digunakan sebagai tempat pertemuan, tidak apa -apa. Tapi, untuk pidato, kami tidak mengizinkannya," katanya.Menurutnya, Istiqlal dapat dikunjungi oleh siapa pun, tetapi tidak untuk kepentingan kelompok tertentu.Ketua Ikhwanul Muslimin Indonesia (Parmusi) Usamah Hisyam menjelaskan bahwa para peserta aksi 212 akan melakukan doa pagi di jemaat.Kemudian, peserta aksi pindah ke gedung DPR di Senayan, Jakarta Selatan.Osama mengklaim memimpin tindakan itu.Ada tiga tuntutan yang akan disuarakan oleh para peserta dari aksi 212, yaitu untuk menghentikan Ahok sebagai gubernur DKI, berhenti mengkriminalisasi Ulama, dan menangkap Ahok.

berita: The Surabaya City government continues to carry out dot candy raids that indicate drugs. There are three sub-district points that are mobilized by the Surabaya City Satpol PP marketer to raid the green colored candy. They are Genteng District, Rungkut District and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan District of Surabaya City, Yunus said that raids had been carried out at three school points. "We raided SDN Pakis I, II, and IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result was 20 teats," said Yunus. The candy pacifiers are suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy does not look like drugs but looks like ordinary candy. "Those who sell it at street vendors around the school are immediately secured. We secure them and take them to the sub-district office," said Yunus. Not only pacifiers, but in the food and beverage raids at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan, a number of hard candies were also found, namely candy containing formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. "For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also secure that," said Yunus
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus melakukan serangan permen dot yang menunjukkan obat -obatan.Ada tiga poin sub-distrik yang dimobilisasi oleh pemasar Surabaya City Satpol PP untuk menyerang permen berwarna hijau.Mereka adalah Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala distrik Sawahan di Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa serangan telah dilakukan di tiga titik sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, II, dan IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dadah," kata Yunus.Permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan tetapi terlihat seperti permen biasa."Mereka yang menjualnya di pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah segera diamankan. Kami mengamankannya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi dalam serangan makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan, sejumlah permen keras juga ditemukan, yaitu permen yang mengandung formaldehida yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga mengamankannya," kata Yunus

berita: The salaries of the President of the Republic of Indonesia, Joko Widodo and the Vice President, Jusuf Kalla have not increased This was stated by Bey Mahmudi, the head of the press bureau of the presidential secretary. Regarding the salary increase received by Jokowi and Jusuf Kalla "The amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001," explained Bey Mahmudi. -Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President and Former Presidents and basic Vice Presidents In article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. vice president principal is four times ga Furthermore, according to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary of a state official (Chairman of the DPR, MA, BPK) is IDR 5040000 per month. Thus, the amount of the Presidential Basic Salary per month is six times The salary is Rp. 30240000. Meanwhile, the Basic Salary of the Vice President each month is four times the salary, which is Rp. 2016000000. The amount of office allowances that the President and Vice President receive each month is in accordance with Presidential Decree Number 68 of 2001, which is Rp. 32500000 for the President and Rp. 22000000 for Vice President
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia, Joko Widodo dan Wakil Presiden, Jusuf Kalla belum meningkatkan ini dinyatakan oleh Bey Mahmudi, kepala Biro Pers Sekretaris Presiden.Mengenai kenaikan gaji yang diterima oleh Jokowi dan Jusuf Kalla "jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh presiden dan wakil presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001," jelas Bey Mahmudi.-Law Nomor 7 tahun 1978 tentang hak -hak keuangan/administrasi Presiden dan Wakil Presiden dan mantan presiden dan Wakil Presiden Dasar dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar Presiden enam kali lipat gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia selain Presiden dan Wakil Presiden.Wakil Presiden Kepala Sekolah empat kali lipat Ga lebih jauh, menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat negara (ketua DPR, MA, BPK) adalah IDR 5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, jumlah gaji dasar presiden per bulan adalah enam kali gaji adalah RP.30240000. Sementara itu, gaji dasar wakil presiden setiap bulan adalah empat kali lipat gaji, yaitu RP.2016000000. Jumlah tunjangan kantor yang diterima presiden dan wakil presiden setiap bulan sesuai dengan keputusan presiden nomor 68 tahun 2001, yaitu RP.32500000 untuk Presiden dan RP.22000000 untuk Wakil Presiden

berita: After a few weeks on the market and becoming the most sought after item by premium class gadget lovers, it turns out that there are some iPhone 6 users who feel disappointed with the product they bought at a fairly expensive price. There are some iPhone users who feel that the quality of the device they buy is far below the standard because they feel the iPhone 6 is soft and bends easily. The above is not just an issue or gossip. If you put your new iPhone in a trouser pocket without a protective case or try to squeeze it a little like you want to break a chocolate bar, you'll soon find out that the iPhone 6's body bends easily. If you don't feel willing to bend your own iPhone, there are many videos and pictures that you can download and view from the internet that show Apple's weakness. Due to the outpouring of disappointment from iPhone 6 users that is widely uploaded on YouTube and also reports that enter Apple, which says the body of the latest iPhone is much softer than its predecessor, Apple had to swallow the bitter pill by experiencing a decline in the value of Apple's shares by 3.8%. Apple's stock price dropped after a video of the bent iPhone went viral on YouTube. In addition, the video showing that the iPhone 6 is flabby and easy to bend is also exacerbated by the many reports stating that there are many errors in the iOS update from iOS 7 to iOS 8. The problems encountered include intermittent updates and also users of more than 5GB of space are only for updates, so many iPhone users have to delete some of the photo and video files they have. To avoid a wider issue, Apple then made a claim that the damage that occurred to the iPhone 6 which was claimed to be soft and easy to bend was rare when used normally. Apple claims that in 6 days of sale, there were only 9 consumers who contacted the iPhone because their product was bent, but Apple forgot that iPhones are sold worldwide and there are more users who don't know who to contact to get their iPhone replaced because indeed the damage is not included. warranty. Another issue related to the iPhone 6 flaccid and easy to bend issue is the iOS 8 update which is otherwise problematic. Many consumers are calling because they find an error detecting their fingerprint. Because of this, Apple then discontinued the distribution of iOS and released a new one a day later. When compared with competitors, the strength of the iPhone 6 is only half that of competing products such as Samsung and LG. Of the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, and iPHone, tested at 4.5KG, the ones that bring out curled right up were the iPhone 6 and M8, reports Consumer Reports.
berita_id: Setelah beberapa minggu di pasar dan menjadi yang paling dicari oleh pecinta gadget kelas premium, ternyata ada beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 yang merasa kecewa dengan produk yang mereka beli dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Ada beberapa pengguna iPhone yang merasa bahwa kualitas perangkat yang mereka beli jauh di bawah standar karena mereka merasa iPhone 6 mudah dan berbelok dengan mudah.Di atas bukan hanya masalah atau gosip.Jika Anda meletakkan iPhone baru Anda ke dalam saku celana tanpa kotak pelindung atau mencoba memerasnya sedikit seperti Anda ingin memecahkan cokelat, Anda akan segera mengetahui bahwa tubuh iPhone 6 dengan mudah membungkuk.Jika Anda tidak merasa mau menekuk iPhone Anda sendiri, ada banyak video dan gambar yang dapat Anda unduh dan lihat dari internet yang menunjukkan kelemahan Apple.Karena curahan kekecewaan dari pengguna iPhone 6 yang secara luas diunggah di YouTube dan juga melaporkan bahwa masuk Apple, yang mengatakan tubuh iPhone terbaru jauh lebih lembut daripada pendahulunya, Apple harus menelan pil pahit dengan mengalami penurunan nilai saham Apple sebesar 3,8%.Harga saham Apple turun setelah video iPhone bengkok menjadi viral di YouTube.Selain itu, video yang menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 lembek dan mudah ditekuk juga diperburuk oleh banyak laporan yang menyatakan bahwa ada banyak kesalahan dalam pembaruan iOS dari iOS 7 ke iOS 8. Masalah yang dihadapi termasuk pembaruan yang terputus -putus dan juga pengguna lebih dari 5GB ruang yang hanya untuk pembaruan, banyak pengguna iPhone harus menghapus beberapa file dan video yang dimiliki.Untuk menghindari masalah yang lebih luas, Apple kemudian membuat klaim bahwa kerusakan yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 yang diklaim lembut dan mudah ditekuk jarang terjadi jika digunakan secara normal.Apple mengklaim bahwa dalam 6 hari penjualan, hanya ada 9 konsumen yang menghubungi iPhone karena produk mereka bengkok, tetapi Apple lupa bahwa iPhone dijual di seluruh dunia dan ada lebih banyak pengguna yang tidak tahu siapa yang harus dihubungi untuk mengganti iPhone mereka karena memang kerusakan tidak termasuk.jaminan.Masalah lain yang terkait dengan iPhone 6 lembek dan masalah yang mudah ditekuk adalah pembaruan iOS 8 yang merupakan masalah.Banyak konsumen menelepon karena mereka menemukan kesalahan mendeteksi sidik jari mereka.Karena itu, Apple kemudian menghentikan distribusi iOS dan merilis yang baru sehari kemudian.Jika dibandingkan dengan pesaing, kekuatan iPhone 6 hanya setengah dari produk yang bersaing seperti Samsung dan LG.Dari Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, dan iPhone, diuji pada 4,5kg, yang mengeluarkan keriting tepat adalah iPhone 6 dan M8, lapor konsumen.

berita: Traveloka has responded to a lot of news regarding calls to boycott its services. This hotel and travel ticket booking application also provides clarification regarding the events at the Canisius College event. As is known, invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. According to news circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. Regarding the circulation of mention of Derianto's name providing support to Ananda and raising an invitation to boycott Traveloka, according to Busyro, Traveloka is still investigating. "We have just seen a lot of people about this, we are also still investigating. What I can say is that he was unable to attend and we have not taken any position," he said. Derianto and Ananda plan are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Traveloka telah menanggapi banyak berita tentang panggilan untuk memboikot layanannya.Aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan ini juga memberikan klarifikasi mengenai acara di acara Canisius College.Seperti yang diketahui, undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berkeliaran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Menurut berita yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.Mengenai sirkulasi menyebutkan nama Deraianto memberikan dukungan kepada Ananda dan mengajukan undangan untuk memboikot Traveloka, menurut Busyro, Traveloka masih menyelidiki."Kami baru saja melihat banyak orang tentang ini, kami juga masih menyelidiki. Apa yang dapat saya katakan adalah bahwa ia tidak dapat hadir dan kami belum mengambil posisi apa pun," katanya.DERIANTO DAN ANANDA RENCANA adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada Pastor Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha)

berita: Not even a month since this virtual reality game application has been circulating in Indonesia, Pokemon Go has been labeled with the meaning "I am Jewish". Pokemon which is taken from the word Pocket Monster (pocket monster), is interpreted as freely as possible from the Old Syriac language. Even its icon, Pikachu, a yellow mouse monster, does not escape the perfunctory translation of “Be a Jew”. Long before the Pokemon Go application was released, in 2001, when the Pokemon animation was broadcast, Pokemon was considered as Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Pokemon Go has even become a topic that needs to be legalized at the PBNU Plenary Session in Cirebon, parallel to the discussion of the tax amnesty issue. Pokemon Go is just one of hundreds of games both online and offline that feel the need to be labeled with the word "Jewish". Other games that have been painstakingly labeled the illuminati/devil/freemason/devil's follower/deviant sect/other Islamic insults have also filled the list. Call it Devil May Cry, Resident Evil, Clash of Clans, Prince of Persia, Counter Strike, Come on Dance, even Angry Birds cannot be separated from these frills. This is certainly not something new. Of course, you can also get a pagan/Jewish/communist/liberal stamp for free. Not just one, but all at once. While we are still busy with the narrow division between Jews and Gentiles, the rest of the world is busy pursuing world peace and space exploration. Meanwhile, every year we still struggle with the discourse of boycotting products that are considered to support Israel. The shadow of a big conspiracy carried out by the Jews continues to follow and enlarges the distance of the possibility of diplomatic relations with Indonesia. But, what is not a Jewish conspiracy? Everything is the fault of the Jewish conspiracy. Economic failure is a Jewish conspiracy. After all, what escapes the Jewish frills? Coca Cola if it is twisted in such a way is Jewish. Jewish made Facebook. Like the painful PKI stamp, all Made in China products should be replaced with Jewish ones. What's the matter with the Jews and us? Anti-Judaism, Anti-Semitism, Anti-Zionism, and Why We Hate. What's different about the three? For us, it's all the same. Jews = Israel = Zionists. There is no need to differentiate. All three are the same. Those who believed in and condemned the negative prejudice against Islam in the American hemisphere are now proud to have the same hatred for Jews. What are the similarities between the two? Both consider people with certain characteristics to be hated (as much as they hate communists, liberals, and lesbians, gays, bisexuals, and transgender/LGBT). Why do we hate? Hatred of other groups makes the group and ourselves look good. We love to be good and work hard at it. Love for the group works not only when other groups are truly hated, but because of positive emotions such as pride, honor, sympathy, and trust in one's own group. This we reproduce continuously to other groups. We give in to the temptation to make ourselves look bigger by belittling others. We then imagine big things that don't make sense to be attached to the hatred that feeds our brains every day. Gordon Allport, in Anti-Semitism, A Social Disease (1946) called Judeophobia (negative prejudice against Jews) as a social disease that is contagious and is a complex crime. Simmel then even interpreted it as a mass psychosis that spreads like a virus. Like a possessed individual, this thought is highly irrational, massive, structured, and is a futile defensive attempt to balance a perceived weak identity and affiliation with delusions of power. We use negative prejudices to control our free-falling self-esteem. Unfortunately, our hatred doesn't stop there. We reproduce fears that are like snowballs, rolling and multiplying. We build a discourse in which the existence of the Jews will threaten our existence. To eliminate the thought of threat, we have an urgency to remove the source of the discomfort, by destroying others if we do not want to be destroyed by ourselves. The principle: “In order for us to breathe, you must be eliminated.” Not to mention our fear of the Jews, online games push us into new troubles. Those of us who are technology stutterers are also rushing to respond to augmented reality-based games. When did Islam as a religion emerge? The writer Damhuri Muhammad articulated it nicely in his opinion in Kompas (26/7/2016), that high technology which is now accessible to anyone has turned into a strange shock, addiction, and even hysteria. Although some of us understand that perhaps the discourses of fear of high-tech extremely games are mere humor and satire, we must realize that this is happening not on the other side of the world, but in the headrooms themselves and is taken seriously. Even that is driven by what has been echoed in our ears so far. We must become rigid by learning to study again and learn We are taught that it is wrong to play and have fun (except watching Uttaran from day to night, or watching gossip shows of artist life). However I say that the most effective English lessons are not in boring classrooms. To me, it came in the form of a Harvest Moon game when I had to open a dictionary to look up the meaning of the word basketball which I thought at the time was ball. And as an addict of online and offline games, I'll always be at the forefront of having fun, even if the consequences are “Being Jewish”.

The virtual universe was shocked by Ananda Sukarlan's Walk Out (WO) action. The famous composer and pianist came out when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan read a welcoming speech commemorating the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, Saturday (11/11). The news immediately went viral in cyberspace. Not a few of the netizens who poured spicy comments. Recently, the hashtag uninstall Traveloka has become a trending topic. Why? Netizens consider Ananda Sukarlan's WO action to be intolerant. This includes actions taken by Traveloka boss Derianto Kusuma, who followed in Ananda's footsteps. From INDOPOS's observation, many accounts invite and post to uninstall the Traveloka application. As posted by the Instagram account @wollessunda. In the photo that was posted on his account, there was an image that  minutes read "In the act of harassment carried out by Ananda Sukarlan against Pa Anies Baswedan, the Muslim Governor of DKI Jakarta was also supported by Derianto Kusuma, the founder of Traveloka. Elo sell me buy". Connected with an invitation to delete the Traveloka application below. The same thing was also posted by the Instagram account @conan_back.911. The account owner posted a photo with the Traveloka logo. With the addition of the words "WO-Kan Traveloka". It doesn't just end there. INDOPOS's monitoring on the trends24.in site, the hashtag uninstall traveloka has become a trending topic since 1 hour ago. The trending topic ranking site in Indonesia wrote that #uninstalltraveloka was the most talked about one hour ago. Until this news was published, there has been no official clarification by Traveloka or Derianto Kusuma, as CTO and co-founder of Traveloka.
berita_id: Alam semesta virtual dikejutkan oleh tindakan Ananda Sukarlan (WO).Komposer dan pianis terkenal keluar ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan membaca pidato yang menyambut untuk memperingati peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, Sabtu (11/11).Berita itu segera menjadi viral di dunia maya.Tidak sedikit netizen yang menuangkan komentar pedas.Baru -baru ini, tagar uninstall Traveloka telah menjadi topik yang sedang tren.Mengapa?Netizen menganggap tindakan Ananda Sukarlan tidak toleran.Ini termasuk tindakan yang diambil oleh bos Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang mengikuti jejak Ananda.Dari pengamatan Indopos, banyak akun mengundang dan memposting untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Seperti yang diposting oleh akun Instagram @wollessunda.Dalam foto yang diposting di akunnya, ada gambar yang dibacakan menit "Dalam tindakan pelecehan yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan terhadap Pa Anies Baswedan, gubernur Muslim DKI Jakarta juga didukung oleh DeRianto Kusuma, pendiri Traveloka. Elo menjual saya membeli".Terhubung dengan undangan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka di bawah ini.Hal yang sama juga diposting oleh akun Instagram @conan_back.911.Pemilik akun memposting foto dengan logo Traveloka.Dengan tambahan kata "wo-kan traveloka".Itu tidak hanya berakhir di sana.Pemantauan Indopos di Situs Trends24. Di, tagar uninstall Traveloka telah menjadi topik yang sedang tren sejak 1 jam yang lalu.Situs peringkat topik tren di Indonesia menulis bahwa #uninstalltraveloka adalah yang paling banyak dibicarakan sekitar satu jam yang lalu.Sampai berita ini diterbitkan, belum ada klarifikasi resmi oleh Traveloka atau DeRianto Kusuma, sebagai CTO dan salah satu pendiri Traveloka.

berita: JAKARTA, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Arrmanatha Nasir said he was investigating internally regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement (statement) from the Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to confirm it because the item is an asset of a state agency," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, Sunday. On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . indonesian Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao would not only provide a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, but also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Jakarta, juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir mengatakan dia sedang menyelidiki secara internal mengenai pembakaran reog di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi (pernyataan) dari konsulat jenderal di Davao mengenai masalah reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk mengkonfirmasinya karena barang tersebut merupakan aset dari agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, Minggu.Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar secara viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik Indonesia yang terkait dengan pembakaran Reog Ponorogo di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao tidak hanya akan memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran REOG, tetapi juga menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni reog di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: Alam Islam - Help straighten it out, after HOAX code E as a product with all pork, this is a HOAX explanation that all bristles are also pork, hopefully it can reduce the anxiety of the BRISTLE community. general in nature. In Arabic, isim nakirah. The meaning of the word bristle is a fine/thin strand (filament) and firm/strong, according to the following dictionaries: The bristle written on the toothbrush, solely means bristles, NOT sea urchins. Now the word bristle which is general in nature (isim nakirah) only has a more special meaning when compared to other words, for example: pure bristle or 100% bristle or natural bristle: meaning fur made from pure animal hair or plant fiber. Can be from horses or other animals. Bristle from plant fibers is also available, namely SIWAK wood. The bristles or bristle of Tang dynasty (619 - 907) toothbrushes were indeed made of pig bristles, but modern toothbrushes made since 1938 are made of NYLON. The history can be seen here: Until now, there are STILL 10% of toothbrushes made of sea urchins circulating throughout the WORLD (so NOT 10% in Indonesia as Jeng wrote, whose status talk over I photographed). For hygiene reasons, modern toothbrush manufacturers and consumers prefer nylon toothbrushes. It seems that the joy of welcoming the toothbrush bristle information occurred due to a misunderstanding when reading articles on the LPPOK MUI website. Articles that discuss BRUSH FOR COOKING, are considered the same as the bristles on a toothbrush. this article : this is the misunderstood part : The handle of a boar bristle brush is often written with the words : Bristle, Pure Bristle, 100% China Bristle, etc. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet. Therefore, bread that is touched by an unclean brush becomes unclean, so it is forbidden to eat it. A substitute for a boar bristle brush is a brush made of plastic (polyester). Brush companies Ken Master and Selery also produce brushes from this halal material. The word ONE in the article is not understood properly where one also means NOT ALL the meanings of the word bristle are sea urchins, including the bristles of modern NYLON toothbrushes. AND some people don't even bother to double-check if it's true that the word bristle ONLY means sea urchin. Qadar Allah this error is so massive that even one of the sites belonging to one of the asatidz interprets it incorrectly. So I hope that the manager of the LPPOM MUI site (maybe someone can contact Mr. Nanung to correct the article) will correct the article by providing a more detailed description of the meaning of the word bristle so that there are no mistakes like what we see in the picture. below this.
berita_id: Alam Islam - Membantu meluruskannya, setelah kode tipuan E sebagai produk dengan semua daging babi, ini adalah penjelasan tipuan bahwa semua bulu juga babi, semoga dapat mengurangi kecemasan komunitas bulu.umum di alam.Dalam bahasa Arab, Isim Nakirah.Arti kata bulu adalah untai halus/tipis (filamen) dan tegas/kuat, menurut kamus berikut: bulu yang ditulis pada sikat gigi, semata -mata berarti bulu, bukan landak laut.Sekarang kata bulu yang bersifat umum (isim nakirah) hanya memiliki makna yang lebih khusus jika dibandingkan dengan kata lain, misalnya: bulu murni atau bulu 100% atau bulu alami: artinya bulu yang dibuat dari rambut hewan murni atau serat tanaman.Bisa dari kuda atau hewan lain.Bulu dari serat tanaman juga tersedia, yaitu kayu Siwak.Bulu sikat gigi Dinasti Tang (619 - 907) memang terbuat dari bulu babi, tetapi sikat gigi modern yang dibuat sejak 1938 terbuat dari nilon.Sejarah dapat dilihat di sini: Sampai sekarang, masih ada 10% sikat gigi yang terbuat dari landak laut yang beredar di seluruh dunia (jadi tidak 10% di Indonesia seperti yang ditulis Jeng, yang statusnya berbicara tentang memotret saya).Untuk alasan kebersihan, produsen sikat gigi modern dan konsumen lebih suka sikat gigi nilon.Tampaknya kegembiraan menyambut informasi bulu gigi terjadi karena kesalahpahaman ketika membaca artikel di situs web LPPOK MUI.Artikel yang membahas kuas untuk memasak, dianggap sama dengan bulu pada sikat gigi.Artikel ini: Ini adalah bagian yang disalahpahami: pegangan sikat bulu babi sering ditulis dengan kata -kata: bulu, bulu murni, 100% china bristle, dll. Salah satu makna kata bulu adalah rambut babi atau landak laut (Kamus Webster) yang tidak bersih ketika basah.Oleh karena itu, roti yang disentuh oleh sikat najis menjadi najis, jadi dilarang memakannya.Pengganti untuk sikat bulu babi adalah kuas yang terbuat dari plastik (poliester).Perusahaan kuas Ken Master dan Selery juga menghasilkan kuas dari bahan halal ini.Kata satu dalam artikel ini tidak dipahami dengan baik di mana orang juga berarti tidak semua makna kata bulu adalah landak laut, termasuk bulu sikat gigi nilon modern.Dan beberapa orang bahkan tidak repot-repot memeriksa ulang jika benar bahwa kata Bristle hanya berarti landak laut.Qadar Allah Kesalahan ini sangat besar sehingga bahkan salah satu situs milik salah satu Asatidz menafsirkannya secara tidak benar.Jadi saya berharap manajer situs LPPOM MUI (mungkin seseorang dapat menghubungi Tn. Nanung untuk memperbaiki artikel) akan memperbaiki artikel dengan memberikan deskripsi yang lebih rinci tentang arti kata bulu sehingga tidak ada kesalahan seperti apa yang kita lihat dalam gambar.dibawah ini.

berita: Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said Head of tidings the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (evening), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Foto -foto peserta aksi 212 Volume Dua beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Kepala Pidana Bagian Protokol Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (malam), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is IDR 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. So that the total money received by the president each month is Rp. 62740000 or Rp. 752880000 per year. According to the palace, this number has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than that of PRC President Xi Jinping, who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't ruff have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji pokok presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000. Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah RP.62740000 atau RP.752880000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping, yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum memiliki informasi. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: The Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) declared the 'Penguin Brand' candy or teat candy free of drugs and psychotropic substances. Head of BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito in a press conference political science on Thursday (9/3) revealed that laboratory tests had been carried out on the candy. He said of the 12 parameters tested, all of them showed negative results. "We have coordinated with the National Narcotics Agency and today it was concluded that pacifier candy does not contain narcotics," Penny explained on the sidelines of the 2017 BPOM National Conference in Batu. Testing on candy pacifiers was carried out at BPOM Surabaya as the place where these snacks were found. In addition to Surabaya, the candy pacifier test was also carried out at BPOM Bandar Lampung and Serang. All of them showed negative results for narcotics. Penny added that testing the content of rhodamine B and formalin in pacifiers also showed negative results. A negative result indicates that the candy can still be circulated and consumed. "We ask the public to be calm but remain vigilant about consuming any food because it could be contaminated or contaminated," he added. Based on BPOM research, the candy pacifier has obtained a distribution permit which will expire in 2018. Sweets imported from China are widely traded in the Surabaya school environment. However, Penny instructed all BPOM in the region to participate in checking the product in question. The Surabaya government through its entire staff raided candy pacifiers in a number of schools and markets. The issue of pacifier candy containing narcotics has been circulating in the mass media and social media since March 6. This issue arose after the Surabaya City Government suspected the presence of rhodamine-B and formalin.
berita_id: Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM) menyatakan permen 'merek penguin' atau permen TEAT yang bebas dari narkoba dan zat psikotropika.Kepala BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito dalam Ilmu Politik Konferensi Pers pada hari Kamis (9/3) mengungkapkan bahwa tes laboratorium telah dilakukan dengan permen.Dia mengatakan dari 12 parameter yang diuji, semuanya menunjukkan hasil negatif."Kami telah berkoordinasi dengan Badan Narkotika Nasional dan hari ini disimpulkan bahwa Candy Datang tidak mengandung narkotika," Penny menjelaskan di sela -sela Konferensi Nasional BPOM 2017 di Batu.Pengujian dot permen dilakukan di BPOM Surabaya sebagai tempat di mana makanan ringan ini ditemukan.Selain Surabaya, uji Candy Pacifier juga dilakukan di BPOM Bandar Lampung dan Serang.Semuanya menunjukkan hasil negatif untuk narkotika.Penny menambahkan bahwa menguji kandungan rhodamin B dan formalin pada dot juga menunjukkan hasil negatif.Hasil negatif menunjukkan bahwa permen masih dapat diedarkan dan dikonsumsi."Kami meminta masyarakat untuk tenang tetapi tetap waspada tentang mengonsumsi makanan apa pun karena itu bisa terkontaminasi atau terkontaminasi," tambahnya.Berdasarkan penelitian BPOM, dot permen telah memperoleh izin distribusi yang akan berakhir pada tahun 2018. Permen yang diimpor dari Cina diperdagangkan secara luas di lingkungan sekolah Surabaya.Namun, Penny menginstruksikan semua BPOM di wilayah tersebut untuk berpartisipasi dalam memeriksa produk tersebut.Pemerintah Surabaya melalui seluruh stafnya menggerebek dot permen di sejumlah sekolah dan pasar.Masalah permen dot yang mengandung narkotika telah beredar di media massa dan media sosial sejak 6 Maret. Masalah ini muncul setelah pemerintah kota Surabaya mencurigai keberadaan rhodamine-B dan formalin.

berita: From the records of the Indonesian Foundation, stroke is the third dangerous disease offer that contributes a lot of deaths with an increasing trend. What would you do if someone around you suddenly had a stroke? Of course, you must be able to think clearly and calmly in order to provide first aid to the sufferer. In the following, we will tell you how to give first aid to stroke. Do not move, if you move the patient from the place of origin / original place it will make the possibility of rupture of fine blood vessels in the brain will occur more quickly and of course this will be risky. Simply help the patient take a sitting position so as not to fall again. Puncture the tips of the fingers with a needle, it is recommended to use a syringe. But if you don't have one, you can use other needles that are not too big (ex: sewing needles, pins) and of course they must be in a sterile condition by burning. The point to be punctured is about 1 mm from the tip of the nail. Try so that at least a little blood can drip / 1 drop is enough. If you can't, press the finger. Within about 10 minutes, the patient will regain consciousness. Pull - pull and prick the earlobe. If the patient's mouth looks abnormal, you may have to try tugging at the patient's ears until they look a little red. Then, do 2 punctures on the lower end of the ear with a small needle that has been sterilized so that the blood drips 2 times from each earlobe. In a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal. Seek medical help, when the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical help immediately. Take the patient to the nearest doctor or nearest hospital to get further action. Remember, before 6 hours since the attack, stroke sufferers must receive medical help. So some information and tips about First Aid for Stroke Patients, I hope you can provide help to those around you and help save a human life. I hope this article is helpful for all of us
berita_id: Dari catatan Yayasan Indonesia, stroke adalah penawaran penyakit berbahaya ketiga yang berkontribusi banyak kematian dengan tren yang meningkat.Apa yang akan Anda lakukan jika seseorang di sekitar Anda tiba -tiba mengalami stroke?Tentu saja, Anda harus dapat berpikir dengan jelas dan tenang untuk memberikan pertolongan pertama kepada penderita.Berikut ini, kami akan memberi tahu Anda cara memberikan pertolongan pertama untuk stroke.Jangan bergerak, jika Anda memindahkan pasien dari tempat asal / tempat asli itu akan membuat kemungkinan pecahnya pembuluh darah halus di otak akan terjadi lebih cepat dan tentu saja ini akan berisiko.Cukup bantu pasien mengambil posisi duduk agar tidak jatuh lagi.Tusuk ujung jari dengan jarum, disarankan untuk menggunakan jarum suntik.Tetapi jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain yang tidak terlalu besar (mis: jarum menjahit, pin) dan tentu saja mereka harus dalam kondisi steril dengan membakar.Poin yang harus ditusuk adalah sekitar 1 mm dari ujung kuku.Cobalah agar setidaknya sedikit darah dapat menetes / 1 tetes sudah cukup.Jika Anda tidak bisa, tekan jari.Dalam waktu sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Tarik - Tarik dan tusuk telinga.Jika mulut pasien terlihat tidak normal, Anda mungkin harus mencoba menarik telinga pasien sampai mereka terlihat sedikit merah.Kemudian, lakukan 2 tusukan di ujung bawah telinga dengan jarum kecil yang telah disterilkan sehingga darah menetes 2 kali dari setiap daun telinga.Dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal.Carilah bantuan medis, ketika kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari bantuan medis.Bawa pasien ke dokter terdekat atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan tindakan lebih lanjut.Ingat, sebelum 6 jam sejak serangan, penderita stroke harus menerima bantuan medis.Jadi beberapa informasi dan tips tentang pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke, saya harap Anda dapat memberikan bantuan kepada orang -orang di sekitar Anda dan membantu menyelamatkan hidup manusia.Saya harap artikel ini bermanfaat bagi kita semua

berita: The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka is echoing on Twitter social media, Tuesday (14/11/2017). The call to uninstall was allegedly triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk-out action when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech last weekend. Precisely when, Ananda walked out during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017) at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. According to information compiled by galamedianews.com, this event was also attended by one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma. At that time, he greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. Meanwhile, the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province assessed that the walkout (WO) carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and the Traveloka boss to Anies Baswedan was an intolerant attitude. Chairman of the Muhammadiyah Youth of DKI Jakarta Province, Syahrul Hasan, said that the WO action carried out by Ananda Sukarlan and several others illustrates the attitude of intolerance and poor morals as hosts in tuesday receiving guests. Where the presence of Anies Baswedan as a guest is at the official request of the host himself. "Ananda Sukarlan's walkout action accusing Anies Baswedan of winning the governor's seat is not in accordance with Kanisius' values ​​is far from being burned," Syahrul said in a release, Tuesday (11/14/2017). Syahrul explained, Anies Baswedan was part of the Muhammadiyah extended family, both structurally and culturally. Currently, he is entrusted with the advisory role of the Muhammadiyah Branch of Pondok Labu where Din Syamsudin MA serves as the head of the branch.
berita_id: Tagar #uninstalltraveloka bergema di media sosial Twitter, Selasa (14/11/2017).Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi diduga dipicu oleh tindakan pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato akhir pekan lalu.Tepatnya ketika, Ananda berjalan keluar selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017) di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Galamamedianews.com, acara ini juga dihadiri oleh salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.Pada waktu itu, dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Sementara itu, pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta menilai bahwa pemogokan (WO) yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan bos Traveloka ke Anies Baswedan adalah sikap yang tidak toleran.Ketua pemuda Muhammadiyah dari provinsi DKI Jakarta, Syahrul Hasan, mengatakan bahwa tindakan WO yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan dan beberapa lainnya menggambarkan sikap intoleransi dan moral yang buruk sebagai tuan rumah pada hari Selasa menerima tamu.Di mana kehadiran Anies Baswedan sebagai tamu atas permintaan resmi tuan rumah sendiri."Tindakan pemogokan Ananda Sukarlan menuduh Anies Baswedan memenangkan kursi gubernur tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai Kanisius jauh dari dibakar," kata Syahrul dalam rilisnya, Selasa (11/14/2017).Syahrul menjelaskan, Anies Baswedan adalah bagian dari keluarga besar Muhammadiyah, baik secara struktural maupun budaya.Saat ini, ia dipercayakan dengan peran penasihat cabang Muhammadiyah dari Pondok Labu di mana Din Syamsudin Ma berfungsi sebagai kepala cabang.

berita: JAKARTA – The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI)? denied that his party did not accept the masses of Action 212 Volume II who were going to perform the Fajr prayer there. Previously, it was reported that the administrator of the largest mosque in Southeast Asia had deliberately closed the fence because he did not want the masses to perform the Fajr prayer there. "That in order to optimize the security of the BPPMI mosque, the Istiqlal Mosque since 2002 has imposed a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30 WIB and opening them again in the morning at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer is held. All pilgrims are not allowed stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security and BPPMI leadership," said BPPMI's publicist, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam?, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu explained that the condition of the night of February 20, 2017 until the early hours of February 21 2017, the security of the Istiqlal Mosque had explained to the worshipers who had gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure. So, the demonstrators understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. "BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for pilgrims to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held Actions 411, 212, or 112. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter," he added. Abu added, the Istiqlal Mosque administrators always serve the people and strive for national unity and unity and always maintain the comfort of worship." BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above, was not in accordance with reality and tended to contain provocations. ," he explained. Abu hopes that the Muslims will not be influenced by this irresponsible news. "The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today formula went well and smoothly, led by the Imam, Ustadz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers was approximately 240 people or 170 men and 70 women," he said.
berita_id: Jakarta - Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI)?Dibantah bahwa partainya tidak menerima massa aksi 212 Volume II yang akan melakukan doa Fajr di sana.Sebelumnya, dilaporkan bahwa administrator masjid terbesar di Asia Tenggara dengan sengaja menutup pagar karena dia tidak ingin massa melakukan doa Fajr di sana."Bahwa untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid BPPMI, masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah memberlakukan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan membukanya lagi di pagi hari di pukul 03.40 WIB sebelum doa FAJR diadakan. Semua peziarah tidak diperbolehkan tinggal di ISTIQL Areaql dari Konderal dari Kondisi -Kondisi dari Kondisi MOSQUE TERKENAL DENGAN PILGRIGAS TERGAH HIGRIAL TIDAK ADALAH DI SIMI DAN KONDIA DENGAN ISTIQL DARI MOSQUE DENGAN KOPASI TERKENTKepemimpinan, "kata humas BPPMI, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam?, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu menjelaskan bahwa kondisi malam 20 Februari 2017 hingga dini hari 21 Februari 2017, keamanan Masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang telah berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur tersebut.Jadi, para demonstran memahami dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah Masjid Istiqlal."BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana bagi para peziarah untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika umat Islam mengadakan tindakan 411, 212, atau 112. Tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini," tambahnya.Abu menambahkan, para administrator masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani rakyat dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah. "BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal di atas, tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.," Dia menjelaskan.Abu berharap bahwa umat Islam tidak akan dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak bertanggung jawab ini."Implementasi Doa Fajr di Formula Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Imam, Ustadz Salim Ghazali. Jumlah jamaah sekitar 240 orang atau 170 pria dan 70 wanita," katanya.

berita: The appearance of the game Pokemon Go at this time really took everyone's eyes off. In fact, not a few people are willing to quit their jobs just to play this game developed by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps and Niantic Labs. No wonder this game is used by people who are not right to spread oblique rumors. Like the news circulating recently. Also Read: Beware of Fake Pokemon Go Applications Roaming the PlayStore In the social media link, it is stated that Pokemon actually in Syriac (Suryani) means 'I am Jewish'. While Pikachu is said to mean 'Be a Jew', and Charmander means 'God is Weak'. Suddenly, Muslims in all corners of the world were infuriated by this news. So, is it true that Pokemon contains elements of words like that? Also Read: How to Play Pokemon Go In a statement to Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names are of ancient Syriac origin and have insulting Islamic meanings. In fact, church officials were surprised when they read a letter that said that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. So, it can be ascertained that the meanings of the word Pokemon characters do not have connotations that damage Islam. Also Read: DOWNLOAD THE GAME POKEMON GO This statement was also approved by a professor from Al Azhar University, Mohammed Abu Laila. "Until now, there is no strong evidence that justifies the rumors that make parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon Go game," he said. Then, what is the convey true meaning of Pokemon? Based on information from the Pokemondb.net site, Pokemon is a combination of the word "Pocket Monster" which means pocket monster. This term expresses how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Also Read: Pokemon Go Will Add New Features Then, said from Pikachu. This famous cute monster is composed of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name for a small mouse, while Chu is a Japanese word which means to squeak.
