As we can see, Pikachu's shape does resemble a mouse. And lastly, Charmander which consists of the words Char and Salamander. Char means to burn, and Salamander means amphibious lizard. Well, that's the true meaning of the word monster - Pokemon monster. Hopefully this explanation can make the hearts of Muslims in the world relieved. If you found this article useful, please share it!
berita_id: Penampilan permainan Pokemon Go saat ini benar -benar mengalihkan pandangan semua orang.Faktanya, tidak sedikit orang yang mau berhenti dari pekerjaan mereka hanya untuk memainkan permainan yang dikembangkan oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs ini.Tidak heran game ini digunakan oleh orang -orang yang tidak benar untuk menyebarkan rumor miring.Seperti berita yang beredar baru -baru ini.Baca juga: Waspadalah terhadap aplikasi Pokemon Go palsu yang berkeliaran di Playstore di tautan media sosial, dinyatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria (Suryani) berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi', dan Charmander berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Tiba -tiba, umat Islam di semua penjuru dunia marah dengan berita ini.Jadi, benarkah Pokemon berisi elemen kata -kata seperti itu?Baca juga: Cara Memainkan Pokemon GO dalam sebuah pernyataan ke surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berasal dari Syria kuno dan memiliki makna Islam yang menghina.Bahkan, para pejabat gereja terkejut ketika mereka membaca surat yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Jadi, dapat dipastikan bahwa makna kata -karakter kata pokemon tidak memiliki konotasi yang merusak Islam.Baca juga: Unduh game Pokemon Go Pernyataan ini juga disetujui oleh seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, Mohammed Abu Laila."Sampai sekarang, tidak ada bukti kuat yang membenarkan rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go," katanya.Lalu, apa yang disampaikan makna Pokemon yang sebenarnya?Berdasarkan informasi dari situs Pokemondb.net, Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata "monster saku" yang berarti monster saku.Istilah ini mengungkapkan betapa kecilnya monster ini agar muat di saku.Baca juga: Pokemon Go akan menambahkan fitur baru kemudian, kata Pikachu.Monster lucu yang terkenal ini terdiri dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama untuk tikus kecil, sedangkan Chu adalah kata Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Seperti yang bisa kita lihat, bentuk Pikachu memang menyerupai tikus.Dan terakhir, Charmander yang terdiri dari kata -kata Char dan Salamander.Char berarti membakar, dan salamander berarti kadal amfibi.Nah, itulah arti sebenarnya dari kata monster - monster pokemon.Semoga penjelasan ini dapat membuat hati Muslim di dunia lega.Jika Anda menemukan artikel ini bermanfaat, silakan bagikan!

berita: The basic salary of the president, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary to become Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest The income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000, so he will earn IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. income 64000 With p With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with leaders in other countries. In the RPP there are also new salary proposals for the Ministers, Attorney General, Commander of the Indonesian National Armed Forces, Chief of Police, Chairman of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR, Chairman of the DPD, and Chairman of the KPK. , Chairman of the BPK, Chairman of the Supreme Court and Chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is Rp. 92.2 million per month. Then for the Deputy Chairs of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK, MA and MK, they have an income index of 15333 and receive income IDR 88.3 million per month. Meanwhile, Deputy Ministers, Deputy Chief of Police, DPR Members, DPD Members, BPK Members, and Supreme Court Justices per month earn IDR 80.7 million with an income index of 14,000. Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN) -RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP, although he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of KemenPAN-RB, Herman Suryatman said that the information The RPP organization is not yet valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material that was held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 11/3/2018) As is known, the RPP for the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical rule of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the explanation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. requires further study. "Not only contains a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he asked. regions such as governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD and DPRD regencies or cities will also experience an increase Where for governors will earn Rp. 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then for deputy governors, regents/mayors, and chairman of the Provincial DPRD will earn income of Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. The deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, the chairman of the regency/municipal DPRD have a salary of Rp. Rp. 66.3 million. Finally, for district/city DPRD members, the salary that will be obtained is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public Policy Expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad), Yogi Suprayogi, assessed that although it is only a simulation, the increase in state officials is irrelevant. obtained by state officials is now enough "It's enough because there is an additional operating allowance al It's big It's what he likes No need to grow up It's irrelevant," he explained According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. billion," he said. Yogi said that compared to the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. According to him, the material for the RPP for the salaries and benefits of handmaiden civil servants currently circulating is one of the scenarios that are simulated by the government. the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP Salary and Allowance Yogi emphasizes the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. enlarged compared to the performance allowance. Currently the basic salary is smaller so that There are many civil servants going here and there to increase the performance allowance. Expensive allowance must be greater than the other two so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that the performance allowance must be based on performance. He reminded that no state should pay salaries based on education level. in some countries it is also partly performance-based In the United States, the salary of a civil servant in the State Department ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year The number of civil servants in Uncle Sama's country reaches 2.79 million people. US president around USD400000 The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001 Previously the president's salary was only USD200000 Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees amounting to 1.6 million In addition, he also provided a pension of 1000 ringgit per month y Those who have served for 25 years The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 1-4 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 10-19 years earn 70753 ringgit. The salary of civil servants who have just worked in Singapore is 3000 Singapore dollars per month. For a manager position, the salary is around SGD 8000. The number of employees in Singapore is 84,000. According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, public servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats. "They have high standards of discipline and accountability," said Friedman.

This week, content circulated on Facebook's timeline stating that this social media would be blocked or closed in Indonesia on April 24, 2018. The Ministry of Communication and Information finally spoke up about this news, and stated that it was fake news or a hoax. The Director General of Informatics Applications at the Ministry of Communications and Informatics, Semuel Abrijani Pangerapan, confirmed that the news that Internet access to Facebook would be closed on April 24 was false news. "It must be a hoax. Fake news," said Semuel to the coil (kumparan.com), Friday (20/4). In spreading this hoax, the perpetrators used a photo that seemed to be the headline of a newspaper with the headline "FB Indonesia will be shut down." The perpetrator then added the caption text: "April 24, 2018 at 00.00 WIB." There is also a user status update stating the same thing and until now it has been viral on Facebook, as shown below: Facebook blocked Semuel said the viral picture above does not clearly show the origins of the media and the source of the news. The Ministry of Communication and Information, as the regulator of Internet content in Indonesia, has never stated that it will block Facebook on April 24. DPR Opens Option to Ask Kominfo to Block Facebook 3 Important Figures Behind the Leak of 50 Million Facebook User Data Semuel said the Ministry of Communication and Information would indeed take firm steps to block Facebook if it was found that Facebook violated the law that harmed users in Indonesia in the case of data misuse by political consultant Cambridge Analytica to win Donald Trump in the 2016 US presidential election. "Like Minister Rudiantara's statement, (Facebook) will be temporarily blocked if there are findings of violation of the law or harm to Indonesian Facebook users," said Semuel. Facebook given until April 26 Facebook is currently being hit by a problem because there is a case of data misuse by Cambridge Analytica. The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent a second warning letter asking Facebook to submit the results of an audit of data misused by Cambridge Analytica, along with the Indonesian users who were affected. Facebook Indonesia is given until April 26 to submit the results of the audit. Facebook Indonesia management asked the government for time so that they first coordinate with Facebook management in the region. This data misuse is not only carried out by Cambridge Analytica, but the Ministry of Communication and Information also mentions that there are CubeYou and Aggregate IQ institutions that collect Facebook user data and then misuse it. Cambridge Analytica Case Cambridge Analytica collects Facebook user data through the psychological test quiz application This Is Your Digital Life, created by Cambridge University researcher Aleksandr Kogan. Through This Is Your Digital Life, Kogan managed to collect more than 50 million data in the form of likes, interests, user's birth date, to location. This data was then handed over to Cambridge Analytica by Kogan. The British political consultant then used data such as likes, location, date of birth of users, to target political advertisements aimed at improving Donald Trump's reputation and bringing down political opponents. INA Facebook Public Policy, Ruben Hattari. INA Facebook Public Policy, Ruben Hattari. (Photo: Iqbal Firdaus/coil) Facebook apologizes for the misuse of this data and promises to make improvements to privacy and promises to limit access rights for third-party applications that want to retrieve Facebook user data. Ruben Hattari, Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia, said there are around 748 Facebook users in Indonesia who have installed the This is Your Digital Life application. The application has been closed by Facebook since cambridge 2015.
berita_id: Minggu ini, konten yang diedarkan pada timeline Facebook yang menyatakan bahwa media sosial ini akan diblokir atau ditutup di Indonesia pada 24 April 2018. Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi akhirnya berbicara tentang berita ini, dan menyatakan bahwa itu adalah berita palsu atau tipuan.Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informatika di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika, Semuel Abrijani Pangerapan, mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita bahwa akses internet ke Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April adalah berita palsu."Itu pasti tipuan. Berita palsu," kata Semuel kepada koil (kumparan.com), Jumat (20/4).Dalam menyebarkan tipuan ini, para pelaku menggunakan foto yang tampaknya menjadi berita utama sebuah koran dengan judul "FB Indonesia akan ditutup."Pelaku kemudian menambahkan teks teks: "24 April 2018 pukul 00.00 WIB."Ada juga pembaruan status pengguna yang menyatakan hal yang sama dan sampai sekarang telah viral di Facebook, seperti yang ditunjukkan di bawah ini: Facebook diblokir Semuel mengatakan gambar viral di atas tidak dengan jelas menunjukkan asal -usul media dan sumber berita.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi, sebagai regulator konten Internet di Indonesia, tidak pernah menyatakan bahwa mereka akan memblokir Facebook pada 24 April. DPR membuka opsi untuk meminta Kominfo untuk memblokir angka -angka penting Facebook 3 di balik kebocoran 50 juta data pengguna Facebook, Semuel, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna dalam hal -hal yang melanggar hukum, dalam hal -hal yang merugikan, para pengguna yang merugikan, para pengguna yang merugikan, Facebook, melanggar undang -undang yang melanggar hukum, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna yang melanggar hukum, Facebook, melanggar undang -undang yang melanggar hukum, dan informasi yang merugikan para pengguna di Indones.Trump dalam pemilihan presiden AS 2016."Seperti pernyataan Menteri Rudiantara, (Facebook) akan diblokir sementara jika ada temuan pelanggaran hukum atau kerugian pada pengguna Facebook Indonesia," kata Semuel.Facebook yang diberikan hingga 26 April Facebook saat ini dipukul oleh masalah karena ada kasus penyalahgunaan data oleh Cambridge Analytica.Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim surat peringatan kedua yang meminta Facebook untuk mengirimkan hasil audit data yang disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, bersama dengan pengguna Indonesia yang terpengaruh.Facebook Indonesia diberikan hingga 26 April untuk mengirimkan hasil audit.Manajemen Facebook Indonesia meminta waktu kepada pemerintah sehingga mereka pertama kali berkoordinasi dengan manajemen Facebook di wilayah tersebut.Penyalahgunaan data ini tidak hanya dilakukan oleh Cambridge Analytica, tetapi Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi juga menyebutkan bahwa ada Cubeyou dan agregat lembaga IQ yang mengumpulkan data pengguna Facebook dan kemudian menyalahgunakannya.Cambridge Analytica Case Cambridge Analytica mengumpulkan data pengguna Facebook melalui aplikasi kuis tes psikologis ini adalah kehidupan digital Anda, yang dibuat oleh peneliti Universitas Cambridge Aleksandr Kogan.Melalui ini adalah kehidupan digital Anda, Kogan berhasil mengumpulkan lebih dari 50 juta data dalam bentuk suka, minat, tanggal lahir pengguna, ke lokasi.Data ini kemudian diserahkan ke Cambridge Analytica oleh Kogan.Konsultan politik Inggris kemudian menggunakan data seperti suka, lokasi, tanggal lahir pengguna, untuk menargetkan iklan politik yang bertujuan meningkatkan reputasi Donald Trump dan menjatuhkan lawan politik.Ina Kebijakan Publik Facebook, Ruben Hattari.Ina Kebijakan Publik Facebook, Ruben Hattari.(Foto: Iqbal Firdaus/Coil) Facebook meminta maaf atas penyalahgunaan data ini dan berjanji untuk melakukan perbaikan privasi dan berjanji untuk membatasi hak akses untuk aplikasi pihak ketiga yang ingin mengambil data pengguna Facebook.Ruben Hattari, Kepala Kebijakan Publik di Facebook Indonesia, mengatakan ada sekitar 748 pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang telah menginstal aplikasi ini adalah aplikasi kehidupan digital Anda.Aplikasi telah ditutup oleh Facebook sejak Cambridge 2015.

berita: A Facebook account named Rudi Salam shocked netizens with the news of the Blocking of Facebook Indonesia and the information was uploaded through his personal account on Saturday (14/4). In the description of his upload, Rudi Salam said that Facebook Indonesia would be closed starting April 24, 2018. “Starting April 24, Facebook Indonesia will reciprocal be closed. Welcome back to the stone age. Say goodbye to your friends on Facebook before they close," wrote Rudi Salam in the caption of his upload. However, the Minister of Communications and Informatics Rudiantara himself has not specified the exact date of the blocking of Mark Zuckerberg's social media account. Rudiantara had previously stated that he would block Facebook if it was proven that there was a violation of the applicable rules, but there has been no decision to block Facebook so far. Rudiantara said that he did not hesitate to block Facebook if Facebook was not responsive in dealing with hate speech using its platform. “Facebook admits there is a technique that Facebook is used for the Rohingya case in Myanmar. I said that should not happen in Indonesia. He does not want to repeat the same incident as the SARA conflict in Myanmar that arose as a result of the spread of hoaxes on Facebook. If there is mutual incitement between groups and so on, I don't care (with Facebook). I have no doubts about blocking or shutdown (of Facebook) if there are indications in that direction," said Rudiantara. Facebook has just met with Commission I of the House of Representatives to discuss the issue of data misuse of 1 million users in Indonesia. In the meeting held on Tuesday (17/4), no decision has been made to block Facebook either, but Commission I of the DPR has given a one-month deadline for the social media giant to submit the results of its data audit if its services do not want to be temporarily suspended.
berita_id: Akun Facebook bernama Rudi Salam terkejut netizens dengan berita pemblokiran Facebook Indonesia dan informasinya diunggah melalui akun pribadinya pada hari Sabtu (14/4).Dalam deskripsi unggahannya, Rudi Salam mengatakan bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup mulai 24 April 2018. “Mulai 24 April, Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup. Selamat datang kembali ke Zaman Batu. Ucapkan selamat tinggal kepada teman -teman Anda di Facebook sebelum mereka tutup,” tulis Rudi Salam dalam judul unggahannya.Namun, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika Rudiantara sendiri belum menentukan tanggal pasti pemblokiran akun media sosial Mark Zuckerberg.Rudiantara sebelumnya menyatakan bahwa ia akan memblokir Facebook jika terbukti bahwa ada pelanggaran aturan yang berlaku, tetapi belum ada keputusan untuk memblokir Facebook sejauh ini.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa dia tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook jika Facebook tidak responsif dalam berurusan dengan pidato kebencian menggunakan platformnya.“Facebook mengakui ada teknik bahwa Facebook digunakan untuk kasus Rohingya di Myanmar. Saya mengatakan itu tidak boleh terjadi di Indonesia. Dia tidak ingin mengulangi insiden yang sama dengan konflik Sara di Myanmar yang muncul sebagai akibat dari penyebaran yang ada di Facebook. Jika ada cuti yang tidak ada di antara kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook). Jika tidak ada cuti di antara kelompok -kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook). Jika saya tidak ada yang terkena dakwaan antara kelompok dan sebagainya, saya tidak peduli (dengan Facebook).Arah, "kata Rudiantara.Facebook baru saja bertemu dengan Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat untuk membahas masalah penyalahgunaan data terhadap 1 juta pengguna di Indonesia.Dalam pertemuan yang diadakan pada hari Selasa (17/4), tidak ada keputusan yang dibuat untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi Komisi I dari DPR telah memberikan tenggat waktu satu bulan bagi raksasa media sosial untuk mengirimkan hasil audit datanya jika layanannya tidak ingin ditangguhkan sementara.

berita: You may have heard the news that eating catfish can cause cancer. For those of you who like to eat catfish, news like this can certainly make you confused. Actually this issue is just a myth or fact, right? Come on, first check the truth of the issue of catfish that causes cancer below. Catfish is a freshwater fish that contains various important nutrients for the body, including protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and vitamin B complex. So, catfish itself actually does not contain toxins or harmful substances that are cancer-causing (carcinogenic) in the human body. However, a number of studies reveal that certain mudcat catfish can indeed increase your risk of developing cancer. This is because the catfish has been contaminated with carcinogenic substances, not because of the natural content in the catfish itself. So, not all types of catfish cause cancer. Catfish can be contaminated with carcinogenic substances because they are cultivated in waters that have been contaminated with various types of pollutants (pollution-causing substances). A team of experts from the University of Pittsburgh School of the Health Sciences in the United States proved this in their research. Experts take extracts of catfish that grow in waters that are already highly polluted. This extract is injected into breast cancer cells in the laboratory. The result, after being injected with contaminated catfish extract, it turns out that the cancer cells grow to multiply. After further investigation, it turns out that the catfish contains chemicals that are like the hormone estrogen in the human body. Estrogen levels that are too high in the body are known to increase the risk of breast cancer. The catfish tested by a team of experts was taken from waters that have been mixed with factory waste and human waste. So, this case is very similar to the case of mercury poisoning due to seafood consumption. The fish themselves are harmless. However, because water pollution has become so serious, the fish that live in these waters can also be polluted and eventually consumed by humans. Don't be afraid, only catfish from polluted waters can increase the risk of cancer. Meanwhile, catfish obtained from catfish farms are safe for consumption by you and your family. Currently, catfish farming in Indonesia is regulated and supervised by the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries. The government itself already has special requirements for catfish cultivation, for example water sources, cleanliness of facilities, use of chemicals, catfish feed, and others. This requirement is regulated in CBIB (Good Fish Cultivation Method). So as long as the fish you choose comes from a farm that has a CBIB certificate, you don't have to worry about the rumors of neighbors whispering that catfish causes cancer. Although catfish is considered safe for your health, it is sometimes difficult to determine which waters the catfish you are buying from. Therefore, it never hurts to reduce the risk by limiting how often you eat catfish. In general, catfish is safe to eat two to three times a week. In addition, you can also remove the skin of the catfish before it is processed into food. The problem is, fish skin is usually the most easily polluted by pollutant substances in dirty waters. You should also vary your choice of side dishes each day. The more varied, the richer and more balanced the nutritional intake for your family's body.
berita_id: Anda mungkin pernah mendengar berita bahwa makan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Bagi Anda yang suka makan lele, berita seperti ini pasti bisa membuat Anda bingung.Sebenarnya masalah ini hanyalah mitos atau fakta, bukan?Ayo, pertama -tama periksa kebenaran masalah ikan lele yang menyebabkan kanker di bawah ini.Lele adalah ikan air tawar yang mengandung berbagai nutrisi penting untuk tubuh, termasuk protein, asam lemak omega-3, dan kompleks vitamin B.Jadi, ikan lele itu sendiri sebenarnya tidak mengandung racun atau zat berbahaya yang menyebabkan kanker (karsinogenik) dalam tubuh manusia.Namun, sejumlah penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa ikan lele mudcat tertentu memang dapat meningkatkan risiko terkena kanker.Ini karena ikan lele telah terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik, bukan karena kandungan alami dalam lele itu sendiri.Jadi, tidak semua jenis ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Lele dapat terkontaminasi dengan zat karsinogenik karena mereka dibudidayakan di perairan yang telah terkontaminasi dengan berbagai jenis polutan (zat penyebab polusi).Sebuah tim ahli dari University of Pittsburgh School of Health Sciences di Amerika Serikat membuktikan hal ini dalam penelitian mereka.Para ahli mengambil ekstrak ikan lele yang tumbuh di perairan yang sudah sangat tercemar.Ekstrak ini disuntikkan ke dalam sel kanker payudara di laboratorium.Hasilnya, setelah disuntikkan dengan ekstrak ikan lele yang terkontaminasi, ternyata sel kanker tumbuh berkembang biak.Setelah penyelidikan lebih lanjut, ternyata ikan lele mengandung bahan kimia yang seperti estrogen hormon dalam tubuh manusia.Kadar estrogen yang terlalu tinggi di tubuh diketahui meningkatkan risiko kanker payudara.Lele yang diuji oleh tim ahli diambil dari perairan yang telah dicampur dengan limbah pabrik dan limbah manusia.Jadi, kasus ini sangat mirip dengan kasus keracunan merkuri karena konsumsi makanan laut.Ikan itu sendiri tidak berbahaya.Namun, karena polusi air telah menjadi begitu serius, ikan yang hidup di perairan ini juga dapat tercemar dan akhirnya dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Jangan takut, hanya ikan lele dari perairan yang tercemar yang dapat meningkatkan risiko kanker.Sementara itu, ikan lele yang diperoleh dari peternakan lele aman untuk dikonsumsi oleh Anda dan keluarga Anda.Saat ini, pertanian lele di Indonesia diatur dan diawasi oleh Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan.Pemerintah sendiri sudah memiliki persyaratan khusus untuk budidaya ikan lele, misalnya sumber air, kebersihan fasilitas, penggunaan bahan kimia, pakan ikan lele, dan lainnya.Persyaratan ini diatur dalam CBIB (metode budidaya ikan yang baik).Jadi selama ikan yang Anda pilih berasal dari pertanian yang memiliki sertifikat CBIB, Anda tidak perlu khawatir tentang rumor tetangga yang berbisik bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Meskipun ikan lele dianggap aman untuk kesehatan Anda, terkadang sulit untuk menentukan perairan mana ikan lele yang Anda beli.Karena itu, tidak ada salahnya untuk mengurangi risiko dengan membatasi seberapa sering Anda makan lele.Secara umum, ikan lele aman untuk makan dua hingga tiga kali seminggu.Selain itu, Anda juga dapat menghilangkan kulit ikan lele sebelum diproses menjadi makanan.Masalahnya adalah, kulit ikan biasanya yang paling mudah tercemar oleh zat polutan di perairan kotor.Anda juga harus memvariasikan pilihan lauk pilihan Anda setiap hari.Semakin bervariasi, semakin kaya dan lebih seimbang asupan nutrisi untuk tubuh keluarga Anda.

berita: Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". Thus the broadcast circulating on WhatsApp and social media, while along with the excitement of the Pokemon Go game. According to the broadcast, pokemon comes from the Syriac or Syriac language which means "I am Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "be a Jew". Actually, the polemic about the meaning of Pokemon has emerged since 2001, when Saudi Arabian clerics banned Pokemon because it was considered to be campaigning for the theory of evolution and considered Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Soon after, Pokemon comics and toys were taken to store shelves and orders were cancelled. Pokemon haram fatwas were also issued by scholars in Qatar, Dubai, Jordan and Egypt. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor at Egypt's Al Azhar University, found no evidence that Pokemon originated in Syriac and means "I'm Jewish". Nor is there any valid evidence that pikachu means "be a Jew." However, he agrees that Pokemon games spread atheist ideas and distance themselves from God. "From a parent's point of view, this game drives children away from God, and spreads atheist ideas," he was quoted as saying by the Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001.
berita_id: Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dengan demikian siaran yang beredar di WhatsApp dan media sosial, sementara bersama dengan kegembiraan game Pokemon Go.Menurut siaran, Pokemon berasal dari bahasa Syria atau Syria yang berarti "Saya Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sebenarnya, polemik tentang makna Pokemon telah muncul sejak tahun 2001, ketika ulama Arab Saudi melarang Pokemon karena dianggap berkampanye untuk teori evolusi dan dianggap sebagai propaganda Yahudi untuk menjauhkan anak -anak Muslim dari agama mereka.Segera setelah itu, komik dan mainan Pokemon dibawa ke rak toko dan pesanan dibatalkan.Fatwa Pokemon Haram juga dikeluarkan oleh para sarjana di Qatar, Dubai, Jordan dan Mesir.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor di Universitas Al Azhar di Mesir, tidak menemukan bukti bahwa Pokemon berasal dari Syria dan berarti "Saya Yahudi".Juga tidak ada bukti yang valid bahwa Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi."Namun, dia setuju bahwa game Pokemon menyebarkan ide -ide ateis dan menjauhkan diri dari Tuhan."Dari sudut pandang orang tua, permainan ini menjauhkan anak -anak dari Tuhan, dan menyebarkan ide -ide ateis," katanya seperti dikutip oleh Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001.

berita: Davao - Philippines, at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, a number of individuals burned Reog Ponorogo and its equipment. This burning took place last Tuesday [20/10] as reported by bitungnews.com The reason they burned Reog and its Gamelan was because they thought there was a devil in them and considered idols. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. When the Reog was burned, which is one of the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, no one from the Indonesian Consulate General's staff knew about it. As a result of this incident, the perpetrators were bombarded with insults and blasphemy by Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still felt innocent because according to them what they were doing was right in the eyes of God.  said bitungnews.com Until now there has been no specific clarification from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines. Indonesian citizens in Davao asked the Indonesian Consulate General to withdraw the persons involved in this arson.
berita_id: Davao - Filipina, di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, sejumlah orang membakar Reog Ponorogo dan peralatannya.Pembakaran ini terjadi Selasa lalu [20/10] seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Bitungnews.com alasan mereka membakar Reog dan gamelannya adalah karena mereka mengira ada iblis di dalamnya dan dianggap sebagai berhala.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Ketika Reog dibakar, yang merupakan salah satu inventaris museum budaya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada seorang pun dari staf Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia tentang hal itu.Sebagai akibat dari kejadian ini, para pelaku dibombardir dengan penghinaan dan penistaan ​​oleh warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena menurut mereka apa yang mereka lakukan tepat di mata Tuhan.kata bitungnews.com Sampai sekarang belum ada klarifikasi khusus dari konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina.Warga negara Indonesia di Davao meminta konsulat Jenderal Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam pembakaran ini.

berita: The call to uninstall the Traveloka application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. This started when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. His action to walk out was also reportedly attended by several other alumni. One of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, is said to have supported Ananda's walk out by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action that resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka also received a response from the company. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," Traveloka said in a statement received by Okezone. Meanwhile, regarding the support that Traveloka CTO reportedly gave to the pianist, Traveloka stated that the company prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect that are applied to all of its employees. “Responding to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the Kanisius College 90th Celebration event, we state respective that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders,” explained the company
berita_id: Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Ini dimulai ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya dalam perayaan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni dari Kanisius College.Tindakannya untuk keluar juga dilaporkan dihadiri oleh beberapa alumni lainnya.Salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang mengakibatkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka juga menerima tanggapan dari perusahaan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota."Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata Traveloka dalam sebuah pernyataan yang diterima oleh Okezone.Sementara itu, mengenai dukungan yang dilaporkan diberikan oleh Traveloka CTO kepada pianis, Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai rasa saling menghormati yang diterapkan pada semua karyawannya.Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di acara perayaan Kanisius College ke-90, kami menyatakan masing-masing bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal, "jelas perusahaan itu.

berita: Following up on complaints from a number of users who said that the iPhone 6 Plus easily bends when kept in a trouser pocket for too long, the United States (US) consumer complaints agency, Consumer Reports, held a series of trials. Consumer Reports conducted tests on 6 smartphones, namely the iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, and HTC One M8. All five were tested under load stresses ranging from 10 pounds (5 Kg) onwards until the device warped or even broke. According to a report published on the official consumerreports.org website, it is stated that the test results show that the two new iPhones, especially the iPhone 6 Plus, are not  as vulnerable as recently complained.
berita_id: Menindaklanjuti keluhan dari sejumlah pengguna yang mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah ditekuk ketika disimpan di saku celana terlalu lama, agen keluhan konsumen Amerika Serikat (AS), Consumer Reports, mengadakan serangkaian uji coba.Consumer Reports melakukan tes pada 6 smartphone, yaitu iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, dan HTC One M8.Kelima diuji di bawah tekanan beban mulai dari 10 pound (5 kg) dan seterusnya sampai perangkat melengkung atau bahkan pecah.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di situs web resmi ConsumerReports.org, dinyatakan bahwa hasil tes menunjukkan bahwa dua iPhone baru, terutama iPhone 6 Plus, tidak rentan seperti yang baru -baru ini dikeluhkan.

berita: Jakarta (ANTARA News) - The Head of the Criminal Investigation Unit of the National Police Komjen Pol Ari Dono Sukmanto said that the National Police still needed information from representatives of Facebook Indonesia user to complete the police investigation into the alleged leak of Facebook user data. The police are also likely to call the FB representative again for questioning. "We want to find information from several more people, there are representatives from FB," said Komjen Ari Dono at the National Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Thursday. Previously, on Wednesday (18/4), Ruben Hattari, Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia, was questioned by investigators from the Directorate of Cyber ​​Crime at the Criminal Investigation Department of the National Police for five hours regarding the alleged leak of Facebook user data. According to Ruben, Facebook Indonesia is currently conducting an internal audit regarding the alleged leak of one million Facebook user data in Indonesia. He ensured that he would be transparent in reporting the results of the audit to Dittipidsiber investigators, the Ministry of Communication and Information and the DPR. However, he could not confirm when the audit would be completed. The case of the alleged leak of FB user data is currently still under police investigation. Ari added that until now there have been no users of the Facebook social network in Indonesia whose data was stolen for certain purposes. The police have yet to receive reports from the public regarding the leak of FB user data. There are indications of the leak of one million Facebook user data from Indonesia in the Cambridge Analytica case. The number of Facebook users in Indonesia who access social media every month is estimated at more than 115 million people, from 2.07 billion people who access Facebook every month worldwide.
berita_id: JAKARTA (Antara News) - Kepala unit investigasi kriminal Kepolisian Nasional Komjen Pol Ari Dono Sukmanto mengatakan bahwa polisi nasional masih membutuhkan informasi dari perwakilan pengguna Facebook Indonesia untuk menyelesaikan penyelidikan polisi atas dugaan data pengguna Facebook.Polisi juga cenderung memanggil perwakilan FB lagi untuk ditanyai."Kami ingin menemukan informasi dari beberapa orang lagi, ada perwakilan dari FB," kata Komjen Ari Dono di markas Kepolisian Nasional, Jakarta, Kamis.Sebelumnya, pada hari Rabu (18/4), Ruben Hattari, kepala kebijakan publik di Facebook Indonesia, ditanyai oleh penyelidik dari Direktorat Kejahatan Cyber ​​di Departemen Investigasi Kriminal Polisi Nasional selama lima jam mengenai dugaan kebocoran data pengguna Facebook.Menurut Ruben, Facebook Indonesia saat ini sedang melakukan audit internal mengenai dugaan kebocoran satu juta data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Dia memastikan bahwa dia akan transparan dalam melaporkan hasil audit kepada penyelidik DittipidSiber, Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi dan DPR.Namun, dia tidak bisa mengkonfirmasi kapan audit akan selesai.Kasus dugaan kebocoran data pengguna FB saat ini masih dalam penyelidikan polisi.Ari menambahkan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada pengguna jejaring sosial Facebook di Indonesia yang datanya dicuri untuk tujuan tertentu.Polisi belum menerima laporan dari publik mengenai kebocoran data pengguna FB.Ada indikasi kebocoran satu juta data pengguna Facebook dari Indonesia dalam kasus Cambridge Analytica.Jumlah pengguna Facebook di Indonesia yang mengakses media sosial setiap bulan diperkirakan lebih dari 115 juta orang, dari 2,07 miliar orang yang mengakses Facebook setiap bulan di seluruh dunia.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke, namely sticking a needle, Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm yourself. Especially if the person who does it also has diabetes. It's not true that you can prevent stroke by inserting a needle. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at Siloam Hospital, Kebon Jeruk, denies it. Not true. If the heat of the blood vessels will spread but it will be normal again when the heat subsides. Only fainted cleave but not stroke because of the blood vessels. the lid is uploading
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke, yaitu menempelkan jarum, Dr. Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Terutama jika orang yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar bahwa Anda dapat mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Doctor Who berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam, Kebon Jeruk, menyangkalnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas pembuluh darah akan menyebar tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas mereda.Hanya celah pingsan tetapi tidak stroke karena pembuluh darah.Tutupnya mengunggah

berita: Social media in enounce Indonesia, especially Twitter, is currently being flooded a call to uninstall the Traveloka application. According to netizens, the CTO who is also one of the founders of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, said to support the walk out DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan is giving a speech at Canisius College school anniversary event. The news angered the netizens who said Derianto did not respect Anies and decided to many people uninstall the Traveloka application from their smart phones. I don't know where this information originally circulated, because it turned out to be just a hoax. Traveloka has confirmed that Derianto was not present at the event 90th anniversary of Canisius last Saturday (11/11). Is known, Derianto was invited to attend the event because he received an award as one of the outstanding alumni of Canisius. However, he was unable to attend because he was doing a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," write Traveloka's official statement. This means what is being rumored on social media about support Derianto about the walk out action is not true. Regarding the details of the action, according to the official statement of Colossians Canisius, conveyed that when Anies gave a speech, one of the alumni who is also a famous pianist Ananda Sukarlan decided to get up from his VIP seat and walk out. This action was then followed by hundreds of alumni and other invited guests who attended. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the place, the people who walked out earlier re-entered the room. Ananda Sukarlan himself became another alumnus who received the award in this event because they are considered outstanding in the field of music. This is evidence for the umpteenth time that hoaxes have succeeded affect the wider community in a short time. Without correct facts and information, people still easy to believe what is trending topic in social media without searching for the truth first.
berita_id: Media sosial di Enounce Indonesia, terutama Twitter, saat ini dibanjiri panggilan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Menurut Netizens, CTO yang juga merupakan salah satu pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang dikatakan mendukung Walk Out Out DKI Jakarta Gubernur Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di acara ulang tahun Sekolah Canisius College.Berita itu membuat marah para netizen yang mengatakan DeRianto tidak menghormati anies dan memutuskan untuk banyak orang menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dari ponsel pintar mereka.Saya tidak tahu di mana informasi ini awalnya beredar, karena ternyata hanya tipuan.Traveloka telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa DeRianto tidak hadir di acara 90th Anniversary of Canisius Sabtu lalu (11/11).Dikenal, Derianto diundang untuk menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia menerima penghargaan sebagai salah satu alumni Canisius yang luar biasa.Namun, dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia melakukan perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya, "Tulis pernyataan resmi Traveloka. Ini berarti apa yang dikabarkan pada media sosial tentang dukungan Deriianto tentang tindakan berjalan itu tidak benar. Mengenai rincian aksi, menurut Pernyataan Resmi dari Kolose Canisius, yang menyampaikan bahwa ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumni yang ada di Kolose, siapa yang disampaikan bahwa Anies, ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumia, siapa yang disampaikan oleh Anies.Kursi dan berjalan.Informasi, orang masih mudah dipercayai apa itu topik tren di media sosial tanpa mencari kebenaran terlebih dahulu.

berita: It is said that the salary of the Indonesian president will increase drastically from only Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. The information circulating stated that this increase was conveyed by the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform. However, Finance Minister Sri Mulyani, as quoted by Antara, said that until now there has been no and there has been no discussion about the increase in the President's salary. His party has never discussed the increase in the president's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3). Meanwhile, regarding the information from the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform which mentioned the increase in the president's salary, Sri Mulyani emphasized that it was a hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are a lot of social media that produce information, make documents that are made similar to those of the government declared that are published. So we have no discussion about it, absolutely nothing," said Mulyani. Previously, news circulated that the president's basic salary, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very small and is planning to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RPP on the Salary and Allowances for Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In the RPP, in addition to the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience a salary increase
berita_id: Dikatakan bahwa gaji presiden Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis hanya dari RP.62 juta hingga RP.553 juta.Informasi yang beredar menyatakan bahwa peningkatan ini disampaikan oleh Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi.Namun, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani, seperti dikutip oleh Antara, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada dan belum ada diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden.Partainya tidak pernah membahas peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan itu tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Bogor Presidential Palace, Senin (12/3).Sementara itu, mengenai informasi dari Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi yang menyebutkan peningkatan gaji presiden, Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, membuat dokumen yang dibuat serupa dengan yang dinyatakan oleh pemerintah yang diterbitkan. Jadi kami tidak berdiskusi tentang hal itu, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Mulyani.Sebelumnya, berita beredar bahwa gaji dasar presiden, yang hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan, saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan berencana untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Simulasi perubahan ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RPP tentang gaji dan tunjangan untuk pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Di RPP, selain presiden, wakil presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji

berita: Not yet finished the iPhone 5 was thrown into the market, Apple already has an idea for the 6th generation of their smartphone. Reportedly, Apple will introduce a new product with a curved touch screen democratic next year. The Californian company has contacted iPad and iPhone screen suppliers, Lens Technology, G-Tech and Fuji Crystal, and will supply them with equipment for polishing the indentation of the glass. The use of a touch screen with curved glass, according to some users feels more comfortable during phone calls. The indentation also protects the screen from scratches when the smartphone or tablet is placed face down. Corning, which provides scratch-resistant screens for a number of smartphones, has developed a curved version of their popular Gorilla Glass display. but it is not clear if this screen will be used in future Apple products. This is not the first time the design has been used on a smartphone device. Google and Samsung also provide the Nexus S smartphone with a concave screen. Dell has also played around with a curved display on the Venue Pro smartphone which has a Windows phone platform. Although the popularity of the concave screen seems to be increasing, some observers see the design as a temporary trend.
berita_id: Belum selesai iPhone 5 dilemparkan ke pasar, Apple sudah memiliki ide untuk generasi ke -6 dari smartphone mereka.Dilaporkan, Apple akan memperkenalkan produk baru dengan layar sentuh melengkung Demokrat tahun depan.Perusahaan California telah menghubungi pemasok layar iPad dan iPhone, teknologi lensa, G-Tech dan Fuji Crystal, dan akan memasok mereka dengan peralatan untuk memoles lekukan kaca.Penggunaan layar sentuh dengan kaca melengkung, menurut beberapa pengguna merasa lebih nyaman selama panggilan telepon.Indentasi juga melindungi layar dari goresan ketika smartphone atau tablet ditempatkan menghadap ke bawah.Corning, yang menyediakan layar tahan gores untuk sejumlah smartphone, telah mengembangkan versi melengkung dari tampilan kaca gorila populer mereka.Tetapi tidak jelas apakah layar ini akan digunakan dalam produk Apple di masa depan.Ini bukan pertama kalinya desain digunakan pada perangkat smartphone.Google dan Samsung juga menyediakan smartphone Nexus dengan layar cekung.Dell juga bermain -main dengan layar melengkung di smartphone Venue Pro yang memiliki platform Windows Phone.Meskipun popularitas layar cekung tampaknya meningkat, beberapa pengamat melihat desain sebagai tren sementara.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President finance of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a "hoax" or false news. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java, Monday (12/3). "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed," he said, according to a release received by kicknews.today. The Minister of Finance explained that at this time there were indeed many circulating information and documents that were made as if they came from government institutions. “What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, that's what it is. In today's social media, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. In the issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the Vice President is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji Presiden dan Wakil Presiden Keuangan Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi sebagai "tipuan" atau berita palsu.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Bogor Presidential Palace, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3)."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas," katanya, menurut rilis yang diterima oleh KickNews.today.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa pada saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, itulah yang terjadi. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Sebelumnya, secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia.Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP 553422694 per bulan.Sementara itu, wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: Behind the boom of Pokemon GO there is always controversy that accompanies it. Some even made things worse by circulating hoax issues that the games were cornering a certain group. There is news that says that Pokemon when interpreted means "I am Jewish" in Syriac. This case began around 2001, the Iraqi government strictly prohibited the showing of Pokemon cartoons because they had forbidden language meanings, including the names of monsters in Pokemon. Quoting from various sources, in democratic Syriac or Syriac, Pokemon means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu means "Be a Jew", and Charmander means "God is weak". You believe? However, many have denied the accusations. Because, there is no definite evidence that Pokemon if interpreted has a meaning that is considered insulting to Islam. In fact, Pokemon GO is nothing more than adorable Animals. Reporting from Pokemondb.net, Pokemon and the names of the existing monsters are a combination of Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. In a broader sense, it shows that Pokemon monsters are so small that they can be put in a pocket. Pikachu is the most popular monster in Pokemon and consists of two words, namely Pika and Chu. Pika means mouse, while Chu comes from Japanese which means to squeak. As we know, Pikachu is similar to a mouse. Charmander also consists of two words, namely Cha which means burning, and Salamander which means amphibious lizard. So, Charmander is an amphibious lizard that can burn. So, you better find out the truth first, check various sources, before deciding to share information. Share this article so that your friends are not affected by Hoax news that develops and corners certain religions. Make sure you surf smartly with Loop Apps which you can access without limits.
berita_id: Di balik ledakan Pokemon pergi, selalu ada kontroversi yang menyertainya.Beberapa bahkan membuat segalanya lebih buruk dengan beredar masalah tipuan yang membuat game memojokkan kelompok tertentu.Ada berita yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon ketika ditafsirkan berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria.Kasus ini dimulai sekitar tahun 2001, pemerintah Irak secara ketat melarang menunjukkan kartun Pokemon karena mereka memiliki makna bahasa yang dilarang, termasuk nama -nama monster di Pokemon.Mengutip dari berbagai sumber, di Syria Demokrat atau Syria, Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi", sementara Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Anda percaya?Namun, banyak yang membantah tuduhan itu.Karena, tidak ada bukti pasti bahwa Pokemon jika ditafsirkan memiliki makna yang dianggap menghina Islam.Faktanya, Pokemon Go tidak lebih dari hewan yang menggemaskan.Pelaporan dari Pokemondb.net, Pokemon dan nama -nama monster yang ada adalah kombinasi monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Dalam arti yang lebih luas, ini menunjukkan bahwa monster Pokemon sangat kecil sehingga dapat dimasukkan ke dalam saku.Pikachu adalah monster paling populer di Pokemon dan terdiri dari dua kata, yaitu Pika dan Chu.Pika berarti tikus, sementara Chu berasal dari bahasa Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Seperti yang kita ketahui, Pikachu mirip dengan mouse.Charmander juga terdiri dari dua kata, yaitu Cha yang berarti membakar, dan salamander yang berarti kadal amfibi.Jadi, Charmander adalah kadal amfibi yang bisa terbakar.Jadi, Anda lebih baik mencari tahu kebenarannya terlebih dahulu, periksa berbagai sumber, sebelum memutuskan untuk berbagi informasi.Bagikan artikel ini sehingga teman -teman Anda tidak terpengaruh oleh berita tipuan yang mengembangkan dan menyentuh agama -agama tertentu.Pastikan Anda berselancar dengan cerdas dengan aplikasi loop yang dapat Anda akses tanpa batas.

berita: A news related to the commotion at the Head of Mobile Brigade Headquarters terrorist detention center, Salemba branch, in Depok on Friday (11/10/2017) was spread in messaging application groups. The news said that the commotion was still going on and caused 3 blocks in the prison to catch fire. The news also stated that the trigger for the commotion was the throwing of the Koran by the guard. Responding to the news, the Karo Penmas Public Relations of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto spoke up. He confirmed that the news was a hoax. "It's a hoax," explained Rikwanto, Saturday (11/11/2017). Rikwanto explained that currently the condition of the terrorist detention center is conducive. There was no arson or fire in the commotion. "(The commotion) resulted in damage to the prison on that point facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken, the gate of the hallway block, broken windows in block C and block B," he explained. Meanwhile, the trigger for the commotion was the presence of a prisoner who did not accept it when the officers conducted a search. During the search, officers found 4 cell phones. "One of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there were members who were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked prisoners from the block next to them," said Rikwanto. The police then fired warning shots to warn the detainees. Fortunately, the commotion was suppressed by the police. Now, the situation in the terrorist prison is back to normal.
berita_id: Sebuah berita yang terkait dengan keributan di kepala pusat penahanan teroris Mobile Brigade Mobile Brigade, Cabang Salemba, di Depok pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017) tersebar dalam kelompok aplikasi pesan.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa keributan masih terjadi dan menyebabkan 3 blok di penjara terbakar.Berita itu juga menyatakan bahwa pemicu keributan adalah lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Menanggapi berita tersebut, Hubungan Masyarakat Karo Penmas dari Brigadir Jenderal Kepolisian Nasional Rikwanto berbicara.Dia mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan," jelas Rikwanto, Sabtu (11/11/2017).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa saat ini kondisi pusat penahanan teroris kondusif.Tidak ada pembakaran atau tembakan dalam keributan."(Keributan) mengakibatkan kerusakan pada penjara pada fasilitas titik itu, seperti pintu sel penjara yang rusak, gerbang blok lorong, jendela yang rusak di blok C dan blok B," jelasnya.Sementara itu, pemicu keributan adalah kehadiran seorang tahanan yang tidak menerimanya ketika para petugas melakukan pencarian.Selama pencarian, petugas menemukan 4 ponsel."Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memicu petugas dengan berbagai kata. Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," kata Rikwanto.Polisi kemudian menembakkan tembakan peringatan untuk memperingatkan para tahanan.Untungnya, keributan itu ditekan oleh polisi.Sekarang, situasi di penjara teroris kembali normal.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta recently. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels heating will spread, but it will be normal again when the heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta baru -baru ini.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pemanasan pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: The reog ponorogo art community in Jabodetabek, Monday (2/11) met with Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) officials to ask about the burning of reog instruments at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines. Director of Information and Media at the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Siti Sofia Sudarma, said that as many as six reog Ponorogo administrators met with her party to express their disappointment regarding the burning. During the meeting, the community also said that the burning hurt the feelings of the Reog Ponorogo community and was a form of destruction of cultural assets that became Indonesian cultural heritage. “They also gave a letter to the Foreign Minister and asked the Foreign Ministry to clarify this case, starting from the chronology, motive, to the perpetrators. We accommodate all their concerns and will convey the letter to the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Retno Marsudi)," he told Republika.co.id, Tuesday (3/11). Siti admitted that she had actually clear up clarified to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City by telephone. The Consul General, he said, admitted that he had committed the arson. He added that the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. When Siti said the reason, one of the community members who donated the equipment to the Consulate General denied it. Members of the community said the equipment was made in 2007 and was judged not to be too fragile. Siti in the near future will send a team to review directly to the field. This step also clarifies the burning of reog equipment. "We don't know when the team will go there, but what is clear is as soon as possible. We are just waiting for orders from the leadership," he said.
berita_id: Komunitas seni Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Jabodetabek, Senin (2/11) bertemu dengan para pejabat Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemenlu) untuk bertanya tentang pembakaran instrumen reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina.Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia, Siti Sofia Sudarma, mengatakan bahwa sebanyak enam administrator Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang bertemu dengan partainya untuk mengungkapkan kekecewaan mereka mengenai pembakaran.Selama pertemuan itu, masyarakat juga mengatakan bahwa pembakaran melukai perasaan komunitas Ponorogo yang reog dan merupakan bentuk penghancuran aset budaya yang menjadi warisan budaya Indonesia."Mereka juga memberikan surat kepada Menteri Luar Negeri dan meminta Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi kasus ini, mulai dari kronologi, motif, kepada para pelaku. Kami mengakomodasi semua keprihatinan mereka dan akan menyampaikan surat itu kepada Menteri Luar Negeri (Retno Marsudi)," katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (3/11).Siti mengakui bahwa dia benar -benar telah membersihkan yang diklarifikasi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Kota Davao melalui telepon.Konsul Jenderal, katanya, mengakui bahwa dia telah melakukan pembakaran.Dia menambahkan bahwa pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ketika Siti mengatakan alasannya, salah satu anggota masyarakat yang menyumbangkan peralatan kepada Konsulat Jenderal membantahnya.Anggota masyarakat mengatakan peralatan itu dibuat pada tahun 2007 dan dinilai tidak terlalu rapuh.Siti dalam waktu dekat akan mengirim tim untuk ditinjau langsung ke lapangan.Langkah ini juga mengklarifikasi pembakaran peralatan reog."Kami tidak tahu kapan tim akan pergi ke sana, tetapi yang jelas adalah sesegera mungkin. Kami hanya menunggu perintah dari kepemimpinan," katanya.

berita: After the boom of the Pokemon Go game, several issues began to emerge among lovers of the mobile game. Starting from the many victims because of Pokemon Go, to the assumption that Pokemon Go is Jewish. Hearing this, Pokemon Go players started looking for information about the issue of Pokemon being Jewish. As one of the game's players, Usama Harbatah is also looking for information on this issue. In the following video, Usama Harbatah clarifies the issue which he considers slander. At first, Usama heard rumors that the name Pokemon is a combination of the word syriac which means I am a Jew. He searched for the meaning of the word Pokemon from Syriac to English, but couldn't find the meaning. In addition to the word pokemon, he also looked for the names of Pikachu, Charmander and others, but also found nothing. In addition, he also argues that pokemon games that are considered to steal personal data safety are just feelings. Because basically social media has stolen the personal data of all its users. In this video, Usama Harbatah also provides tips for safe playing Pokemon Go. Here's a video clarification of Usama Harbatah about the notion that Pokemon are Jews.
berita_id: Setelah permainan booming Pokemon Go, beberapa masalah mulai muncul di antara para pecinta game mobile.Mulai dari banyak korban karena Pokemon Go, dengan asumsi bahwa Pokemon Go adalah orang Yahudi.Mendengar ini, pemain Pokemon Go mulai mencari informasi tentang masalah Pokemon menjadi Yahudi.Sebagai salah satu pemain permainan, Usama Harbatah juga mencari informasi tentang masalah ini.Dalam video berikut, Usama Harbatah mengklarifikasi masalah yang ia anggap fitnah.Pada awalnya, Usama mendengar desas -desus bahwa nama Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata Syria yang berarti saya seorang Yahudi.Dia mencari arti kata Pokemon dari Syria ke Bahasa Inggris, tetapi tidak dapat menemukan artinya.Selain kata Pokemon, ia juga mencari nama Pikachu, Charmander dan lainnya, tetapi juga tidak menemukan apa pun.Selain itu, ia juga berpendapat bahwa game Pokemon yang dianggap mencuri keamanan data pribadi hanyalah perasaan.Karena pada dasarnya media sosial telah mencuri data pribadi semua penggunanya.Dalam video ini, Usama Harbatah juga menyediakan tips untuk bermain Pokemon GO yang aman.Berikut klarifikasi video Usama Harbatah tentang gagasan bahwa Pokemon adalah orang Yahudi.

berita: Is it true that every bite of catfish meat can trigger 3000 cancer cells in our body? Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was 29.98 kg/capita/ year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant mudcat women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Benarkah setiap gigitan daging ikan lele dapat memicu 3000 sel kanker dalam tubuh kita?Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, meningkat dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Konsumsi Menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) adalah 29,98 KG/CAPIT, sesuai dengan statistik sentral (bps) 29,98 KG/tahun, CapiT dari Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) adalah 29,98 KG/CAPIT, menurut statistik sentral (bps) 29,98 KG/KG.2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios ikan lele Pecel telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita mudcat hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually approved. The amount is stated in the RPP material. the presidential salary index of 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law No. 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, drawing card and BPK). The official receives a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. , this amount has not changed since 2001 the amount of salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia, is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year After Lee, there was Doris Leuthard, President of Switzerland who recorded a salary of USD 437,000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull with a salary of USD 403,700 or IDR 5.5 billion per year President Jokowi's salary is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year while United States President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, namely USD 1 per year. Of course, this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal wealth of around USD 3 billion. Public policy observer from the University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah said that it is very natural for the President to have a very large income index. Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said he was both head of state and head of state He is the government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large, so according to him it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, his salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further on the civil servant salary increase scheme, the president and other state officials Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it.
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sipil sebenarnya disetujui.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, menemukan angka RP 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum No. 7 tahun 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, kartu gambar dan BPK).Pejabat itu menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000., Jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001 jumlah gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia, relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara utama di Perdana Menteri Dunia (PM) Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss yang mencatat gaji USD 437.000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau IDR 5,5 miliar per tahun gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun sementara Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald mencatat pendapatan terkecil, namanya USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja, ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik dari University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan bahwa sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan dia adalah kepala negara dan kepala negara dia adalah pemerintah, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar, jadi menurutnya tidak wajar bagi pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, gajinya lebih besar daripada presiden.Istana belum dapat mengomentari lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji pegawai negeri, presiden dan juru bicara presiden pejabat negara lainnya Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu.

berita: Hoax messages are also circulating on social media about sticking needles in the fingers of stroke patients and bleeding one or two endeavour drops of blood. The puncture is usually in the area under the earlobe or fingers. It is said that he can launch and help oxygen enter the body. Even though a stroke can occur because there is a blockage or even a blood vessel burst. Of course, if this information is true, many people will be able to recover from a stroke in an inexpensive way. If this information is wrong, then you are hurting other people and doing useless things. Until there is a video on how to insert a needle into a stroke patient's body. Maybe his intentions are good, considering that stroke is a disease that should not be treated too late and must be treated as soon as possible. Because the effects of a stroke are permanent. There are also those who believe that if you have been stabbed, the blood will come out, it will help improve blood flow. But when it's that easy, with a needle can make a stroke person recover. It's not possible right? Ladies and gentlemen, blood clots are not as imagined and trivial. Needle sticking is just to keep the patient awake and book first aid for stroke patients. Instead of helping people who are in trouble, they add new problems. This method of stabbing with a needle can actually harm people having a stroke. If it is true that you have had a stroke, don't pretend to know if you don't know. Immediately take him to the hospital for proper treatment. Sticking a needle under the ear or finger actually slows down the treatment time for a more competent medical team. Not to belittle it, but just look for it to be safe! So that you don't take the wrong action and don't be weird, make sure it's the FAST way. What is FAST? Let's first look at F (Face), pay attention to the person's face. If the face becomes turned or tilted, this is a sign that someone has had a stroke. Stroke is a disease that attacks the nerves. A (Arm), try to raise the hand of the person who had a stroke.
