If he is unable to hold his hand forward, then the person is likely to have a stroke. If that person can't hold both hands, after you let go, or maybe only one of them, it's to determine the symptoms of a stroke only on one side (half) or on both sides. S (Speech), pay attention when speaking whether slurred. If he suddenly has difficulty speaking and is slurred, he may have a stroke. Physically it can be seen if the person's mouth turns slanted, this is a clear symptom too. T (Time), if seen from the physical characteristics there are changes as above, the faster the handling will be the better. Until now there has been no official reference that suggests the needling method as first aid in stroke patients. Strokes that are not treated immediately can even worsen the condition. Moreover, just silenced without treatment. If you have had a stroke, you may experience slurred, difficult limbs to move. This kind of pain is certainly inconvenient and uncomfortable. It would be better if you can prevent this stroke by maintaining a lifestyle from now on. What is certain is that prevention is better than cure. Always make sure it's in good health
berita_id: Pesan tipuan juga beredar di media sosial tentang menempelkan jarum di jari -jari pasien stroke dan berdarah satu atau dua tetes darah usaha.Tusukan biasanya berada di daerah di bawah daun telinga atau jari.Dikatakan bahwa ia dapat meluncurkan dan membantu oksigen memasuki tubuh.Meskipun stroke dapat terjadi karena ada penyumbatan atau bahkan pembuluh darah meledak.Tentu saja, jika informasi ini benar, banyak orang akan dapat pulih dari stroke dengan cara yang murah.Jika informasi ini salah, maka Anda menyakiti orang lain dan melakukan hal -hal yang tidak berguna.Sampai ada video tentang cara memasukkan jarum ke dalam tubuh pasien stroke.Mungkin niatnya baik, mengingat stroke adalah penyakit yang tidak boleh diobati terlambat dan harus dirawat sesegera mungkin.Karena efek stroke bersifat permanen.Ada juga orang -orang yang percaya bahwa jika Anda ditikam, darah akan keluar, itu akan membantu meningkatkan aliran darah.Tetapi ketika semudah itu, dengan jarum dapat membuat orang stroke pulih.Itu tidak mungkin kan?Hadirin sekalian, gumpalan darah tidak seperti yang dibayangkan dan sepele.Menempel jarum hanya untuk menjaga pasien tetap terjaga dan memesan pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke.Alih -alih membantu orang yang bermasalah, mereka menambahkan masalah baru.Metode penikaman dengan jarum ini benar -benar dapat membahayakan orang yang mengalami stroke.Jika benar Anda mengalami stroke, jangan berpura -pura tahu jika Anda tidak tahu.Segera bawa dia ke rumah sakit untuk perawatan yang tepat.Menempelkan jarum di bawah telinga atau jari sebenarnya memperlambat waktu perawatan untuk tim medis yang lebih kompeten.Bukan untuk meremehkannya, tapi hanya mencari itu untuk aman!Sehingga Anda tidak mengambil tindakan yang salah dan jangan aneh, pastikan itu cara yang cepat.Apa itu cepat?Pertama -tama mari kita lihat f (wajah), perhatikan wajah orang tersebut.Jika wajah menjadi berbalik atau miring, ini adalah tanda bahwa seseorang mengalami stroke.Stroke adalah penyakit yang menyerang saraf.A (lengan), cobalah untuk mengangkat tangan orang yang mengalami stroke.Jika dia tidak dapat memegang tangannya ke depan, maka orang tersebut cenderung mengalami stroke.Jika orang itu tidak dapat memegang kedua tangan, setelah Anda melepaskan, atau mungkin hanya satu dari mereka, itu untuk menentukan gejala stroke hanya di satu sisi (setengah) atau di kedua sisi.S (pidato), perhatikan saat berbicara apakah tidak jelas.Jika dia tiba -tiba mengalami kesulitan berbicara dan tidak bersalah, dia mungkin mengalami stroke.Secara fisik dapat dilihat jika mulut orang itu berubah miring, ini juga merupakan gejala yang jelas.T (waktu), jika dilihat dari karakteristik fisik ada perubahan seperti di atas, semakin cepat penanganannya akan lebih baik.Sampai sekarang belum ada referensi resmi yang menunjukkan metode tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Stroke yang tidak dirawat segera bahkan dapat memperburuk kondisinya.Apalagi dibungkam tanpa perawatan.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, Anda mungkin mengalami cadel, anggota tubuh yang sulit untuk bergerak.Rasa sakit semacam ini tentu saja tidak nyaman dan tidak nyaman.Akan lebih baik jika Anda dapat mencegah stroke ini dengan mempertahankan gaya hidup dari sekarang.Yang pasti adalah pencegahan lebih baik daripada Cure.Selalu pastikan itu dalam kesehatan yang baik

berita: Komuniras Reog Ponorogo (KRP) plans to hold a demonstration at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Office on Jalan Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/11/2015) tomorrow at 09.30. "Our main visit to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs is to clarify the incident of the Reog Ponorogo property burning at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Southern Philippines," said Deputy Chairperson of the Greater Jakarta electrocution KRP, S Nojeng to Surya, Sunday (1/11/2015). As previously reported, the Reog Ponorogo property which consisted of a sudden peacock, barong and gayor carved with a dragon was burned by the staff of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines on Tuesday (20/10/2015). The reason for the burning is because barong reog, dadak peacock and gayor carved dragon snakes, to exorcise demons and dragon carvings for idols. However, the news circulating in online media was clarified and confirmed on Saturday (30/10/2015) by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites, wrote the Indonesian Consulate General Davao considering the age of reog has existed since 1988. But apart from that, all KRP will still clarify the extent of the truth, and the actual chronology of the events that. We want to solve this problem immediately and don't let the problem drag on. Moreover, Reog Ponorogo has become part of the arts in Indonesia which has gone global, said Nojeng. According to Jojeng, this problem also disturbed friends in the Reog Ponorogo community. Even the reog art community in Ponorogo, East Java itself, as well as outside Jakarta and Ponorogo, many have questioned about the arson incident. According to the man who was born in Tambakbayan, Ponorogo City, he said that there are several things that will be done at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs later, including: Requesting information and clarification as well as the actual chronology of the incident. Placing banners in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs area. and gayor Doing testimony of artist Reog Ponorogo who has performed in Davao in 2007.
berita_id: Komuniras Reog Ponorogo (KRP) berencana untuk mengadakan demonstrasi di Kantor Urusan Luar Negeri di Jalan Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/11/2015) besok pukul 09.30."Kunjungan utama kami ke Kementerian Luar Negeri adalah untuk mengklarifikasi insiden properti Reog Ponorogo yang terbakar di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina Selatan," kata Wakil Ketua dari Greater Jakarta Electricution KRP, S Nojeng ke Surya, Minggu (1/11/2015).Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, properti Reog Ponorogo yang terdiri dari merak tiba -tiba, Barong dan Gayor yang diukir dengan naga dibakar oleh staf Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina pada hari Selasa (20/10/2015).Alasan pembakaran adalah karena Barong Reog, Dadak Peacock dan Gayor mengukir naga ular, untuk mengusir setan dan ukiran naga untuk berhala.Namun, berita yang beredar di media online diklarifikasi dan dikonfirmasi pada hari Sabtu (30/10/2015) oleh Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Penghancuran oleh Burning harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog dalam kondisi yang rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap, menulis konsulat Indonesia Jenderal Davao mengingat zaman Reog telah ada sejak 1988. Tetapi terlepas dari itu, semua KRP masih akan mengklarifikasi sejauh mana kebenaran, dan kronologi aktual dari peristiwa itu.Kami ingin menyelesaikan masalah ini dengan segera dan tidak membiarkan masalah berlarut -larut.Selain itu, Reog Ponorogo telah menjadi bagian dari seni di Indonesia yang telah menjadi global, kata Nojeng.Menurut Jojeng, masalah ini juga mengganggu teman -teman di komunitas Reog Ponorogo.Bahkan komunitas seni reog di Ponorogo, Java Timur sendiri, serta di luar Jakarta dan Ponorogo, banyak yang mempertanyakan tentang insiden pembakaran.Menurut pria yang lahir di Tambakbayan, Ponorogo City, ia mengatakan bahwa ada beberapa hal yang akan dilakukan di Kementerian Luar Negeri nanti, termasuk: meminta informasi dan klarifikasi serta kronologi aktual dari insiden tersebut.Menempatkan spanduk di wilayah Urusan Luar Negeri.dan Gayor melakukan kesaksian artis Reog Ponorogo yang telah tampil di Davao pada tahun 2007.

berita: Terrorist inmates at the Mako Brimob Detention Center Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta, rioted in their cells on Friday (11/10/2017). A number of videos and photos of the riots went viral on social media. A number of accounts that spread the video on social media said the riots occurred because officers threw the Koran. However, the Head of the Public Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Comr. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the throwing of the Koran by the prison guard was not true or a hoax. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. The riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the terrorist prisoners, who did not accept the search. "The turmoil captive that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Head of the Public Information Bureau (Karopenmas) Brigadier General Rikwanto said the riot started after Friday prayers in congregation. After the prayer, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the cell, the picket officer who is a member of Densus 88 removed the keys in Rooms A5 and C5. "The key was removed because there was a key slot from the inside, for security and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door," said Rikwanto. At that time, a search was also carried out in the two detention rooms, and four cell phones belonging to four terrorist prisoners were found. "During the search, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words," he said. Then, one of the picket officers was provoked by the words of the inmate and fired a bullet up to warn other officers of a commotion. Rikwanto, the riot did not last long because it was quickly resolved.
berita_id: Narapidana teroris di Cabang Penahanan Mako Brimob Salemba, Jakarta Tengah, kerusuhan di sel -sel mereka pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017).Sejumlah video dan foto kerusuhan menjadi viral di media sosial.Sejumlah akun yang menyebarkan video di media sosial mengatakan kerusuhan terjadi karena petugas melemparkan Alquran.Namun, Kepala Bagian Informasi Publik (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Comr.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga penjara itu tidak benar atau tipuan."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Kerusuhan yang terjadi pada Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan teroris, yang tidak menerima pencarian."Tawanan kekacauan yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Kepala Brigadir Jenderal Biro Informasi Publik (Karopenmas) Rikwanto mengatakan kerusuhan dimulai setelah doa Jumat di jemaat.Setelah doa, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah memasuki sel, petugas piket yang merupakan anggota Densus 88 menghapus kunci di kamar A5 dan C5."Kuncinya dihapus karena ada slot kunci dari dalam, untuk keamanan dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel," kata Rikwanto.Pada waktu itu, pencarian juga dilakukan di dua ruang penahanan, dan empat ponsel termasuk empat tahanan teroris ditemukan."Selama pencarian, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai kata," katanya.Kemudian, salah satu petugas piket diprovokasi oleh kata -kata narapidana dan menembakkan peluru untuk memperingatkan perwira keributan lainnya.Rikwanto, kerusuhan tidak bertahan lama karena dengan cepat diselesaikan.

berita: The rampant free sale of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs has prompted a public elementary school (SD) in Banyumas, Central Java, to take quick steps by conducting raids in the canteen around the school on Wednesday (08/03/2017). During the raid, the teacher of SD Negeri 1 Kracak, Banyumas, also gave directions to students about the dangers of drug candy, the teachers asked them not to sell candy scholar and packaged drinks suspected of containing drugs. Rumini, a trader at SDN 1 Kracak, admitted that he had not sold it since he learned about the dangers of the children's snacks. "I don't sell it, they say why it contains weird stuff, I sell other snacks that are common," he said. Separately, the Principal of SDN 1 Kracak Wanto Tirta gathered the students and gave an explanation about the dangerous content in the candy. "The school hopes that this activity can anticipate as early as possible the circulation of drugs in the school environment, besides that it also educates children to eat healthy and nutritious snacks," he concluded.
berita_id: Penjualan dot bebas yang merajalela yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan telah mendorong sekolah dasar umum (SD) di Banyumas, Jawa Tengah, untuk mengambil langkah cepat dengan melakukan penggerebekan di kantin di sekitar sekolah pada hari Rabu (08/03/2017).Selama penggerebekan, guru SD Negeri 1 Kracak, Banyumas, juga memberikan arahan kepada siswa tentang bahaya permen narkoba, para guru meminta mereka untuk tidak menjual Candy Scholar dan minuman kemasan yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Rumini, seorang pedagang di SDN 1 Kracak, mengakui bahwa dia belum menjualnya sejak dia mengetahui tentang bahaya makanan ringan anak -anak."Saya tidak menjualnya, mereka mengatakan mengapa itu berisi barang -barang aneh, saya menjual makanan ringan lain yang biasa," katanya.Secara terpisah, kepala sekolah SDN 1 Kracak Wanto Tirta mengumpulkan para siswa dan memberikan penjelasan tentang konten berbahaya dalam permen."Sekolah berharap bahwa kegiatan ini dapat mengantisipasi sedini mungkin sirkulasi obat -obatan di lingkungan sekolah, selain itu juga mendidik anak -anak untuk makan makanan ringan yang sehat dan bergizi," pungkasnya.

berita: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Remember the crooked cellphone phenomenon that happened to the iPhone 6 Plus? Galaxy S6 Edge owners can also experience the same thing. The initial launch of the iPhone 6 Plus was immediately hit by an unpleasant issue, namely the body of the cellphone which turned out to be easy to bend when pressed. This apparently also happened to the latest Samsung phones. SquareTrade, an electronics company, conducted tests on the iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. All three try to be pressed with the same machine. From the results of these tests, it can be  seen that the iPhone 6 Plus starts to bend when it receives a pressure of 50 Kg, and looks broken when pressed up to 81 Kg. While the Galaxy S6 Edge turns out to have the same resistance. The screen and body look completely damaged when under pressure weighing 81 Kg. "Is this the second bendgate issue? No. Samsung fans will experience worse, they will not find a bent phone, but a broken glass in their pocket," said the voice actor in the video. As for the HTC One M9. The screen already looks bent when it takes 54 kg of pressure, and because the power button is right in the middle, the damage prevents the phone from working at all. Here is a video of the testing done by SquareTrade From the results of these tests, it can be seen that the scathing criticism directed at Apple about the iPhone 6 Plus being easily bent was also experienced by its competitors, the Galaxy S6 Edge and HTC One M9. But it should also be noted. Even to make the three phones curved is not easy, because it requires quite hard pressure at one point.
berita_id: JAKARTA, CNN Indonesia - Ingat fenomena ponsel bengkok yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus?Pemilik Galaxy S6 Edge juga dapat mengalami hal yang sama.Peluncuran awal iPhone 6 Plus segera dilanda masalah yang tidak menyenangkan, yaitu tubuh ponsel yang ternyata mudah ditekuk saat ditekan.Ini tampaknya juga terjadi pada ponsel Samsung terbaru.Squaretrade, sebuah perusahaan elektronik, melakukan tes pada iPhone 6 Plus, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Ketiganya mencoba ditekan dengan mesin yang sama.Dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mulai menekuk ketika menerima tekanan 50 kg, dan terlihat rusak ketika ditekan hingga 81 kg.Sementara Galaxy S6 Edge ternyata memiliki resistensi yang sama.Layar dan tubuh terlihat benar -benar rusak ketika di bawah tekanan dengan berat 81 kg."Apakah ini masalah Bendgate kedua? Tidak. Penggemar Samsung akan mengalami lebih buruk, mereka tidak akan menemukan telepon bengkok, tetapi pecahan gelas di saku mereka," kata aktor suara dalam video.Adapun HTC One M9.Layar sudah terlihat bengkok ketika mengambil tekanan 54 kg, dan karena tombol daya tepat di tengah, kerusakan mencegah ponsel bekerja sama sekali.Berikut adalah video pengujian yang dilakukan oleh Squaretrade dari hasil tes ini, dapat dilihat bahwa kritik pedas yang diarahkan pada Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah ditekuk juga dialami oleh para pesaingnya, Galaxy S6 Edge dan HTC One M9.Tapi itu juga harus dicatat.Bahkan untuk membuat tiga ponsel melengkung tidak mudah, karena membutuhkan tekanan yang cukup keras pada satu titik.

berita: When it was first launched two years ago, the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus were heavily criticized for the 'bendgate' screen case. Now, the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus are again reported to have screen problems that are no less severe. Julia Bluff from iFixit, a leading gadget service provider, stated that many iPhone 6 lines that are almost two years old are affected by the 'Touch Disease' problem. iPhone 6 affected by Touch Disease, the touch screen is called not working. Unfortunately, while iFixit can perform repairs, most cases require users to replace their iPhones. iFixit explained that Touch Disease occurs because the two chips responsible for the touchscreen feature on the iPhone 6 are damaged or not connected to each other. Apparently, Touch Disease is said to be enounce related to the 'bendgate' problem. Yes, the body of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, which is weaker than other iPhone series, indirectly causes the circuit board to bend, making the chip or solder connection break. Ironically, Apple authorized stores and Apple authorized service centers are said to not have adequate equipment to carry out repairs. Because the Touch Disease problem requires the technician to disassemble the iPhone, and it's not an easy matter. Some 'victims' of Touch Disease on the Apple Forum also regret the difficulty of finding a warranty claim for this problem because the curved or bent iPhone is categorized as a user error. In order to get around this problem, there is a user who was forced to put a rubber band on his iPhone 6 Plus so that the screen can still work. As seen in the following image.
berita_id: Ketika pertama kali diluncurkan dua tahun lalu, iPhone 6 dan 6 Plus sangat dikritik untuk kasus layar 'Bendgate'.Sekarang, iPhone 6 dan 6 Plus dilaporkan memiliki masalah layar yang tidak kalah parah.Julia Bluff dari Ifixit, penyedia layanan gadget terkemuka, menyatakan bahwa banyak jalur iPhone 6 yang hampir dua tahun dipengaruhi oleh masalah 'penyakit sentuh'.iPhone 6 Dipengaruhi oleh penyakit sentuh, layar sentuh disebut tidak berfungsi.Sayangnya, sementara IFIXIT dapat melakukan perbaikan, kebanyakan kasus mengharuskan pengguna untuk mengganti iPhone mereka.Ifixit menjelaskan bahwa penyakit sentuh terjadi karena dua chip yang bertanggung jawab untuk fitur layar sentuh pada iPhone 6 rusak atau tidak terhubung satu sama lain.Rupanya, penyakit sentuh dikatakan berkaitan dengan masalah 'bendgate'.Ya, tubuh iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus, yang lebih lemah dari seri iPhone lainnya, secara tidak langsung menyebabkan papan sirkuit menekuk, membuat chip atau koneksi solder istirahat.Ironisnya, Apple Stores Resmi dan Pusat Layanan Resmi Apple dikatakan tidak memiliki peralatan yang memadai untuk melakukan perbaikan.Karena masalah penyakit sentuh membutuhkan teknisi untuk membongkar iPhone, dan itu bukan masalah yang mudah.Beberapa 'korban' penyakit sentuh di forum Apple juga menyesali kesulitan menemukan klaim garansi untuk masalah ini karena iPhone melengkung atau bengkok dikategorikan sebagai kesalahan pengguna.Untuk mengatasi masalah ini, ada pengguna yang terpaksa meletakkan karet gelang di iPhone 6 Plus sehingga layar masih bisa berfungsi.Seperti yang terlihat pada gambar berikut.

berita: The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) has completed the process of laboratory examination of pacifiers suspected of containing drug substances. Based on the results of the examination, BNN stated that the pacifier candy did not contain drugs. "After testing at the Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency, it was concluded that the candy sample was negative, or did not contain narcotics or other psychoactive ingredients," said Head of the BNN Public Relations Division, Kombes restrain Pol Slamet Pribadi to VIVA.co.id, Thursday, March 9, 2017. Slamet said, apart from laboratory tests, another thing that confirms that pacifiers do not contain drugs is that they are circulated through official channels and have received official distribution permits. "Some cases of food types are often used as a modus operandi for narcotics syndicates. But usually these products are sold illegally and at prices that are certainly different from market prices," he said. Even so, BNN still asks parents to always monitor the association of their sons and daughters. Likewise with other related parties, such as schools, RT environments, RW neighborhoods, to religious leaders, community leaders, traditional leaders, youth leaders to be able to help monitor the surrounding environment, in order to avoid the dangers of drug abuse. "BNN appeals to the public to remain vigilant against various modes of illicit drug trafficking that are increasingly diverse," he said. As previously reported, bottled candy pacifiers are suspected of containing drugs circulating in the city of Surabaya. The candy dot was found by the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) of Surabaya City, while conducting raids in 14 sub-districts. The raid was held after an elementary school (SD) student experienced dizziness after eating the candy. Not only in Surabaya, dot candy has also been circulated in a number of other cities such as Mojokerto and Bekasi, West Java.
berita_id: Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) telah menyelesaikan proses pemeriksaan laboratorium dot yang diduga mengandung zat obat.Berdasarkan hasil pemeriksaan, BNN menyatakan bahwa permen dot tidak mengandung obat."Setelah pengujian di Laboratorium Narkotika Badan Narkotika Nasional, disimpulkan bahwa sampel permen negatif, atau tidak mengandung narkotika atau bahan -bahan psikoaktif lainnya," kata kepala divisi Public Hubungan BNN, Kombes yang mengonfirmasi hal -hal lain dari Slamet Pribadi ke Viva.co.id, Kamis, 2017, 2017. 2017. Pol Slamet Pribadi ke Viva.co.id, Kamis, Maret, 2017. 2017.Tidak mengandung obat adalah bahwa mereka diedarkan melalui saluran resmi dan telah menerima izin distribusi resmi."Beberapa kasus jenis makanan sering digunakan sebagai modus operandi untuk sindikat narkotika. Tetapi biasanya produk -produk ini dijual secara ilegal dan dengan harga yang tentu berbeda dari harga pasar," katanya.Meski begitu, BNN masih meminta orang tua untuk selalu memantau asosiasi putra dan putri mereka.Demikian juga dengan partai -partai terkait lainnya, seperti sekolah, lingkungan RT, lingkungan RW, kepada para pemimpin agama, pemimpin masyarakat, pemimpin tradisional, pemimpin pemuda untuk dapat membantu memantau lingkungan di sekitarnya, untuk menghindari bahaya penyalahgunaan narkoba."BNN mengajukan banding kepada publik untuk tetap waspada terhadap berbagai mode perdagangan narkoba yang semakin beragam," katanya.Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, dot permen botol diduga mengandung obat yang beredar di kota Surabaya.Dot permen ditemukan oleh Unit Kepolisian Dinas Sipil (SATPOL PP) dari Surabaya City, saat melakukan penggerebekan di 14 sub-distrik.Serangan itu diadakan setelah seorang siswa sekolah dasar (SD) mengalami pusing setelah makan permen.Tidak hanya di Surabaya, Dot Candy juga telah diedarkan di sejumlah kota lain seperti Mojokerto dan Bekasi, Jawa Barat.

berita: Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". Thus the broadcast circulating on social media, along with the excitement of the Pokemon Go game. According to the broadcast, pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means "I'm Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "be a Jew". Actually, the polemic about the meaning of Pokemon has been sticking out since 2001, when Saudi Arabian clerics banned Pokemon because it was considered campaigning theory of evolution and is considered Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Soon after, Pokemon comics and toys were taken to store shelves and orders were cancelled. Pokemon haram fatwas were also issued by scholars in Qatar, Dubai, Jordan and Egypt. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor at Egypt's Al Azhar University, found no evidence that Pokemon comes from Syriac and means "I am Jewish". and there is no forth valid evidence that pikachu means “be a jew.” However, he agrees that Pokemon games spread atheist ideas and distance themselves from God. "From a parent's point of view, this game keeps children away from God, and spread atheist ideas," he was quoted as saying by the Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001.
berita_id: Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dengan demikian siaran yang beredar di media sosial, bersama dengan kegembiraan game Pokemon Go.Menurut siaran, Pokemon berasal dari Syria atau Syria yang berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sebenarnya, polemik tentang makna Pokemon telah mencuat sejak tahun 2001, ketika ulama Arab Saudi melarang Pokemon karena dianggap sebagai teori evolusi kampanye dan dianggap sebagai propaganda Yahudi untuk menjauhkan anak -anak Muslim dari agama mereka.Segera setelah itu, komik dan mainan Pokemon dibawa ke rak toko dan pesanan dibatalkan.Fatwa Pokemon Haram juga dikeluarkan oleh para sarjana di Qatar, Dubai, Jordan dan Mesir.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor di Universitas Al Azhar di Mesir, tidak menemukan bukti bahwa Pokemon berasal dari Syria dan berarti "Saya Yahudi".Dan tidak ada bukti yang valid bahwa Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi."Namun, dia setuju bahwa game Pokemon menyebarkan ide -ide ateis dan menjauhkan diri dari Tuhan."Dari sudut pandang orang tua, permainan ini menjauhkan anak -anak dari Tuhan, dan menyebarkan ide -ide ateis," katanya seperti dikutip oleh Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan said he did not know Ananda Sukarlan was protesting his presence at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College. But he did not mind and still respect the composer's attitude. “I will greet all, protect all. If then there is a negative reaction, yes, that's a bonus for me. There is nothing, it's normal," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Monday, November 13 2017. Ananda launched a walk out to protest the committee who invited Anies to commemorate the founding of Kanisius College. According to him, Anies does not deserve to be in the midst of the Kanius community. "Why invite someone who goes against the values ​​we were taught at Canisius?" he said when contacted by Tempo, Monday. Ananda said that while studying at Kanisius, he got an understanding of pluralism. By appreciating differences, he believes life in the world will be better. "Differences are what bring us together," he said. However, he considers Anies' figure to be contrary to these values. According to Ananda, during the 2017 DKI regional head election campaign which was full of religious and racist sentiments, Anies Baswedan didn't seem bothered. In addition, Anies' inaugural speech as governor touched on indigenous issues. "I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," said Ananda. Anies Baswedan said that he was only informed this morning about Ananda Sukarlan's protest. According to him, anyone has the right to express their thoughts or criticisms in their own way. He attended the event because he was invited inch as governor as well as a friend. "I'm not like someone who doesn't know my friends at Kanisius," said Anies. "And this isn't the first time I've been to Kanisius."
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengatakan dia tidak tahu Ananda Sukarlan memprotes kehadirannya pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College.Tapi dia tidak keberatan dan masih menghormati sikap komposer."Saya akan menyambut semuanya, melindungi semuanya. Jika ada reaksi negatif, ya, itu bonus bagi saya. Tidak ada apa -apa, itu normal," kata Anies di Balai Kota Jakarta, Senin, 13 November 2017. Ananda meluncurkan jalan keluar untuk memprotes komite yang mengundang Anies untuk memperingati pendirian Kanisius College.Menurutnya, Anies tidak pantas berada di tengah -tengah komunitas Kanius."Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai yang diajarkan kepada Canisius?"Dia mengatakan ketika dihubungi oleh Tempo, Senin.Ananda mengatakan bahwa saat belajar di Kanisius, ia mendapat pemahaman tentang pluralisme.Dengan menghargai perbedaan, ia percaya kehidupan di dunia akan lebih baik."Perbedaan itulah yang menyatukan kita," katanya.Namun, ia menganggap angka ini bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai ini.Menurut Ananda, selama kampanye pemilihan kepala regional DKI 2017 yang penuh dengan sentimen religius dan rasis, Anies Baswedan tampaknya tidak terganggu.Selain itu, pidato pelantikan Anies sebagai gubernur menyentuh masalah -masalah asli."Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai kemanusiaan," kata Ananda.Anies Baswedan mengatakan bahwa dia hanya diberitahu pagi ini tentang protes Ananda Sukarlan.Menurutnya, siapa pun memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pikiran atau kritik mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Dia menghadiri acara itu karena dia diundang inci sebagai gubernur dan juga teman."Aku tidak seperti seseorang yang tidak mengenal teman -temanku di Kanisius," kata Anies."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya aku ke Kanisius."

berita: The Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan was invited by Kanisius College to give a speech at the 90th anniversary event of Kanisius College, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. On this occasion, there was an award presentation agenda to five alumni of Canisius College across generations. (For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder of Kalbe Farma. However, when Anies was giving a speech, pianist Ananda Sukarlan suddenly left the room (Walk Out). Hundreds of alumni and attendees followed Ananda's footsteps. Apparently, about half an hour after Anies left the room, Ananda came back in. At that time, he took the award pinned to him. After receiving the award, Ananda then gave a sarcastic speech to Anies. He said Kanisius respects differences. "Yes, I did walk out in the middle of (Anies Baswedan's) speech," said Ananda when contacted by reportindonesia.com. (Monday) “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we have been taught,” said Ananda Ananda also admitted that he did not invite round of drinks his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his contemporaries, namely the 1986 class. Ananda Sukarlan was born on June 10, 1968 in Jakarta. He is the son of the couple Sukarlan and Poppy Kumudastuti. In Europe, Ananda's name is well known. Piano Petrof from the University of Hadford, Connecticut, United States in 1986. Graduated summa cum laude in 1993 under the guidance of Naum Grubert As in 2000, he was invited by Queen Sofia of Spain to fill a concert at the Queen Sofia Prize Gala Night in Madrid. In 2002, he reached the peak of his career by signing a contract to collaborate with the great French composer Pierre Boulez on a concert tour to 11 cities including Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago and Paris. And the first Indonesian pianist to be recorded in The International Who's Who in Music book. On the other hand, when reportindonesia.com confirmed Anies Baswedan (Governor of DKI), he admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall. (Monday). Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. According to the Big Indonesian Dictionary (KBBI) the definition of walk out is to leave the meeting room or trial of your own free will because you do not agree or refuse the discussion or the results of the trial. This turned out to have an impact on one of the Indonesian start-up companies, Traveloka. The movement to UNINSTALL THE TRAVELOKA APPLICATION is milling about on Twitter's timeline. There, Derianto Kusuma, co-founder and CTO of Traveloka, was also present. He greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Derianto's gesture was considered as support for Ananda's actions which were considered insulting to Governor Anies. Whereas in 2017, the online travel service provider Traveloka, received new funding for their operations in Indonesia and expanded the market in Southeast Asia. The new funding was obtained from Expedia from the United States amounting to 350 million US dollars, or around Rp. 4.6 trillion. In the past year, Traveloka has raised a total of 500 million US dollars or Rp. 6.6 trillion, which was obtained from investors in previous funding rounds such as East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, and Chinese e-commerce company, JD.com. I hope this doesn't happen again to anyone and anything.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan diundang oleh Kanisius College untuk memberikan pidato di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Pada kesempatan ini, ada agenda presentasi penghargaan untuk lima alumni Canisius College lintas generasi.(For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder ofKalbe Farha.Namun, ketika Anies memberikan pidato, pianis Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba meninggalkan ruangan (berjalan keluar).Ratusan alumni dan peserta mengikuti jejak Ananda.Rupanya, sekitar setengah jam setelah Anies meninggalkan ruangan, Ananda kembali. Pada waktu itu, ia menerima penghargaan yang disematkan kepadanya.Setelah menerima penghargaan, Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato sarkastik kepada Anies.Dia mengatakan Kanisius menghormati perbedaan."Ya, saya memang keluar di tengah pidato (anies Baswedan)," kata Ananda ketika dihubungi oleh ReportIndonesia.com.(Senin) "Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda Ananda juga mengakui bahwa ia tidak mengundang minuman teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang banyak keluar adalah orang -orang sezamannya, yaitu kelas 1986.Ananda Sukarlan lahir pada 10 Juni 1968 di Jakarta.Dia adalah putra pasangan Sukarlan dan Poppy Kumudastuti.Di Eropa, nama Ananda terkenal.Piano Petrof dari University of Hadford, Connecticut, Amerika Serikat pada tahun 1986. Lulus summa cum laude pada tahun 1993 di bawah bimbingan Naum Grubert seperti pada tahun 2000, ia diundang oleh Ratu Sofia dari Spanyol untuk mengisi konser di Ratu Sofia Hadiah Gala Night di Madrid.Pada tahun 2002, ia mencapai puncak karirnya dengan menandatangani kontrak untuk berkolaborasi dengan komposer Prancis yang hebat Pierre Boulez dalam tur konser ke 11 kota termasuk Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago dan Paris.Dan pianis Indonesia pertama yang direkam di International Who's Who in Music Book.Di sisi lain, ketika Reportindonesia.com mengkonfirmasi Anies Baswedan (Gubernur DKI), dia mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak ingat, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta.(Senin).Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Menurut Kamus Indonesia Besar (KBBI) Definisi Walk Out adalah meninggalkan ruang pertemuan atau persidangan atas kehendak bebas Anda sendiri karena Anda tidak setuju atau menolak diskusi atau hasil persidangan.Ini ternyata berdampak pada salah satu perusahaan pemula Indonesia, Traveloka.Gerakan untuk menghapus instalasi aplikasi Traveloka sedang berkeliaran di timeline Twitter.Di sana, DeRianto Kusuma, co-founder dan CTO dari Traveloka, juga hadir.Dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies.Gerakan DeRianto dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda yang dianggap menghina gubernur.Sedangkan pada 2017, penyedia layanan perjalanan online Traveloka, menerima dana baru untuk operasi mereka di Indonesia dan memperluas pasar di Asia Tenggara.Pendanaan baru diperoleh dari Expedia dari Amerika Serikat sebesar 350 juta dolar AS, atau sekitar RP.4,6 triliun.Pada tahun lalu, Traveloka telah mengumpulkan total 500 juta dolar AS atau RP.6,6 triliun, yang diperoleh dari investor dalam putaran pendanaan sebelumnya seperti East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, dan China E-Commerce Company, JD.com.Saya harap ini tidak terjadi lagi pada siapa pun dan apa pun.

berita: On Tuesday (21/2) morning, news circulated on social media about the closure of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque for visitors. The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) felt the need to provide clarification. In an official statement received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (21/2), the Head of Protocol for the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, clarified so that there would be no misunderstanding. BPPMI also appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. As for the news about the locking of the mosque so that people cannot pray Fajr, he said, is a hoax or a lie. According to him, the closure of the mosque is already a regulation or the protocol at Istiqlal. This is the explanation: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency since 2002 has enforced a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30. The mosque was reopened in the morning at 03.40, ahead of the Fajr prayer service. This rule leading (SOP) was enforced in order to optimize mosque security at night. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. Regarding the conditions at night from 20 to the early hours of February 21 2017, the Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. The Istiqlal Mosque always serves the people and strives for national unity and unity, and always maintains the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above matters did not correspond to reality and tended to contain provocations. BPPMI appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by Ustaz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people (170 men and 70 women).
berita_id: Pada hari Selasa (21/2) pagi, berita beredar di media sosial tentang penutupan gerbang masjid Istiqlal untuk pengunjung.Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) merasa perlu untuk memberikan klarifikasi.Dalam pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Republika.co.id, Selasa (21/2), kepala protokol untuk Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, diklarifikasi sehingga tidak akan ada kesalahpahaman.BPPMI juga mengajukan banding kepada semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Adapun berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak dapat berdoa, katanya, adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Menurutnya, penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau protokol di ISTIQLAL.Ini adalah penjelasannya: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menegakkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30.Masjid dibuka kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40, di depan Layanan Doa Fajr.Aturan ini (SOP) ini ditegakkan untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid di malam hari.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah Masjid Istiqlal, kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Mengenai kondisi pada malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari 2017, pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid Istiqlal.BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: Traveloka management spoke up in response to the bad news that hit the company. His party denied that there was a Walk Out (WO) action, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza said, Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders. "We are also proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni," said Busyra when confirmed by JawaPos.com, Tuesday (14/11). However, the news circulating on social media seems excessive. Because Busyra emphasized that although the founder received an award, Derianto was unable to attend. This is because Derianto is currently on an official trip that had been planned several months in advance. "He was unable to attend. However, this award further motivates us to increase our contribution to society by increasing mobility and improving the quality of life," he said. With this information, continued Busyra, Traveloka has firmly rejected the issues circulating on social media. "The statement already includes points that the public needs to know. We hope this can provide an explanation of the issues that are currently happening," he explained. Previously, Twitter social media was bustling with tweets of the Traveloka boycott. Even #UninstallTraveloka was at the top of Twitter's trending topic. The conversation emerged as a result of the Walk Out (WO) action of the famous Indonesian composer, Ananda ineffective Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). Rumors circulated, when Anies Baswedan gave a speech, Ananda suddenly stood up and then WO went out of the room. It is said that one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who was present at the event, also greeted Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. This was seen as support for Ananda's actions. However, the issue was finally clarified by Traveloka that Derianto was unable to attend at that time.
berita_id: Manajemen Traveloka berbicara sebagai tanggapan atas berita buruk yang menghantam perusahaan.Partainya membantah bahwa ada aksi Walk Out (WO), salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengatakan, Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Nilai -nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius," kata Busyra ketika dikonfirmasi oleh Jawapos.com, Selasa (14/11).Namun, berita yang beredar di media sosial tampaknya berlebihan.Karena Busyra menekankan bahwa meskipun pendiri menerima penghargaan, DeRianto tidak dapat hadir.Ini karena DeRianto saat ini sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya."Dia tidak dapat hadir. Namun, penghargaan ini semakin memotivasi kami untuk meningkatkan kontribusi kami kepada masyarakat dengan meningkatkan mobilitas dan meningkatkan kualitas hidup," katanya.Dengan informasi ini, lanjutan Busyra, Traveloka dengan tegas menolak masalah yang beredar di media sosial."Pernyataan itu sudah mencakup poin yang perlu diketahui publik. Kami berharap ini dapat memberikan penjelasan tentang masalah yang saat ini terjadi," jelasnya.Sebelumnya, media sosial Twitter ramai dengan tweet boikot Traveloka.Bahkan #uninstalltraveloka ada di puncak topik tren Twitter.Percakapan muncul sebagai akibat dari aksi Walk Out (WO) dari komposer Indonesia yang terkenal, Ananda tidak efektif Sukarlan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakara, Sabtu, Sabtu.Rumor beredar, ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato, Ananda tiba -tiba berdiri dan kemudian akan keluar dari ruangan.Dikatakan bahwa salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang hadir di acara tersebut, juga menyambut Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Ini dipandang sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Namun, masalah ini akhirnya diklarifikasi oleh Traveloka bahwa DeRianto tidak dapat hadir pada waktu itu.

berita: to carry out actions to defend Islam and the State that will be carried out by the Muslim community, who are members of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI), who are already angry with president the behavior of the leaders of this country, where they should carry out the rules and laws firmly and correctly, but in reality this is not the case. This assumption led to the case of blasphemy against Islam carried out by the defendant Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, who is currently undergoing trial, it was not dismissed and the public considered that the reasons given seemed made up. Not even a few legal and state administration experts, including the former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court, Mahfud MD, also criticized the government's attitude, especially the Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo including President Joko Widodo alias Jokowi who was silent when Ahok was again given his seat as governor. While some regional heads actually experience the opposite. As a result, their demands in the action called the Action to Defend Islam and the State 212 will be carried out in front of the MPR building of the DPR RI, and apparently not a few participants came from several outside Jakarta. As a result, they tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the prayer time to enter. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer. "Istiqlal Mosque in Padlock ... no one can (may) pray Fajr .... What regime is this ... PKI challenges the Defenders of Islam .... Our war begins (Starts) ... Allahu Akbar .....!" Thus the contents of the text in the description of the photo sent to this media. It can be seen in the photo that the participants are gathering and hoping that the door will be opened soon. Their anger was directed at the government, because the Istiqlal Mosque is managed directly under the Ministry of Religion through the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI). Where the management of BPPMI is appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who is also in the structure as Chairman of BPPMI. Meanwhile, the responsibility is directly to the President. Meanwhile, it is related to the statement that mentions the involvement of the PKI, due to the connection with the PDI-P as the ruling party and also the main supporter of President Jokowi and also the DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot. And in PDIP itself, it is known that many generations of PKI leaders from the 1960s have filled it. And do not cover themselves even boldly and proudly they admit it. As once said by Member of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission IX from PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, when interviewed and published by one of the media, on September 30, 2015.
berita_id: Untuk melakukan tindakan untuk membela Islam dan negara yang akan dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim, yang merupakan anggota Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI), yang sudah marah dengan Presiden perilaku para pemimpin negara ini, di mana mereka harus melaksanakan aturan dan hukum dengan tegas dan benar, tetapi dalam kenyataan ini bukan masalahnya.Asumsi ini mengarah pada kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam yang dilakukan oleh terdakwa Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, yang saat ini sedang menjalani persidangan, itu tidak diberhentikan dan publik mempertimbangkan bahwa alasan yang diberikan tampaknya dibuat.Bahkan beberapa pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi, Mahfud MD, juga mengkritik sikap pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo termasuk Presiden Joko Widodo Alias ​​Jokowi yang diam ketika Ahok lagi diberi kursi sebagai gubernur.Sementara beberapa kepala regional benar -benar mengalami sebaliknya.Akibatnya, tuntutan mereka dalam tindakan yang disebut tindakan untuk membela Islam dan Negara 212 akan dilakukan di depan gedung MPR DPR RI, dan tampaknya tidak sedikit peserta yang datang dari beberapa di luar Jakarta.Akibatnya, mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, sebagai akibatnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu sholat masuk.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya ditutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar."Masjid Istiqlal di gembok ... tidak ada yang bisa (mungkin) berdoa fajr .... rezim apa ini ... PKI menantang para pembela Islam .... Perang kami dimulai (dimulai) ... Allahu Akbar .....!"Dengan demikian isi teks dalam deskripsi foto yang dikirim ke media ini.Dapat dilihat di foto bahwa para peserta berkumpul dan berharap pintu akan segera dibuka.Kemarahan mereka diarahkan pada pemerintah, karena masjid Istiqlal dikelola langsung di bawah Kementerian Agama melalui Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI).Di mana manajemen BPPMI ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.Sementara itu, tanggung jawabnya langsung kepada Presiden.Sementara itu, ini terkait dengan pernyataan yang menyebutkan keterlibatan PKI, karena hubungan dengan PDI-P sebagai partai yang berkuasa dan juga pendukung utama Presiden Jokowi dan juga DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot.Dan dalam PDIP sendiri, diketahui bahwa banyak generasi pemimpin PKI dari tahun 1960 -an telah mengisinya.Dan jangan menutupi diri mereka bahkan dengan berani dan bangga mereka mengakuinya.Seperti yang pernah dikatakan oleh anggota Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dari PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, ketika diwawancarai dan diterbitkan oleh salah satu media, pada 30 September 2015.

berita: according to one professor from China, you should always have and keep a needle in the house. Because it can be used to treat people who have had a stroke. When a person has a stroke, the brain's hair vessels are slowly torn. Therefore, first aid is needed. Here are the steps you should take, as reported by Lifehealthandfood.com Stay calm. Regardless of the position of the patient, you must not move or move him. Because if you don't, you will cause the brain's capillaries to burst and bleed inside the brain. Using an injection would be better, but as an alternative you can use a sewing needle. Heat the needle with a candle or a match to sterilize it. With the needle, prick the patient's ten fingertips with it. No expert in acupuncture required. But make sure, if your puncture is a few millimeters away from the nail. Do this until the blood comes out of his fingers. If the blood does not come out, squeeze or massage until the blood comes out. When the blood has flowed from the ten fingers, wait a few minutes, God willing, the patient will be awake and conscious. If you notice a change in the patient's mouth, begin to massage both ears until the blood is flowing into them and the ears are injectant red. Pierce the soft part of the ear with a needle, until two drops of blood fall from each ear. After a few minutes, God willing, his mouth will no longer change. When you make sure there are no more strange symptoms in the patient and have returned to normal, take him to the hospital.
berita_id: Menurut seorang profesor dari Cina, Anda harus selalu memiliki dan menyimpan jarum di rumah.Karena dapat digunakan untuk memperlakukan orang yang mengalami stroke.Ketika seseorang mengalami stroke, pembuluh rambut otak perlahan -lahan robek.Oleh karena itu, pertolongan pertama diperlukan.Berikut adalah langkah -langkah yang harus Anda ambil, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh LifeHealthandfood.com tetap tenang.Terlepas dari posisi pasien, Anda tidak boleh menggerakkan atau menggerakkannya.Karena jika tidak, Anda akan menyebabkan kapiler otak meledak dan berdarah di dalam otak.Menggunakan injeksi akan lebih baik, tetapi sebagai alternatif Anda dapat menggunakan jarum jahit.Panaskan jarum dengan lilin atau kecocokan untuk mensterilkannya.Dengan jarum, tusuk sepuluh ujung jari pasien dengannya.Tidak ada ahli dalam akupunktur yang diperlukan.Tapi pastikan, jika tusukan Anda berjarak beberapa milimeter dari paku.Lakukan ini sampai darah keluar dari jari -jarinya.Jika darah tidak keluar, peras atau pijat sampai darah keluar.Ketika darah telah mengalir dari sepuluh jari, tunggu beberapa menit, Tuhan bersedia, pasien akan terjaga dan sadar.Jika Anda melihat perubahan di mulut pasien, mulailah memijat kedua telinga sampai darah mengalir ke dalamnya dan telinga suntikan merah.Tusuk bagian lunak telinga dengan jarum, sampai dua tetes darah jatuh dari setiap telinga.Setelah beberapa menit, Tuhan mau, mulut -Nya tidak akan lagi berubah.Ketika Anda memastikan tidak ada gejala aneh lagi pada pasien dan telah kembali normal, bawa dia ke rumah sakit.

berita: Underneath it were displayed several sentences indicating the nickname of the hacker and a joke message which was judged by the hacker as a form of intolerance carried out by Ananda Sukarlan. There are also a number of names that are part or groups of the hacker group. Until the news was released, there has been no corrective response from the management or website manager of the famous composer who is famous for his classical music works. For your information, previously at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College, Ananda Sukarlan took a Walk Out or left the room when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan was reading his speech. According to reports from a number of online media, Anandan Sukarlan's boycott was a form of his disapproval of the elected governor of DKI, Anies Baswedan. grouping The action was then followed by some of the invited guests in the room. After Anies Baswedan finished his speech, the invited guests then went back into the room to continue the event. For this action, there are many pros and cons circulating on social media from netizens. In fact, netizens are busy carrying the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka in their timelines because the action of WO Ananda Sukarlan is considered by some netizens to have the support of the CEO of Traveloka, even though in fact Derianto Kusuma as the Boss of Traveloka was not in the event.
berita_id: Di bawahnya ditampilkan beberapa kalimat yang menunjukkan julukan peretas dan pesan lelucon yang dinilai oleh peretas sebagai bentuk intoleransi yang dilakukan oleh Ananda Sukarlan.Ada juga sejumlah nama yang merupakan bagian atau grup dari grup peretas.Sampai berita dirilis, belum ada tanggapan korektif dari manajemen atau manajer situs web komposer terkenal yang terkenal dengan karya musik klasiknya.Untuk informasi Anda, sebelumnya pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College, Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar atau meninggalkan ruangan ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan sedang membaca pidatonya.Menurut laporan dari sejumlah media online, boikot Anandan Sukarlan adalah bentuk ketidaksetujuannya terhadap gubernur terpilih DKI, Anies Baswedan.Mengelompokkan aksi kemudian diikuti oleh beberapa tamu yang diundang di ruangan itu.Setelah Anies Baswedan menyelesaikan pidatonya, para tamu yang diundang kemudian kembali ke ruangan untuk melanjutkan acara tersebut.Untuk tindakan ini, ada banyak pro dan kontra yang beredar di media sosial dari netizen.Faktanya, netizen sibuk membawa tagar #uninstalltraveloka dalam jadwal mereka karena aksi Wo Ananda Sukarlan dianggap oleh beberapa netizen untuk mendapat dukungan dari CEO Traveloka, meskipun sebenarnya Deraianto Kusuma sebagai bos Traveloka tidak ada dalam acara tersebut.

berita: When Facebook Will Be Closed - Recently, there has been a lot of talk about Facebook being closed or frozen in the country, this is certainly very troubling for those who have been relying on Facebook as a medium of communication or also a medium for selling goods online. Actually, it is not without reason why the government wants to block Facebook, this is because of the misuse of leaked data on Facebook users, so it is feared that later it will endanger the stability of domestic security. Facebook itself has long been used by the Indonesian people as a medium of communication, on April 17, 2018, the DPR had a meeting with Facebook. The government itself still has the will and gives Facebook one month or thirty days to audit and report later, if within one month there is still no news on how it will continue, then the DPR will propose a temporary suspension of Facebook so that later we can't use facebook. Technology can sometimes be two-sided and sometimes it depends on how we use it, there are so many events or problems that are caused by provocations on social media, for that we need to respond to the development of the technology world in a positive way. So have you got an answer about when Facebook will be closed, isn't it, it's better if we wait for news from Facebook later, as for if the government decides to block Facebook then we have to get ready resolve to look for other social media that we can make as an option, maybe that's all to share a little rud-arsenio.com this time, have a nice day.
berita_id: Ketika Facebook akan ditutup - baru -baru ini, ada banyak pembicaraan tentang Facebook yang ditutup atau dibekukan di negara ini, ini tentu sangat meresahkan bagi mereka yang telah mengandalkan Facebook sebagai media komunikasi atau juga media untuk menjual barang secara online.Sebenarnya, bukan tanpa alasan mengapa pemerintah ingin memblokir Facebook, ini karena penyalahgunaan data yang bocor pada pengguna Facebook, sehingga dikhawatirkan bahwa nanti akan membahayakan stabilitas keamanan domestik.Facebook itu sendiri telah lama digunakan oleh orang -orang Indonesia sebagai media komunikasi, pada 17 April 2018, DPR mengadakan pertemuan dengan Facebook.Pemerintah itu sendiri masih memiliki surat wasiat dan memberikan Facebook satu bulan atau tiga puluh hari untuk mengaudit dan melaporkan nanti, jika dalam waktu satu bulan masih belum ada berita tentang bagaimana hal itu akan berlanjut, maka DPR akan mengusulkan penangguhan sementara Facebook sehingga nanti kita tidak dapat menggunakan Facebook.Teknologi kadang-kadang bisa dua sisi dan kadang-kadang tergantung pada bagaimana kita menggunakannya, ada begitu banyak peristiwa atau masalah yang disebabkan oleh provokasi di media sosial, untuk itu kita perlu menanggapi pengembangan dunia teknologi dengan cara yang positif.Jadi, apakah Anda mendapat jawaban tentang kapan Facebook akan ditutup, bukan, lebih baik jika kita menunggu berita dari Facebook nanti, seperti jika pemerintah memutuskan untuk memblokir Facebook maka kita harus siap menyelesaikan untuk mencari media sosial lain yang bisa kita buat sebagai pilihan, mungkin itu saja untuk berbagi rud-arsenio.com kali ini, semoga harimu menyenangkan.

berita: The Presidential Palace emphasized that the salaries of the President and Vice President did not increase because both of them were still receiving salaries according to Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning Financial or Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President as well as Former Presidents and Vice Presidents. Bey Machmudin in a written statement in Jakarta, Wednesday (28/6/2017) Bey emphasized that the news that President Joko Widodo received a salary increase is not true because until now, President Joko Widodo and Vice President Jusuf Kalla still receive salaries according to the law. Number 7 of 1978 In Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President jurisprudence is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. according to Government Regulation No. 75 of 2000, salary The highest principal of state officials (Chairman of DPR, MA, BPK) is IDR 5040000 per month
berita_id: Istana presiden menekankan bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden tidak meningkat karena keduanya masih menerima gaji menurut hukum nomor 7 tahun 1978 mengenai hak keuangan atau administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden serta mantan presiden dan wakil presiden.Bey Machmudin dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis di Jakarta, Rabu (28/6/2017) Bey menekankan bahwa berita bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar karena sampai sekarang, Presiden Joko Widodo dan Wakil Presiden Jusuf Kalla masih menerima gaji menurut undang -undang.Nomor 7 tahun 1978 dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar yurisprudensi Presiden adalah enam kali lipat gaji dasar tertinggi dari seorang pejabat di Indonesia selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Menurut Peraturan Pemerintah No. 75 tahun 2000, Gaji Kepala Pejabat Negara Tertinggi (Ketua DPR, MA, BPK) adalah IDR 5040000 per bulan

berita: The basic salary of the president, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary to become Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest The income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000, so he will earn IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. income 64000 With p With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with leaders in other countries. In the RPP there are also new salary proposals for the Ministers, Attorney General, Commander of the Indonesian National Armed Forces, Chief of Police, Chairman of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR, Chairman of the DPD, and Chairman of the KPK. , Chairman of the BPK, Chairman of the Supreme Court and Chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is Rp. 92.2 million per month. Then for the Deputy Chairs of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK, MA and MK, they have an income index of 15333 and receive income IDR 88.3 million per month. Meanwhile, Deputy Ministers, Deputy Chief of Police, DPR Members, DPD Members, BPK Members, and Supreme Court Justices per month earn IDR 80.7 million with an income index of 14,000. Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN) -RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP, although he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of KemenPAN-RB, Herman Suryatman said that the information The RPP organization is not yet valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material that was held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 11/3/2018) As is known, the RPP for the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical rule of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the explanation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. requires further study. "Not only contains a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he asked. regions such as governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD and DPRD regencies or cities will also experience an increase Where for governors will earn Rp. 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then for deputy governors, regents/mayors, and chairman of the Provincial DPRD will earn income of Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. The deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, the chairman of the regency/municipal DPRD have a salary of Rp. Rp. 66.3 million. Finally, for district/city DPRD members, the salary that will be obtained is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public Policy Expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad), Yogi Suprayogi, assessed that although it is only a simulation, the increase in state officials is irrelevant. obtained by state officials is now enough "It's enough because there is an additional operating allowance al It's big It's what he likes No need to grow up It's irrelevant," he explained According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. billion," he said. Yogi said that compared to the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. According to him, the material for the RPP for the salaries and benefits of handmaiden civil servants currently circulating is one of the scenarios that are simulated by the government. the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP Salary and Allowance Yogi emphasizes the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. enlarged compared to the performance allowance. Currently the basic salary is smaller so that There are many civil servants going here and there to increase the performance allowance. Expensive allowance must be greater than the other two so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that the performance allowance must be based on performance. He reminded that no state should pay salaries based on education level. in some countries it is also partly performance-based In the United States, the salary of a civil servant in the State Department ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year The number of civil servants in Uncle Sama's country reaches 2.79 million people. US president around USD400000 The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001 Previously the president's salary was only USD200000 Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees amounting to 1.6 million In addition, he also provided a pension of 1000 ringgit per month y Those who have served for 25 years The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 1-4 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 10-19 years earn 70753 ringgit. The salary of civil servants who have just worked in Singapore is 3000 Singapore dollars per month. For a manager position, the salary is around SGD 8000. The number of employees in Singapore is 84,000. According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, public servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats. "They have high standards of discipline and accountability," said Friedman.

A number of members of the Ponorogo Reyog Community (KRP) visited the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office to ask for information and clarification regarding the burning of reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burned reyog had been damaged and eaten by termites. 18 KRP representatives gathered in front of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office, Jl Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/10/2015). They brought 2 sudden peacocks, a barong, and a gayor with a picture of a dragon, a banner that reads "Resolute Action on Burning Reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines" and an open letter to Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi. Their arrival was related to the burning of reog that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on 20 October. They also attached a picture showing the reyog burning. "Our visit is to officially ask the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which is the "superior" of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to convey information and clarification honestly and transparently regarding the burning of Reyog Ponorogo's property," said KRP Chairman, Suyatno to Suarajakarta.co, Monday (2/11). ). Suyatno was accompanied, among others, by the Deputy Chairperson of the KRP Suparno Nojeng, the Secretary of the KRP M Syaiful Jihad, the Treasurer of the KRP Agus Susanto, the leader of the reyog group Singo Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo and the reyog artist who had performed in Davao Philippines in 2005, Suyono Gendon. After waiting for some time, 6 KRP representatives were received by Siti Sofia Sudarma, Director of Information and Media at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at 10.20 squad WIB. For 30 minutes they held a meeting and as a result the Ministry of Foreign Affairs promised to seek information related to the incident by forming a team to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in the near future. "The team will further clarify the incident and we will convey the results to the KRP," said Sofia. Explanation of the Consulate General in Davao Meanwhile, in a press release from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao which was published on its website, it was explained that on October 20, 2015 the Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy the Ponorogo reog which had been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a state of disrepair. damaged and eaten by termites. "The arson was in no way an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City would also like to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits," he wrote. "The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo," he continued.
berita_id: Sejumlah anggota komunitas Ponorogo Reyog (KRP) mengunjungi kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu) untuk meminta informasi dan klarifikasi mengenai pembakaran Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa Reyog yang terbakar telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.18 Perwakilan KRP berkumpul di depan kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu), JL Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/10/2015).Mereka membawa 2 burung merak yang tiba -tiba, sebuah barong, dan seorang Gayor dengan gambar naga, spanduk yang bertuliskan "Tindakan tegas tentang membakar Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina" dan surat terbuka kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi.Kedatangan mereka terkait dengan pembakaran reog yang terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober.Mereka juga memasang gambar yang menunjukkan Reyog terbakar."Kunjungan kami adalah secara resmi bertanya kepada Kementerian Luar Negeri, yang merupakan" atasan "konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina untuk menyampaikan informasi dan klarifikasi secara jujur ​​dan transparan mengenai pembakaran properti Reyog Ponorogo," kata Ketua KRP, Suyatno ke Suarajakarta.co (2).).Suyatno ditemani, antara lain, oleh wakil ketua KRP Sarno Nojeng, sekretaris jihad KRP M Syaiful, bendahara KRP Agus Susanto, pemimpin Reyog Group Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo dan REYOG REYOG.Setelah menunggu beberapa waktu, 6 KRP Perwakilan diterima oleh Siti Sofia Sudarma, Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri di 10.20 Skuad WIB.Selama 30 menit mereka mengadakan pertemuan dan sebagai hasilnya, Kementerian Luar Negeri berjanji untuk mencari informasi yang terkait dengan insiden tersebut dengan membentuk tim ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao dalam waktu dekat."Tim akan lebih mengklarifikasi insiden tersebut dan kami akan menyampaikan hasilnya kepada KRP," kata Sofia.Penjelasan Konsulat Jenderal di Davao sementara itu, dalam siaran pers dari Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao yang diterbitkan di situs webnya, dijelaskan bahwa pada 20 Oktober 2015 Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao dipaksa untuk menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog yang telah menjadi Asset dari Konsulat Indonesia yang telah menjadi Ponorogo.sudah dalam keadaan rusak.rusak dan dimakan rayap.Pembakaran itu sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya. Penghancuran aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap ponorogo sebagai hal yang benar -benar terjadi pada petak yang benar -benar terjadi pada ponorogo yang sama -sama.menulis."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo," lanjutnya.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is rumored to be increasing by up to Rp 500 million per month (Rp 6 billion) per year. The increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually ratified. With a presidential salary index of 96,000 points, then the figure is Rp 553 million as is known, in article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, it is stated that the president's salary is six times the highest basic salary of an official in Indonesia compared to other officials such as the chairman of the DPR, MA and BPK. Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the basic salary of the president is Rp. 30240000 per month. According president to Presidential Decree 68/2001 it also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000.
