The number of worshipers is about 240 people, consisting of, 170 men and 70 women.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Media sosial pagi ini dimeriahkan oleh sirkulasi foto peserta dari demonstrasi Volume 2 ke -212 yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Dalam foto -foto yang tersebar, sepertinya ada grup yang berbaris di depan gerbang masuk ISTIQLAL.Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari pawang masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam, mengatakan bahwa berita bahwa kerumunan Volume 2 yang macet di gerbang itu adalah tipuan."Berita bahwa ada 212 pengunjuk rasa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu ketika dikonfirmasi oleh AFP pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017).Menurut Abu, memang pada Senin malam, setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid, kata Abu, mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Administrator Masjid Istiqlal kemudian berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang disertai oleh polisi."Setelah berbicara bahwa mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan Istiqlal," kata Abu.Kemudian menurut prosedur, masjid Istiqlal, di luar bulan Ramadhan, ditutup pada 21.30 WIB."Menurut SOP, masjid Istiqlal ditutup setiap hari pada pukul 09.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar, sekitar pukul 3:45 WIB," kata Abu.Mengenai foto itu, ada antrian para penyembah di gerbang Istiqlal, Abu mengatakan itu adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki Istiqlal.Manajer juga meminta maaf jika mereka mengantri di gerbang, karena pintunya hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB atau satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada beberapa peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada pukul 3:45 Wib. Kami meminta maaf untuk ini," kata Abu.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini, kata Abu, berjalan dengan baik, dengan Imam, Tuan Ust.Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang, terdiri dari, 170 pria dan 70 wanita.

berita: For the first time, Apple was quick to respond to complaints about the curved iPhone 6 Plus, when it was stored in the front pocket. Under normal use, a curved iPhone is a rare occurrence, Apple told the Wall Street Journal. They also replied to CNBC, that the new iPhone features orchard apple tree steel or titanium inserts to strengthen the circumference of the phone body. In fact, to further strengthen it is also used the strongest glass. The response from Apple this time, is the fastest. Looking back, if there are complaints from customers, this company from Uncle Sam's country does not respond. Apple CEO Tim Cook appears to have changed the company's communications policy. This phenomenon is by far the clearest example of such change. For information, this complaint had enlivened the virtual world. Complaints that came to Apple as many as nine customers, related to their iPhone 6 Plus phones that were curved. So far, Apple has sold more than 10 million iPhone 6 Plus since launch. So that the nine complaints that come in, can be said to be a small part of those sold.
berita_id: Untuk pertama kalinya, Apple dengan cepat menanggapi keluhan tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung, ketika disimpan di saku depan.Dalam penggunaan normal, iPhone melengkung adalah kejadian yang langka, Apple mengatakan kepada Wall Street Journal.Mereka juga menjawab CNBC, bahwa iPhone baru fitur Orchard Apple Tree Steel atau Titanium Inserts untuk memperkuat keliling badan telepon.Bahkan, untuk lebih memperkuat itu juga digunakan kaca terkuat.Respons dari Apple kali ini, adalah yang tercepat.Melihat ke belakang, jika ada keluhan dari pelanggan, perusahaan dari negara Paman Sam ini tidak merespons.CEO Apple Tim Cook tampaknya telah mengubah kebijakan komunikasi perusahaan.Fenomena ini sejauh ini merupakan contoh paling jelas dari perubahan tersebut.Sebagai informasi, keluhan ini telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Keluhan yang datang ke Apple sebanyak sembilan pelanggan, terkait dengan ponsel iPhone 6 Plus mereka yang melengkung.Sejauh ini, Apple telah menjual lebih dari 10 juta iPhone 6 Plus sejak diluncurkan.Sehingga sembilan keluhan yang masuk, dapat dikatakan sebagai bagian kecil dari mereka yang dijual.

berita: When one family member has a stroke, usually other family members take the initiative to provide first aid. For example, by pricking the tips of the patient's fingers with a needle to check whether he is numb or not. Then, make an impromptu family meeting to discuss the stroke patient to be taken to which hospital and which doctor. The initiative, said Prof. Dr. Dr. Mohammad Hasan Machfoed, Sp.S(K), MS is not important! This was revealed in the Grand Kalbe Academia talk show with the theme Indonesian Neurologist Forum in Jakarta, Saturday (4/2) yesterday. Mohammad Hasan said that as soon as one of the family members had a stroke, they should immediately be taken to a specialist. Don't think too much, hold a family meeting, call an elder sibling, blah-blah-blah. That makes things even worse. Stoke could not be helped by his own family members. You see, when someone has a stroke, the brain suddenly lacks oxygen and within 10 minutes can damage the entire brain. After those 10 minutes, he experienced a panombra area that is between life and death. At that time, we have to give proper help and only a specialist can do it. Giving wrong help can result in necrosis or cell death in all body tissues, said Mohammad Hassan to tabloidbintang.com. Stroke strikes at an unexpected time. It brings progressive change. Very fast. The very rapid changes, said Mohammad Hassan, are caused by the brain being suddenly deprived of oxygen. Due to lack of oxygen, the brain swells. If not treated quickly, the swelling causes the patient to die. The process to death will be very fast if he falls or experiences blockages in the airways. Importantly, family members must be careful to detect strange symptoms early on. For example, waking up talking sluggish. Or suddenly experience paralysis of one side. Or his mental state changes, forgets easily, told Mohammad Hassan. Another thing that should be considered by the family is at what time the patient had a stroke. For example, at 6 am. You must move quickly (take him to the doctor) in less than four hours after 6 am. Mohammad Hassan emphasized that four hours after the stroke occurred was the most crucial time. He must get the right help and fast. If you are in Jakarta, you family unit can take the patient to Cipto Mangunkusumo Hospital, for example. There, it allows patients to undergo thrombolysis (the process of destroying blood clots-red) which allows stroke survivors to recover. The condition is that you have to get help in less than four hours, he continued. Mohammad Hassan assessed that Indonesian people's awareness of the dangers of stroke has improved. However, it must continue to be improved considering that stroke is still the deadliest disease in this country. Therefore, the Chairperson of the Indonesian Neurologist Association welcomed the 2017 Grand Kalbe Academia. Director of PT Kalbe Farma Michael Buyung Nugroho added, the Indonesian Neurologist Forum talked about Neurological Disorder. Neurological disorders can lead to disability and even death. We want to contribute more in building competence for both senior and junior neurology doctors to better understand neurological disorders. Considering this disease has an impact on decreasing patient productivity and the quality of life of the patient's family.
berita_id: Ketika satu anggota keluarga mengalami stroke, biasanya anggota keluarga lainnya mengambil inisiatif untuk memberikan pertolongan pertama.Misalnya, dengan menusuk ujung jari pasien dengan jarum untuk memeriksa apakah dia mati rasa atau tidak.Kemudian, buat pertemuan keluarga dadakan untuk membahas pasien stroke untuk dibawa ke rumah sakit mana dan dokter mana.Inisiatif ini, kata Prof. Dr. Dr. Mohammad Hasan Machfoed, SP.S (K), MS tidak penting!Ini terungkap di acara bincang -bincang akademisi Grand Kalbe dengan tema Forum Neurologis Indonesia di Jakarta, Sabtu (4/2) kemarin.Mohammad Hasan mengatakan bahwa segera setelah salah satu anggota keluarga mengalami stroke, mereka harus segera dibawa ke spesialis.Jangan terlalu banyak berpikir, mengadakan pertemuan keluarga, panggil saudara penatua, bla-bla-bla.Itu membuat segalanya menjadi lebih buruk.Stoke tidak dapat dibantu oleh anggota keluarganya sendiri.Anda tahu, ketika seseorang mengalami stroke, otak tiba -tiba kekurangan oksigen dan dalam 10 menit dapat merusak seluruh otak.Setelah 10 menit itu, ia mengalami area Panombra yang berada di antara hidup dan mati.Pada saat itu, kami harus memberikan bantuan yang tepat dan hanya seorang spesialis yang dapat melakukannya.Memberikan bantuan yang salah dapat mengakibatkan nekrosis atau kematian sel di semua jaringan tubuh, kata Mohammad Hassan ke tabloidbintang.com.Stroke menyerang pada waktu yang tidak terduga.Ini membawa perubahan progresif.Sangat cepat.Perubahan yang sangat cepat, kata Mohammad Hassan, disebabkan oleh otak yang tiba -tiba kehilangan oksigen.Karena kurangnya oksigen, otak membengkak.Jika tidak dirawat dengan cepat, pembengkakan menyebabkan pasien mati.Proses sampai mati akan sangat cepat jika dia jatuh atau mengalami penyumbatan di saluran udara.Yang penting, anggota keluarga harus berhati -hati untuk mendeteksi gejala aneh sejak dini.Misalnya, bangun berbicara lamban.Atau tiba -tiba mengalami kelumpuhan di satu sisi.Atau perubahan keadaan mentalnya, lupa dengan mudah, memberi tahu Mohammad Hassan.Hal lain yang harus dipertimbangkan oleh keluarga adalah pada jam berapa pasien mengalami stroke.Misalnya, jam 6 pagi.Anda harus bergerak cepat (bawa dia ke dokter) dalam waktu kurang dari empat jam setelah jam 6 pagi.Mohammad Hassan menekankan bahwa empat jam setelah stroke terjadi adalah waktu yang paling penting.Dia harus mendapatkan bantuan dan cepat.Jika Anda berada di Jakarta, unit keluarga Anda dapat membawa pasien ke rumah sakit Cipto Mangunkusumo, misalnya.Di sana, memungkinkan pasien untuk menjalani trombolisis (proses menghancurkan gumpalan darah-merah) yang memungkinkan penderita stroke untuk pulih.Kondisinya adalah Anda harus mendapatkan bantuan dalam waktu kurang dari empat jam, lanjutnya.Mohammad Hassan menilai bahwa kesadaran rakyat Indonesia tentang bahaya stroke telah membaik.Namun, itu harus terus ditingkatkan mengingat stroke masih merupakan penyakit paling mematikan di negara ini.Oleh karena itu, ketua Asosiasi Saraf Indonesia menyambut Grand Kalbe Academia 2017.Direktur PT Kalbe Farmha Michael Buyung Nugroho menambahkan, Forum Neurologis Indonesia berbicara tentang gangguan neurologis.Gangguan neurologis dapat menyebabkan kecacatan dan bahkan kematian.Kami ingin berkontribusi lebih banyak dalam membangun kompetensi bagi dokter neurologi senior dan junior untuk lebih memahami gangguan neurologis.Mempertimbangkan penyakit ini berdampak pada penurunan produktivitas pasien dan kualitas hidup keluarga pasien.

berita: Information for you, especially Muslims, to be more careful and careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. If you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Sea urchin! Again, double-check the double check packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Share this info with your family and friends on Facebook so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal.
berita_id: Informasi untuk Anda, terutama Muslim, untuk lebih berhati-hati dan hati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Jika Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti landak laut!Sekali lagi, periksa kembali kemasan cek ganda sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda di Facebook sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal.

berita: The call to uninstall the Traveloka application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. This started when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. His action to walk out was also reportedly attended by several other alumni. One declared of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, is said to have supported Ananda's walk out by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action that resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka also received a response from the company. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on a business trip that had been planned several months in advance," Traveloka said in a statement received by Okezone. Meanwhile, regarding the support that Traveloka CTO reportedly gave to the pianist, Traveloka stated that the company prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect that are applied to all of its employees. “Responding to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the Kanisius College 90th Celebration, we state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders,” explained the company.
berita_id: Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Ini dimulai ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya dalam perayaan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni dari Kanisius College.Tindakannya untuk keluar juga dilaporkan dihadiri oleh beberapa alumni lainnya.Salah satu yang dinyatakan sebagai pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang mengakibatkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka juga menerima tanggapan dari perusahaan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota."Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata Traveloka dalam sebuah pernyataan yang diterima oleh Okezone.Sementara itu, mengenai dukungan yang dilaporkan diberikan oleh Traveloka CTO kepada pianis, Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai rasa saling menghormati yang diterapkan pada semua karyawannya.“Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di perayaan Kanisius College ke-90, kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal,” jelas perusahaan.

berita: Analysis of the Great Cultural Begawan Prabu: No termites or porous. A woman praying in a certain religion, residential district burning has absolutely nothing to do with the expulsion of idols or spirits, is a LIE. A woman supports prayer no. 2 Accompanying praise/prayer in the context of the destruction of objects that are not acceptable in the eyes of God. Bitungnews – A wave of protests over the burning of Reog Ponorogo and the decoration of the dragon gamelan at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Philippines, occurred both domestically and abroad. The Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) throughout Greater Jakarta, held a protest in front of the Office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Likewise in Ponorogo, the area of ​​origin of this exotic culture and art. Hundreds of Reog Ponorogo artists held Reog performances at the Ponorogo District Square, and continued to the local DPRD office. Abroad, especially in Davao City, Southern Philippines, Indonesian citizens living in the 'Packman' country, raised a petition urging the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to take action against the perpetrators of burning the assets of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (LP) in the House of Indonesia (HOI). Because until now the fact finding team of the reog burning case and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs have not disclosed the results of the investigation. "We don't know about the arrival of the fact-finding team from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Davao, but reportedly on last November 10, strangely, none of the Indonesian citizens were visited by the team," said an Indonesian citizen in Davao. Foreign Ministry spokesman Arrmanatha Nasir, as quoted from merdeka.com, said that the investigation into the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao was related to the ownership of the burned equipment. As inventory whose source is APBN, deposit, grant or private property. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs also does not guarantee that the results of the examination will be published. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao previously denied that the burning of reog and dragon head gamelan ornaments was not due to certain religious rituals to exorcise demons. But because Reog and the dragon's head have been eaten by termites. Magelang culturalist, T. Agung Nugroho, better known as Agung Begawan Prabu, spearheaded a petition on the change.org website, to save reog, stop fooling the public. The petition was addressed to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, the President of the Republic of Indonesia, the Minister of Education and Culture, and the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. As of today, Wednesday 2/12/2015, the petition has been signed by 1326 supporters. To quell the protests of Indonesian citizens in the Philippines and at home, it is reported that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao will hold a reog show, on December 10, 2015. The Reog Group from the Ponorogo Police will be selected to perform in Davao, Philippines.
berita_id: Analisis Budaya Budaya Budaya Prabu: Tidak ada rayap atau berpori.Seorang wanita yang berdoa dalam agama tertentu, pembakaran distrik perumahan sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan pengusiran berhala atau roh, adalah bohong.Seorang wanita mendukung doa no.2 Pujian/doa yang menyertainya dalam konteks penghancuran benda -benda yang tidak dapat diterima di mata Tuhan.Bitungnews - Gelombang protes atas pembakaran Reog Ponorogo dan dekorasi naga gamelan di konsulat jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Filipina, terjadi baik di dalam maupun di luar negeri.Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) di seluruh Greater Jakarta, mengadakan protes di depan kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri.Demikian juga di Ponorogo, bidang asal budaya dan seni eksotis ini.Ratusan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan pertunjukan reog di Lapangan Distrik Ponorogo, dan melanjutkan ke kantor DPRD setempat.Di luar negeri, terutama di Kota Davao, Filipina Selatan, warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di negara 'Packman', mengangkat petisi yang mendesak Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengambil tindakan terhadap para pelaku membakar aset -aset konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (LP) di Dewan Indonesia (Hoi).Karena sampai sekarang tim menemukan tim dari kasus pembakaran reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri belum mengungkapkan hasil penyelidikan."Kami tidak tahu tentang kedatangan tim pencari fakta dari Kementerian Luar Negeri di Davao, tetapi dilaporkan pada 10 November lalu, anehnya, tidak ada warga negara Indonesia yang dikunjungi oleh tim," kata seorang warga negara Indonesia di Davao.Juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir, sebagaimana dikutip dari Merdeka.com, mengatakan bahwa penyelidikan terhadap konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao terkait dengan kepemilikan peralatan yang terbakar.Sebagai inventaris yang sumbernya adalah APBN, setoran, hibah atau properti pribadi.Kementerian Luar Negeri juga tidak menjamin bahwa hasil pemeriksaan akan dipublikasikan.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sebelumnya menyangkal bahwa pembakaran ornamen Gamelan Head Reog dan Dragon bukan karena ritual keagamaan tertentu untuk mengusir setan.Tetapi karena Reog dan kepala naga telah dimakan oleh rayap.Budaya Magelang, T. Agung Nugroho, lebih dikenal sebagai Agung Begawan Prabu, mempelopori petisi di situs web Change.org, untuk menyimpan Reog, berhenti membodohi masyarakat.Petisi itu ditujukan kepada Menteri Luar Negeri, Presiden Republik Indonesia, Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan, dan Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Pada hari ini, Rabu 2/12/2015, petisi telah ditandatangani oleh 1326 pendukung.Untuk memadamkan protes warga Indonesia di Filipina dan di rumah, dilaporkan bahwa konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao akan mengadakan pertunjukan reog, pada 10 Desember 2015. Kelompok reog dari polisi Ponorogo akan dipilih untuk tampil di Davao, Filipina.

berita: Previously, the Oral B brand of toothbrush was suddenly being discussed because the material used was Bristles. From the search results on Google, it is known that Bristles means sea urchin. So not a few who think the toothbrush is made of pig hair. Responding to the news, the Head of the North Sumatra Health Service, Usma Polita, said that his party was still looking for the truth about the news that the alleged toothbrush was made of pig hair. "Now I want to see the truth of this, because it really needs to be investigated whether it contains sea urchins or not. If it is proven, there must be MUI readiness to declare halal or not halal, we will work if there is such a statement," said Polita when met on Jalan Mangkara, Tuesday (8/3/2016). Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, who was met on a different occasion, said that if the toothbrush was proven to be made of pig bristles, it could be ascertained that the toothbrush was forbidden to use. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via short message. He further said that if it was later proven to contain sea urchins, then the MUI would take steps to prohibit the public from using the toothbrush. Not only that, the MUI enounce will also take action so that toothbrush products containing sea urchins are withdrawn from the market. (tribunnews.com)
berita_id: Sebelumnya, merek oral B dari sikat gigi tiba -tiba dibahas karena bahan yang digunakan adalah bulu.Dari hasil pencarian di Google, diketahui bahwa bulu berarti landak laut.Jadi tidak sedikit yang berpikir sikat gigi terbuat dari rambut babi.Menanggapi berita itu, kepala Dinas Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Usma Polita, mengatakan bahwa partainya masih mencari kebenaran tentang berita bahwa dugaan sikat gigi itu terbuat dari rambut babi."Sekarang saya ingin melihat kebenaran ini, karena itu benar -benar perlu diselidiki apakah itu mengandung bulu babi atau tidak. Jika terbukti, harus ada kesiapan MUI untuk menyatakan halal atau tidak halal, kita akan bekerja jika ada pernyataan seperti itu," kata Polita ketika bertemu di Jalan Mangkara, Selasa (8/3/2016).Sementara itu, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta, yang bertemu pada kesempatan yang berbeda, mengatakan bahwa jika sikat gigi terbukti terbuat dari bulu babi, dapat dipastikan bahwa sikat gigi dilarang digunakan."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah, ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan mengeksplorasi larangan ini, benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," katanya melalui pesan pendek.Dia lebih lanjut mengatakan bahwa jika kemudian terbukti mengandung bulu babi laut, maka MUI akan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk melarang masyarakat menggunakan sikat gigi.Tidak hanya itu, MUI Enounce juga akan mengambil tindakan sehingga produk sikat gigi yang mengandung landak laut ditarik dari pasar.(tribunnews.com)

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is rich in animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for some people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it the dirtiest fish? that's what he said: a) Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish admirers, indeed not all catfish live or are cultivated in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in public ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish that he harvested every 3 months. once to the markets and restaurants on the roadside in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from several people, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated this fish. Several journalists took samples from the 7 ponds that store this catfish. Actually these seven ponds are all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, in the middle of these ponds there are many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed in the form of manure. If the conditions are like this, then catfish will be the same as jallalah animals, namely animals that consume dirty and unclean food until the law to consume it is haram. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined mudcat or separated from dirty places and given clean food. For a minimum of 3 days quarantine. Danger lurks when you eat catfish, one mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, the fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly once a doctor admitted that he often had patients with swollen thyroid disease and infections, with signs: swollen lower neck, around the neck something like a tumor, eyeballs like wanting to come out, heat around the neck, often coughing inside night is not there because. After being asked, in fact all patients often consume catfish and fried eel. This kind of thing can happen to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, the father, wife and child experience some of the symptoms as above. When this doctor asked one of the professors of doctors at Pluit, actually this catfish contains an easy poison, so that when it is fried, the clean oil will certainly turn black. Up to that point, it could be possible if the catfish's body contains three thousand cancer cells which are very likely for the human body. Friends for you catfish admirers, even though catfish is halal and not very worrying, as a wise customer you must and always be alert. You also don't understand when buying catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, do not need to consume. Or if you believe in its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not in large quantities through regular methods
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang kaya akan protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi sebagian orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa ikan paling kotor?Itulah yang dia katakan: a) ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang pengagum lele, memang tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibudidayakan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam publik.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari sesuatu yang kotor termasuk bangkai ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia hasilkan setiap 3 bulan.Sekali ke pasar dan restoran di pinggir jalan di provinsi Hainan tepatnya di haikou.Keluhan yang sering dari beberapa orang, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan ini.Beberapa jurnalis mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menyimpan ikan lele ini.Sebenarnya ketujuh kolam ini semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, di tengah -tengah kolam ini ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dalam bentuk kotoran.Jika kondisinya seperti ini, maka ikan lele akan sama dengan hewan jallalah, yaitu hewan yang mengonsumsi makanan kotor dan najis sampai hukum mengkonsumsinya adalah haram.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina mudcat atau terpisah dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Untuk minimal 3 hari karantina.Bahaya bersembunyi ketika Anda makan lele, satu seteguk ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan begitu seorang dokter mengakui bahwa ia sering memiliki pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan infeksi, dengan tanda -tanda: leher bawah bengkak, di sekitar leher seperti tumor, bola mata seperti ingin keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di dalam malam tidak ada di sana karena.Setelah ditanya, bahkan semua pasien sering mengonsumsi ikan lele dan belut goreng.Hal semacam ini dapat terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anak mengalami beberapa gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter ini bertanya kepada salah satu profesor dokter di Pluit, sebenarnya ikan lele ini mengandung racun yang mudah, sehingga ketika digoreng, minyak bersih tentu akan berubah menjadi hitam.Hingga saat itu, mungkin saja jika tubuh lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat mungkin bagi tubuh manusia.Teman untuk Anda pengagum lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan, sebagai pelanggan yang bijak Anda harus dan selalu waspada.Anda juga tidak mengerti saat membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, tidak perlu mengkonsumsi.Atau jika Anda percaya pada kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan tidak dalam jumlah besar melalui metode reguler

berita: Apple has finally revealed about the curved iPhone 6 case or called #Bendgate which has been widely discussed on social media. The iPhone 6 product is a rare thing and only a few have experienced it. Apple told a news site CNBC and several other media outlets that there has been a lot of discussion about it on social networks and online, however, Apple has only received 9 complaints from consumers about the iPhone 6 bending during normal use as quoted above. by The Verge, Friday (26/9/2014). Problems with the curved iPhone 6 device are very rare, Apple also added that the iPhone 6 and 6+ design uses steel / titanium metal which can be useful to strengthen the structure of the device. In addition, the screens of the iPhone 6 and 6+ have been strengthened with ions to keep them from deforming. In social organization the past, pictures of the curved iPhone 6 and 6+ have been circulating the internet. Some of the users said that the incident was the result of keeping the iPhone 6 in the trouser pocket for too long. There are also many videos circulating on the YouTube page showing that the iPhone 6 and 6+ are indeed easy to bend with just a little pressure. Apple said it would provide compensation in this case, but Apple would look at it on a case-by-case basis before providing a warranty.
berita_id: Apple akhirnya mengungkapkan tentang case iPhone 6 melengkung atau yang disebut #BendGate yang telah banyak dibahas di media sosial.Produk iPhone 6 adalah hal yang langka dan hanya sedikit yang mengalaminya.Apple mengatakan kepada situs berita CNBC dan beberapa outlet media lainnya bahwa telah ada banyak diskusi tentang hal itu di jejaring sosial dan online, namun, Apple hanya menerima 9 keluhan dari konsumen tentang pembengkokan iPhone 6 selama penggunaan normal seperti dikutip di atas.oleh Verge, Jumat (26/9/2014).Masalah dengan perangkat iPhone 6 melengkung sangat jarang, Apple juga menambahkan bahwa desain iPhone 6 dan 6+ menggunakan logam baja / titanium yang dapat berguna untuk memperkuat struktur perangkat.Selain itu, layar iPhone 6 dan 6+ telah diperkuat dengan ion agar tidak berubah.Dalam organisasi sosial masa lalu, gambar iPhone 6 dan 6+ melengkung telah beredar di internet.Beberapa pengguna mengatakan bahwa insiden itu adalah hasil dari menjaga iPhone 6 di saku celana terlalu lama.Ada juga banyak video yang beredar di halaman YouTube yang menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 dan 6+ memang mudah ditekuk hanya dengan sedikit tekanan.Apple mengatakan akan memberikan kompensasi dalam kasus ini, tetapi Apple akan melihatnya berdasarkan kasus per kasus sebelum memberikan garansi.

berita: The easy curve of the iPhone 6 Plus casing has become a hot topic of conversation lately. And it's not just a figment. There are already iPhone 6 Plus users who have experienced this incident. The screen size of 5.5 inches is indeed in a trouser pocket, but without realizing it while in the smartphone pocket, it changes shape (curved) due to pressure movements that are not realized by the owner. A video posted on Youtube shows the vulnerability of the aluminum-wrapped unibody design. A person in a video uploaded on YouTube tries to bend the iPhone 6 Plus through the pressure of both hands and succeeds. Seen the indentation on the left side, just below the volume buttons. Its slender form actually brings weakness to him. To be fair, someone in the video also uploaded another video with the same level of testing, but using a Samsung Galaxy Note 3 unit. The Samsung Galaxy Note 3, which uses a plastic casing, turns out to be a stronger design frame than the iPhone 6 Plus. Until now, as quoted from GSMarena, Apple has not video recording confirmed this.
berita_id: Kurva yang mudah dari casing iPhone 6 Plus telah menjadi topik percakapan yang hangat belakangan ini.Dan itu bukan hanya isapan jempol.Sudah ada pengguna iPhone 6 Plus yang mengalami kejadian ini.Ukuran layar 5,5 inci memang ada di saku celana, tetapi tanpa menyadarinya saat berada di saku smartphone, itu berubah bentuk (melengkung) karena gerakan tekanan yang tidak diwujudkan oleh pemilik.Video yang diposting di YouTube menunjukkan kerentanan desain unibody yang dibungkus aluminium.Seseorang dalam video yang diunggah di YouTube mencoba menekuk iPhone 6 Plus melalui tekanan kedua tangan dan berhasil.Melihat lekukan di sisi kiri, tepat di bawah tombol volume.Bentuknya yang ramping sebenarnya membawa kelemahan baginya.Agar adil, seseorang dalam video juga mengunggah video lain dengan tingkat pengujian yang sama, tetapi menggunakan unit Samsung Galaxy Note 3.Samsung Galaxy Note 3, yang menggunakan casing plastik, ternyata menjadi bingkai desain yang lebih kuat daripada iPhone 6 Plus.Sampai sekarang, seperti dikutip dari GSMARENA, Apple belum merekam video mengkonfirmasi hal ini.

berita: according to one professor from China, you should always have and keep a needle in the house. Because it can be used to treat people who have had a stroke. When a person has a stroke, the brain's hair vessels are slowly torn. Therefore, first aid is needed. Here are the steps you should take, as reported by Lifehealthandfood.com Stay calm. Regardless of the position of the patient, you must not move or move him. Because if you don't, you will cause the brain's capillaries to burst and bleed inside the brain. Using an injection would be better, but as an alternative you can use a sewing needle. Heat the needle with a candle or a match to sterilize it. With the needle, prick the patient's ten fingertips with it. No expert in acupuncture required. But make sure, if your puncture is a few millimeters away from the nail. Do this until the blood comes out of his fingers. If the blood does not come out, squeeze or massage until the blood comes out. When the blood has flowed from the ten fingers, wait a few minutes, God willing, the patient will be awake and conscious. If you notice a change in the patient's mouth, begin to massage both ears until the blood is flowing into them and the ears are injectant red. Pierce the soft part of the ear with a needle, until two drops of blood fall from each ear. After a few minutes, God willing, his mouth will no longer change. When you make sure there are no more strange symptoms in the patient and have returned to normal, take him to the hospital.
berita_id: Menurut seorang profesor dari Cina, Anda harus selalu memiliki dan menyimpan jarum di rumah.Karena dapat digunakan untuk memperlakukan orang yang mengalami stroke.Ketika seseorang mengalami stroke, pembuluh rambut otak perlahan -lahan robek.Oleh karena itu, pertolongan pertama diperlukan.Berikut adalah langkah -langkah yang harus Anda ambil, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh LifeHealthandfood.com tetap tenang.Terlepas dari posisi pasien, Anda tidak boleh menggerakkan atau menggerakkannya.Karena jika tidak, Anda akan menyebabkan kapiler otak meledak dan berdarah di dalam otak.Menggunakan injeksi akan lebih baik, tetapi sebagai alternatif Anda dapat menggunakan jarum jahit.Panaskan jarum dengan lilin atau kecocokan untuk mensterilkannya.Dengan jarum, tusuk sepuluh ujung jari pasien dengannya.Tidak ada ahli dalam akupunktur yang diperlukan.Tapi pastikan, jika tusukan Anda berjarak beberapa milimeter dari paku.Lakukan ini sampai darah keluar dari jari -jarinya.Jika darah tidak keluar, peras atau pijat sampai darah keluar.Ketika darah telah mengalir dari sepuluh jari, tunggu beberapa menit, Tuhan bersedia, pasien akan terjaga dan sadar.Jika Anda melihat perubahan di mulut pasien, mulailah memijat kedua telinga sampai darah mengalir ke dalamnya dan telinga suntikan merah.Tusuk bagian lunak telinga dengan jarum, sampai dua tetes darah jatuh dari setiap telinga.Setelah beberapa menit, Tuhan mau, mulut -Nya tidak akan lagi berubah.Ketika Anda memastikan tidak ada gejala aneh lagi pada pasien dan telah kembali normal, bawa dia ke rumah sakit.

berita: First Aid for Stroke Patients Stroke is a disease that attacks the nerves in the brain, causing reduced function of the limbs whose nerves have been attacked. Stroke can be caused by various things, such as high blood pressure and rupture of blood vessels so that oxygen intake to the brain is disturbed. You can learn first aid for stroke sufferers that you can learn in the following discussion: Do not move the place. First aid for stroke sufferers is not to move the patient's position when he falls, be it in the bathroom, field or other place. Because if the patient is moved the position there is a possibility that the transfer is wrong and can cause rupture of blood vessels and make the stroke worse. You are only advised to change the patient's position into a sitting position so that the patient does not fall again. Puncture the fingertips using a needle To resuscitate a stroke patient who has fainted you can pierce the patient's fingertips swoon using a syringe, but if there is no syringe you can use a small needle such as a pin, but remember this needle must be sterilized first by burning. The puncture is carried out at a distance of 1mm from the nail. After being stabbed with a needle, try to have at least 1 drop of blood coming out of the fingertips, if within 10 seconds the blood has not dripped, squeeze the finger so that the blood comes out. Pull the ear First aid in the next stroke patient is to pull the patient's ear until it turns red. This is done if the patient wakes up from his stupor with his mouth squeezing. In addition to being pulled, do a stab using a needle at the bottom end of the patient's ear. Also try to get blood out of the ear tip. which the needle has pierced. If the blood has dripped within a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal, or no longer sneezing. Medical Aid If you have performed first aid for stroke patients by piercing the fingertips, and pulling the ear and piercing the tip of the lower ear using a sterile needle so that the patient's condition begins to improve, you still have to take the patient to a medical expert. This medical help must be obtained by stroke patients at least 6 hours after the patient experiences stroke symptoms. Because if it is more than 6 hours after the symptoms, it is likely that the healing process will be more difficult and take longer. First aid for stroke sufferers should be studied carefully, so that you can practice it on people around you who are experiencing stroke symptoms. That way the knowledge you gain can be useful for others.
berita_id: Pertolongan pertama untuk stroke stroke pasien adalah penyakit yang menyerang saraf di otak, menyebabkan penurunan fungsi anggota tubuh yang sarafnya telah diserang.Stroke dapat disebabkan oleh berbagai hal, seperti tekanan darah tinggi dan pecahnya pembuluh darah sehingga asupan oksigen ke otak terganggu.Anda dapat belajar pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke yang dapat Anda pelajari dalam diskusi berikut: Jangan pindahkan tempat itu.Pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke adalah tidak memindahkan posisi pasien ketika dia jatuh, baik di kamar mandi, lapangan atau tempat lain.Karena jika pasien dipindahkan posisi, ada kemungkinan bahwa transfer itu salah dan dapat menyebabkan pecahnya pembuluh darah dan membuat stroke lebih buruk.Anda hanya disarankan untuk mengubah posisi pasien menjadi posisi duduk sehingga pasien tidak jatuh lagi.Menusuk ujung jari menggunakan jarum untuk menyadarkan kembali pasien stroke yang pingsan Anda dapat menembus ujung jari pasien menggunakan jarum suntik, tetapi jika tidak ada jarum suntik, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum kecil seperti pin, tetapi ingat jarum ini harus disterilkan terlebih dahulu dengan membakar.Tusukan dilakukan pada jarak 1mm dari paku.Setelah ditikam dengan jarum, cobalah untuk memiliki setidaknya 1 tetes darah keluar dari ujung jari, jika dalam 10 detik darah belum menetes, peras jari sehingga darah keluar.Tarik telinga pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke berikutnya adalah menarik telinga pasien sampai berubah merah.Ini dilakukan jika pasien bangun dari kebodohannya dengan mulutnya meremas.Selain ditarik, lakukan tusukan menggunakan jarum di ujung bawah telinga pasien.Cobalah juga mengeluarkan darah dari ujung telinga.yang telah ditusuk jarum.Jika darah telah menetes dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal, atau tidak lagi bersin.Bantuan Medis Jika Anda telah melakukan pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke dengan menusuk ujung jari, dan menarik telinga dan menusuk ujung telinga yang lebih rendah menggunakan jarum steril sehingga kondisi pasien mulai membaik, Anda masih harus membawa pasien ke ahli medis.Bantuan medis ini harus diperoleh oleh pasien stroke setidaknya 6 jam setelah pasien mengalami gejala stroke.Karena jika lebih dari 6 jam setelah gejala, kemungkinan proses penyembuhan akan lebih sulit dan memakan waktu lebih lama.Pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke harus dipelajari dengan cermat, sehingga Anda dapat mempraktikkannya pada orang -orang di sekitar Anda yang mengalami gejala stroke.Dengan begitu pengetahuan yang Anda peroleh dapat berguna bagi orang lain.

berita: Parents need to be vigilant. Drug trafficking begins to target children. The modus operandi used by the perpetrators was to mix drugs in pacifiers. The Trade Office is tracking shops, traditional markets and schools to make sure Mataram is free from the candy pacifier. The head of the Mataram City Trade Office, L. Alwan Basri, said this issue must be seen and examined first in the field. Because, this concerns the general public, especially children who need to be protected. The drug mafia mode is considered very dangerous for the younger generation. He asked the Supervision Division of the Trade Office to follow up by tracing the points of shopping centers, markets, kiosks and school canteens. "I will order the supervisory department and the head of the market to check later," said Alwan, Wednesday, March 8 2017. The investigation will involve the Center for Drug and Food Control, Satpol PP and police officers. If the goods are found circulating in the city of Mataram. It will immediately withdraw and secure for laboratory tests. "If it is found, we will immediately confiscate it and withdraw it," he said. The indications do not end there. Police officers will be asked to trace the source. Retailers and merchants will be scrutinized to find out the marketing chain. The government does not want illegal drugs to penetrate students. The former Head of Public Relations and Protocol of the Mataram City Secretariat emphasized that if necessary, the perpetrators were punished according to the applicable legal provisions. "There must be a link. This is what we will find out," he said. Not only pacifiers, but other products that contain harmful substances are routinely monitored. The Mayor and Deputy Mayor of Mataram continue to urge the public to avoid hazardous materials. Especially for parents to provide their children with food cooked at home. "Don't shop outside, let alone unclear hygiene," traffic he ordered.
berita_id: Orang tua harus waspada.Perdagangan narkoba mulai menargetkan anak -anak.Modus operandi yang digunakan oleh para pelaku adalah untuk mencampur obat pada dot.Kantor perdagangan melacak toko, pasar tradisional dan sekolah untuk memastikan Mataram bebas dari dot permen.Kepala Kantor Perdagangan Kota Mataram, L. Alwan Basri, mengatakan masalah ini harus dilihat dan diperiksa terlebih dahulu di lapangan.Karena, ini menyangkut masyarakat umum, terutama anak -anak yang perlu dilindungi.Mode mafia obat dianggap sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda.Dia meminta divisi pengawasan kantor perdagangan untuk menindaklanjuti dengan menelusuri titik -titik pusat perbelanjaan, pasar, kios dan kantin sekolah."Saya akan memesan departemen pengawas dan kepala pasar untuk memeriksa nanti," kata Alwan, Rabu, 8 Maret 2017. Investigasi akan melibatkan Pusat Pengendalian Obat dan Makanan, Satpol PP dan petugas polisi.Jika barang ditemukan beredar di kota Mataram.Ini akan segera menarik dan mengamankan untuk tes laboratorium."Jika ditemukan, kami akan segera menyitanya dan menariknya," katanya.Indikasinya tidak berakhir di sana.Petugas polisi akan diminta untuk melacak sumbernya.Pengecer dan pedagang akan diteliti untuk mengetahui rantai pemasaran.Pemerintah tidak ingin obat -obatan terlarang menembus siswa.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat dan protokol Sekretariat Kota Mataram menekankan bahwa jika perlu, para pelaku dihukum sesuai dengan ketentuan hukum yang berlaku."Pasti ada tautan. Inilah yang akan kita ketahui," katanya.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi produk lain yang mengandung zat berbahaya dipantau secara rutin.Walikota dan wakil walikota Mataram terus mendesak masyarakat untuk menghindari bahan berbahaya.Terutama bagi orang tua untuk memberi anak -anak mereka makanan yang dimasak di rumah."Jangan berbelanja di luar, apalagi kebersihan yang tidak jelas," lalu lintasnya memesan.

berita: The issue of the blocking and closing of Facebook in Indonesia continues to roll. Even the discourse of closing Facebook and social networks is not the first time. It was the same in years past. As the issue resurfaced, the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo), Rudiantara, was afflicted with the question "do you dare to block Facebook in Indonesia?". This follows the incident of the theft of 1 million user data in the country by the analyst firm Cambridge Analytica, which was announced on April 5, 2018. It has been a week since the announcement, Rudiantara has twice sent a warning letter (SP) to Facebook. However, there is no sign that the social networking giant will be blocked. (Also read: This is Facebook's reply letter after being given a second warning from Kominfo) Rudiantara denied that it was said to be "soft" to Facebook. He claimed that Indonesia was considered the most assertive by his fellow Southeast Asians. “Indonesia is considered to be bold and assertive. Which other ASEAN country dares to close the international Electronic System Operator (PSE)? Only Indonesia," he said. "We are the reference. Neighboring countries in ASEAN even sent a number of staff to see the system in Indonesia,” he added. It is known that previously there were several PSEs that were blocked because they were considered to have violated the rules of the game in Indonesia. For example, Telegram, Tumblr, Vimeo, etc. Although he dared to block, Rudiantara did not want to be careless. According to him, there are certain conditions under which the government can immediately take blocking action, for example if there are indications of incitement between groups. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," he said. For the data theft case, Rudiantara said he valuate was still waiting for the full audit results from Facebook. If there are results, then the government can measure the potential problems that arise and take further action. For now, in the First and Second Warning Letters given by Kominfo to Facebook, his party requested that potentially harmful third-party services be stopped. This is said to have been agreed by Facebook. Right now, it's already SP II. We wait, later after SP II it can be upgraded to temporary service termination if needed," he said. Meanwhile, Member of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Bobby Adhityo Rizaldi, hopes that there is an immediate need for a solution regarding the data leak of Facebook users in Indonesia of more than one million users. According to Bobby, closing Facebook is not a solution to solve this problem. "Current challenges must be solved with modern solutions. Closing FB without having a solution will only cause unnecessary domestic noise," Bobby said in a public hearing (RDPU) between Commission I and Facebook Indonesia and Southeast Asia. at the DPR Building, Senayan. Although Facebook has apologized for the misuse of data by an application developed by academics at Cambridge University, DR. Alexander Kogan. However, according to Bobby, there is no need to close Facebook because the use of Facebook by the Indonesian people has touched the Indonesian economy. "The use of the FB platform has touched the joints of the micro-enterprise economy in Indonesia, apart from only social media, it doesn't need to be closed," Bobby explained. The Golkar Party politician advised the Indonesian government to make regulations on commercialization and proper monitoring infrastructure in this regard. "The issue of FB is similar to online motorcycle taxis which have become a new economic media platform, which did not exist 10 years ago," he explained. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the House of Representatives, Bambang Soesatyo, assessed that if Facebook in Indonesia was closed it would cause other problems. He said this, considering that Facebook has helped the Indonesian people a lot. "The steps to close Facebook in my opinion are less creative. Because Facebook has benefits for the people, especially SMEs," said Bamsoet, the typical greeting for the chairman of the DPR. The former chairman of Commission III also added that there must be other solutions and strict sanctions for Facebook. "There must be more creative ways other than closing Facebook, and strict sanctions must still be given," he said.
berita_id: Masalah pemblokiran dan penutupan Facebook di Indonesia terus bergulir.Bahkan wacana untuk menutup Facebook dan jejaring sosial bukan pertama kalinya.Itu sama di tahun -tahun sebelumnya.Sebagai masalah muncul kembali, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo), Rudiantara, menderita pertanyaan "Apakah Anda berani memblokir Facebook di Indonesia?".Ini mengikuti insiden pencurian 1 juta data pengguna di negara itu oleh perusahaan analis Cambridge Analytica, yang diumumkan pada 5 April 2018. Sudah seminggu sejak pengumuman, Rudiiantara telah dua kali mengirim surat peringatan (SP) ke Facebook.Namun, tidak ada tanda bahwa raksasa jejaring sosial akan diblokir.(Baca Juga: Ini adalah surat balasan Facebook setelah diberi peringatan kedua dari Kominfo) Rudiiantara membantah bahwa itu dikatakan "lembut" ke Facebook.Dia mengklaim bahwa Indonesia dianggap paling tegas oleh sesama orang Asia Tenggara."Indonesia dianggap berani dan tegas. Negara ASEAN lainnya yang berani menutup Operator Sistem Elektronik Internasional (PSE)? Hanya Indonesia," katanya."Kami adalah referensi. Negara -negara tetangga di ASEAN bahkan mengirim sejumlah staf untuk melihat sistem di Indonesia," tambahnya.Diketahui bahwa sebelumnya ada beberapa PSE yang diblokir karena mereka dianggap telah melanggar aturan permainan di Indonesia.Misalnya, Telegram, Tumblr, Vimeo, dll. Meskipun ia berani memblokir, Rudiantara tidak ingin ceroboh.Menurutnya, ada kondisi tertentu di mana pemerintah dapat segera mengambil tindakan pemblokiran, misalnya jika ada indikasi hasutan antar kelompok."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar, saya tidak ragu memblokirnya," katanya.Untuk kasus pencurian data, Rudiantara mengatakan dia Nilaiuat masih menunggu hasil audit penuh dari Facebook.Jika ada hasil, maka pemerintah dapat mengukur potensi masalah yang muncul dan mengambil tindakan lebih lanjut.Untuk saat ini, dalam surat peringatan pertama dan kedua yang diberikan oleh Kominfo ke Facebook, partainya meminta agar layanan pihak ketiga yang berpotensi berbahaya dihentikan.Ini dikatakan telah disepakati oleh Facebook.Saat ini, ini sudah SP II.Kami menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan, "katanya. Sementara itu, anggota Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Indonesia, Bobby Adhityo Rizaldi, berharap ada kebutuhan langsung untuk solusi yang tidak ada pada solusinya.Menutup FB tanpa memiliki solusi hanya akan menyebabkan kebisingan domestik yang tidak perlu, "kata Bobby dalam audiensi publik (RDPU) antara Komisi I dan Facebook Indonesia dan Asia Tenggara. Di gedung DPR, Senayan. Meskipun Facebook telah meminta maaf atas Penyalahgunaan Data oleh aplikasi yang dikembangkan oleh akademisi di Cambridge University, Dr. Alexander Kogan, menurut Boban.menyentuh ekonomi Indonesia.ada 10 tahun yang lalu, "ia menjelaskan. Sementara itu, ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat, Bambang Soesatyo, menilai bahwa jika Facebook di Indonesia ditutup itu akan menyebabkan masalah lain. Dia mengatakan ini, mengingat bahwa Facebook telah banyak membantu orang -orang Indonesia." Langkah -langkah untuk menutup Facebook menurut saya kurang kreatif.Karena Facebook memiliki manfaat bagi orang -orang, terutama UKM, "kata Bamsoet, salam khas untuk ketua DPR. Mantan ketua Komisi III juga menambahkan bahwa harus ada solusi lain dan sanksi yang ketat untuk Facebook." Pasti ada cara yang lebih kreatif selain menutup Facebook, dan sanksi ketat masih harus diberikan, "katanya.

berita: Needlestick First Aid For Stroke Sufferers? Suspicious We often hear a chain message spread about First Aid for stroke survivors is to pierce needles at several points from the fingertips to the ear. Some websites from the internet say that this news is a mere hoax. Why? Because a stroke is caused by the rupture of a blood vessel in the brain. The blood that comes out can actually suppress the surrounding brain tissue so that its function is disrupted. A medical expert dr. Devika Y, on the aladokter.com website said that finger pricking with a needle in stroke sufferers is of no benefit. Puncture with a needle can actually pose a risk of infection if the needle used is not sterile. The first aid we need to do if someone has a stroke is to take the patient to a safe place content Position the person in a state of the body facing the left side Immediately contact the nearest hospital and ask for an ambulance to come to the location Or you can take the person directly to the hospital. The sooner a stroke is treated, the better the results. Subsequent treatment will be carried out by the medical team at the hospital. So, if someone has a stroke near us, don't hesitate to immediately take him to the nearest hospital so that he can be handled by an expert.
berita_id: Perlu pertolongan pertama yang perlu untuk penderita stroke?Mencurigakan kita sering mendengar pesan rantai menyebar tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penyintas stroke adalah untuk menembus jarum di beberapa titik dari ujung jari ke telinga.Beberapa situs web dari internet mengatakan bahwa berita ini hanyalah tipuan.Mengapa?Karena stroke disebabkan oleh pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak.Darah yang keluar sebenarnya dapat menekan jaringan otak di sekitarnya sehingga fungsinya terganggu.Seorang ahli medis DR.Devika Y, di situs web Aladokter.com mengatakan bahwa jari tusukan dengan jarum pada penderita stroke tidak bermanfaat.Tusukan dengan jarum sebenarnya dapat menimbulkan risiko infeksi jika jarum yang digunakan tidak steril.Pertolongan pertama yang perlu kita lakukan jika seseorang mengalami stroke adalah membawa pasien ke posisi konten tempat yang aman, orang dalam keadaan tubuh yang menghadap ke sisi kiri segera menghubungi rumah sakit terdekat dan meminta ambulans untuk datang ke lokasi atau Anda dapat membawa orang tersebut langsung ke rumah sakit.Semakin cepat stroke diobati, semakin baik hasilnya.Perawatan selanjutnya akan dilakukan oleh tim medis di rumah sakit.Jadi, jika seseorang memiliki stroke di dekat kami, jangan ragu untuk segera membawanya ke rumah sakit terdekat sehingga ia dapat ditangani oleh seorang ahli.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently endemic, craze and increasingly popular with netizens throughout Indonesia and the world. A question was asked to our editor, "Is playing Pokemon Go Game according to Islam, halal or haram?" As an introduction, Pokemon Go is an augmented-reality-based game developed by the Pokemon Company in collaboration with Niantic and Nintendo. How to play, someone uses a smartphone, both Android and iOS to hunt Pokemon monsters. With Android or iOS smartphone devices, users can hunt Pokemon monsters in the real world, for example in rivers, mountains, streets, offices, markets, supermarkets, lakes, and other places. So, Pokemon monsters seem to exist and hide in the real world that can be seen through your cellphone screen. Users are also busy hunting Pokemon monsters around them. In fact, some of them deliberately venture here and there to places where there are Pokemon monsters, such as Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, and so on. game pokemon go according to islam Suddenly, many children, teenagers and adults are addicted to the Pokemon Go game and are pacing around, busy playing hunting monsters. In fact, there are journalists on the sidelines of their coverage, hunting Pokemon monsters before waiting for sources. Pokemon Go game according to Islam To answer this question, the editor of Islamcendekia.com held a study and limited discussion. From the results of this study, we state that the Pokemon Go game can be legal/permissible or illegal/prohibited. Here's the explanation. Sunni scholars agree that the main sources of Islamic law are the Qur'an and the Sunnah (Hadith of the Prophet). Meanwhile, the sources of law that are still being debated by scholars include ijma, qiyas, ijtihad, istihsan, urf, maslahah mursalah, and so on. Pokemon Go game is clearly not regulated in the Quran and Hadith. That way, we use the maslahah mursalah basis in answering the question of whether the game is haram or halal. From the aspect of its application, it is clear that the law was initially allowed. However, when the game appears harmful, has a bad impact on someone, then the law becomes haram or not allowed. In this context, for example, forgetting the obligation to pray because they are busy hunting Pokemon monsters or being lazy to work, decreased work productivity, children are reluctant to study, and so on. Because, being too busy playing the Pokemon Go Game, which wastes time, even interferes with the concentration of learning and children's development, is part of the devil. So, it is not wrong when an Ulema Council in Egypt forbids the game. As quoted from the Mirror, Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman likened the Pokemon Go game to alcohol which is prohibited in Islam. Because, monster hunting activities are considered like drunk people on the streets. People become on the streets with their eyes glued to their cellphone screens looking for locations where imaginary Pokemon monsters are. They are masses also busy capturing something imaginary or imaginary. In fact, some people even neglect work to find imaginary monsters in the world of cellphone screens. Meanwhile, he left work to earn a living that could support him. Or for example, students, students, or college students, suddenly turn on their smartphones, then hunt monsters and forget their study assignments. If the condition is so severe, then the law in Islam is haram. The analysis carried out by the Deputy Head of Al Azhar Egypt, Abbas Shuman, is quite good. That is, Abbas uses the qiyas method in analyzing a problem. The game Pokemon Go is likened to alcohol which is forbidden in Islam. This is called qiyas, which is establishing the law of a new case that has not been regulated in the Qur'an or hadith, but there are similarities in terms of causes, benefits, dangers, and various other aspects. When mixed with alcohol, with the same effect when drinking intoxicating alcohol, it can be concluded that the Pokemon Go game is haram. It's different when the existence of the Pokemon Go game actually makes people happy and happy, still doesn't leave praying, working and studying as usual, then free time is used to play Pokemon with the intention and purpose of refreshing. So in this case it is permissible or halal. That is, if the existence of the Pokemon Go game, which is currently being flooded with many fans, turns out to be beneficial and good for the mind-health, because there are games that are refreshing and fun, then in the name of benefit, this game is halal. Or, the existence of Pokemon Go will provide skills, skills, and has the benefit of sharpening the right brain, so the law is okay. Thus, this conclusion can be drawn. The law of origin of the Pokemon Go game application according to Islam is permissible, because it is not regulated in the Shari'a, both in the Qur'an and hadith. If it turns out that the impact invites harm, is destructive, and brings bad consequences for users, then playing Pokemon Go is haram/forbidden. This is the answer from the editor of Islamcendekia.com related to questions from readers about playing the Pokemon Go Game according to Islam, halal or haram. Spread this news for our common good, for the future of the nation's children! May be useful.

Dental hygiene is a major factor in maintaining healthy teeth and mouth. You are required to clean your teeth using a toothbrush at least twice a day, after eating and before going to bed. Beware, the Issue of write up Toothbrushes Made of Pig Bristle has been circulating. related to toothbrushes Some toothbrush products are said to use pig bristles as the main ingredient. One of the accounts on the social network Facebook uploaded a brand of brush and wrote that the toothbrush came from boar bristles. In fact, the status has been shared more than 1000 times by his friends. with the name Hamirudin Hamzah said, if he was reprimanded by the cashier of a supermarket that the toothbrush he bought contained sea urchins. In the composition of the toothbrush there was the word Bristles, which is the hair of one of the animals. However, there is an account called Mindy Chin, which explains more about what it is bristles He wrote: This is so funny Bristles ad one of the toothbrush compositions, but not all of them come from pigs, it could be from other animals, Wednesday (5/10/2016) Therefore, not all toothbrushes that we use come from pig bristles. Be careful and choose a really halal toothbrush
berita_id: Kebersihan gigi adalah faktor utama dalam mempertahankan gigi dan mulut yang sehat.Anda diharuskan membersihkan gigi menggunakan sikat gigi setidaknya dua kali sehari, setelah makan dan sebelum tidur.Waspadalah, masalah penulisan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah beredar.Terkait dengan sikat gigi beberapa produk sikat gigi dikatakan menggunakan bulu babi sebagai bahan utama.Salah satu akun di jejaring sosial Facebook mengunggah merek kuas dan menulis bahwa sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Bahkan, statusnya telah dibagikan lebih dari 1000 kali oleh teman -temannya.Dengan nama Hamirudin Hamzah berkata, jika dia ditegur oleh kasir supermarket yang dibeli sikat gigi yang dibelinya berisi landak laut.Dalam komposisi sikat gigi ada kata bulu, yang merupakan rambut salah satu hewan.Namun, ada akun yang disebut Mindy Chin, yang menjelaskan lebih banyak tentang apa yang ditulisnya: Ini sangat lucu, dan salah satu komposisi sikat gigi, tetapi tidak semuanya berasal dari babi, itu bisa dari hewan lain, Rabu (5/10/2016) karena itu, tidak semua sikat gigi yang kami gunakan berasal dari Bristles babi.Hati -hati dan pilih sikat gigi yang benar -benar halal

berita: It's been a week since the launch of the sophisticated smartphone made by Apple. However, there are a lot of comments about Apple products with the latest iPhone 6 Plus. Did Apple in designing and choosing the body material of the iPhone 6 Plus have an error, or is it a feature provided on the iPhone 6 Plus? What makes the public in an uproar about the iPhone 6 Plus is easily curved. Check out the following reviews about the iPhone 6 Plus product. The case of the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily This case began with one of the owners untarnished of the latest iPhone 6 Plus who uploaded a photo on social networks of his iPhone which bends easily after he put the iPhone in his pants for 4 full hours. An owner named Hanzon, the owner of the new iPhone, found out after taking it out of his pocket that the iPhone's body was bent. Not only the case of Hanzon's iPhone, another iPhone 6 Plus owner named Devin Pitcher also expressed the same complaint about his latest iPhone in line with the case experienced by Hanzon. After Devin put his iPhone 6 Plus in the front pocket of his pants, when Devin took it out of his pocket, he found that the iPhone 6 Plus was bent in the middle, as if it couldn't withstand the pressure so that the iPhone 6 Plus easily curved. Why iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend Apple also admits that some of the products sold have a curve in the body of the new product. However, said the Apple, it has materialized the iPhone 6 Plus with stainless steel and titanium as a protective body for the newest iPhone. The iPhone 6 Plus is also made of the strongest glass in the smartphone industry, and Apple workers have also tested it many times with many tests to test the durability of the body and other devices. However, some opinions from someone who does not want to be named, gives his opinion about the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend. If one of the materials for making the body from Apple is deemed not strong enough, or Apple is wrong in choosing the material with the size of the iPhone 6 Plus which is large enough to measure up to 5.5 ". Not comparable between the size and body of the iPhone 6 Plus. If the size is still in the 4.5” range, it may still be able to withstand bending.
berita_id: Sudah seminggu sejak peluncuran smartphone canggih yang dibuat oleh Apple.Namun, ada banyak komentar tentang produk Apple dengan iPhone 6 Plus terbaru.Apakah Apple dalam merancang dan memilih bahan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus memiliki kesalahan, atau apakah fitur yang disediakan di iPhone 6 Plus?Apa yang membuat publik dalam kegemparan tentang iPhone 6 Plus mudah melengkung.Lihatlah ulasan berikut tentang produk iPhone 6 Plus.Kasus iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah membungkuk dengan mudah, kasus ini dimulai dengan salah satu pemilik yang tidak ternoda dari iPhone 6 Plus terbaru yang mengunggah mengeluarkannya dari sakunya bahwa tubuh iPhone bengkok.Tidak hanya kasus iPhone Hanzon, pemilik iPhone 6 plus lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan yang sama tentang iPhone terbarunya Tidak sebanding antara ukuran dan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus. Jika ukurannya masih dalam kisaran 4.5”, mungkin masih dapat dengan melengkung.

berita: Dream - The Muslim community was shocked by the news about a toothbrush made from pig bristles. One of the markers is the ingredient in the toothbrush, 'bristle', which is listed on the packaging. The word 'bristle' is then interpreted as 'sea urchin'. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. But, does 'bristle' really mean 'sea urchin'? Regarding this case, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) provided an explanation. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term 'bristle' means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to Webster's Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For care example, 'Boar Bristle Brush' which means 'Boar Bristle Brush. 'Boar' means 'boar' or 'boar'. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. "This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles," wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term 'bristle' in the packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. "When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material." "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off that characteristic smell when burned." wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Dream - Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah bahan di sikat gigi, 'Bristle', yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata 'bristle' kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai 'landak laut'.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Tapi, apakah 'Bristle' benar -benar berarti 'landak laut'?Mengenai kasus ini, Institut untuk Studi Makanan, Obat -obatan dan Kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) memberikan penjelasan.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah 'bulu' berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Webster, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Sebagai contoh, 'Boar Bristle Brush' yang berarti 'Boar Bristle Brush.'Babi' berarti 'babi hutan' atau 'babi hutan'.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan."Ini berarti bahwa produk ini adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar. Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi," tulis LPPOM MUI, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang mengandung istilah 'bristle' dalam kemasan harus dibuat dari Bristles babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka."Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber material, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan. Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.""Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan aroma khas saat dibakar."menulis lppom mui.

berita: In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. That's a chain of news circulating on social networks that call catfish the dirtiest fish. This news is 100 percent fake. Facts say catfish is low in cholesterol. Catfish circulating in the market are generally cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish fact can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Itu adalah rantai berita yang beredar di jejaring sosial yang menyebut ikan kucing paling kotor.Berita ini 100 persen palsu.Fakta mengatakan ikan lele rendah kolesterol.Ikan lele yang beredar di pasar umumnya dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan fakta lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: A number of street vendors (PKL) selling candy snacks in schools were raided by the Surabaya City Satpol-PP. The raids were carried out at schools in 31 sub-districts, Tuesday giddy (7/3). Head of Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, said the control operation was carried out because previously candy "The candy is feared to contain substances that are not good for consumption, especially children," he explained at the Surabaya City Satpol PP office. Irvan admitted that the raid on snacks was carried out starting Monday (6/3) with Involving the ranks of the Health Service and related agencies From the results of operations in 14 sub-districts yesterday, his party has secured as many as 345 bottles of candy. "We comb it in schools, especially elementary schools," he said. and others. The candy is produced in China and sold at a price of Rp. 1000 per seed. The name is hard candy," he said briefly. The presence of candy containing hazardous substances stems from the operation to control the PP Satpol against elementary school students who skipped school in Ploso, Tambaksari One of the students caught in the operation while at the internet cafe admitted that his head was dizzy after consuming candy After hearing the news, the Mayor of Surabaya Tri Rismaharini ordered Satpol PP to carry out candy snacks at school
berita_id: Sejumlah pedagang kaki lima (PKL) yang menjual camilan permen di sekolah-sekolah digerebek oleh Surabaya City Satpol-PP.Penggerebekan dilakukan di sekolah-sekolah di 31 sub-distrik, Selasa Giddy (7/3).Kepala Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, mengatakan operasi kontrol dilakukan karena sebelumnya permen "permen itu dikhawatirkan mengandung zat yang tidak baik untuk dikonsumsi, terutama anak -anak," jelasnya di kantor Surabaya City Satpol PP.Irvan mengakui bahwa serangan pada makanan ringan dilakukan mulai Senin (6/3) dengan melibatkan jajaran layanan kesehatan dan lembaga terkait dari hasil operasi di 14 sub-distrik kemarin, partainya telah mendapatkan sebanyak 345 botol permen."Kami menyisirnya di sekolah, terutama sekolah dasar," katanya.dan lainnya.Permen diproduksi di Cina dan dijual dengan harga RP.1000 per biji.Nama itu permen yang keras, "katanya sebentar. Kehadiran permen yang mengandung zat berbahaya berasal dari operasi untuk mengendalikan PP Satpol terhadap siswa sekolah dasar yang melewatkan sekolah di Ploso, Tambaksari salah satu siswa yang terjebak dalam operasi di kafe internet mengakui bahwa kepalanya merasa pusing setelah mengkonsumsi permen setelah mendengar berita, Mayor dari The Mayor.Camilan di sekolah

berita: The Brimob Mako Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, was reported to be in a riot on Friday (11/10/2017) afternoon. This news is widely discussed on social media. "Mako Brimob rioted this afternoon. Reportedly 3 blocks of the detention room caught fire & the doors were destroyed. According to my source, the reason was because a group of Police there threw Al-Qur'an and hadith books belonging to prisoners," tweeted the owner of the Twitter account @CondetWarrior. This account completes its tweet with a video that the owner of the account says the source sent him. The video shows a number of people who appear to be convicted of terrorism, making gestures that indicate that they are in a tense atmosphere, and then the camera, which appears to be from a cell phone, moves to reveal a shattered window. "Just now, my intelligence told me that this was a deliberate riot so that Ahok could be transferred from the Mobile Brigade video recording Headquarters to house arrest. Everything is possible, but what is clear is that if it is true that the police threw the Qur'an, then your business is with the entire Muslim Ummah!" chirp that account again. Panjimas.com reported, a social media channel reported that the riots occurred because the prisoners who were charged with terrorism cases were angry when they heard the news that there were guards who allegedly abused the Koran and the books of the clerics belonging to the prisoners.
