"Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense ...," reads an excerpt from #AlfathChannel which is spread throughout the world. social media. In addition, videos and photos of the riots and detainees waving the monotheism flag have gone viral. In the video, the atmosphere of the Mako Brimbob detention cell looks shattered, there are also broken glass and wood that the prisoners break down. Meanwhile, the screams of takbir of the prisoners resounded. However, there were also other prisoners who tried to calm the atmosphere. After the riots, it was reported that the atmosphere was starting to become conducive, the warden of the Mako Brimod Detention Center was reported to have tried to invite the detainees to negotiate. Until this news was revealed, there has been no release of clarification from the Mako Brimob Detention Center.
berita_id: Pusat Penahanan Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, dilaporkan berada dalam kerusuhan pada hari Jumat (11/10/2017) sore.Berita ini banyak dibahas di media sosial."Mako Brimob Rioted sore ini. Dilaporkan 3 blok dari ruang penahanan terbakar & pintu-pintu dihancurkan. Menurut sumber saya, alasannya adalah karena sekelompok polisi di sana melemparkan buku-buku al-Qur'an dan Hadits milik tahanan," tweet pemilik akun Twitter @Condetwarrior.Akun ini melengkapi tweetnya dengan video bahwa pemilik akun mengatakan sumber mengirimnya.Video ini menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang tampaknya dihukum karena terorisme, membuat gerakan yang menunjukkan bahwa mereka berada dalam suasana tegang, dan kemudian kamera, yang tampaknya berasal dari ponsel, bergerak untuk mengungkapkan jendela yang hancur."Baru saja, kecerdasan saya memberi tahu saya bahwa ini adalah kerusuhan yang disengaja sehingga Ahok dapat ditransfer dari kantor pusat perekaman video brigade seluler untuk menampung penangkapan. Semuanya mungkin, tetapi yang jelas adalah bahwa jika benar bahwa polisi melemparkan Al -Qur'an, maka bisnis Anda adalah dengan seluruh umat Muslim!" "Kicaukan akun itu lagi.Panjimas.com melaporkan, sebuah saluran media sosial melaporkan bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena para tahanan yang didakwa dengan kasus -kasus terorisme marah ketika mereka mendengar kabar bahwa ada penjaga yang diduga melecehkan Alquran dan buku -buku ulama milik para tahanan."Densus dan sipir dengan sombong memasuki kamar Ikhwan dan Alquran diinjak oleh Brimob, sipir dan Densus akhirnya menyebabkan Ikhwan mengamuk dan menghancurkan ruang penahanan Brimob Mako di seluruh dunia yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.media sosial.Selain itu, video dan foto kerusuhan dan tahanan yang melambaikan bendera monoteisme telah menjadi viral.Dalam video itu, suasana sel penahanan Mako Brimbob terlihat hancur, ada juga pecahan kaca dan kayu yang dihancurkan oleh para tahanan.Sementara itu, teriakan takbir para tahanan bergema.Namun, ada juga tahanan lain yang mencoba menenangkan suasana.Setelah kerusuhan, dilaporkan bahwa atmosfer mulai menjadi kondusif, sipir Pusat Penahanan Brimod Mako dilaporkan telah mencoba mengundang tahanan untuk bernegosiasi.Sampai berita ini terungkap, belum ada rilis klarifikasi dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax or false news. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. It does not exist and has never been discussed. he said on Monday, March 12, 2018 While giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he frailty received a question about it. "What the Minister of State has said (in social media) is a hoax, it is indeed like that. In today's social media, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those of the government and published," he said. n The Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia In this issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan atau berita palsu.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat.Itu tidak ada dan belum pernah dibahas.Dia mengatakan pada hari Senin, 12 Maret 2018 sambil memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), ia dengan lemah menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu."Apa yang dikatakan Menteri Negara (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah dan diterbitkan," katanya.Di Wakil Presiden Republik Indonesia dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa Presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan.

berita: Is it true that catfish contain cancer cells? There are many rumors about this delicious fish, that there are about 3000 cancer cells located in the body of catfish. Let's peel in depth according to Dr. Oz Indonesia. Who does not know this one fish? Surely all countries know it because the meat is very soft and has a very high nutritional value. Catfish is a type of fish that is classified as very strong and can live even in wastewater. If you are in Indonesia, you will definitely not miss the name of catfish cuisine, there are many preparations that can be made with catfish ingredients including catfish pecel, tongseng, basil, spicy catfish sauce, and many more. Why Many Public Opinion That Catfish Contain Cancer Cells, Is That True? This public opinion had become viral and even became a scene in the world of news information, and this has also been revealed by the television program Dr. Oz Indonesia. Then is it true that this catfish when consumed by someone can cause cancer? According to Dr. Oz Indonesia has been revealed and has been explained to conclude that there are 2 things that cause this catfish to have thousands of cancer cells, including: Where is the Place for Catfish Cultivated? What's Worth? The presence of this opinion made the fisheries service participate in conducting research and the results revealed that some of the sample catfish contained cancer cells and some were negative. After being investigated by various catfish farmers, it turned out that the cause was the place where the catfish were cultivated. There are some catfish that live in ponds with waste that is not fit for consumption and some live in fresh water. The catfish farmers admitted that the catfish's ability to live in murky water was even in piles of garbage or pig manure, so that the farmers did not have to bother draining their pond water. This is what makes the catfish very toxic, the catfish is directly contaminated with liquids that are classified as having a bad impact on the consumer. Do Catfish Consuming Dirt or Waste According to doctor Oz Indonesia in his video, it has been stated that something from above can sink so that the catfish consumes it. What about poop droppings like chicken, bird or even pig? Of course, it's clear, isn't it, that catfish is one type of fish that eats dirt. Currently, many catfish farmers can use alternative feeds such as cow dung, poultry, humans and so on. This indeed provides a distinct advantage for catfish farmers, to reap 2x profits, the manufacturing process is very simple, for example, cow dung: Put cow dung into a barrel or container that can be closed, Mix waste such as tofu dregs, Stir until mixed, Leave it open the barrel or container, to invite flies to lay eggs, sugar or honey can be added, leave it for one week, so that the larvae or worms can come out and are ready to be harvested. If you look at it, it is very disgusting, the catfish that is consumed turns out to be used from worm feed. Not to mention, feed from human waste because this is precisely what is very dangerous because the worms that grow are hard to destroy even though they have been cooked, as a result the eggs settle in the catfish's body and enter the bodies of other humans. One of the most common examples is pinworms, which can survive approximately 3 weeks in even open areas. However, Dr. Oz said that not all breeders do this, that's why we have to be smart in choosing the right catfish market. Keep catfish clean and try to cook catfish food very thoroughly. Why Can Catfish Survive In Muddy Water, sum And Mixed With Dirt? Catfish are indeed equipped with the advantage of being able to survive in cloudy and dirty water because this type of fish is equipped with labyrinthine respiration. What is a maze? The labyrinth is an additional breathing apparatus for fish whose function is to take air above the surface and store it for a long time, so don't be surprised if the catfish rises to the surface only briefly but can last a long time under murky water that is poor in oxygen even if it is mixed with dirt. Benefits of Catfish Vs Salmon Many say that the content of catfish is equivalent to the content in salmon, according to Dr. Oz this is true because catfish contains omega 3 and omega 6 just like salmon. The difference is how to consume it, if the salmon can be swallowed raw, but the catfish does not have to be cooked first to reduce the bacteria present. Some of the benefits that can be obtained from health, including: Helping nourish the brain Omega 3 fats and omega 6 fats are fats that are good for the body, which are HDL (good fats) which help the body fulfill brain nutrition. Rich in protein, it is very beneficial for a child who is growing and developing, building muscle mass and bone density. The content of B12, just a portion of catfish can help meet the needs of B12 in the body, B12 is very influential on the body that is often tired. It is recommended if your body feels tired, try to eat catfish. Consuming catfish is also beneficial for curing anemia, the body is easily tired and difficulty in remembering something. Phosphorus for the formation of bones and teeth. Catfish does contain a lot of phosphorus, not only from milk, it turns out that catfish is also useful for meeting the needs of bones and teeth. Phosphorus in the human body is essentially absorbed around 70% will be digested by the body and used to support healthy teeth and bones. Lowers blood pressure. This type of fish is very helpful in lowering high blood pressure, omega 3 in fish is fat (HDL) which is very good in fighting bad fats (LDL). People tend not to know that high cholesterol is closely related to the narrowing of blood vessels that causes hypertension (high blood pressure). You can reduce this hypertension by consuming catfish 3 times a day.

When Facebook Will Be Closed - Recently, there has been a lot of talk about Facebook being closed or frozen in the country, this is certainly very troubling for those who have been relying on Facebook as a medium of communication or also a medium for selling goods online. Actually, it is not without reason why the government wants to block Facebook, this is because of the misuse of leaked data on Facebook users, so it is feared that later it will endanger the stability of domestic security. Facebook itself has long been used by the Indonesian people as a medium of communication, on April 17, 2018, the DPR had a meeting with Facebook. The government itself still has the will and gives Facebook one month or thirty days to audit and report later, if within one month there is still no news on how it will continue, then the DPR will propose a temporary suspension of Facebook so that later we can't use facebook. Technology can sometimes be two-sided and sometimes it depends on how we use it, there are so many events or problems that are caused by provocations on social media, for that we need to respond to the development of the technology world in a positive way. So have you got an answer about when Facebook will be closed, isn't it, it's better if we wait for news from Facebook later, as for if the government decides to block Facebook then we have to get ready resolve to look for other social media that we can make as an option, maybe that's all to share a little rud-arsenio.com this time, have a nice day.
berita_id: Ketika Facebook akan ditutup - baru -baru ini, ada banyak pembicaraan tentang Facebook yang ditutup atau dibekukan di negara ini, ini tentu sangat meresahkan bagi mereka yang telah mengandalkan Facebook sebagai media komunikasi atau juga media untuk menjual barang secara online.Sebenarnya, bukan tanpa alasan mengapa pemerintah ingin memblokir Facebook, ini karena penyalahgunaan data yang bocor pada pengguna Facebook, sehingga dikhawatirkan bahwa nanti akan membahayakan stabilitas keamanan domestik.Facebook itu sendiri telah lama digunakan oleh orang -orang Indonesia sebagai media komunikasi, pada 17 April 2018, DPR mengadakan pertemuan dengan Facebook.Pemerintah itu sendiri masih memiliki surat wasiat dan memberikan Facebook satu bulan atau tiga puluh hari untuk mengaudit dan melaporkan nanti, jika dalam waktu satu bulan masih belum ada berita tentang bagaimana hal itu akan berlanjut, maka DPR akan mengusulkan penangguhan sementara Facebook sehingga nanti kita tidak dapat menggunakan Facebook.Teknologi kadang-kadang bisa dua sisi dan kadang-kadang tergantung pada bagaimana kita menggunakannya, ada begitu banyak peristiwa atau masalah yang disebabkan oleh provokasi di media sosial, untuk itu kita perlu menanggapi pengembangan dunia teknologi dengan cara yang positif.Jadi, apakah Anda mendapat jawaban tentang kapan Facebook akan ditutup, bukan, lebih baik jika kita menunggu berita dari Facebook nanti, karena jika pemerintah memutuskan untuk memblokir Facebook maka kita harus siap menyelesaikan untuk mencari media sosial lain yang bisa kita buat sebagai pilihan, mungkin itu saja untuk berbagi rud-arsenio.com kali ini, semoga harimu menyenangkan.

berita: Surabaya (SI Online) -Surabaya City Government officials conducted raids on the circulation and trade of candy packed with baby pacifiers, throughout elementary schools. The excitement was triggered by the circulation of news that immediately went viral on social media networks, revealing the confession of a number of children feeling dizzy after consuming pacifiers. Allegedly, this type of candy contains drugs. “It is not yet known whether it contains drugs or other dangerous substances; We still need research in the laboratory,” said an officer from the Surabaya City Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), after conducting a raid recently. Candy pacifiers, packaged differently from most candy. In the form of a whitish powder that tends to be pink, wrapped in paper. On the outside of the wrapper or packaging, it says Hard Candy. Likewise, on the box packaging containing 20 packs of pacifiers, it also reads hard candy. How to consume; The powder is put into a bottle, and given water according to the amount stated in the manufacturer's instructions. The bottle is then closed with a lid equipped with a rubber teat (like a baby pacifier). The bottle is daughter then shaken gently, until the mixture thickens and is ready to be consumed by sucking from the tip of the teat, like a baby or toddler drinking milk. “The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste. Another student said that this type of candy had been traded in the school environment for a long time. Not in the school canteen, but by traders outside the school's front yard fence. “The price is a pack of a thousand elephant dolls. While the one with a picture of a swan, one thousand can get two packs,” he said and added, this candy is in great demand. Because the price is cheap, the shape is attractive, as well as how to prepare the candy until it is consumed, it is very fun. Previously, about the circulation of this candy had been widely circulated on social media networks, especially on Whatsapp (WA) and others on Facebook and even Instagram. Called, candy is widely circulated in elementary schools. Some of them even revealed the confession of a number of children, after consuming pacifiers they felt dizzy. Among posting photos on social media networks, a member of the Satpol PP is holding a candy pacifier. Followed by writing; "DOT candy, allegedly contains drugs. Please help spread this information, mother, so that our sons / daughters are protected from dangerous snacks." The People's Welfare Section (Kesra) of a number of sub-district offices, together with officers from the Kelurahan level, Trantibbang and supported by Satpol PP, acts as if simultaneously working with the support of police officers, observing the circulation of this candy. Even then take a number of samples to be investigated further about the substance content of the candy which is said to cause dizziness. The social media network also mentions the raids that have been carried out by officers in the city center and four corners of the city of Surabaya; covers 14 districts. In the District of Pabean Cantikan at SD Krembangan Utara 2/57. Wiyung District at SDN 1 Balas klumprik and SDN Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilang sub-district at SDN Begongin Kedurus I, SDN 1 Karang-Pilang and TK Darma Praja. The sub-district of the field at SDN Petemon. Sambikerep District in SDN Sambikerep 1 and 5. Sukolilo District on Jalan Kejawen VIII and Pasar Keputih Lama. Tambaksari District at SDN Gading VII and SDN Tambaksari 1. Then in the District of Trenggilis Mejoyo at SDN Kedangsari 8, SDN Trenggilis Mejoyo and SDN Panjangjiwo. Jambangan District in SDN Kebonsari 10, SDN Pagesangan, and Komplek Komplek Kebonsari and Pag3esangan IV RT 3. In Tandes Subdistrict, Romli Thammim Elementary School and Al Faruq Bulak Rukem Kindergarten. Gubeng District at Mojo Elementary School, Mojoklangru Kidul Street. Simokerto District in Simokerto VI/139 Elementary School and YPPI Elementary School. Gununganyar District in Al Islah Elementary School and Mifta'ul Ulum Elementary School. In addition, raids were also carried out in a number of other elementary schools, including SD Yapita, SDN 245, all SD Muhammadiyah and SD Bunga Bangsa.
berita_id: Surabaya (SI Online) -Pejabat pemerintah Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan pada sirkulasi dan perdagangan permen yang dikemas dengan dot bayi, di seluruh sekolah dasar.Kegembiraan itu dipicu oleh sirkulasi berita yang segera menjadi viral di jaringan media sosial, mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot.Diduga, permen jenis ini berisi obat -obatan."Belum diketahui apakah mengandung obat -obatan atau zat berbahaya lainnya; kami masih membutuhkan penelitian di laboratorium," kata seorang petugas dari Unit Polisi Polisi Sipil Kota Surabaya (Satpol PP), setelah melakukan serangan baru -baru ini.Permen dot, dikemas secara berbeda dari kebanyakan permen.Dalam bentuk bubuk keputihan yang cenderung merah muda, dibungkus kertas.Di bagian luar pembungkus atau kemasan, katanya permen keras.Demikian juga, pada kemasan kotak yang berisi 20 paket dot, itu juga membaca permen keras.Cara mengkonsumsi;Bubuk dimasukkan ke dalam botol, dan diberi air sesuai dengan jumlah yang dinyatakan dalam instruksi pabrik.Botol kemudian ditutup dengan tutup yang dilengkapi dengan dot karet (seperti dot bayi).Botolnya adalah anak perempuan kemudian terguncang dengan lembut, sampai campuran mengental dan siap dikonsumsi dengan mengisap dari ujung dot, seperti bayi atau balita minum susu.“The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste.Siswa lain mengatakan bahwa permen jenis ini telah diperdagangkan di lingkungan sekolah sejak lama.Bukan di kantin sekolah, tetapi oleh pedagang di luar pagar halaman depan sekolah."Harganya adalah sebungkus seribu boneka gajah. Sementara yang memiliki gambar angsa, seribu bisa mendapatkan dua bungkus," katanya dan menambahkan, permen ini sangat diminati.Karena harganya murah, bentuknya menarik, serta bagaimana menyiapkan permen sampai dikonsumsi, sangat menyenangkan.Sebelumnya, tentang sirkulasi permen ini telah diedarkan secara luas di jaringan media sosial, terutama di WhatsApp (WA) dan lainnya di Facebook dan bahkan Instagram.Disebut, permen secara luas diedarkan di sekolah dasar.Beberapa dari mereka bahkan mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak, setelah mengonsumsi dot mereka merasa pusing.Di antara memposting foto di jaringan media sosial, anggota SATPOL PP memegang dot permen.Diikuti dengan menulis;"Dot Candy, diduga mengandung narkoba. Tolong bantu menyebarkan informasi ini, ibu, sehingga putra / putri kita terlindungi dari makanan ringan yang berbahaya."Bagian Kesejahteraan Rakyat (Kesra) dari sejumlah kantor sub-distrik, bersama dengan petugas dari tingkat Kelurahan, Trantibbang dan didukung oleh Satpol PP, bertindak seolah-olah bekerja secara bersamaan dengan dukungan petugas polisi, mengamati peredaran permen ini.Bahkan kemudian mengambil sejumlah sampel untuk diselidiki lebih lanjut tentang kandungan zat permen yang dikatakan menyebabkan pusing.Jaringan media sosial juga menyebutkan penggerebekan yang telah dilakukan oleh petugas di pusat kota dan empat sudut kota Surabaya;mencakup 14 distrik.Di distrik Pabean Canyikan di Sd Krembangan Utara 2/57.Distrik Wiyung di Sdn 1 Balas Klumprik dan Sdn Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilan Sub-distrik di Sdn Begongin Kedurus I, Sdn 1 Karang-Pilang dan Tk Darma Praja.Sub-distrik lapangan di SDN Petemon.Distrik Sambikerep di SDN Sambikerep 1 dan 5. Distrik Sukolilo di Jalan Kejawen VIII dan Pasar KEPUTIH LAMA.Distrik Tambaksari di Sdn Gading VII dan Sdn Tambaksari 1. Kemudian di distrik Trenggilis Mejoyo di Sdn Kedangsari 8, Sdn Trenggilis Mejoyo dan Sdn Panjangjiwo.Distrik Jambangan di SDN Kebonsari 10, Sdn Pagesangan, dan Komplek Komplek Kebonsari dan Pag3esangan IV Rt 3. Di Tandes Subdistrict, Sekolah Dasar Romli Thammim dan Al Faruq Bulak Rukem TK.Distrik Gubeng di Sekolah Dasar Mojo, Mojoklangru Kidul Street.Distrik Simokerto di Simokerto VI/139 Sekolah Dasar dan Sekolah Dasar YPPI.Distrik Gununganyar di Sekolah Dasar Al Islah dan Sekolah Dasar Mifta'ul Ulum.Selain itu, penggerebekan juga dilakukan di sejumlah sekolah dasar lainnya, termasuk SD Yapita, SDN 245, semua SD Muhammadiyah dan SD Bunga Bangsa.

berita: All Muslims who read this article need to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush brand. Recently, one type of dental cleaner has been found that contains non-halal ingredients. The material is known to contain sea urchins and is used as an ingredient in the manufacture of toothbrushes. To find out whether the toothbrush contains the forbidden ingredients or not is easy. Check the packaging and abound look for the words 'BRISTLE'. If the material is contained in the package, it means that the manufacturer has used pig bristles as one of the ingredients in the toothbrush. So it's best to re-check the packaging of the goods you buy and identify the names of haram ingredients which are usually disguised to trick consumers. The term Bristle means Pig Hair or sea urchins. In addition to toothbrushes, Bristle ingredients are also found in bread brushes (bread spreaders). The writing form is usually different, sometimes just 'Bristle', sometimes 'Pure Bristle' or '100% China Bristle'. Avoid using ingredients that Bristle is made of. Spread this information to other family and friends so that more people know and avoid this non-halal product.
berita_id: Semua Muslim yang membaca artikel ini harus lebih berhati -hati dalam memilih merek sikat gigi.Baru-baru ini, satu jenis pembersih gigi telah ditemukan yang mengandung bahan-bahan non-halal.Bahan ini diketahui mengandung bulu babi dan digunakan sebagai bahan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Untuk mengetahui apakah sikat gigi mengandung bahan terlarang atau tidak mudah.Periksa kemasannya dan lihat kata -kata 'bulu'.Jika bahan terkandung dalam paket, itu berarti bahwa pabrikan telah menggunakan bulu babi sebagai salah satu bahan di sikat gigi.Jadi yang terbaik adalah memeriksa ulang kemasan barang yang Anda beli dan mengidentifikasi nama-nama bahan haram yang biasanya menyamar untuk menipu konsumen.Istilah bulu berarti rambut babi atau landak laut.Selain sikat gigi, bahan -bahan bulu juga ditemukan dalam sikat roti (penyebar roti).Bentuk penulisan biasanya berbeda, kadang -kadang hanya 'bulu', kadang -kadang 'bulu murni' atau '100% china bristle'.Hindari menggunakan bahan -bahan yang terbuat dari bulu.Sebarkan informasi ini ke keluarga dan teman-teman lain sehingga lebih banyak orang tahu dan hindari produk non-halal ini.

berita: Jakarta - Complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users that their handsets bend easily have been denied by Apple. According to Apple, as long as users are careful, the incident doesn't need to happen. Apple does admit that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to his spokesman, as of Wednesday (9/24/2014), only 9 people had complained about this issue. iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect the body. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry, said an Apple spokesman, as quoted from CNBC, Friday (26/9/2014). Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. The iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend problem has been reported by several users, complete with photos. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, newly he found the center of his new smartphone slightly bent. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he's been putting it on, but it's clearly quite warped.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mudah ditekuk handset mereka dengan mudah ditolak oleh Apple.Menurut Apple, selama pengguna berhati -hati, insiden itu tidak perlu terjadi.Apple memang mengakui bahwa ada iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut juru bicaranya, pada hari Rabu (9/24/2014), hanya 9 orang yang mengeluh tentang masalah ini.iPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra.Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi tubuh.Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone, kata juru bicara Apple, seperti dikutip dari CNBC, Jumat (26/9/2014).Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus Easy to Bend telah dilaporkan oleh beberapa pengguna, lengkap dengan foto.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, baru ia menemukan pusat smartphone barunya sedikit bengkok.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia mengenakannya, tapi jelas cukup bengkok.

berita: There have been a lot of people's reactions to this very popular game, Pokemon Go. The scholars in Egypt and Arabia declared this game haram and un-Islamic because it made the players behave like drunk people and crazy to hunt pocket monsters (pocket monsters). Now on various social media in Indonesia, people are spreading information stating that Pokemon Go promotes Zionism and is a game that insults Islam. It is said that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am a Jew", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be a Jew", and Charmander means "God is Weak". Apparently this accusation has been around for a long time. In 2001 when the popular Pokemon video game, rumors circulated that the game was a Jewish conspiracy to spread Zionism. In an article published on the LA Times news site, in that year various brochures circulated in the Middle East stating that Pokemon was a Jewish company and the names of the monsters in it insulted Islam. The brochure further states that Pokemon actually means "I'm Jewish". "The brochure, written in poor Arabic, states that Pikachu, the most popular and powerful character, means 'I am Jewish' in Japanese," said Abdel Rahman Mtowah, editor of Saudi Arabia's Al Sharq al Awsat newspaper. The allegation that Pokemon and Pikachu are of Syriac enounce or Syriac origin, the Aramaic dialect of Aramaic itself was debunked in 2001 when the rumors circulated. The Syriac Orthodox Christian Church in Jordan states that Pokemon and Pikachu are not of Syriac origin. A similar rebuttal was released by the Orthodox Christian church in Jerusalem. The Japanese Cultural Attache in Jordan in 2001 stated that many people asked him to tell them the Japanese word for "Jew". Jew in Japanese is "youdayajin", a far cry from the word Pokemon. "Pokemon itself stands for 'pocket monsters'. In Japan we use the word 'poke' which means something small. "Pokekom" means 'pocket computer'," Tahara told AFP. "I don't know Hebrew but as far as I know there are no foreign or hidden languages ​​in Pokemon," said Tahara. Pokemon itself was created by Satoshi Tajiri, Ken Sugimori and managed by The Pokemon Company, a combination of Nintendo, Game Freak and Creatures. The name Pokemon itself is an abbreviation of Pocket Monsters or pocket monsters. In Japanese it is called Poketto Monsuta. While Pikachu itself is a combination of two sounds in Japanese. Pika is the sound of electric sparks and chu is the sound that mice make.
berita_id: Ada banyak reaksi orang terhadap permainan yang sangat populer ini, Pokemon Go.Para sarjana di Mesir dan Arab menyatakan permainan ini Haram dan tidak Islami karena membuat para pemain berperilaku seperti orang mabuk dan gila untuk berburu monster saku (monster saku).Sekarang di berbagai media sosial di Indonesia, orang -orang menyebarkan informasi yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon Go mempromosikan Zionisme dan merupakan permainan yang menghina Islam.Dikatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya seorang Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rupanya tuduhan ini telah ada sejak lama.Pada tahun 2001 ketika video game Pokemon yang populer, rumor beredar bahwa permainan itu adalah konspirasi Yahudi untuk menyebarkan Zionisme.Dalam sebuah artikel yang diterbitkan di situs berita LA Times, pada tahun itu berbagai brosur yang diedarkan di Timur Tengah menyatakan bahwa Pokemon adalah perusahaan Yahudi dan nama -nama monster di dalamnya menghina Islam.Brosur lebih lanjut menyatakan bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya orang Yahudi"."Brosur, yang ditulis dalam bahasa Arab miskin, menyatakan bahwa Pikachu, karakter paling populer dan kuat, berarti 'Saya Yahudi' dalam bahasa Jepang," kata Abdel Rahman Mtowah, editor surat kabar Al Sharq Al Awsat Arab Saudi.Tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan Pikachu berasal dari Syria atau asal Syria, dialek bahasa Aram bahasa Aram itu sendiri dibantah pada tahun 2001 ketika rumor beredar.Gereja Kristen Ortodoks Syria di Yordania menyatakan bahwa Pokemon dan Pikachu tidak berasal dari Syria.Sanggahan serupa dibebaskan oleh Gereja Kristen Ortodoks di Yerusalem.Atas -uk budaya Jepang di Yordania pada tahun 2001 menyatakan bahwa banyak orang memintanya untuk memberi tahu mereka kata Jepang untuk "Yahudi".Orang Yahudi dalam bahasa Jepang adalah "YouDayajin", jauh dari kata Pokemon."Pokemon itu sendiri adalah singkatan dari 'Pocket Monsters'. Di Jepang kita menggunakan kata 'poke' yang berarti sesuatu yang kecil." Pokekom "berarti 'komputer saku'," kata Tahara kepada AFP."Saya tidak tahu bahasa Ibrani tetapi sejauh yang saya tahu tidak ada bahasa asing atau tersembunyi di Pokemon," kata Tahara.Pokemon sendiri diciptakan oleh Satoshi Tajiri, Ken Sugimori dan dikelola oleh Pokemon Company, kombinasi Nintendo, Game Freak dan Makhluk.Nama Pokemon itu sendiri adalah singkatan dari monster saku atau monster saku.Dalam bahasa Jepang itu disebut Poketto Monsuta.Sementara Pikachu sendiri adalah kombinasi dari dua suara dalam bahasa Jepang.Pika adalah suara percikan listrik dan Chu adalah suara yang dibuat tikus.

berita: A reog Ponorogo at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was destroyed by burning on October 20, 2015. The Consulate General in Davao City emphasized that this burning was not an attempt to destroy or eliminate reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Extermination is carried out with care and respect. "I have checked Davao. Reog and the dragon's head are damaged and infested with termites," said Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi via spokesperson Arrmanatha Nasir. "So, there is no intention of destroying cultural objects and has nothing to do with idols," he continued. City is communicating with parties in Indonesia to try to find a new replacement for Ponorogo dutch east indies reog.
berita_id: Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, dihancurkan dengan membakar pada 20 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao menekankan bahwa pembakaran ini bukanlah upaya untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang sebagai asset budaya.Pemusnahan dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan hormat."Saya telah memeriksa Davao. Reog dan kepala naga rusak dan penuh dengan rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi melalui juru bicara Arrmanatha Nasir."Jadi, tidak ada niat untuk menghancurkan benda -benda budaya dan tidak ada hubungannya dengan berhala," lanjutnya.City berkomunikasi dengan pesta -pesta di Indonesia untuk mencoba menemukan pengganti baru untuk Hindia Dutch East Ponorogo Reog.

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that mentions catfish as the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. The news made catfish cultivators in East Java (East Java) offended and devastated. The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. That's not true. "Pity catfish farmers, they are offended and very saddened by the news," said Head of the Fisheries and Marine Service of East Java Province, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10/2015). He said that the news that actually describes catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China is not the same as catfish cultivation in East Java. The news could have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. The reason is, the catfish market is a consumer in the lower middle class level II. While snapper, tuna, mackerel, grouper at level I upper middle class. Heru said, consumers at level I are difficult to shake with the issue of the fish they consume. This is different from the issue of fish such as catfish, gourami, mujahir, which are food for middle to lower-class level II consumers. if level I consumers are difficult to shake with issues. In contrast to level II consumers. If there is an issue, level II consumers can be afraid and don't want to consume, he said. Heru said that there was already a certification of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) and Good Fish Hatchery (CPIB) certification, which were applied to the hatchery business unit For in East Java. In order to achieve quality assurance and security of national and international fishery products, it is deemed necessary to regulate good fish farming methods, said Heru. The Ministry of Marine Affairs and Fisheries stipulates Decree No. KEP.02/MEN/2007 on Good Fish Cultivation Methods. For in East Java, from thousands of catfish cultivation, currently 266 cultivation business units have been certified. Meanwhile, for hatcheries, there are 20 hatchery business units that already have CPIB certification. "We are targeting that there are 900 business units of all cultivated commodities in East Java that meet the certification," he explained. Heru added that the government continues to monitor fish farming and domesticate hatchery units. Data for monitoring the residue of catfish in 2015 was 379 samples. Parameters tested were levels of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals. The sampling locations for monitoring catfish residues included cultivation units in Lamongan, Sidoarjo, Pasuruan, Gresik, Tulungagung, Jombang, Mojokerto, Kediri, Blitar, Malang, Pamekasan, Magetan, Probolinggo, and Probolinggo regencies. Until the third quarter, the results of catfish samples that have been tested negative (free) of hormone residues, antibiotics, and heavy metals, he said.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele di Jawa Timur (Jawa Timur) tersinggung dan hancur.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Itu tidak benar."Kasihan petani lele, mereka tersinggung dan sangat sedih dengan berita itu," kata kepala perikanan dan layanan kelautan provinsi Jawa Timur, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10/2015).Dia mengatakan bahwa berita yang benar -benar menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina tidak sama dengan budidaya ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Berita itu dapat berdampak pada pasar ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Alasannya adalah, pasar lele adalah konsumen di tingkat kelas menengah II.Sedangkan kakap, tuna, mackerel, kerapu di kelas menengah atas level I.Heru berkata, konsumen di level I sulit untuk mengguncang masalah ikan yang mereka konsumsi.Ini berbeda dari masalah ikan seperti ikan lele, gourami, mujahir, yang merupakan makanan untuk konsumen kelas menengah ke bawah.Jika konsumen Level I sulit untuk diguncang dengan masalah.Berbeda dengan konsumen Level II.Jika ada masalah, konsumen Level II bisa takut dan tidak ingin mengkonsumsi, katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa sudah ada sertifikasi Budidaya Ikan yang Baik (CBIB) dan sertifikasi Good Fish Hatchery (CPIB), yang diterapkan pada Unit Bisnis Penetasan untuk di Jawa Timur.Untuk mencapai jaminan kualitas dan keamanan produk perikanan nasional dan internasional, dianggap perlu untuk mengatur metode pertanian ikan yang baik, kata Heru.Kementerian Urusan Kelautan dan Perikanan menetapkan Keputusan No. Kep.02/Men/2007 tentang metode penanaman ikan yang baik.Karena di Jawa Timur, dari ribuan budidaya ikan lele, saat ini 266 unit bisnis budidaya telah disertifikasi.Sementara itu, untuk penetasan, ada 20 unit bisnis penetasan yang sudah memiliki sertifikasi CPIB."Kami menargetkan bahwa ada 900 unit bisnis dari semua komoditas yang dibudidayakan di Jawa Timur yang memenuhi sertifikasi," jelasnya.Heru menambahkan bahwa pemerintah terus memantau pertanian ikan dan domestik unit penetasan.Data untuk memantau residu ikan lele pada tahun 2015 adalah 379 sampel.Parameter yang diuji adalah kadar hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat.Lokasi pengambilan sampel untuk memantau residu ikan lele termasuk unit budidaya di Lamongan, Sidoarjo, Pasuruan, Gresik, Tulungagung, Jombang, Mojokerto, Kediri, Blitar, Malang, Pamekasan, Magetan, Probolinggo, dan Regensgo.Sampai kuartal ketiga, hasil sampel ikan lele yang telah diuji negatif (bebas) residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat, katanya.

berita: The news that Facebook was closed or blocked for Indonesian social media (Medsos) users on April 24, 2018 has gone viral since this week. Netizens, especially those who use Facebook, are busy posting the status "Facebook will be closed", there are also those who upload "before Facebook is closed, post a status or photo first." The news of the closure of Facebook has constituent also become the pros and cons among netizens. Even so, the viral rumors circulating widely on social media, especially Facebook, are certainly not true or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Camridge Analityca scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of communication and information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. Also Read: Features of Stolen Facebook Account, 1 Million Indonesian Users Affected In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must comply with procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement regarding blocking FB is if there is evidence that FB is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, they are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. “If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook in Indonesia to conduct an audit and submit the results of the audit since a week after the announcement of the data on Facebook users in Indonesia being leaked in the CA scandal.
berita_id: Berita bahwa Facebook ditutup atau diblokir untuk pengguna media sosial Indonesia (MEDSOS) pada 24 April 2018 telah menjadi viral sejak minggu ini.Netizen, terutama mereka yang menggunakan Facebook, sibuk memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", ada juga yang mengunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup, memposting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita tentang penutupan Facebook telah menjadi konstituen juga menjadi pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor viral yang beredar luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Camridge Analityca.Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Juga dibaca: Fitur akun Facebook yang dicuri, 1 juta pengguna Indonesia yang terpengaruh pada kenyataannya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mematuhi prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir FB adalah jika ada bukti bahwa FB digunakan sebagai cara menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, mereka masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak punya keraguan tentang pemblokiran," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook di Indonesia untuk melakukan audit dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia bocor dalam skandal CA.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan said he did not know Ananda Sukarlan was protesting his presence at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College. But he did not mind and still respect the composer's attitude. “I will greet all, protect all. If then there is a negative reaction, yes, that's a bonus for me. There is nothing, it's normal," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Monday, November 13 2017. Ananda launched a walk out to protest the committee who invited Anies to commemorate the founding of Kanisius College. According to him, Anies does not deserve to be in the midst of the Kanius community. "Why invite someone who goes against the values ​​we were taught at Canisius?" he said when contacted by Tempo, Monday. Ananda said that while studying at Kanisius, he got an understanding of pluralism. By appreciating differences, he believes life in the world will be better. "Differences are what bring us together," he said. However, he considers Anies' figure to be contrary to these values. According to Ananda, during the 2017 DKI regional head election campaign which was full of religious and racist sentiments, Anies Baswedan didn't seem bothered. In addition, Anies' inaugural speech as governor touched on indigenous issues. "I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," said Ananda. Anies Baswedan said that he was only informed this morning about Ananda Sukarlan's protest. According to him, anyone has the right to express their thoughts or criticisms in their own way. He attended the event because he was invited inch as governor as well as a friend. "I'm not like someone who doesn't know my friends at Kanisius," said Anies. "And this isn't the first time I've been to Kanisius."
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengatakan dia tidak tahu Ananda Sukarlan memprotes kehadirannya pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College.Tapi dia tidak keberatan dan masih menghormati sikap komposer."Saya akan menyambut semuanya, melindungi semuanya. Jika ada reaksi negatif, ya, itu bonus bagi saya. Tidak ada apa -apa, itu normal," kata Anies di Balai Kota Jakarta, Senin, 13 November 2017. Ananda meluncurkan jalan keluar untuk memprotes komite yang mengundang Anies untuk memperingati pendirian Kanisius College.Menurutnya, Anies tidak pantas berada di tengah -tengah komunitas Kanius."Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai yang diajarkan kepada Canisius?"Dia mengatakan ketika dihubungi oleh Tempo, Senin.Ananda mengatakan bahwa saat belajar di Kanisius, ia mendapat pemahaman tentang pluralisme.Dengan menghargai perbedaan, ia percaya kehidupan di dunia akan lebih baik."Perbedaan itulah yang menyatukan kita," katanya.Namun, ia menganggap angka ini bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai ini.Menurut Ananda, selama kampanye pemilihan kepala regional DKI 2017 yang penuh dengan sentimen religius dan rasis, Anies Baswedan tampaknya tidak terganggu.Selain itu, pidato pelantikan Anies sebagai gubernur menyentuh masalah -masalah asli."Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai kemanusiaan," kata Ananda.Anies Baswedan mengatakan bahwa dia hanya diberitahu pagi ini tentang protes Ananda Sukarlan.Menurutnya, siapa pun memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pikiran atau kritik mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Dia menghadiri acara itu karena dia diundang inci sebagai gubernur dan juga teman."Aku tidak seperti seseorang yang tidak mengenal teman -temanku di Kanisius," kata Anies."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya aku ke Kanisius."

berita: MOST of the world's people are now loving Pokémon. Pokemon is a media franchise owned by the video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. Originally, Pokémon was a video game series that was identical to the Game Boy console. That's Wikipedia data. Reported by the BBC, Pokemon Go is an augmented reality game on smartphones using the Global Positioning System (GPS). You play by walking around in the real world catching adorable virtual monsters, like Pikachu and Jigglypuff, in places near your phone's location and training them to compete. These monsters first became popular in the 90s when the Nintendo Game Boy appeared. A piece of information is circulating on social media: the word Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". It is said that the name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language (Syrian language) which in Indonesian means "I am Jewish". Syriac or Syrian language (in English: Syriac language), the language currently spoken by the minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. (Wikipedia). In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have reality roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. (LA Times). According to Sheikh Muhammed Salih Al-Munajjid of the Q&A Islamic Q&A site, the correct meaning of Pokemon is an abbreviation of "Pocket monster", which is an animal small enough to fit in a pocket. According to the Oxford English dictionary, Pokemon (Pronunciation: /'poki?män/) is a video game featuring Japanese cartoon characters. Originally, Pokemon was the name of a Japanese video game from the word "pocket monster". On the Reference page, the word "Pokemon" in Japanese comes from the words "Poketto" and "Monsut" or "Pocket Monsters" in English. Wallahu a'lam.
berita_id: Sebagian besar orang di dunia sekarang mencintai Pokémon.Pokemon adalah waralaba media yang dimiliki oleh perusahaan video game Nintendo dan dibuat oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Awalnya, Pokémon adalah seri video game yang identik dengan Game Boy Console.Itu data Wikipedia.Dilaporkan oleh BBC, Pokemon Go adalah permainan augmented reality pada smartphone menggunakan Global Positioning System (GPS).Anda bermain dengan berjalan -jalan di dunia nyata menangkap monster virtual yang menggemaskan, seperti Pikachu dan Jigglypuff, di tempat -tempat di dekat lokasi ponsel Anda dan melatih mereka untuk bersaing.Monster -monster ini pertama kali menjadi populer di tahun 90 -an ketika Nintendo Game Boy muncul.Sepotong informasi beredar di media sosial: kata pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dikatakan bahwa nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria (bahasa Suriah) yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti "Saya Yahudi".Bahasa Syria atau Suriah (dalam bahasa Inggris: Bahasa Syria), bahasa yang saat ini digunakan oleh orang -orang Kristen Suriah minoritas yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak Utara dan Suriah timur laut.(Wikipedia).Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya memiliki akar realitas di Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.(LA Times).Menurut Sheikh Muhammed Salih al-Munajjid dari situs Q&A Q&A Islamic, makna Pokemon yang benar adalah singkatan dari "monster saku", yang merupakan hewan yang cukup kecil untuk muat di saku.Menurut Oxford English Dictionary, Pokemon (pengucapan: /'Poki? Män /) adalah video game yang menampilkan karakter kartun Jepang.Awalnya, Pokemon adalah nama video game Jepang dari kata "saku monster".Di halaman referensi, kata "pokemon" dalam bahasa Jepang berasal dari kata "poketto" dan "monsut" atau "monster saku" dalam bahasa Inggris.Wallahu a'lam.

berita: Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". Thus the broadcast circulating on social media, along with the excitement of the Pokemon Go game. According to the broadcast, pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means "I'm Jewish". While Pikachu is said to mean "be a Jew". Actually, the polemic about the meaning of Pokemon has been sticking out since 2001, when Saudi Arabian clerics banned Pokemon because it was considered campaigning theory of evolution and is considered Jewish propaganda to keep Muslim children away from their religion. Soon after, Pokemon comics and toys were taken to store shelves and orders were cancelled. Pokemon haram fatwas were also issued by scholars in Qatar, Dubai, Jordan and Egypt. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor at Egypt's Al Azhar University, found no evidence that Pokemon comes from Syriac and means "I am Jewish". and there is no forth valid evidence that pikachu means “be a jew.” However, he agrees that Pokemon games spread atheist ideas and distance themselves from God. "From a parent's point of view, this game keeps children away from God, and spread atheist ideas," he was quoted as saying by the Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001.
berita_id: Pokemon berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Dengan demikian siaran yang beredar di media sosial, bersama dengan kegembiraan game Pokemon Go.Menurut siaran, Pokemon berasal dari Syria atau Syria yang berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".Sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi".Sebenarnya, polemik tentang makna Pokemon telah mencuat sejak tahun 2001, ketika ulama Arab Saudi melarang Pokemon karena dianggap sebagai teori evolusi kampanye dan dianggap sebagai propaganda Yahudi untuk menjauhkan anak -anak Muslim dari agama mereka.Segera setelah itu, komik dan mainan Pokemon dibawa ke rak toko dan pesanan dibatalkan.Fatwa Pokemon Haram juga dikeluarkan oleh para sarjana di Qatar, Dubai, Jordan dan Mesir.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor di Universitas Al Azhar di Mesir, tidak menemukan bukti bahwa Pokemon berasal dari Syria dan berarti "Saya Yahudi".Dan tidak ada bukti yang valid bahwa Pikachu berarti "menjadi orang Yahudi."Namun, dia setuju bahwa game Pokemon menyebarkan ide -ide ateis dan menjauhkan diri dari Tuhan."Dari sudut pandang orang tua, permainan ini menjauhkan anak -anak dari Tuhan, dan menyebarkan ide -ide ateis," katanya seperti dikutip oleh Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001.

berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing skirmish clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely FROM A FIRE FUR! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. Usually, pig hair brushes are sold in WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, manufacturers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then dyeing them, so it looks like the hair of other animals. (AND) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle"."Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Bagaimana cara memeriksa: Lihatlah paket itu, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti doa dan doa yang disingkirkan. TETAP RAIK. Tapi jika ada yang meleleh dan menjadi keras, itu berarti itu berarti itu digunakan dan ada yang aman.lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang -orang yang kita cintai.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian pertempuran, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari bulu api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya, kuas rambut babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, jadi sepertinya rambut hewan lain.(Dan) bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga bermanfaat

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month or Rp. 6.6 billion per year. This increase will occur if the Draft Government Regulation on Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities for Civil Servants is actually ratified. amounting to 96,000 points, found the figure of Rp 553 million According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of president 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). salary of IDR 5040000 per month Thus, the basic salary of the president is IDR 30240000 per month Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is IDR 32500000 So the total money received by the president each month is IDR 62740000 or IDR 752880000 per year According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001 The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world, the salary of President of the Republic of Indonesia Jokowi's identity is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year While the President of the United States Donald Trump has the smallest income, which is USD 1 per year Of course this is Trump's personal request. USD 3 billion University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So the income received by the number one person in Indonesia was very high. "It makes sense too," she explained. At the same time as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a President are very large. So according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid a salary from the State Budget, whose salary is greater than the President. the palace has not been able to comment further It is a salary increase scheme for civil servants, the president and other state officials. Presidential spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about it. "I haven't received the information. The KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan atau RP.6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini akan terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas untuk pegawai negeri sebenarnya diratifikasi.Jumlah 96.000 poin, menemukan angka Rp 553 juta menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 dari Presiden 1978, gaji presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Gaji IDR 5040000 per bulan dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah IDR 32500000 sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh Presiden setiap bulan adalah PALACE Sejak 2001 yang tidak diubah sejak itu, No. IDR 752880000 per tahun, NOTE PALACE, PALACE, PALOCE Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75280000 per tahun menurut PALACE, PALACE, PALACE, Sejak 2001 atau IDR 75880000 per tahun menurut PALACE, NOW IDR Sejak 2001 atau IDR NOW IDR Sejak 2001, NO NOW IDR Sejak 2001,Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara utama di dunia, gaji Presiden Republik Republik Indonesia Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun ini sementara Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald memiliki pendapatan terkecil, yang merupakan USD 1 per tahun ini adalah kursus ini.USD 3 miliar University of Indonesia (UI) Pengamat Kebijakan Publik Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Jadi pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Pada saat yang sama dengan kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat untuk dibayar gaji dari anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut bahwa ini adalah skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal itu."Saya belum menerima informasi. Kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Currently, news is circulating regarding candy in the form of a dot that is circulating in the city of Surabaya, East Java. Those suspected of containing drugs or other hazardous materials. The candy, which is known to be imported from a certain country, has gone viral on social media because it is accused of containing drugs. In an appeal letter numbered B/HB-01/III/2017/Humas dated March 8 2017, BNN urges the public to be aware of all forms of drugs and not to consume food, drink, or drugs that do not have a distribution permit. The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) as the focal point for drug problems in Indonesia, said that until now the East Java BNN was bringing a sample of the candy for scientific examination by the Narcotics Laboratory Center regarding the drug content. BNN urges the public to be patient while waiting for the results of the examination. It is hoped that parents and children will be aware of all forms and types of see drugs by not consuming food, drinks or drugs that do not have a distribution permit.
berita_id: Saat ini, berita beredar mengenai permen dalam bentuk titik yang beredar di kota Surabaya, Jawa Timur.Mereka yang diduga mengandung obat atau bahan berbahaya lainnya.Permen, yang diketahui diimpor dari negara tertentu, telah menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan.Dalam surat banding bernomor B/HB-01/III/2017/Humas tertanggal 8 Maret 2017, BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk mengetahui semua bentuk obat-obatan dan tidak mengonsumsi makanan, minuman, atau obat-obatan yang tidak memiliki izin distribusi.Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) sebagai titik fokus untuk masalah obat di Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang Java BNN Timur membawa sampel permen untuk pemeriksaan ilmiah oleh Pusat Laboratorium Narkotika mengenai kandungan obat.BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk bersabar sambil menunggu hasil pemeriksaan.Diharapkan bahwa orang tua dan anak -anak akan menyadari semua bentuk dan jenis obat -obatan dengan tidak mengonsumsi makanan, minuman, atau obat -obatan yang tidak memiliki izin distribusi.

berita: Jakarta - iPhone 6 Plus has complained that a number of users have the disadvantage of being easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Apple is considered to have made a big mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum alloy mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. For that weakness, Apple's new smartphone with a 5.5-inch jumbo sail is now reported to be the subject of ridicule on various social media. A number of Apple's competitors did not waste this opportunity to 'beat' Apple. According to the Business Insider page, Thursday (25/9/2014), the hashtag #bendgate, or what can be interpreted as the 'curvy scandal' of the iPhone 6Plus has become a hot topic on a number of social voyage media. Many users of Twitter, Path, and various other photo social networks mock the weakness of the iPhone 6 Plus. An example is what the snack brand's official Twitter account @KitKat did. The brand, which is indeed a partnership with Google, posted a photo insinuating how fragile the iPhone 6 handset frame is. They also tweeted, "We don't bend, we #break. #bendgate #iPhone6plus. There was also another internet user who posted photos to the Imgur website. The photo he posted is an imitation of the official Apple website. It describes a hoax feature belonging to the iPhone 6 Plus called 'Flex' It was stated that the curvature of the iPhone 6 Plus body was not a drawback, but indeed one of the special features that was deliberately embedded in the smartphone. This feature is useful for providing a better view of watching videos, just like LG's curved screen concept
berita_id: Jakarta - iPhone 6 Plus telah mengeluh bahwa sejumlah pengguna memiliki kelemahan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Apple dianggap telah membuat kesalahan besar dengan memilih campuran paduan logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Untuk kelemahan itu, smartphone baru Apple dengan layar jumbo 5,5 inci sekarang dilaporkan menjadi subjek ejekan di berbagai media sosial.Sejumlah pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan kesempatan ini untuk 'mengalahkan' Apple.Menurut halaman Business Insider, Kamis (25/9/2014), tagar #Bendgate, atau apa yang dapat ditafsirkan sebagai 'skandal melengkung' dari iPhone 6Plus telah menjadi topik hangat di sejumlah media perjalanan sosial.Banyak pengguna Twitter, Path, dan berbagai jejaring sosial foto lainnya mengejek kelemahan iPhone 6 Plus.Contohnya adalah apa yang dilakukan akun Twitter resmi merek Snack Brand.Merek, yang memang merupakan kemitraan dengan Google, memposting foto yang menyindir betapa rapuhnya bingkai handset iPhone 6.Mereka juga tweeted, "We Don't Bend, We #break. #BendGate #iPhone6plus. Ada juga pengguna internet lain yang memposting foto ke situs web Imgur. Foto yang dipostingnya adalah tiruan dari situs web Apple resmi. Ini menggambarkan fitur hoax yang dimiliki oleh iphone 6 yang disebut 'Flex' yang dinyatakan bahwa kelulusan iPhone 6 plus tidak ada aturan, tetapi adalah satu -satunya fitur yang ditambah, tetapi adalah satu -satunya fitur yang ditambah dengan iphone, tetapi tidak ada yang menarik, tidak ada fitur yang dikerjakan, tidak ada yang menarik, tidak ada latar belakang, tidak ada lewatnya, tidak ada latar belakang yang tidak ada.Fitur berguna untuk memberikan tampilan yang lebih baik tentang menonton video, seperti konsep layar melengkung LG

berita: JAKARTA – After its release, Pokemon Go received a lot of response from people. However, this Pokemon Go mobile game raises the suspicion of many parties. The reason is, since 2001, Pokemon games and cartoons, which were banned by a number of scholars in the Middle East, have appeared again. According to them, the characters on Pokemon are un-Islamic and feature Zionist symbols. Some time ago, several Muslim clerics, among them Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, said that Pokemon video games and card games were a waste of time and psychologically unhealthy for children. For penetrating Jewish names into children's memories. The real impact is, many pokemon players take to the streets in search of real-world digital monsters that are part of the game's gameplay. In America, the Pokemon Go fever that 'anesthetized' a number of smartphone users turned out to be quite disturbing the Holocaust Memorial Museum and Arlington National Cemetery in the United States. The reason, many players are hunting Pokemon in that place. In fact, the museum asked players not to catch Pokemon anymore when visiting the place. Pokemon before it was made into a game was a children's film. And pokemon movies have been banned in various countries. One of them is in Iraq. President Saddam Hussein at that time banned it because the name Pokemon was a Jewish mission. A document states that President Saddam Hussein received information about the film from the state intelligence agency. According to information, the names used in the Pokemon movies contain muslimism an invitation that cannot be tolerated. Apparently, the word Pokemon itself means "I'm Jewish". The name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language, or the Syriac language which in Indonesian means 'I am Jewish'. Not only Pokemon that has this surprising meaning, but also in other characters, such as Pikachu, the main character in the Pokemon movie. Pikachu, means 'Be a Jew'. Charmander character, which also means: 'God is Weak'. Of course, the meaning is very offensive to adherents of religion, especially Islam and Christianity. Because, in Islam, it is clearly called Allahu Akbar (God is Great). And in Christianity it is called the Holy God
berita_id: Jakarta - Setelah dirilis, Pokemon Go menerima banyak tanggapan dari orang -orang.Namun, game mobile Pokemon Go ini menimbulkan kecurigaan banyak pihak.Alasannya adalah, sejak tahun 2001, Pokemon Games and Cartoons, yang dilarang oleh sejumlah sarjana di Timur Tengah, telah muncul lagi.Menurut mereka, karakter di Pokemon tidak islam dan fitur simbol Zionis.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, beberapa ulama Muslim, di antaranya Sheikh Yousef Qaradawi, mengatakan bahwa video game Pokemon dan permainan kartu adalah buang -buang waktu dan secara psikologis tidak sehat untuk anak -anak.Untuk menembus nama Yahudi ke dalam ingatan anak -anak.Dampak sebenarnya adalah, banyak pemain Pokemon turun ke jalan untuk mencari monster digital dunia nyata yang merupakan bagian dari gameplay game.Di Amerika, demam Pokemon Go yang 'membius' sejumlah pengguna smartphone ternyata cukup mengganggu Holocaust Memorial Museum dan Arlington National Cemetery di Amerika Serikat.Alasannya, banyak pemain berburu Pokemon di tempat itu.Bahkan, museum meminta pemain untuk tidak menangkap Pokemon lagi saat mengunjungi tempat itu.Pokemon sebelum dibuat menjadi permainan adalah film anak -anak.Dan film Pokemon telah dilarang di berbagai negara.Salah satunya di Irak.Presiden Saddam Hussein pada waktu itu melarangnya karena nama Pokemon adalah misi Yahudi.Sebuah dokumen menyatakan bahwa Presiden Saddam Hussein menerima informasi tentang film dari Badan Intelijen Negara.Menurut informasi, nama -nama yang digunakan dalam film -film Pokemon berisi undangan Muslimisme yang tidak dapat ditoleransi.Rupanya, kata pokemon itu sendiri berarti "aku orang Yahudi".Nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria, atau bahasa Syria yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti 'Saya Yahudi'.Tidak hanya Pokemon yang memiliki makna mengejutkan ini, tetapi juga dalam karakter lain, seperti Pikachu, karakter utama dalam film Pokemon.Pikachu, berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.Karakter Charmander, yang juga berarti: 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Tentu saja, artinya sangat menyinggung penganut agama, terutama Islam dan Kekristenan.Karena, dalam Islam, itu jelas disebut Allahu Akbar (Tuhan itu hebat).Dan dalam agama Kristen itu disebut Tuhan yang kudus

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Reported from detik.com, Tuesday (11/14/2017), Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a md business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra.
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Dilaporkan dari Detik.com, Selasa (11/14/2017), manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tn. Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis MD hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.

berita: The Pokemon Go game, which is currently a new craze in the community, has made the players forget the time. If you look, the most lovers of this game are young people.
