jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: The statement from the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara threatened to close Facebook, Twitter and Youtube if they did not follow government rules in preventing radicalism. For our social media users, ''I apologize for those who use Facebook, or Youtube if it is forced to be closed, because the government is in charge of maintaining the state's conduciveness,'' said Rudiantara after following the Declaration on Anti Radicalism Friday (14/7/2017) at Universities in West Java. at Padjadjaran University, Bandung City. Indonesian government on international social media platform policies. This is because the government's request to crack down on malicious accounts has not been fully heeded. He explained that in 2016 international social media platforms only closed 50 percent of the accounts requested by the Ministry of Communication and Information to be prosecuted. "In 2016, the government asked to take down accounts on social media and video file sharing, only 50 percent were carried out by international social media platform providers. Obviously, this is very disappointing for us, so we ask for it to be corrected,” Rudiantara explained that the spread of radicalism through cyberspace was getting worse. Radical understanding is inserted online so as to facilitate the infiltration of harmful doctrines. Obviously, ''Rudiantara, the spread of radical content in cyberspace is divided through websites and social media. He explained that it is easier to take action against sites that play a role in spreading radicalism content because the government can directly block them, and for social media, the government must communicate with these service providers. To that end, Rudiantara has sent representatives to communicate with companies providing social media and video sharing services. To follow our rules, the government will take a firm stance if societal there is absolutely no improvement in limiting accounts containing radicalism. The closure of this social media will be carried out in stages, First, by prohibiting Indonesian advertisements that are displayed on social media, because the main business of social media platforms is to serve advertisements. .
berita_id: Pernyataan dari Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengancam akan menutup Facebook, Twitter, dan YouTube jika mereka tidak mengikuti aturan pemerintah dalam mencegah radikalisme.Untuk pengguna media sosial kami, '' Saya minta maaf bagi mereka yang menggunakan Facebook, atau YouTube jika dipaksa untuk ditutup, karena pemerintah bertugas mempertahankan kondusif negara, '' kata Rudiiantara setelah mengikuti deklarasi anti radikalisme Jumat (14/7/2017) di universitas di Java Barat.di Universitas Padjadjaran, Bandung City.Pemerintah Indonesia tentang kebijakan platform media sosial internasional.Ini karena permintaan pemerintah untuk menindak akun berbahaya belum sepenuhnya diperhatikan.Dia menjelaskan bahwa pada tahun 2016 platform media sosial internasional hanya menutup 50 persen dari akun yang diminta oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan informasi yang akan dituntut."Pada tahun 2016, pemerintah meminta untuk menjatuhkan akun di media sosial dan berbagi file video, hanya 50 persen yang dilakukan oleh penyedia platform media sosial internasional. Jelas, ini sangat mengecewakan bagi kami, jadi kami meminta untuk diperbaiki," Rudiantara menjelaskan bahwa penyebaran radikalisme melalui ruang maya semakin buruk.Pemahaman radikal dimasukkan secara online untuk memfasilitasi infiltrasi doktrin berbahaya.Jelas, '' Rudiantara, penyebaran konten radikal di dunia maya dibagi melalui situs web dan media sosial.Dia menjelaskan bahwa lebih mudah untuk mengambil tindakan terhadap situs yang berperan dalam menyebarkan konten radikalisme karena pemerintah dapat secara langsung memblokir mereka, dan untuk media sosial, pemerintah harus berkomunikasi dengan penyedia layanan ini.Untuk itu, Rudiantara telah mengirim perwakilan untuk berkomunikasi dengan perusahaan yang menyediakan layanan media sosial dan video berbagi.Untuk mengikuti aturan kami, pemerintah akan mengambil sikap tegas jika masyarakat sama sekali tidak ada peningkatan dalam membatasi akun yang mengandung radikalisme.Penutupan media sosial ini akan dilakukan secara bertahap, pertama, dengan melarang iklan Indonesia yang ditampilkan di media sosial, karena bisnis utama platform media sosial adalah melayani iklan..

berita: mudcat On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that calls catfish the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. Really? The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish who are fond of consuming all kinds of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. Meanwhile in their natural habitat, catfish or catfish are also known as very tough fish species. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that it can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. Presumably, this fact has led to allegations of accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. Fortunately, catfish on the market do not come from the wild. Many catfish are cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. The feed given can also be chosen, not having to rely on waste. To be sure, the popularity of this murmured fish has never faded, in fact continues to increase. Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta, no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). Regarding the nutritional content, it is undeniable that catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. The fact that catfish is also low in cholesterol is likely to drown out accusations that catfish can cause cancer. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer, said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association when contacted by detikHealth, Friday (23/10/2015).
berita_id: Mudcat di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebut ikan lele ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Benar-benar?Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Sementara itu di habitat alami, lele atau ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang sangat tangguh.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Agaknya, fakta ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Untungnya, ikan lele di pasaran tidak datang dari alam liar.Banyak ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Pakan yang diberikan juga dapat dipilih, tidak harus mengandalkan limbah.Yang pasti, popularitas ikan yang bergumam ini tidak pernah memudar, sebenarnya terus meningkat.Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. According to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), catfish consumption was 29.98 kg/capita/year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. InJakarta, tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios ikan lele Pecel telah terdaftar di Asosiasi Pejabat Jalanan Indonesia (APKLI).Mengenai kandungan nutrisi, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Fakta bahwa ikan lele juga rendah kolesterol cenderung menenggelamkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele dapat menyebabkan kanker.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia ketika dihubungi oleh DetikHealth, Jumat (23/10/2015).

berita: "In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells". The title of the article in recent days has inch become a hot topic of discussion on social media. However, for catfish farmers, the article is considered a threat to their business continuity. The East Java Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Service accommodated the complaints of catfish farming business people in East Java who were offended by the circulation of the article. "This article is a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market whose market prospects continue to improve," said the Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service, Wednesday (28/10/2015). He is worried that the article, which actually describes a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China, will have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. According to him, catfish consumers are fish consumers at level II. At level I are consumers of high-end fish such as tuna, snapper, grouper, and so on. "Class I consumers will not be shaken by the spread of any issue, but for class II consumers, this is still vulnerable to being shaken by issues. They may no longer eat catfish because they are afraid," he said. Heru said that East Java was the largest catfish producer nationally. From hundreds of catfish cultivators, in the last three years, catfish production in East Java continues to increase. In 2012 the production was recorded at 62,807 tons, increased in 2013 to 79,928 tons, while in 2014 it continued to increase to 96,830 tons. During 2014 production, 2,000 tons of which were exported abroad. Catfish production in East Java, said Heru, is produced in a healthy manner according to the standards of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) as regulated by the Government in Ministerial Decree No. 02/Men/2007. "CBIB requires catfish cultured feed with healthy feed that focuses on health and food safety," he said. Periodically, the East Java Marine and Fisheries Service also monitors residues on catfish by sampling. This year there were 379 samples taken from various catfish producing regions such as Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, and Tulungagung. "As a result, the tested catfish commodities were free from residues of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals," he said. Heru suspected that the issue of catfish was deliberately raised by certain parties for the benefit of the fish business ahead of the 2015 MEA free market. "There are parties who want to seize the catfish market and replace it with other fish commodities," he said. Articles about the content of cancer cells are uploaded on a number of websites. The article was also followed by a number of online media for discussion. The article, which was posted on July 29, 2015, describes the confession of a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who supplies catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the fish by observing seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of catfish, before the test results come out.
berita_id: "Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker".Judul artikel dalam beberapa hari terakhir membuat inch menjadi topik diskusi di media sosial.Namun, bagi petani lele, artikel ini dianggap sebagai ancaman bagi kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Layanan Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan Java Timur mengakomodasi keluhan orang -orang bisnis petani lele di Jawa Timur yang tersinggung oleh sirkulasi artikel tersebut."Artikel ini adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele yang prospek pasar terus meningkat," kata kepala Perikanan dan Layanan Kelautan Java Timur, Rabu (28/10/2015).Dia khawatir bahwa artikel itu, yang sebenarnya menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Haikou City, Cina, akan berdampak pada pasar lele di Jawa Timur.Menurutnya, konsumen lele adalah konsumen ikan di Level II.Pada level I adalah konsumen ikan kelas atas seperti tuna, kakap, kerapu, dan sebagainya."Konsumen Kelas I tidak akan terguncang oleh penyebaran masalah apa pun, tetapi untuk konsumen Kelas II, ini masih rentan untuk dikocok oleh masalah. Mereka mungkin tidak lagi makan lele karena mereka takut," katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa Jawa Timur adalah produsen ikan lele terbesar secara nasional.Dari ratusan budidaya lele, dalam tiga tahun terakhir, produksi ikan lele di Jawa Timur terus meningkat.Pada 2012 produksi dicatat pada 62.807 ton, meningkat pada 2013 menjadi 79.928 ton, sedangkan pada 2014 terus meningkat menjadi 96.830 ton.Selama produksi 2014, 2.000 ton di antaranya diekspor ke luar negeri.Produksi lele di Jawa Timur, kata Heru, diproduksi dengan cara yang sehat sesuai dengan standar penanaman ikan yang baik (CBIB) sebagaimana diatur oleh pemerintah dalam Keputusan Menteri No. 02/Men/2007."CBIB membutuhkan feed yang dikultur ikan lele dengan pakan sehat yang berfokus pada kesehatan dan keamanan pangan," katanya.Secara berkala, East Java Marine and Fisheries Service juga memantau residu pada ikan lele dengan pengambilan sampel.Tahun ini ada 379 sampel yang diambil dari berbagai daerah penghasil lele seperti Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, dan Tulungagung."Akibatnya, komoditas ikan lele yang diuji bebas dari residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat," katanya.Heru menduga bahwa masalah ikan lele sengaja dibesarkan oleh pihak -pihak tertentu untuk kepentingan bisnis ikan menjelang Pasar Bebas MEA 2015."Ada pihak yang ingin merebut pasar ikan lele dan menggantinya dengan komoditas ikan lainnya," katanya.Artikel tentang konten sel kanker diunggah di sejumlah situs web.Artikel ini juga diikuti oleh sejumlah media online untuk diskusi.Artikel itu, yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015, menggambarkan pengakuan seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang memasok ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan dengan mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan lele, sebelum hasil tes keluar.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta recently. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at the Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital denied it. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels will spread, but it will be normal again when the accession heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta baru -baru ini.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Dokter yang berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk membantahnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas aksesi berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles. Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging. There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly explains the product, "Super thin Bristles". Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3, it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, whether it is really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta. However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public metropolis regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," Afwan said, as reported by Tribunnews.com
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada penulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu meremehkan kemasan.Ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menjelaskan produk, "bulu super tipis".Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram."Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3, dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah Haram. Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, apakah itu benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak," kata Muhammad Hatta.Namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Dia menambahkan bahwa tes laboratorium dilakukan jika ada laporan dari kota kecil tentang sikat gigi bulu babi.Jika benar -benar mengandung bulu babi, maka itu tidak boleh diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal."Saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin. Tapi bagaimana dengan itu? Kita bisa berkomentar jika ada tes laboratorium terlebih dahulu. Saat ini tidak ada tes laboratorium," kata Afwan, seperti dilaporkan oleh tribunnews.com

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. ," he said, Monday (12/3/2018), as quoted in an official statement by the Minister of Finance explaining that currently there are indeed many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from a government institution. It's like that. On social media nowadays, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. salary up to Rp 553422694 per month As for representatives the president is proposed to have receive a salary of Rp 368948462 per month
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat., "katanya, Senin (12/3/2018), seperti dikutip dalam pernyataan resmi oleh Menteri Keuangan yang menjelaskan bahwa saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah. Ini seperti itu. Di media sosial saat ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan dipublikasikan," katanya.Gaji hingga Rp 553422694 per bulan untuk perwakilan Presiden diusulkan untuk menerima gaji Rp 368948462 per bulan

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of mobs driving 5 bosses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, as the mosque, which used to be the gathering place for the Defending Islam Action, was previously closed. Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked manoeuver to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan gerombolan yang mengendarai 5 bos, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, sebagai masjid, yang dulunya adalah tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan, sebelumnya ditutup.Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari daerah ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta Manoeuver untuk memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: A commotion reportedly occurred at the Brimob Corps Terrorist Detention Center Salemba Branch, Friday (11/10/2017) afternoon at around 16.00 WIB. The uproar was carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of a number of prison facilities. A message spread in the media said that the trigger for the riot was caused by officers throwing the holy Koran. Through his written statement, the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Police Brigadier General Rikwanto said the chain message was a hoax. The hoax message reads: #Updates #mako_brimob #riot There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Until now, the rioting at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters is still continuing. 3 blocks burned and the door was destroyed. Everyone, pray for our brothers and sisters who are being held at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. #AlfathChannel Rikwanto also denied the message. Meanwhile, through his written statement, Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering, the Densus picket removed the key in rooms A5 and C5 (RB) because there was a key slot from the inside. "For security purposes and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door," Rikwanto explained in his written statement, Friday (11/10/2017). While carrying out these activities, the Densus picket conducted a search in the room and found 4 cell phones. The cellphones belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. Because of the investigation, one of the detainees felt disapproved and later provoked the officers with various kinds of words. "Then there are members who are provoked by their words and there are prisoners who while takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them," explained Rikwanto. The picket members also took action by shooting upwards to signal a commotion and warn the inmates. At this time, the atmosphere can be appeased by the picket members. "After that, members were on standby in picket while waiting for developments, but the prisoners still had takbir takbir, triggering others," he continued.
berita_id: Keributan dilaporkan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Korps Brimob Cabang Salemba, Jumat (11/10/2017) sore sekitar pukul 16.00 WIB.Keributan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang mengakibatkan penghancuran sejumlah fasilitas penjara.Sebuah pesan yang tersebar di media mengatakan bahwa pemicu kerusuhan itu disebabkan oleh petugas yang melemparkan Alquran.Melalui pernyataan tertulisnya, kepala Biro Informasi Publik Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Rikwanto mengatakan pesan rantai itu adalah tipuan.Pesan Hoax berbunyi: #updates #mako_brimob #riot Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana para tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alban dan menyebabkan para tahanan pergi keengganan.Sampai sekarang, kerusuhan di markas komando brigade seluler masih berlanjut.3 blok terbakar dan pintu dihancurkan.Semua orang, berdoa untuk saudara -saudari kita yang ditahan di markas Komando Brigade Seluler.#Alfathchannel Rikwanto juga membantah pesan itu.Sementara itu, melalui pernyataan tertulisnya, Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah masuk, piket densus melepas kunci di kamar A5 dan C5 (RB) karena ada slot kunci dari dalam."Untuk tujuan keamanan dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel," Rikwanto menjelaskan dalam pernyataan tertulisnya, Jumat (11/10/2017).Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, piket densus melakukan pencarian di ruangan itu dan menemukan 4 ponsel.Ponsel milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali.Karena penyelidikan, salah satu tahanan merasa tidak disetujui dan kemudian memicu petugas dengan berbagai jenis kata."Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memancing tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," jelas Rikwanto.Anggota piket juga mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas untuk menandakan keributan dan memperingatkan para narapidana.Pada saat ini, suasananya dapat ditenangkan oleh anggota piket."Setelah itu, anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan, tetapi para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir Takbir, memicu orang lain," lanjutnya.

berita: Surabaya (SI Online) -Surabaya City Government officials conducted raids on the circulation and trade of candy packed with baby pacifiers, throughout elementary schools. The excitement was triggered by the circulation of news that immediately went viral on social media networks, revealing the confession of a number of children feeling dizzy after consuming pacifiers. Allegedly, this type of candy contains drugs. “It is not yet known whether it contains drugs or other dangerous substances; We still need research in the laboratory,” said an officer from the Surabaya City Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP), after conducting a raid recently. Candy pacifiers, packaged differently from most candy. In the form of a whitish powder that tends to be pink, wrapped in paper. On the outside of the wrapper or packaging, it says Hard Candy. Likewise, on the box packaging containing 20 packs of pacifiers, it also reads hard candy. How to consume; The powder is put into a bottle, and given water according to the amount stated in the manufacturer's instructions. The bottle is then closed with a lid equipped with a rubber teat (like a baby pacifier). The bottle is daughter then shaken gently, until the mixture thickens and is ready to be consumed by sucking from the tip of the teat, like a baby or toddler drinking milk. “The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste. Another student said that this type of candy had been traded in the school environment for a long time. Not in the school canteen, but by traders outside the school's front yard fence. “The price is a pack of a thousand elephant dolls. While the one with a picture of a swan, one thousand can get two packs,” he said and added, this candy is in great demand. Because the price is cheap, the shape is attractive, as well as how to prepare the candy until it is consumed, it is very fun. Previously, about the circulation of this candy had been widely circulated on social media networks, especially on Whatsapp (WA) and others on Facebook and even Instagram. Called, candy is widely circulated in elementary schools. Some of them even revealed the confession of a number of children, after consuming pacifiers they felt dizzy. Among posting photos on social media networks, a member of the Satpol PP is holding a candy pacifier. Followed by writing; "DOT candy, allegedly contains drugs. Please help spread this information, mother, so that our sons / daughters are protected from dangerous snacks." The People's Welfare Section (Kesra) of a number of sub-district offices, together with officers from the Kelurahan level, Trantibbang and supported by Satpol PP, acts as if simultaneously working with the support of police officers, observing the circulation of this candy. Even then take a number of samples to be investigated further about the substance content of the candy which is said to cause dizziness. The social media network also mentions the raids that have been carried out by officers in the city center and four corners of the city of Surabaya; covers 14 districts. In the District of Pabean Cantikan at SD Krembangan Utara 2/57. Wiyung District at SDN 1 Balas klumprik and SDN Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilang sub-district at SDN Begongin Kedurus I, SDN 1 Karang-Pilang and TK Darma Praja. The sub-district of the field at SDN Petemon. Sambikerep District in SDN Sambikerep 1 and 5. Sukolilo District on Jalan Kejawen VIII and Pasar Keputih Lama. Tambaksari District at SDN Gading VII and SDN Tambaksari 1. Then in the District of Trenggilis Mejoyo at SDN Kedangsari 8, SDN Trenggilis Mejoyo and SDN Panjangjiwo. Jambangan District in SDN Kebonsari 10, SDN Pagesangan, and Komplek Komplek Kebonsari and Pag3esangan IV RT 3. In Tandes Subdistrict, Romli Thammim Elementary School and Al Faruq Bulak Rukem Kindergarten. Gubeng District at Mojo Elementary School, Mojoklangru Kidul Street. Simokerto District in Simokerto VI/139 Elementary School and YPPI Elementary School. Gununganyar District in Al Islah Elementary School and Mifta'ul Ulum Elementary School. In addition, raids were also carried out in a number of other elementary schools, including SD Yapita, SDN 245, all SD Muhammadiyah and SD Bunga Bangsa.
berita_id: Surabaya (SI Online) -Pejabat pemerintah Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan pada sirkulasi dan perdagangan permen yang dikemas dengan dot bayi, di seluruh sekolah dasar.Kegembiraan itu dipicu oleh sirkulasi berita yang segera menjadi viral di jaringan media sosial, mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot.Diduga, permen jenis ini berisi obat -obatan."Belum diketahui apakah mengandung obat -obatan atau zat berbahaya lainnya; kami masih membutuhkan penelitian di laboratorium," kata seorang petugas dari Unit Polisi Polisi Sipil Kota Surabaya (Satpol PP), setelah melakukan serangan baru -baru ini.Permen dot, dikemas secara berbeda dari kebanyakan permen.Dalam bentuk bubuk keputihan yang cenderung merah muda, dibungkus kertas.Di bagian luar pembungkus atau kemasan, katanya permen keras.Demikian juga, pada kemasan kotak yang berisi 20 paket dot, itu juga membaca permen keras.Cara mengkonsumsi;Bubuk dimasukkan ke dalam botol, dan diberi air sesuai dengan jumlah yang dinyatakan dalam instruksi pabrik.Botol kemudian ditutup dengan tutup yang dilengkapi dengan dot karet (seperti dot bayi).Botolnya adalah anak perempuan kemudian terguncang dengan lembut, sampai campuran mengental dan siap dikonsumsi dengan mengisap dari ujung dot, seperti bayi atau balita minum susu.“The way this is made is so much fun. The powder is put in a bottle and then given water. The lid with the pacifier is attached tightly, then shaken, like a mother making milk for a sister. The powder that has been mixed with water thickens and is ready to be sucked through the tip of the teat,” said one of the fifth grade students of an elementary school by revealing that this candy tastes sweet and has a sour taste.Siswa lain mengatakan bahwa permen jenis ini telah diperdagangkan di lingkungan sekolah sejak lama.Bukan di kantin sekolah, tetapi oleh pedagang di luar pagar halaman depan sekolah."Harganya adalah sebungkus seribu boneka gajah. Sementara yang memiliki gambar angsa, seribu bisa mendapatkan dua bungkus," katanya dan menambahkan, permen ini sangat diminati.Karena harganya murah, bentuknya menarik, serta bagaimana menyiapkan permen sampai dikonsumsi, sangat menyenangkan.Sebelumnya, tentang sirkulasi permen ini telah diedarkan secara luas di jaringan media sosial, terutama di WhatsApp (WA) dan lainnya di Facebook dan bahkan Instagram.Disebut, permen secara luas diedarkan di sekolah dasar.Beberapa dari mereka bahkan mengungkapkan pengakuan sejumlah anak, setelah mengonsumsi dot mereka merasa pusing.Di antara memposting foto di jaringan media sosial, anggota SATPOL PP memegang dot permen.Diikuti dengan menulis;"Dot Candy, diduga mengandung narkoba. Tolong bantu menyebarkan informasi ini, ibu, sehingga putra / putri kita terlindungi dari makanan ringan yang berbahaya."Bagian Kesejahteraan Rakyat (Kesra) dari sejumlah kantor sub-distrik, bersama dengan petugas dari tingkat Kelurahan, Trantibbang dan didukung oleh Satpol PP, bertindak seolah-olah bekerja secara bersamaan dengan dukungan petugas polisi, mengamati peredaran permen ini.Bahkan kemudian mengambil sejumlah sampel untuk diselidiki lebih lanjut tentang kandungan zat permen yang dikatakan menyebabkan pusing.Jaringan media sosial juga menyebutkan penggerebekan yang telah dilakukan oleh petugas di pusat kota dan empat sudut kota Surabaya;mencakup 14 distrik.Di distrik Pabean Canyikan di Sd Krembangan Utara 2/57.Distrik Wiyung di Sdn 1 Balas Klumprik dan Sdn Babatan IV, V. Karang-Pilan Sub-distrik di Sdn Begongin Kedurus I, Sdn 1 Karang-Pilang dan Tk Darma Praja.Sub-distrik lapangan di SDN Petemon.Distrik Sambikerep di SDN Sambikerep 1 dan 5. Distrik Sukolilo di Jalan Kejawen VIII dan Pasar KEPUTIH LAMA.Distrik Tambaksari di Sdn Gading VII dan Sdn Tambaksari 1. Kemudian di distrik Trenggilis Mejoyo di Sdn Kedangsari 8, Sdn Trenggilis Mejoyo dan Sdn Panjangjiwo.Distrik Jambangan di SDN Kebonsari 10, Sdn Pagesangan, dan Komplek Komplek Kebonsari dan Pag3esangan IV Rt 3. Di Tandes Subdistrict, Sekolah Dasar Romli Thammim dan Al Faruq Bulak Rukem TK.Distrik Gubeng di Sekolah Dasar Mojo, Mojoklangru Kidul Street.Distrik Simokerto di Simokerto VI/139 Sekolah Dasar dan Sekolah Dasar YPPI.Distrik Gununganyar di Sekolah Dasar Al Islah dan Sekolah Dasar Mifta'ul Ulum.Selain itu, penggerebekan juga dilakukan di sejumlah sekolah dasar lainnya, termasuk SD Yapita, SDN 245, semua SD Muhammadiyah dan SD Bunga Bangsa.

berita: Regarding public unrest regarding one of the toothbrush products containing ingredients from Bristles (sea urchin), the Indonesian Consumers Foundation (YLKI) finally spoke up. YLKI chairman, Abu Bakar Siddiq said, this problem must be taken seriously by relevant agencies such as the Health Service and BPOM to conduct an investigation of the product. "Don't let the public be affected. If it is true that the product uses materials from sea urchins, then the product must be immediately withdrawn from circulation," he explained when confirmed via cellular by Analysisdaily.com, Friday (18/3). Abu Bakar explained, if there is a material or product that is not halal, it is clear that it is very detrimental to the community, especially those who are Muslim. "If this is really proven, then we will sue the product because it does not have a halal label," added Abu Bakar. Meanwhile, the Head of Medan City Health Office, Dra. Hj. Usma Polita Nasution M.kes explained that his party will conduct research to find out whether the toothbrush contains sea urchins. "We will coordinate with MUI and BPOM whether it is proven that it contains sea urchins, because it is MUI's capacity to declare halal or not," he explained. robert william service If the MUI already has a response, the Medan City Health Office will dare to take a policy on the product. "If MUI and BPOM have really stated their position, then we will take a policy," he added.
berita_id: Mengenai kerusuhan publik mengenai salah satu produk sikat gigi yang mengandung bahan -bahan dari bulu (landak laut), Yayasan Konsumen Indonesia (YLKI) akhirnya berbicara.Ketua YLKI, Abu Bakar Siddiq mengatakan, masalah ini harus dianggap serius oleh lembaga -lembaga yang relevan seperti layanan kesehatan dan BPOM untuk melakukan penyelidikan produk."Jangan biarkan publik terpengaruh. Jika benar bahwa produk menggunakan bahan dari bulu babi, maka produk harus segera ditarik dari sirkulasi," jelasnya ketika dikonfirmasi melalui seluler dengan analisisDaily.com, Jumat (18/3).Abu Bakar menjelaskan, jika ada bahan atau produk yang tidak halal, jelas bahwa itu sangat merugikan masyarakat, terutama mereka yang Muslim."Jika ini benar -benar terbukti, maka kami akan menuntut produk karena tidak memiliki label halal," tambah Abu Bakar.Sementara itu, kepala Kantor Kesehatan Kota Medan, DRA.HJ.USMA Polita Nasution M.Kes menjelaskan bahwa partainya akan melakukan penelitian untuk mengetahui apakah sikat gigi berisi bulu babi."Kami akan berkoordinasi dengan MUI dan BPOM apakah terbukti bahwa ia mengandung bulu babi, karena kapasitas MUI untuk menyatakan halal atau tidak," jelasnya.Robert William Service Jika MUI sudah mendapat tanggapan, Kantor Kesehatan Kota Medan akan berani mengambil kebijakan tentang produk tersebut."Jika MUI dan BPOM benar -benar menyatakan posisi mereka, maka kami akan mengambil kebijakan," tambahnya.

berita: It is said that the salary of the Indonesian president will increase drastically from only Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. The information circulating stated that this increase was conveyed by the Minister of State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform. discussion about the increase in the president's salary His party has never discussed the increase in the president's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3). State and Bureaucratic Reform, who mentioned the increase in the president's salary, Sri Mulyani emphasized that it was a hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are many social media that produce information, for documents that are made similar to those of the government that are published," said Mulyani. mention the president's base salary g. The amount of only around Rp. 30 million per month is currently considered very small and it is planned to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RP P on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In this RP P, apart from the convey president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases
berita_id: Dikatakan bahwa gaji presiden Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis hanya dari RP.62 juta hingga RP.553 juta.Informasi yang beredar menyatakan bahwa peningkatan ini disampaikan oleh Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi.Diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden partainya tidak pernah membahas peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan itu tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Bogor Presidential Palace, Senin (12/3).Reformasi negara bagian dan birokrasi, yang menyebutkan peningkatan gaji presiden, Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, untuk dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah yang diterbitkan," kata Mulyani.Sebutkan gaji pokok presiden g.Jumlah hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan direncanakan untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Simulasi perubahan dalam ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RP P pada gaji dan manfaat pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Dalam RP P ini, selain dari Presiden Convey, Wakil Presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji

berita: California - In recent days a number of complaints from iPhone 6 Plus users have enlivened the virtual world. The new 5.5-inch smartphone from Apple is reported to be easy to bend if it is stored in a trouser pocket for too long. Suddenly this news made Apple the monthly on various social media. Not only users, some of Apple's competitors did not waste this moment to 'beat up' the company bearing the bitten apple logo. And now Apple has finally spoken. According to a report published on the Wall Street Journal page, Apple representatives have explained that the issue of the iPhone 6 Plus being easy to bend is exaggerated. Apple claims that the company has so far only received 9 user complaints out of 10 million units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been sold. This means, the defects on the iPhone 6 Plus do not occur in all units, but only a small part. "With normal use, a curved iPhone 6 Plus would be extremely rare," an Apple representative said. In addition, Jon Fort, editor of the news site CNBC also mentioned that Apple representatives have confirmed that only a small percentage of fallible consumers are experiencing the iPhone 6 Plus curved issue. It was also explained that the actual body frame of the iPhone 6 Plus is strong enough and meets Apple's standards. The new iPhones are steel/titanium-infused to strengthen a number of stress locations and use the strongest type of glass in the industry, an Apple representative said. The Business Insider page noted, this is Apple's fastest response in responding to oblique issues circulating wildly on the internet. Previously, Apple had always been 'ignorant' to various oblique issues that befell their products. Jakarta – Apple received bad news about its newest product, iPhone 6 Plus. This Apple-made phablet device is complained of by some users because it has a frail body that easily bends when inserted into the front pocket of the pants. This report comes from a user on Forum Macrumors named Hanzon, who said he put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pants pocket for a long time, which is about 4 hours. Hanzon admitted that he did not take out his iPhone 6 Plus during his 4 hours of activity. And when he then took out his new smartphone, Hanzon was surprised to find his beloved iPhone 6 Plus curved. Seeing the increasing number of reports, a user tested the flexibility of the iPhone 6 Plus and uploaded it on YouTube. As a comparison, he also tested the flexibility of another smartphone, namely the Samsung Galaxy Note 3. In the video, you can see how the iPhone 6 Plus turns out to be very easy to bend. The user who posted the video also said that prior to testing his iPhone 6 Plus, it was already looking a little warped. The weak spot seems to be on the left side, just below the volume buttons. This curved body problem seems to only occur on the iPhone 6 Plus. While for the iPhone 6 which has a size of 4.7 inches, there are no reports of this curved body problem
berita_id: California - Dalam beberapa hari terakhir sejumlah keluhan dari iPhone 6 Plus pengguna telah menghidupkan dunia virtual.Smartphone 5,5 inci baru dari Apple dilaporkan mudah ditekuk jika disimpan dalam saku celana panjang terlalu lama.Tiba -tiba berita ini menjadikan Apple bulanan di berbagai media sosial.Tidak hanya pengguna, beberapa pesaing Apple tidak menyia -nyiakan momen ini untuk 'memukuli' perusahaan yang membawa logo Apple yang digigit.Dan sekarang Apple akhirnya berbicara.Menurut sebuah laporan yang diterbitkan di halaman Wall Street Journal, perwakilan Apple telah menjelaskan bahwa masalah iPhone 6 Plus mudah ditekuk dibesar -besarkan.Apple mengklaim bahwa perusahaan sejauh ini hanya menerima 9 keluhan pengguna dari 10 juta unit iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah terjual.Ini berarti, cacat pada iPhone 6 Plus tidak terjadi di semua unit, tetapi hanya sebagian kecil."Dengan penggunaan normal, iPhone 6 Plus melengkung akan sangat jarang," kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Selain itu, Jon Fort, editor situs berita CNBC juga menyebutkan bahwa Perwakilan Apple telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa hanya sebagian kecil konsumen yang dapat berubah yang mengalami masalah iPhone 6 plus melengkung.Juga dijelaskan bahwa kerangka tubuh yang sebenarnya dari iPhone 6 Plus cukup kuat dan memenuhi standar Apple.Iphone baru ini diresapi baja/titanium untuk memperkuat sejumlah lokasi stres dan menggunakan jenis kaca terkuat di industri ini, kata seorang perwakilan Apple.Halaman Business Insider mencatat, ini adalah respons tercepat Apple dalam menanggapi masalah miring yang beredar liar di internet.Sebelumnya, Apple selalu 'bodoh' untuk berbagai masalah miring yang menimpa produk mereka.Jakarta - Apple menerima kabar buruk tentang produk terbarunya, iPhone 6 Plus.Perangkat phablet buatan Apple ini dikeluhkan oleh beberapa pengguna karena memiliki badan lemah yang dengan mudah ditekuk saat dimasukkan ke dalam saku depan celana.Laporan ini berasal dari pengguna di forum macrumors bernama Hanzon, yang mengatakan ia menempatkan iPhone 6 -nya Plus di saku celana depannya untuk waktu yang lama, yaitu sekitar 4 jam.Hanzon mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus selama 4 jam aktivitasnya.Dan ketika dia kemudian mengeluarkan smartphone barunya, Hanzon terkejut menemukan iPhone 6 Plus yang dicintainya.Melihat meningkatnya jumlah laporan, pengguna menguji fleksibilitas iPhone 6 Plus dan mengunggahnya di YouTube.Sebagai perbandingan, ia juga menguji fleksibilitas smartphone lain, yaitu Samsung Galaxy Note 3. Dalam video, Anda dapat melihat bagaimana iPhone 6 Plus ternyata sangat mudah untuk ditekuk.Pengguna yang memposting video juga mengatakan bahwa sebelum menguji iPhone 6 Plus -nya, itu sudah terlihat sedikit bengkok.Titik lemah tampaknya berada di sisi kiri, tepat di bawah tombol volume.Masalah tubuh melengkung ini tampaknya hanya terjadi pada iPhone 6 Plus.Sedangkan untuk iPhone 6 yang memiliki ukuran 4,7 inci, tidak ada laporan masalah tubuh melengkung ini

berita: Pokemon Go game is on the rise. Since its release earlier this month, Pokemon Go has immediately seized the attention of the world's citizens, including in Indonesia. Pokemon Go is a game made by Nintendo based on Augmented Reality (AR) technology. In playing it, he relies on the ability of GPS and cellphone cameras. In Indonesia, Pokemon Go has not been officially released. However, the Pokemon Go fever has infected gamers in this country even to remote villages. The excitement of the game made by the Japanese company was also used by people to spread issues related to certain religions. In cyberspace, social media, information is circulating which says that Pokemon means "I am Jewish". According to the information that went viral, Pokemon came from the Syriac language or Syriac language. Likewise with the meaning of Pikachu, one of the monster serial publication characters that must be hunted in Pokemon Go. Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish". Then the character Charmender means "God is Weak". Many believe this information. In fact, Banda Aceh Mayor Illiza Saaduddin Djamal, as reported by mediaaceh.co, forbade his city residents to play this Pokemon Go game, it is haram because it means "I am Jewish". Pokemon is a franchise from Japan. It stands for pocket monsters, in Japanese it is called Poketto Monsuta. Named Pocket Monsters, because it can be put in a Pocket Ball or pocket. While the monster characters in this game are also adopted from the Japanese language. A netizen gave the meaning of a number of characters in Pokemon Go. Pikachu comes from the words 'pika' (electric sound in Japanese) and 'chuu' (rat) Charmander (this is correct, not charmender), his real Japanese name is 'hitokage', from the words hito (person) and 'tokage' (lizard). Then it was translated into English as Charmander, from the words 'Char' (charcoal), 'man' (person), and 'salamander' (lizard) because they were designed in the form of a lizard standing on two legs. Wikipedia mentions Pokémon (????) is a media franchise owned by the video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. Initially, Pokémon was a video game series that was identical to the Game Boy console. The Los Angeles Times on April 24, 2001 then published an article about Pokemon that disturbed Muslims, especially those inhabiting the Middle East such as in Qatar, Dubai, Oman to Egypt. Still according to the LA Times, Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors of Pokemon meaning "I'm Jewish".
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go sedang meningkat.Sejak dirilis awal bulan ini, Pokemon Go segera mengambil perhatian warga dunia, termasuk di Indonesia.Pokemon Go adalah permainan yang dibuat oleh Nintendo berdasarkan teknologi augmented reality (AR).Dalam memainkannya, ia mengandalkan kemampuan GPS dan kamera ponsel.Di Indonesia, Pokemon Go belum dirilis secara resmi.Namun, demam Pokemon Go telah terinfeksi gamer di negara ini bahkan ke desa -desa terpencil.Kegembiraan permainan yang dibuat oleh perusahaan Jepang juga digunakan oleh orang -orang untuk menyebarkan masalah yang terkait dengan agama -agama tertentu.Di dunia maya, media sosial, informasi beredar yang mengatakan bahwa Pokemon berarti "Saya Yahudi".Menurut informasi yang menjadi viral, Pokemon berasal dari bahasa Syria atau bahasa Syria.Demikian juga dengan arti Pikachu, salah satu karakter publikasi serial monster yang harus diburu di Pokemon Go.Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi".Maka karakter charmender berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Banyak yang percaya informasi ini.Faktanya, Walikota Banda Aceh Illiza Saaduddin Djamal, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Mediaaceh.co, melarang penduduk kota untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go ini, itu adalah Haram karena itu berarti "Saya Yahudi".Pokemon adalah waralaba dari Jepang.Itu adalah singkatan dari Pocket Monsters, dalam bahasa Jepang disebut Poketto Monsuta.Monster saku bernama, karena dapat dimasukkan ke dalam bola saku atau saku.Sementara karakter monster dalam game ini juga diadopsi dari bahasa Jepang.Netizen memberi arti dari sejumlah karakter di Pokemon Go.Pikachu berasal dari kata -kata 'pika' (suara listrik dalam bahasa Jepang) dan 'chuu' (tikus) Charmander (ini benar, bukan charmender), nama Jepangnya yang sebenarnya adalah 'Hitokage', dari kata -kata Hito (orang) dan 'Tokage' (Lizard).Kemudian diterjemahkan ke dalam bahasa Inggris sebagai Charmander, dari kata -kata 'char' (arang), 'manusia' (orang), dan 'salamander' (kadal) karena mereka dirancang dalam bentuk kadal yang berdiri di atas dua kaki.Wikipedia menyebutkan Pokémon (????) adalah waralaba media yang dimiliki oleh perusahaan video game Nintendo dan dibuat oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Awalnya, Pokémon adalah seri video game yang identik dengan Game Boy Console.The Los Angeles Times pada 24 April 2001 kemudian menerbitkan sebuah artikel tentang Pokemon yang mengganggu umat Islam, terutama yang mendiami Timur Tengah seperti di Qatar, Dubai, Oman ke Mesir.Masih menurut LA Times, Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi desas -desus tentang Pokemon yang berarti "Saya orang Yahudi".

berita: Chairman of the Regional Leadership Council (DPD) of the Bhayangkara Indonesia Narcotics Abuse Prevention Rehabilitation Institute (LRPPN) Tanjungbalai Syahrial Manurung SH told reporters on Sunday (19/3) asking parents to be more careful and always supervise children's snacks because it is suspected nowadays There are types of children's candy containing narcotics and harmful substances on the market. According to him, according to the results of field checks carried out by BPOM Medan and North Sumatra BNN officers, it was found that candy containing drugs was circulating. It is feared that in Tanjungbalai there will also be candy containing drugs circulating. "Therefore, it is requested that the Mayor of Tanjungbalai Mhd Syahrial SH MH together with the queer Tanjungbalai Police Chief AKBP Tri Setyadi Artono Sik can work together to carry out raids to prevent the circulation of sweets that endanger the community and children," he said. Separately, the Mayor of Tanjungbalai, Mhd Syahrial, said that as a regional head he remains responsible for whatever happens in his working area. Syahrial ordered the Disperindag to order the Tanjungbalai Disperindag to immediately conduct a raid on the market. "Report immediately if you find candy that is suspected of containing drugs," said Syahrial.
berita_id: Ketua Dewan Kepemimpinan Regional (DPD) dari Bhayangkara Indonesia Narkotika Pencegahan Pencegahan Rehabilitasi (LRPPN) Tanjungbalai Syahrial Manurung SH mengatakan kepada wartawan pada hari Minggu (19/3) yang menanyakan kepada orang tua dan selalu mengawasi camus anak -anak karena itu diduga dicurigai pada anak -anak.Menurutnya, menurut hasil pemeriksaan lapangan yang dilakukan oleh BPOM Medan dan petugas BNN Sumatra Utara, ditemukan bahwa permen yang mengandung obat -obatan beredar.Dikhawatirkan bahwa di Tanjungbalai juga akan ada permen yang mengandung obat yang beredar."Oleh karena itu, diminta agar walikota Tanjungbalai Mhd Syahrial Sh Mh bersama -sama dengan Kepala Kepolisian Tanjungbalai yang aneh AKBP Tri Setyadi Artono Sik dapat bekerja sama untuk melakukan penggerebekan untuk mencegah sirkulasi permen yang membahayakan masyarakat dan anak -anak," katanya.Secara terpisah, walikota Tanjungbalai, Mhd Syahrial, mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala regional ia tetap bertanggung jawab atas apa pun yang terjadi di area kerjanya.Syahrial memerintahkan disperindag untuk memerintahkan Tanjungbalai Disperindag untuk segera melakukan serangan di pasar."Laporkan segera jika Anda menemukan permen yang diduga mengandung narkoba," kata Syahrial.

berita: The walk out action by Kanisius College alumni including well-known composer Ananda Sukarlan and Traveloka owner Derianto Kusuma when Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech turned out to be a long one. So the public spotlight, now netizens are busy calling for an invitation to delete or uninstall the Traveloka application from their smartphones. The invitation to uninstall it echoed on Twitter's timeline, even becoming one of the trending topics on Twitter Indonesia. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11/2017), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from the VIP seat provided for him and walked out when Anies gave a speech. Unfortunately, the action was followed by a number of other alumni. Judging from the information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies Baswedan's speech. Of course this is considered as support for Ananda's walk out. After the incident, we don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott the Traveloka application. The hashtags #BoikotTraveloka and #UninstallTraveloka echoed and continued to grow along with the widespread invitation of netizens to delete the hotel and transportation booking application. Peeking at the Twitter timeline, the owner of the @dimasprakbar account tweeted the reason the hashtag was crowded. “The hashtag #UninstallTraveloka is a follow-up to the participation of the Traveloka boss in the walkout when the governor of DKI Jakarta gave a speech. Break even," he tweeted. Netizens with the @hizzatullah account wrote something similar. According to him, the owner of Traveloka has exemplified the dishonorable act of walking out at Kanisius. He also said that the price discount provided by Traveloka was not worth the honor. Instead of many Twitter users inviting other netizens to delete the Traveloka application, it turned out that there were also funny replies from other netizens, like my owner @ardeks. He said users who deleted the transportation user application but could still use the service through the website.
berita_id: Tindakan Walk Out oleh alumni Kanisius College termasuk komposer terkenal Ananda Sukarlan dan pemilik Traveloka Dantu Kusuma ketika Gubernur Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato ternyata panjang.Jadi sorotan publik, sekarang netizen sibuk meminta undangan untuk menghapus atau menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dari smartphone mereka.Undangan untuk menghapus instalannya bergema di timeline Twitter, bahkan menjadi salah satu topik tren di Twitter Indonesia.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11/2017), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP yang disediakan untuknya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato.Sayangnya, aksinya diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Dilihat dari informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato Anies Baswedan.Tentu saja ini dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk perjalanan Ananda.Setelah insiden itu, kami tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot aplikasi Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka dan #uninstalltraveloka bergema dan terus tumbuh seiring dengan undangan luas netizen untuk menghapus aplikasi hotel dan pemesanan transportasi.Mengintip di timeline Twitter, pemilik akun @Dimasprakbar tweeted alasan tagar itu ramai."Tagar #uninstalltraveloka adalah tindak lanjut dari partisipasi bos Traveloka di pemogokan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta memberikan pidato. Break Even," ia tweeted.Netizens dengan akun @hizzatullah menulis sesuatu yang serupa.Menurutnya, pemilik Traveloka telah mencontohkan tindakan berjalan yang tidak terhormat di Kanisius.Dia juga mengatakan bahwa diskon harga yang diberikan oleh Traveloka tidak sebanding dengan kehormatannya.Alih -alih banyak pengguna Twitter yang mengundang netizen lain untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka, ternyata ada juga balasan lucu dari netizen lain, seperti pemilik saya @ardeks.Dia mengatakan pengguna yang menghapus aplikasi pengguna transportasi tetapi masih bisa menggunakan layanan melalui situs web.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies. Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out regulator when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan yang berbeda. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus dan sebagainya," kata anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD, Jalan Konal Sirih, Gambir, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (14/11/2017).).Menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan ini seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak warga negara. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat, saling menghormati tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi tidak perlu menghapus semua jenis hal," kata ANIES.Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh regulator Walk Out Pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Ke Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan berbasis teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai-nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai-nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal," lanjutnya.

berita: The head of BPOM RI, Penny Kusumastuti Lukito, emphasized that the teat candy is negative for drugs and does not contain other harmful substances. This assurance was obtained after conducting a series of inspections of the candy. "After being tested and investigated using 12 determining parameters, no drug content and other dangerous food ingredients were mamilla found. This means that there is no prohibition on the sale of candy, which has been distributed almost throughout Indonesia," said Peny on the sidelines of the National BPOM National Conference at the Singhasari Hotel, Batu City, East Java, Thursday (9/3/2017). He explained that the issue of candy pacifiers containing drugs became popular after a report from a resident from Surabaya. It was said that a child who consumed pacifiers experienced dizziness and was addicted. "We also ask the media to provide correct information to the public," he concluded
berita_id: Kepala BPOM RI, Penny Kusumastuti Lukito, menekankan bahwa permen dot negatif untuk obat -obatan dan tidak mengandung zat berbahaya lainnya.Jaminan ini diperoleh setelah melakukan serangkaian inspeksi permen."Setelah diuji dan diselidiki dengan menggunakan 12 parameter penentu, tidak ada kandungan obat dan bahan makanan berbahaya lainnya yang ditemukan Mamilla. Ini berarti bahwa tidak ada larangan penjualan permen, yang telah didistribusikan hampir di seluruh Indonesia," kata Pys di sela -sela Kamis (Kamis, Nasional.Dia menjelaskan bahwa masalah dot permen yang mengandung obat -obatan menjadi populer setelah laporan dari seorang penduduk dari Surabaya.Dikatakan bahwa seorang anak yang mengkonsumsi dot mengalami pusing dan kecanduan."Kami juga meminta media untuk memberikan informasi yang benar kepada publik," pungkasnya

berita: Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was recorded at 29.98 kg / capita / year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can choice trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, peningkatan dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Consumption menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) direkam di 29.9.KG/Capita/Tahun pada tahun 2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios lele PECEL telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: Thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists held a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015), as a form of protest over the burning of Reog properties at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao in the Philippines. Based on information compiled by Solopos.com, the artist's demonstration of the reog burning incident was not only carried out by artists from Ponorogo. Also seen taking to the streets are artists from various cities or regencies in Indonesia. The thousands of artists held demonstrations by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the demonstrators were then allowed to attend a hearing on the second floor of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Jl. East Square. Representatives of the participants in the demonstration were received by elements of the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. "We do not accept the burning of reog that was carried out at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago. Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reog art," said the reog artist representing the Community Pandemen Reyog (Kompag) Ponorogo, Grendo, as quoted by Madiunpos.com from the Facebook fanpage wall All About Ponorogo, Tuesday. Reog Pemeriksaan Checkup Meanwhile, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Arrmanatha Nasir, said that his party was conducting an internal inspection regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to ensure that the item is an asset of a state agency," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, as reported by Antara News Agency, Sunday (8/8). /11/2015). On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that have gone viral and have even been distributed by local online media, Bitung News, show that there is a certain ritual before the burning. In Good Condition One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it can be seen that Indonesian Consulate General Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. "There are periodic internal inspections," he said. Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian electrocution Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, apart from providing a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, could also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
