berpartisipasi dalam menjaga stabilitas negara jika mereka ingin melakukan bisnis di Indonesia, jika itu menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di Indonesia, pemerintah akan bertindak secara tegas.Sementara itu, Facebook sendiri telah meluncurkan program pemeriksaan fakta pihak ketiga pada hari Senin (2/4/2018), untuk mendorong literasi digital dan literasi berita yang lebih baik di Indonesia.Ini adalah program pertama di Asia Pasifik.Dalam program pemeriksaan fakta pihak ketiga, Facebook bekerja sama dengan media online Tirto.id.Mengenai hal ini, pemimpin kemitraan berita Facebook Indonesia, Alice Budisatro, mengatakan alasan partainya berkolaborasi dengan Tirto adalah karena media ini adalah satu -satunya media di Indonesia yang telah diakreditasi sebagai pemeriksa fakta.

berita: The Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (KemenPAN-RB) Herman Suryatman stated that information about the president's salary, which was valued at Rp. 553 million, was not valid. This information cannot be used as a basis because it is sourced from last year's discussion material. "That's an invalid simulation number. Material for the coordination meeting of the Draft PP on Salaries and Benefits that was held last year. Precisely February 2017," said Herman, in Jakarta. Saturday (10/3). He explained that the explanation contained a simulation of the amount of income for civil servants and state officials (not just the president). “The data declared in the presentation is a discussion material that still requires further study. It not only contains a simulation of the income of State Officials, but also a simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood." Furthermore, Herman said, if there is data or information circulating related to the field of utilization of the state apparatus and reform, it is expected to confirm it first with him. "Please confirm with us so that the problem is clear. Especially now in the era of public information disclosure, we are obliged to provide good information services,” concluded Herman.
berita_id: Kepala Biro Informasi Hukum, Komunikasi dan Publik dari Kementerian Reformasi Administratif dan Reformasi Birokrasi (Kemenpan-RB) Herman Suryatman menyatakan bahwa informasi tentang gaji presiden, yang dihargai Rp.553 juta, tidak valid.Informasi ini tidak dapat digunakan sebagai dasar karena bersumber dari materi diskusi tahun lalu."Itu adalah nomor simulasi yang tidak valid. Bahan untuk pertemuan koordinasi draft PP tentang gaji dan tunjangan yang diadakan tahun lalu. Justru Februari 2017," kata Herman, di Jakarta.Sabtu (10/3).Dia menjelaskan bahwa penjelasan itu berisi simulasi jumlah pendapatan untuk pegawai negeri dan pejabat negara (bukan hanya presiden)."Data yang dinyatakan dalam presentasi adalah bahan diskusi yang masih membutuhkan studi lebih lanjut. Ini tidak hanya berisi simulasi pendapatan pejabat negara, tetapi juga simulasi pendapatan pegawai negeri. Tolong jangan disalahpahami."Selain itu, Herman mengatakan, jika ada data atau informasi yang beredar terkait dengan bidang pemanfaatan peralatan dan reformasi negara, diharapkan untuk mengkonfirmasi terlebih dahulu dengannya."Harap konfirmasi dengan kami sehingga masalahnya jelas. Terutama sekarang di era pengungkapan informasi publik, kami berkewajiban untuk memberikan layanan informasi yang baik," simpul Herman.

berita: Needle sticks cure stroke, information about this has circulated on the internet. Of course this made a scene online, where if it was true, then not a few people would use this method. But is the method true or is it just a trick? Just news seeking thrills? Let's find the answer now. Mentioned through a video that is widely circulated on the internet with the following steps to cure a stroke: Needles are sterilized using alcohol liquid The tips of the fingers are pierced with a needle to drip blood Is it that easy to overcome a stroke? It is stated in the video that a stroke is an attack that occurs due to disturbances inch and blockages in the blood path. It also mentions why pricking the finger using a sterilized needle, according to the video, the reason is to make the blood vessels in the body not clogged. For a layman it might be a reasonable argument, but it turns out that from a medical point of view, it is just fake news. Nervous health is important. Do not let you neglect the health of your nerves. Tips for you, take Neurotropic vitamins (B12, B6, B1) and exercise regularly. Mentioned if viewed from a medical point of view, then the theory is just a hoax or made up. Indeed, the information on the internet, especially regarding health, should be filtered before use. Moreover, the information is related to health. Blockage of Blood Vessels Causes Stroke The blockage that occurs for a long period of time, where cholesterol and fat deposits have accumulated and accumulated. Therefore, blockages will occur in the blood vessels and capillaries, which is the source of the problem. And the blockage can not be treated just by sticking a needle in the finger. This is not a trivial problem but has accumulated over the years. The dangers of the finger pricking method using a needle for stroke. In fact, if you carry out the method mentioned in the video and spread it can increase the risk to your health. Risk if you get infection. And if someone really has a stroke, the wrong treatment will slow the sufferer to get the right treatment. Even though it is known that stroke should not be treated too late, because the effects can be permanent. Moreover, the scattered procedures are clearly not in accordance with the procedures given by the doctor. How to deal with stroke sufferers The right way is to run the FAST method. F. Face. Face. Look at the patient's face, if it becomes tilted in his expression or turns away, it is a sign that the person has had a stroke. Because a stroke attacks the nerves. A. Arm. Arm. Try to raise the patient's hand, both hands. Then ask the patient to hold his hand in front of him. If the person is unable to hold both, let alone one of them, it is a symptom of a stroke on both sides, while for one hand it means a half stroke. S. Speech. Saying. The third is speech. A stroke patient will become slurred when speaking, because the patient's mouth turns into a slurred. This is a fairly obvious symptom. T. Time. Time. Last is time or time. If you have had a stroke, the sooner you get treatment at the hospital, the better, don't let it be too late. The single best method is to get the stroke patient to the hospital as soon as possible. Don't use any other method, because it doesn't exist. Call an ambulance or use a private car. So many articles about curing strokes with acupuncture are not true, hopefully it will be useful.
berita_id: Tongkat jarum penyembuhan stroke, informasi tentang ini telah beredar di internet.Tentu saja ini membuat adegan secara online, di mana jika itu benar, maka tidak sedikit orang yang akan menggunakan metode ini.Tetapi apakah metodenya benar atau hanya trik?Hanya berita mencari sensasi?Mari kita temukan jawabannya sekarang.Disebutkan melalui video yang secara luas diedarkan di internet dengan langkah -langkah berikut untuk menyembuhkan stroke: jarum disterilkan menggunakan cairan alkohol, ujung -ujung jari ditusuk dengan jarum untuk meneteskan darah, apakah mudah untuk mengatasi stroke?Dinyatakan dalam video bahwa stroke adalah serangan yang terjadi karena gangguan inci dan penyumbatan di jalur darah.Ini juga menyebutkan mengapa menusuk jari menggunakan jarum yang disterilkan, menurut video, alasannya adalah untuk membuat pembuluh darah dalam tubuh tidak tersumbat.Untuk orang awam itu mungkin merupakan argumen yang masuk akal, tetapi ternyata dari sudut pandang medis, itu hanya berita palsu.Kesehatan gugup itu penting.Jangan biarkan Anda mengabaikan kesehatan saraf Anda.Tips untuk Anda, ambil vitamin neurotropik (B12, B6, B1) dan berolahraga secara teratur.Disebutkan jika dilihat dari sudut pandang medis, maka teorinya hanya tipuan atau dibuat -buat.Memang, informasi di internet, terutama mengenai kesehatan, harus disaring sebelum digunakan.Selain itu, informasi tersebut terkait dengan kesehatan.Penyumbatan pembuluh darah menyebabkan stroke penyumbatan yang terjadi untuk jangka waktu yang lama, di mana kolesterol dan endapan lemak telah menumpuk dan menumpuk.Oleh karena itu, penyumbatan akan terjadi pada pembuluh darah dan kapiler, yang merupakan sumber masalah.Dan penyumbatan tidak dapat diobati hanya dengan menempelkan jarum di jari.Ini bukan masalah sepele tetapi telah terakumulasi selama bertahun -tahun.Bahaya metode tusukan jari menggunakan jarum untuk stroke.Bahkan, jika Anda melakukan metode yang disebutkan dalam video dan menyebar, itu dapat meningkatkan risiko kesehatan Anda.Berisiko jika Anda mengalami infeksi.Dan jika seseorang benar -benar mengalami stroke, perawatan yang salah akan memperlambat penderita untuk mendapatkan perawatan yang tepat.Meskipun diketahui bahwa stroke tidak boleh diperlakukan terlambat, karena efeknya bisa permanen.Selain itu, prosedur yang tersebar jelas tidak sesuai dengan prosedur yang diberikan oleh dokter.Cara menangani penderita stroke dengan cara yang benar adalah dengan menjalankan metode cepat.F. Wajah.Menghadapi.Lihatlah wajah pasien, jika dimiringkan dalam ekspresinya atau berpaling, itu adalah tanda bahwa orang tersebut mengalami stroke.Karena stroke menyerang saraf.A. lengan.Lengan.Cobalah untuk mengangkat tangan pasien, kedua tangan.Kemudian minta pasien untuk memegang tangannya di depannya.Jika orang tersebut tidak dapat menahan keduanya, apalagi salah satunya, itu adalah gejala stroke di kedua sisi, sedangkan untuk satu tangan itu berarti setengah stroke.Pidato S.Pepatah.Yang ketiga adalah pidato.Pasien stroke akan menjadi tidak jelas ketika berbicara, karena mulut pasien berubah menjadi cadel.Ini adalah gejala yang cukup jelas.T. Waktu.Waktu.Terakhir adalah waktu atau waktu.Jika Anda mengalami stroke, semakin cepat Anda mendapatkan perawatan di rumah sakit, semakin baik, jangan biarkan sudah terlambat.Metode tunggal terbaik adalah membawa pasien stroke ke rumah sakit sesegera mungkin.Jangan gunakan metode lain, karena tidak ada.Hubungi ambulans atau gunakan mobil pribadi.Begitu banyak artikel tentang penyembuhan sapuan dengan akupunktur tidak benar, semoga akan berguna.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many febricity thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link.
berita_id: Permainan Pokemon Go saat ini sedang booming di kalangan anak muda.Tidak sedikit orang yang mengalami demam Pokemon dan bersedia untuk Blusukan untuk mencari Pokemon.Namun, game ini dibuat oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring.Baru -baru ini, ada banyak tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permainan berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Secara luas diedarkan di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi desas -desus, banyak febricity mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Jadi apakah itu masalahnya?The Los Angels Times dalam sebuah artikel tertanggal 24 April 2001 pernah meninjau ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, ada banyak desas-desus bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu."Telah terbukti bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran menghujat, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita," kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota parlemen Yordania.Meski begitu, dalam artikel LA Times, ia menyatakan bahwa tidak ada bukti kuat bahwa permainan Pokemon memang memiliki konotasi yang merugikan Islam.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Artikel dari LA Times dapat dibaca di tautan berikut.

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of mobs driving 5 bosses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, as the mosque, which used to be the gathering place for the Defending Islam Action, was previously closed. Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked manoeuver to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own.
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan gerombolan yang mengendarai 5 bos, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, sebagai masjid, yang dulunya adalah tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan, sebelumnya ditutup.Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari daerah ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta Manoeuver untuk memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri.

berita: The Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan was invited by Kanisius College to give a speech at the 90th anniversary event of Kanisius College, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. On this occasion, there was an award presentation agenda to five alumni of Canisius College across generations. (For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder of Kalbe Farma. However, when Anies was giving a speech, pianist Ananda Sukarlan suddenly left the room (Walk Out). Hundreds of alumni and attendees followed Ananda's footsteps. Apparently, about half an hour after Anies left the room, Ananda came back in. At that time, he took the award pinned to him. After receiving the award, Ananda then gave a sarcastic speech to Anies. He said Kanisius respects differences. "Yes, I did walk out in the middle of (Anies Baswedan's) speech," said Ananda when contacted by reportindonesia.com. (Monday) “You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that go against what we have been taught,” said Ananda Ananda also admitted that he did not invite round of drinks his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his contemporaries, namely the 1986 class. Ananda Sukarlan was born on June 10, 1968 in Jakarta. He is the son of the couple Sukarlan and Poppy Kumudastuti. In Europe, Ananda's name is well known. Piano Petrof from the University of Hadford, Connecticut, United States in 1986. Graduated summa cum laude in 1993 under the guidance of Naum Grubert As in 2000, he was invited by Queen Sofia of Spain to fill a concert at the Queen Sofia Prize Gala Night in Madrid. In 2002, he reached the peak of his career by signing a contract to collaborate with the great French composer Pierre Boulez on a concert tour to 11 cities including Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago and Paris. And the first Indonesian pianist to be recorded in The International Who's Who in Music book. On the other hand, when reportindonesia.com confirmed Anies Baswedan (Governor of DKI), he admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall. (Monday). Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. According to the Big Indonesian Dictionary (KBBI) the definition of walk out is to leave the meeting room or trial of your own free will because you do not agree or refuse the discussion or the results of the trial. This turned out to have an impact on one of the Indonesian start-up companies, Traveloka. The movement to UNINSTALL THE TRAVELOKA APPLICATION is milling about on Twitter's timeline. There, Derianto Kusuma, co-founder and CTO of Traveloka, was also present. He greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. Derianto's gesture was considered as support for Ananda's actions which were considered insulting to Governor Anies. Whereas in 2017, the online travel service provider Traveloka, received new funding for their operations in Indonesia and expanded the market in Southeast Asia. The new funding was obtained from Expedia from the United States amounting to 350 million US dollars, or around Rp. 4.6 trillion. In the past year, Traveloka has raised a total of 500 million US dollars or Rp. 6.6 trillion, which was obtained from investors in previous funding rounds such as East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, and Chinese e-commerce company, JD.com. I hope this doesn't happen again to anyone and anything.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan diundang oleh Kanisius College untuk memberikan pidato di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Pada kesempatan ini, ada agenda presentasi penghargaan untuk lima alumni Canisius College lintas generasi.(For information, Canisius College is an educational institution owned by Catholics, which is devoted to men.) The five alumni are, firstly a pianist, Ananda Sukarlan, secondly Derianto Kusuma, founder of Traveloka, thirdly Father Magnis Suseno, a Jesuit figure, fourth Irwan Ismaun Soenggono, a Scout leader, and finally Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan, the founder ofKalbe Farha.Namun, ketika Anies memberikan pidato, pianis Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba meninggalkan ruangan (berjalan keluar).Ratusan alumni dan peserta mengikuti jejak Ananda.Rupanya, sekitar setengah jam setelah Anies meninggalkan ruangan, Ananda kembali. Pada waktu itu, ia menerima penghargaan yang disematkan kepadanya.Setelah menerima penghargaan, Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato sarkastik kepada Anies.Dia mengatakan Kanisius menghormati perbedaan."Ya, saya memang keluar di tengah pidato (anies Baswedan)," kata Ananda ketika dihubungi oleh ReportIndonesia.com.(Senin) "Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda Ananda juga mengakui bahwa ia tidak mengundang minuman teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang banyak keluar adalah orang -orang sezamannya, yaitu kelas 1986.Ananda Sukarlan lahir pada 10 Juni 1968 di Jakarta.Dia adalah putra pasangan Sukarlan dan Poppy Kumudastuti.Di Eropa, nama Ananda terkenal.Piano Petrof dari University of Hadford, Connecticut, Amerika Serikat pada tahun 1986. Lulus summa cum laude pada tahun 1993 di bawah bimbingan Naum Grubert seperti pada tahun 2000, ia diundang oleh Ratu Sofia dari Spanyol untuk mengisi konser di Ratu Sofia Hadiah Gala Night di Madrid.Pada tahun 2002, ia mencapai puncak karirnya dengan menandatangani kontrak untuk berkolaborasi dengan komposer Prancis yang hebat Pierre Boulez dalam tur konser ke 11 kota termasuk Helsinkski, Oslo, Santiago dan Paris.Dan pianis Indonesia pertama yang direkam di International Who's Who in Music Book.Di sisi lain, ketika Reportindonesia.com mengkonfirmasi Anies Baswedan (Gubernur DKI), dia mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J.,.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak ingat, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta.(Senin).Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Menurut Kamus Indonesia Besar (KBBI) Definisi Walk Out adalah meninggalkan ruang pertemuan atau persidangan atas kehendak bebas Anda sendiri karena Anda tidak setuju atau menolak diskusi atau hasil persidangan.Ini ternyata berdampak pada salah satu perusahaan pemula Indonesia, Traveloka.Gerakan untuk menghapus instalasi aplikasi Traveloka sedang berkeliaran di timeline Twitter.Di sana, DeRianto Kusuma, co-founder dan CTO dari Traveloka, juga hadir.Dia menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah berjalan keluar dan pidato anies.Gerakan DeRianto dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda yang dianggap menghina gubernur.Sedangkan pada 2017, penyedia layanan perjalanan online Traveloka, menerima dana baru untuk operasi mereka di Indonesia dan memperluas pasar di Asia Tenggara.Pendanaan baru diperoleh dari Expedia dari Amerika Serikat sebesar 350 juta dolar AS, atau sekitar RP.4,6 triliun.Pada tahun lalu, Traveloka telah mengumpulkan total 500 juta dolar AS atau RP.6,6 triliun, yang diperoleh dari investor dalam putaran pendanaan sebelumnya seperti East Ventures, Hillhouse Capital, Sequoia Capital, dan China E-Commerce Company, JD.com.Saya harap ini tidak terjadi lagi pada siapa pun dan apa pun.

berita: BEING INSPIRED for the burning of property on October 20, 2015, making thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists hold a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015). Photo Text: Reog artists protest (ist) Photo Text: Reog artists protest (ist) The artists took action by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the mass demonstrations were then allowed to attend an audience at the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Second Floor, located on Jl. East Square, Ponorogo, East Java. Representatives of the mass of action termite were received by the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. The protesters were not only from Ponorogo, but also from surrounding cities, some even came directly from Jakarta to join this action. Not only that, dozens of reog groups also took part in the action. Photo test: Reog Ponorogo artists demonstrate (ist) Photo test: Reog Ponorogo artists demonstrate (ist) "We do not accept the reyog burning that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago," said Grendo, one of the Reyog artists who are members of the Ponorogo Reog Pandemen Community. Grendo, who is from Mlarak, continued, so that the perpetrators immediately apologized to the people of Ponorogo. "Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reyog art," he said. Meanwhile, the Technical section for the staging of the Reog Ponorogo Community (KRP) Suyono, who came directly from Jakarta, said the perpetrators must be investigated and dealt with according to the existing law. "We demand accountability, and what was the motive for the arson!" he said after hearings with the Ponorogo DPRD and Acting Regent Maskur at the DPRD Building. After hearing about the burning of the reog, Suyono and several members of the KRP immediately went to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, who then after the discussion asked the ministry to write a letter in which the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would clarify and form an investigation team. The letter was directly delivered by Suyono to Ponorogo to be handed over to the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. Suyono admitted that he and his friends brought a set of reog property to Davao around 2005. He denied that the reog was burned there because of the damaged condition. If the bamboo from here is impossible for termites to eat, wong is stored neatly in the glass, he said in an annoyed tone
berita_id: Terinspirasi untuk pembakaran properti pada 20 Oktober 2015, membuat ribuan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan demonstrasi, Selasa (10/11/2015).Teks Foto: Reog Artists Protes (IST) Teks Foto: Reog Artists Protes (IST) Para seniman mengambil tindakan dengan memberikan pidato, membentangkan spanduk yang membawa sejumlah tuntutan, dan juga melakukan reog di sekitar Ponorogo Square.Setelah melakukan serangkaian kegiatan sebagai protes terhadap pembakaran properti di Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, perwakilan demonstrasi massa kemudian diizinkan untuk menghadiri audiensi di gedung DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo, lantai dua, yang terletak di JL.East Square, Ponorogo, Jawa Timur.Perwakilan dari massa rayap aksi diterima oleh kepemimpinan Ponorogo DPRD bersama dengan akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur.Para pengunjuk rasa tidak hanya dari Ponorogo, tetapi juga dari kota -kota di sekitarnya, beberapa bahkan datang langsung dari Jakarta untuk bergabung dengan tindakan ini.Tidak hanya itu, lusinan kelompok Reog juga mengambil bagian dalam aksi tersebut.Tes Foto: Reog Ponorogo Artists Demonstrasi (IST) Tes Foto: Reog Ponorogo Artists Demonstrasi (IST) "Kami tidak menerima pembakaran Reyog yang terjadi di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao beberapa waktu yang lalu," kata Grendo, salah satu seniman Reyog yang merupakan anggota Ponorogo Pandemo Pandemo.Grendo, yang berasal dari Mlarak, melanjutkan, sehingga para pelaku segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo."Tuntutan kami adalah bahwa mereka segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo sebagai pemilik seni Reyog ini," katanya.Sementara itu, bagian teknis untuk pementasan komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) Suyono, yang datang langsung dari Jakarta, mengatakan para pelaku harus diselidiki dan ditangani sesuai dengan hukum yang ada."Kami menuntut akuntabilitas, dan apa motif pembakaran!"Dia mengatakan setelah audiensi dengan Ponorogo DPRD dan bertindak sebagai Bupati Maskur di gedung DPRD.Setelah mendengar tentang pembakaran Reog, Suyono dan beberapa anggota KRP segera pergi ke Kementerian Luar Negeri, yang kemudian setelah diskusi meminta kementerian untuk menulis surat di mana Kementerian Luar Negeri akan mengklarifikasi dan membentuk tim investigasi.Surat itu langsung dikirim oleh Suyono ke Ponorogo untuk diserahkan kepada akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur.Suyono mengakui bahwa dia dan teman -temannya membawa serangkaian properti reog ke Davao sekitar tahun 2005. Dia membantah bahwa reog dibakar di sana karena kondisi yang rusak.Jika bambu dari sini tidak mungkin untuk dimakan rayap, Wong disimpan dengan rapi di gelas, katanya dengan nada kesal

berita: Wakoka.Co.Id – The demonstration was held today in Ponorogo square, Tuesday (10/11/2015), by several elements of the Ponorogo community consisting of Reyog Artists, Reyog Community, Reyog Pandemen and Ponorogo Citizens Association. This demonstration was carried out in connection with the reyog burning case at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines some time ago. In the demonstration, apart from giving speeches, the demonstrators also brought along several Reyog groups to enliven the action. As previously reported, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on October 20, 2015 burned the Ponorogo reyog art equipment stored in the Indonesian Consulate General's building. Although the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued a statement that the destruction of the Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally sealed and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Representatives of the demonstrators were then met by PJ Regent of Ponorogo, and Chairman of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD on the 2nd floor of the Ponorogo DPRD building to convey their aspirations. Several representatives of the demonstrators then delivered a statement of attitude that strongly condemned the burning of reyog art instruments at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The demonstrators also demanded the removal of the individuals involved in the incident and demanded the government through the tourism office and the Ponorogo DPRD to thoroughly investigate the case. Responding to this, PJ Regent of Ponorogo, Ir. Maskur, MM said that the Regency Government had coordinated with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). The Ministry of Foreign Affairs will replace the Reyog device that has been burned and is currently investigating the case through the Special Team. Previously, the Jabodetabek Reog Community had also sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reyog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials.
berita_id: Wakoka.co.id - Demonstrasi diadakan hari ini di Ponorogo Square, Selasa (10/11/2015), oleh beberapa elemen komunitas Ponorogo yang terdiri dari seniman Reyog, komunitas Reyog, Reyog Pandemen dan Ponorogo Citizens Association.Demonstrasi ini dilakukan sehubungan dengan kasus Reyog Burning di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina beberapa waktu lalu.Dalam demonstrasi, selain memberikan pidato, para demonstran juga membawa beberapa kelompok Reyog untuk menghidupkan tindakan tersebut.Seperti yang dilaporkan sebelumnya, Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober 2015 membakar peralatan seni Ponorogo Reyog yang disimpan di gedung Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia.Meskipun Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar disegel secara virus dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian dipenuhi oleh PJ Bupati Ponorogo, dan ketua DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo di lantai 2 gedung Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyampaikan aspirasi mereka.Beberapa perwakilan dari para demonstran kemudian menyampaikan pernyataan sikap yang sangat mengutuk pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Para demonstran juga menuntut penghapusan orang -orang yang terlibat dalam insiden tersebut dan menuntut pemerintah melalui kantor pariwisata dan Ponorogo DPRD untuk menyelidiki kasus tersebut secara menyeluruh.Menanggapi ini, PJ Bupati Ponorogo, Ir.Maskur, MM mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten telah berkoordinasi dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu).Kementerian Luar Negeri akan menggantikan perangkat Reyog yang telah dibakar dan saat ini sedang menyelidiki kasus ini melalui tim khusus.Sebelumnya, komunitas Reog Jabodetabek juga telah mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni Reyog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.

berita: This one news may be very useful for consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's new smartphone 5.5-inch jumbo sail that began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, The biggest screen iPhone turns out to be easy to bend when stored for too long in the trouser pocket. This incident was first reported by an owner The iPhone 6 is named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He claimed to keep the iPhone 6 Plus in a trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and perform daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw the middle His iPhone 6 Plus is slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, another user named Devin Pitcher also boundary expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin claims to keep the new iPhone 6 Plus his in his front trouser pocket. When removed, even the middle of the iPhone 6 Plus bent like a tank can withstand the pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. However, the problem of large dimensions limits the user's comfort when storing it in the pocket pants seems unthinkable to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have mistakes by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as a material iPhone 6 Plus frame base material. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. UTM Test serves to test the framework of the iPhone 6 plus by pressing and pulling to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend
berita_id: Berita yang satu ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone baru Smartphone 5,5 inci berlayar Jumbo yang mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk saat disimpan terlalu lama di saku celana.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengaku menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bagian tengah iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga Boundary menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum.Devin mengklaim menyimpan iPhone 6 baru ditambahnya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, bahkan tengah iPhone 6 plus bengkok seperti tangki dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Namun, masalah dimensi besar membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di celana saku tampaknya tidak terpikirkan oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap memiliki kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan bingkai bingkai iPhone 6 plus material.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Tes UTM berfungsi untuk menguji kerangka kerja iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menarik ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang diperlukan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk

berita: Participants of Action 212 Volume 2 who came from outside the city had arrived at the Istiqlal Mosque, but they could not enter because the gate of the mosque was locked. According to observations, hundreds of mobs driving 5 bosses, including AD number plates (Solo and its surroundings) were stuck at the entrance of the Istiqlal mosque, Monday (20/2) night, as the mosque, which used to be the gathering place for the Defending Islam Action, was previously closed. (read: Istiqlal door is closed, 5 buses participating in 212 action cannot enter) Police officers on guard in front of the Istiqlal Mosque then directed the bus from the area to another place. It was not explained where the mass gathering place was diverted. For last night's case, there were five buses from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. The group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. Previously, the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) ensured that there would be no long march during the 212th volume II action, Tuesday (21/2) tomorrow. Action participants will be directed directly to the action concentration point in front of the DPR/MPR RI building. "Our scenario does not have a long march. So all participants are advised to go directly to the DPR/MPR RI building," said Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar as coordinator of the 212 action volume II to reporters at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Monday (20/2/2017) . Ustadz Bernard estimates that 10 thousand people will attend the action. People from outside Jakarta were asked to park their vehicles in the parking lots that have been prepared. "And for those from areas who bring buses and vehicles, we then direct them to park at the Senayan East Parking if those from the south and east. Meanwhile, from the west we will direct them to (park vehicles) at Palmerah Station and at in front of the Forestry Department building," he explained. He added that his party also did not provide lodging facilities for action participants from outside the region. This means that those from outside the city put down of Jakarta are welcome to find a place to rest on their own
berita_id: Peserta aksi 212 Volume 2 yang datang dari luar kota telah tiba di masjid Istiqlal, tetapi mereka tidak bisa masuk karena gerbang masjid terkunci.Menurut pengamatan, ratusan gerombolan yang mengendarai 5 bos, termasuk pelat nomor iklan (solo dan sekitarnya) terjebak di pintu masuk masjid Istiqlal, Senin (20/2) malam, sebagai masjid, yang dulunya adalah tempat berkumpul untuk aksi Islam yang bertahan, sebelumnya ditutup.(Baca: pintu ISTIQLAL ditutup, 5 bus yang berpartisipasi dalam 212 Action Can't masuk) Petugas polisi yang berjaga di depan masjid Istiqlal kemudian mengarahkan bus dari area ke tempat lain.Itu tidak dijelaskan di mana tempat pengumpulan massa dialihkan.Untuk kasus tadi malam, ada lima bus dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan.Kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali.Sebelumnya, Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada Maret yang panjang selama aksi Volume II ke -212, Selasa (21/2) besok.Peserta tindakan akan diarahkan langsung ke titik konsentrasi aksi di depan gedung DPR/MPR RI."Skenario kami tidak memiliki pawai panjang. Jadi semua peserta disarankan untuk langsung ke gedung DPR/MPR RI," kata Ustaz Bernard Abdul Jabbar sebagai koordinator 212 Action Volume II kepada wartawan di Markas Kepolisian Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Senin (20/2/2017).Ustadz Bernard memperkirakan bahwa 10 ribu orang akan menghadiri aksi tersebut.Orang -orang dari luar Jakarta diminta memarkir kendaraan mereka di tempat parkir yang telah disiapkan."Dan bagi mereka dari daerah yang membawa bus dan kendaraan, kami kemudian mengarahkan mereka ke parkir di parkir Senayan Timur jika yang dari selatan dan timur. Sementara itu, dari barat kami akan mengarahkan mereka ke (kendaraan parkir) di stasiun Palmerah dan di depan gedung departemen kehutanan," jelasnya.Dia menambahkan bahwa partainya juga tidak menyediakan fasilitas penginapan bagi peserta tindakan dari luar wilayah.Ini berarti bahwa orang -orang dari luar kota yang diletakkan Jakarta dipersilakan untuk menemukan tempat untuk beristirahat sendiri

berita: Jakarta (ANTARA News) - The Istiqlal Mosque Management Board (BPPMI) explained that the news circulating on social media about the Istiqlal Mosque closing the door for worshipers who will stay overnight on Monday (20/2) night and they are not allowed to pray at dawn at Istiqlal is not allowed. Correct. "Since 2002, the Istiqlal Mosque has enforced rules to close the gate every 21.30 WIB and reopen it at 3:40 WIB before the dawn prayer," said BPPMI Secretary Rusli Efendi at the Istiqlal Mosque, Jakarta, Tuesday. He said all pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. He had explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the rules and they understood and were willing to leave the mosque area. "Besides, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the pilgrims to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held the 411, 212 or 112 actions. In addition, there was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter," he said. BPPMI said negative news about the Istiqlal Mosque being locked and allowing the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) to be outside did not match reality and tended to be provocation. "All Muslims are asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," he said. He said that at dawn, the implementation of the dawn prayer went well, led by Imam Salim Ghazali and was attended by 170 male worshipers and 70 female worshipers. The Istiqlal Mosque calls on the people to strive for national unity and unity and always sealed maintain the comfort of worship.
berita_id: JAKARTA (NEWS ANTARA) - Dewan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI) menjelaskan bahwa berita yang beredar di media sosial tentang masjid Istiqlal yang menutup pintu untuk para penyembah yang akan menginap pada hari Senin (20/2) malam dan mereka tidak diizinkan untuk berdoa saat fajar di Istiqlal tidak diizinkan.Benar."Sejak 2002, masjid ISTIQLAL telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali pada 3:40 WIB sebelum doa fajar," kata Sekretaris BPPMI Rusli Efendi di Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta, Selasa.Dia mengatakan semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah masjid kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin dari pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Dia telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang aturan dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid."Selain itu, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana para peziarah untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika umat Islam mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112. Selain itu, tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini," katanya.BPPMI mengatakan berita negatif tentang masjid Istiqlal yang terkunci dan memungkinkan Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) berada di luar tidak cocok dengan kenyataan dan cenderung menjadi provokasi."Semua Muslim diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," katanya.Dia mengatakan bahwa saat fajar, implementasi doa fajar berjalan dengan baik, dipimpin oleh Imam Salim Ghazali dan dihadiri oleh 170 penyembah pria dan 70 jamaah wanita.Masjid Istiqlal menyerukan kepada orang -orang untuk berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu disegel mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.

berita: to carry out actions to defend Islam and the State that will be carried out by the Muslim community, who are members of the Islamic Community Forum (FUI), who are already angry with the behavior of the leaders of this country, where they should carry out the rules and laws firmly and correctly, but in reality this is not the case. This assumption led to the case of blasphemy against Islam carried out by the defendant Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, who is currently undergoing trial, it was not dismissed and the public considered that the reasons given seemed made up. plainly Not even a few legal and state administration experts, including the former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court, Mahfud MD, also criticized the government's attitude, especially the Minister of Home Affairs (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo including President Joko Widodo alias Jokowi who was silent when Ahok was again given his seat as governor. While some regional heads actually experience the opposite. As a result, their demands in the action called the Action to Defend Islam and the State 212 will be carried out in front of the MPR building of the DPR RI, and apparently not a few participants came from several outside Jakarta. As a result, they tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque with the intention of carrying out the Fajr prayer in congregation, and also the weather conditions when this news was revealed were raining, as a result they tried to immediately enter shelter while waiting for the prayer time to enter. The owner of this gold-plated luxury car is actually an Indonesian Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal Mosque is actually tightly closed, as received by this media, in the form of photos and descriptions, 5 minutes later when this news was revealed, the participants were also unable to enter to gather and perform the dawn prayer. "Istiqlal Mosque in Padlock…… no one can (may) pray Fajr…. What regime is this….. PKI challenges the Defenders of Islam….our war begins… Allahu Akbar…..!” This is the text in the caption of the photo sent to the media.It can be seen in the photo that the participants are gathering and hoping that the door will be opened soon. Their anger was directed at the government, because the Istiqlal Mosque is managed directly under the Ministry of Religion through the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI). Where the management of BPPMI is appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who is also in the structure as Chairman of BPPMI. Meanwhile, the responsibility is directly to the President. Meanwhile, it is related to the statement that mentions the involvement of the PKI, due to the connection with the PDI-P as the ruling party and also the main supporter of President Jokowi and also the DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot. And in PDIP itself, it is known that many generations of PKI leaders from the 1960s have filled it. And do not cover themselves even boldly and proudly they admit it. As once said by Member of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission IX from PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, when interviewed and published by one of the media, on September 30, 2015.
berita_id: Untuk melakukan tindakan untuk membela Islam dan negara yang akan dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim, yang merupakan anggota Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI), yang sudah marah dengan perilaku para pemimpin negara ini, di mana mereka harus melaksanakan aturan dan hukum dengan tegas dan benar, tetapi pada kenyataannya ini bukan masalahnya.Asumsi ini mengarah pada kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam yang dilakukan oleh terdakwa Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok, yang saat ini sedang menjalani persidangan, itu tidak diberhentikan dan publik mempertimbangkan bahwa alasan yang diberikan tampaknya dibuat.Jelas sekali tidak ada beberapa pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi, Mahfud MD, juga mengkritik sikap pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri (Mendagri) Tjahjo Kumolo termasuk Presiden Joko Widodo Alias ​​Jokowi yang diam ketika Ahok lagi memberikan kursi sebagai gubernur.Sementara beberapa kepala regional benar -benar mengalami sebaliknya.Akibatnya, tuntutan mereka dalam tindakan yang disebut tindakan untuk membela Islam dan Negara 212 akan dilakukan di depan gedung MPR DPR RI, dan tampaknya tidak sedikit peserta yang datang dari beberapa di luar Jakarta.Akibatnya, mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal dengan maksud melaksanakan doa Fajr di jemaat, dan juga kondisi cuaca ketika berita ini terungkap hujan, sebagai akibatnya mereka mencoba untuk segera memasuki tempat berlindung sambil menunggu waktu sholat masuk.Pemilik mobil mewah berlapis emas ini sebenarnya adalah orang Indonesia rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal sebenarnya tertutup rapat, seperti yang diterima oleh media ini, dalam bentuk foto dan deskripsi, 5 menit kemudian ketika berita ini terungkap, para peserta juga tidak dapat masuk untuk berkumpul dan melakukan doa fajar."Masjid Istiqlal di gembok …… tidak ada yang bisa (mungkin) berdoa fajr .... rezim apa ini ... .. PKI menantang para pembela Islam .... Perang kita dimulai ... Allahu Akbar ...!"Ini adalah teks dalam keterangan foto yang dikirim ke media. Dapat dilihat di foto yang dikumpulkan oleh para peserta dan berharap pintu akan segera dibuka.Kemarahan mereka diarahkan pada pemerintah, karena masjid Istiqlal dikelola langsung di bawah Kementerian Agama melalui Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI).Di mana manajemen BPPMI ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.Sementara itu, tanggung jawabnya langsung kepada Presiden.Sementara itu, ini terkait dengan pernyataan yang menyebutkan keterlibatan PKI, karena hubungan dengan PDI-P sebagai partai yang berkuasa dan juga pendukung utama Presiden Jokowi dan juga DKI Jakarta Paslon Ahok-Djarot.Dan dalam PDIP sendiri, diketahui bahwa banyak generasi pemimpin PKI dari tahun 1960 -an telah mengisinya.Dan jangan menutupi diri mereka bahkan dengan berani dan bangga mereka mengakuinya.Seperti yang pernah dikatakan oleh anggota Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia dari PDIP, Ribka Tjiptaning, ketika diwawancarai dan diterbitkan oleh salah satu media, pada 30 September 2015.

berita: Some time ago, the people of Depok and the National were shocked by the status shared on social media that mentioned a toothbrush that was thought to be made of sea urchins. What is of concern to consumers is that there is the word "Bristle" on the packaging. Suddenly, the question about the halalness of dental brushing was questioned by the general public. This stems from an article about a previously circulated sea urchin brush, which can be seen on the LPPOM MUI website: In the article, it was written that “on the handle of a boar-bristle brush the words: Bristle, PureBristle, 100% China Bristle, and others are often written. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet." The choice of the word ONE in the article turned out to be misunderstood by some netizens who generalized the notion of "bristle" with sea urchins. In fact, if we explore further, the notion of "bristle" is much more general than just sea urchins. Bristle is a stiff/strong fiber or fur, either natural derived from plant fibers and animal hair or artificial (synthetic). From this definition, the word "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging does not necessarily make the toothbrush come from sea urchins. This means that the toothbrush could have come from other animal hair, plant fibers or even synthetic bristles. If we look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. After we understand the true definition of bristle, then how do we know whether the toothbrush comes from non-halal fibers/bristles? A simple way is to look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center. The rapid flow of information on social media makes us have to be more careful in disseminating information. If we have not been able to find valid information, it would be better if the information is asked in a forum that is related to the information. Information about the halalness of a product, of course, not only food/beverage/cosmetic but also lifestyle and thought, becomes a very important part in the life of a Muslim because it has an impact on matters of worship and the hereafter. Indeed, halal and haram matters are not only the responsibility of the MUI or the government but our business as Muslims. Therefore, Halal Corner invites Muslims to join the community of halal fighters. Halal Corner is a community that was established as a forum for active communication / sharing about various halal products, especially in the local area as well as providing halal counseling action and education for Muslims in the form of training, halal campaigns, and educational activities that build public awareness of the importance of halal products.
berita_id: Beberapa waktu yang lalu, orang -orang Depok dan nasional terkejut dengan status yang dibagikan di media sosial yang menyebutkan sikat gigi yang dianggap terbuat dari landak laut.Apa yang menjadi perhatian konsumen adalah bahwa ada kata "bulu" pada kemasannya.Tiba -tiba, pertanyaan tentang kealsuan menyikat gigi dipertanyakan oleh masyarakat umum.Ini berasal dari sebuah artikel tentang sikat landak laut yang sebelumnya beredar, yang dapat dilihat di situs web LPPOM MUI: dalam artikel tersebut, tertulis bahwa “pada pegangan sepoi-sepoi-sepoi-sepoi.Pilihan kata satu dalam artikel itu ternyata disalahpahami oleh beberapa netizen yang menggeneralisasi gagasan "bulu" dengan landak laut.Bahkan, jika kita mengeksplorasi lebih lanjut, gagasan "bulu" jauh lebih umum daripada sekadar bulu babi.Bristle adalah serat atau bulu yang kaku/kuat, baik yang berasal dari serat tanaman dan rambut hewan atau buatan (sintetis).Dari definisi ini, kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi tidak selalu membuat sikat gigi berasal dari bulu babi.Ini berarti bahwa sikat gigi bisa berasal dari rambut hewan lain, serat tanaman atau bahkan bulu sintetis.Jika kita melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberian).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Setelah kita memahami definisi bulu yang sebenarnya, lalu bagaimana kita tahu apakah sikat gigi berasal dari serat/bulu non-halal?Cara sederhana adalah mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan meminta langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.Aliran informasi yang cepat di media sosial membuat kita harus lebih berhati -hati dalam menyebarkan informasi.Jika kami belum dapat menemukan informasi yang valid, akan lebih baik jika informasi ditanyakan di forum yang terkait dengan informasi tersebut.Informasi tentang hal halnya suatu produk, tentu saja, tidak hanya makanan/minuman/kosmetik tetapi juga gaya hidup dan pemikiran, menjadi bagian yang sangat penting dalam kehidupan seorang Muslim karena memiliki dampak pada masalah ibadah dan akhirat.Memang, hal -hal halal dan haram bukan hanya tanggung jawab MUI atau pemerintah tetapi juga bisnis kita sebagai Muslim.Oleh karena itu, halal Corner mengundang umat Islam untuk bergabung dengan komunitas pejuang halal.Halal Corner adalah komunitas yang didirikan sebagai forum untuk komunikasi aktif / berbagi tentang berbagai produk halal, terutama di daerah setempat serta memberikan aksi konseling halal dan pendidikan untuk Muslim dalam bentuk pelatihan, kampanye halal, dan kegiatan pendidikan yang membangun kesadaran publik tentang pentingnya produk halal.

berita: Thousands of people who were going to take part in the 212 Action, from various areas, were detained in front of the courtyard of the Istiqlal mosque in Central Jakarta. Our monitoring Tuesday at 04.00. Wib (21/2/2017) saw dozens of inter-city buses parked on the side of the bull field in front of the Istiqlal mosque fence which dropped thousands of participants from the 212 Action. They felt strange because they were not allowed to enter the mosque even though they were going to perform the Fajr prayer. One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high tone. The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, the participants of the action began to arrive who are planning to walk to the DPR building, it is estimated that player around 50,000 people or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
berita_id: Ribuan orang yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212, dari berbagai daerah, ditahan di depan halaman Masjid Istiqlal di Jakarta Tengah.Pemantauan kami Selasa pukul 04.00.WIB (21/2/2017) melihat lusinan bus antar kota yang diparkir di sisi lapangan banteng di depan pagar masjid Istiqlal yang menjatuhkan ribuan peserta dari aksi 212.Mereka merasa aneh karena mereka tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid meskipun mereka akan melakukan doa Fajr.One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview "We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, it is forbidden to worship in the mosque gently with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we as devout Muslims must carry out worship , try to think that the mosque inside is empty, we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin tokami dengan nada tinggi.The 212 Defend Islam Action Volume 2 akan diadakan pada doa fajar, para peserta tindakan mulai berdatangan yang berencana berjalan ke gedung DPR, diperkirakan bahwa pemain sekitar 50.000 orang atau bahkan lebih.Polda Metro Jaya telah memberikan izin untuk 212 tindakan hari ini mulai pukul 07.00 hingga 18.00.WIB, ribuan polisi dan personel TNI dikerahkan untuk mengamankan tindakan ini.

berita: If the iPhone 4s has a fatal problem in the form of a decrease in antenna function, then the latest iPhone series is threatened with problems in terms of design. One iPhone 6 Plus consumer reported that his favorite iPhone looks curved after some time of use. Almost a week after the first wave of iPhone 6 Plus entered the market and began to be used around the world, a technology news portal writer, Russel Holly admitted that his iPhone 6 Plus was caught curving at the front of the screen. The complaint from Holly was filed after several similar complaints appeared in a virtual world forum, Ars Technica (24/09). Based on the analysis results from Holly's report, it is very likely that his iPhone 6 Plus is curved due to pressure from the pocket and exposure to body heat that makes the smartphone body expand. The combination of these two factors is claimed to make it easier for the iPhone 6 Plus which does have wide and thin dimensions to curve. Several other reports state that their iPhone 6 Plus bends after being put in a back pocket and used for activities such as complaint sitting to dancing. Only a dozen hours later, the iPhone 6 Plus looks curved but can still be used smoothly. Apple itself has not issued their official confirmation regarding the potential for the iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus to bend after a certain period of use. Not a few parties claim that it could be a design error that makes the iPhone 6 bent. The issue of the curved iPhone 6 Plus will give Apple a bad image if later this case becomes an 'epidemic' among its users. The company led by Tim Cook certainly doesn't want the case of mass damage to the iPhone 4s antenna to repeat itself in one of the best products made under the era of the new CEO of Apple.
berita_id: Jika iPhone 4S memiliki masalah fatal dalam bentuk penurunan fungsi antena, maka seri iPhone terbaru terancam dengan masalah dalam hal desain.Satu konsumen iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa iPhone favoritnya terlihat melengkung setelah beberapa saat digunakan.Hampir seminggu setelah gelombang pertama iPhone 6 Plus memasuki pasar dan mulai digunakan di seluruh dunia, seorang penulis portal berita teknologi, Russel Holly mengakui bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya tertangkap melengkung di bagian depan layar.Keluhan dari Holly diajukan setelah beberapa keluhan serupa muncul di forum dunia virtual, ARS Technica (24/09).Berdasarkan hasil analisis dari laporan Holly, sangat mungkin bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya melengkung karena tekanan dari saku dan paparan panas tubuh yang membuat tubuh smartphone mengembang.Kombinasi dari kedua faktor ini diklaim memudahkan iPhone 6 Plus yang memang memiliki dimensi lebar dan tipis untuk melengkung.Beberapa laporan lain menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 mereka ditambah tikungan setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku belakang dan digunakan untuk kegiatan seperti keluhan yang duduk untuk menari.Hanya selusin jam kemudian, iPhone 6 Plus terlihat melengkung tetapi masih dapat digunakan dengan lancar.Apple sendiri belum mengeluarkan konfirmasi resmi mereka mengenai potensi iPhone 6 atau iPhone 6 Plus untuk menekuk setelah periode penggunaan tertentu.Tidak sedikit pihak yang mengklaim bahwa itu bisa menjadi kesalahan desain yang membuat iPhone 6 ditekuk.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung akan memberi Apple gambar yang buruk jika nanti kasus ini menjadi 'epidemi' di antara penggunanya.Perusahaan yang dipimpin oleh Tim Cook tentu tidak ingin kasus kerusakan massa pada antena iPhone 4S mengulangi sendiri di salah satu produk terbaik yang dibuat di bawah era CEO baru Apple.

berita: The Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) has tested a candy sample resembling a pacifier suspected of containing drugs. From the results of laboratory tests carried out by BPOM, it showed that the dot-shaped candy was negative for drugs. "Until now, of the drug indicators to be tested, four negative results have been obtained for four drug indicators," said Head of BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito when contacted by merdeka.com. Penny said, there were 19 parameters used in examining the pacifier sample. out of 19 indicators, four of which show drug candy is negative for drugs. "Narcotics class one, narcotics class three, psychotropics, there are 19 parameters that will be resolved," said Penny. According to Penny, to ensure that the pacifier contains drugs, testing is currently underway with other types of indicators. The results of these laboratory tests will later be submitted to the National Narcotics Agency (BNN). "Based on these four parameters, it does not contain drugs," said Penny. Penny leave added, the candy pacifier itself is registered with BPOM RI with the code ML 224409003077 with the brand Penguin Brand; Hard Candy. The candy is imported from China. "It has been registered with the POM Agency for imported products from China," he concluded. Previously, rumors circulated that candy allegedly containing drugs was circulating in Surabaya. The candy, which is packaged in colorful packaging, is often found in shops and hawkers in schools. The news has gone viral in cyberspace. because of the news, the Surabaya City Government immediately mobilized the Satpol PP, Linmas and sub-districts accompanied by police and military officers to conduct raids in several locations.
berita_id: Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM) telah menguji sampel permen yang menyerupai dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dari hasil tes laboratorium yang dilakukan oleh BPOM, ini menunjukkan bahwa permen berbentuk dot negatif untuk obat-obatan."Sampai sekarang, indikator obat yang akan diuji, empat hasil negatif telah diperoleh untuk empat indikator obat," kata kepala BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito ketika dihubungi oleh Merdeka.com.Penny mengatakan, ada 19 parameter yang digunakan dalam memeriksa sampel dot.Dari 19 indikator, empat di antaranya menunjukkan permen obat negatif untuk obat -obatan."Narkotika Kelas Satu, Narkotika Kelas Tiga, Psikotropika, ada 19 parameter yang akan diselesaikan," kata Penny.Menurut Penny, untuk memastikan bahwa dot berisi obat -obatan, pengujian saat ini sedang berlangsung dengan jenis indikator lainnya.Hasil tes laboratorium ini nantinya akan diserahkan kepada Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN)."Berdasarkan empat parameter ini, itu tidak mengandung narkoba," kata Penny.Penny Leave ditambahkan, permen sendiri terdaftar dengan BPOM RI dengan kode ML 224409003077 dengan merek penguin merek;Permen.Permen diimpor dari Cina."Telah terdaftar di Badan POM untuk produk impor dari China," pungkasnya.Sebelumnya, rumor beredar bahwa permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan beredar di Surabaya.Permen, yang dikemas dalam kemasan berwarna -warni, sering ditemukan di toko -toko dan penjaja di sekolah.Berita itu telah beredar di dunia maya.Karena berita itu, pemerintah Kota Surabaya segera memobilisasi Satpol PP, Linmas dan sub-distrik disertai oleh polisi dan perwira militer untuk melakukan penggerebekan di beberapa lokasi.

berita: Bitungnews – Reog Ponorogo culture is one of the cultural heritages of the Indonesian ancestors. This type of art has even been claimed seven times by neighboring countries, Malaysia, as their culture. The Indonesian people have always been reactive, protesting these claims. The incident at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines was the opposite, if Malaysia claimed the nation's cultural arts, a number of elements in the Indonesian Consulate General actually burned Barong Reog Ponorogo, along with gamelan decorations. According to information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, Acting Consulate General Davao called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragon snakes, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in Bisaya Tagalog: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's flying dragon a shame that the dragon is so good it keeps burning, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a bitungnews.com source. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And electronic messages to infomed@kemlu.go.id have not received a response either.
berita_id: Bitungnews - Budaya Reog Ponorogo adalah salah satu warisan budaya leluhur Indonesia.Jenis seni ini bahkan telah diklaim tujuh kali oleh negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia, sebagai budaya mereka.Rakyat Indonesia selalu reaktif, memprotes klaim ini.Insiden di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina adalah sebaliknya, jika Malaysia mengklaim seni budaya negara itu, sejumlah elemen dalam konsulat Jenderal Indonesia benar -benar membakar Barong Reog Ponorogo, bersama dengan dekorasi gamelan.Menurut informasi yang disusun oleh Bitungnews.com, pembakaran dilakukan pada hari Selasa, 20 Oktober 2015. Alasan pembakaran Barong Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan itu adalah idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Faktanya, Konsulat Akting Jenderal Davao disebut penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas ular reog dan 2 gamelan naga, penjaga keamanan itu begitu terkejut dan terkejut katanya dalam bisaya tagalog: "Hadluk Kaayu, saya scasay soatu gwapo gwapo kaugon,Naga memalukan bahwa naga itu begitu baik sehingga terus membakar, reog itu terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diberitahu), "kata Santander."Ketika dekorasi Barong Reog dan Dragon Gamelan dibakar, yang merupakan inventaris museum budaya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang mengetahuinya," kata sumber Bitungnews.com."Setelah kejadian ini, para pelaku dihujat oleh sebagian besar warga negara Indonesia di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena mereka berpikir apa yang mereka lakukan adalah tepat di mata Tuhan," tambah sumber itu.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id juga belum menerima tanggapan.

berita: In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3,000 cancer cells. The title of the article in recent days has become a hot topic of discussion on social media. However, for catfish farmers, the article is considered a threat to their business continuity. The East Java Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Service accommodated the complaints of catfish farming business people in East Java who were offended by the circulation of the article. The article is a black campaign to bring down sales of the catfish market, whose market prospects continue to improve, said Head of the East Java Fisheries and Marine Service. According to him, catfish consumers are fish consumers at level II. At level I are consumers of high-end fish such as tuna, snapper, grouper, and so on. Class I consumers will not be shaken by the spread of any issue, but for class II consumers, this is still vulnerable to being shaken by issues. They may no longer eat catfish out of fear, he said. Heru said that East Java was the largest catfish producer nationally. From hundreds of catfish cultivators, in the last three years, catfish production in East Java continues to increase. In 2012 the production was recorded at 62,807 tons, increased in 2013 to 79,928 tons, while in 2014 it continued to increase to 96,830 tons. During 2014 production, 2,000 tons of which were exported abroad. Catfish production in East Java, said Heru, is produced in a healthy manner according to the standards of Good Fish Cultivation (CBIB) as regulated by the Government in Ministerial Decree No. 02/Men/2007. CBIB requires catfish cultured feed with healthy feed that focuses on health and food safety, he said. Periodically, the East Java Marine and Fisheries Service also monitors residues on catfish by sampling. this year there were 379 samples taken from various catfish producing regions such as Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, and Tulungagung. As a result, the tested catfish commodities were free from residues of hormones, antibiotics, and heavy metals, he said. Heru suspected that the issue of catfish was deliberately raised by certain parties for the benefit of the fish business ahead of the 2015 MEA free market. There are parties who want to seize the catfish market and replace it with other fish commodities, he said. Articles about the content of cancer cells are uploaded on a number of websites. The article was also followed by a number of online media for discussion. The article, which was posted on July 29, 2015, describes the confession of a mobile phone catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who supplies catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan Province. The media then investigated the fish by observing seven samples of catfish producer ponds. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of catfish, before the test results come out.
berita_id: Dalam seteguk daging lele, ada 3.000 sel kanker.Judul artikel dalam beberapa hari terakhir telah menjadi topik panas diskusi di media sosial.Namun, bagi petani lele, artikel ini dianggap sebagai ancaman bagi kesinambungan bisnis mereka.Layanan Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan Java Timur mengakomodasi keluhan orang -orang bisnis petani lele di Jawa Timur yang tersinggung oleh sirkulasi artikel tersebut.Artikel ini adalah kampanye hitam untuk menurunkan penjualan pasar lele, yang prospek pasarnya terus meningkat, kata kepala perikanan Java Timur dan layanan kelautan.Menurutnya, konsumen lele adalah konsumen ikan di Level II.Pada level I adalah konsumen ikan kelas atas seperti tuna, kakap, kerapu, dan sebagainya.Konsumen Kelas I tidak akan terguncang oleh penyebaran masalah apa pun, tetapi untuk konsumen Kelas II, ini masih rentan untuk dikocok oleh masalah.Mereka mungkin tidak lagi makan lele karena takut, katanya.Heru mengatakan bahwa Jawa Timur adalah produsen ikan
