lele terbesar secara nasional.Dari ratusan budidaya lele, dalam tiga tahun terakhir, produksi ikan lele di Jawa Timur terus meningkat.Pada 2012 produksi dicatat pada 62.807 ton, meningkat pada 2013 menjadi 79.928 ton, sedangkan pada 2014 terus meningkat menjadi 96.830 ton.Selama produksi 2014, 2.000 ton di antaranya diekspor ke luar negeri.Produksi lele di Jawa Timur, kata Heru, diproduksi dengan cara yang sehat sesuai dengan standar penanaman ikan yang baik (CBIB) sebagaimana diatur oleh pemerintah dalam Keputusan Menteri No. 02/Men/2007.CBIB membutuhkan feed yang dikultur ikan lele dengan pakan sehat yang berfokus pada kesehatan dan keamanan pangan, katanya.Secara berkala, East Java Marine and Fisheries Service juga memantau residu pada ikan lele dengan pengambilan sampel.Tahun ini ada 379 sampel yang diambil dari berbagai daerah penghasil lele seperti Sidoarjo, Mojokerto, Kediri, dan Tulungagung.Akibatnya, komoditas ikan lele yang diuji bebas dari residu hormon, antibiotik, dan logam berat, katanya.Heru menduga bahwa masalah ikan lele sengaja dibesarkan oleh pihak -pihak tertentu untuk kepentingan bisnis ikan menjelang Pasar Bebas MEA 2015.Ada pihak yang ingin merebut pasar lele dan menggantinya dengan komoditas ikan lainnya, katanya.Artikel tentang konten sel kanker diunggah di sejumlah situs web.Artikel ini juga diikuti oleh sejumlah media online untuk diskusi.Artikel, yang diposting pada 29 Juli 2015, menggambarkan pengakuan petani ikan lele ponsel dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang memasok ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan.Media kemudian menyelidiki ikan dengan mengamati tujuh sampel kolam produsen ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan lele, sebelum hasil tes keluar.

berita: Traveloka raises its voice regarding the boycott of its mobile application which was echoed on Twitter. This boycott is the aftermath of the walk out action carried out by composer and pianist Ananda Sukarlan when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan delivered an opening speech at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). The online travel agency company confirmed that its founder, Derianto Kusuma was on the list of recipients of the award from the Kanisius Alumni with Ananda Sukarlan and was scheduled to attend the event. "We are also proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the Kanisius Alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier," said Traveloka PR Manager, Busyra Oryza, when contacted by CNNIndonesia. com, Tuesday (14/11). This statement also denies reports that Derianto attended and left the event in the middle of a speech by the Governor of DKI Anies Baswedan. "In response to the issue surrounding Anies' speech at the 90th Celebration of Kanisius College, we stated that the person concerned (Derianto) was out of town to attend an event laurels that had been planned a few months earlier," continued Busyra. Today's Twitter timeline was enlivened by a boycott of the Traveloka application because the founder reportedly walked out and was seen as an insult to Anies as a democratically elected governor. This online tourism provider company claims that it has never discredited other parties and prioritizes the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. According to CNNIndonesia.com observations as of 16.00, Tuesday (14/11), the topic #UninstallTraveloka has been tweeted 2.7 thousand times. This topic is at the top of the most talked about topics netizens in Indonesia
berita_id: Traveloka mengangkat suaranya mengenai boikot aplikasi selulernya yang digemakan di Twitter.Boikot ini adalah akibat dari aksi walk out yang dilakukan oleh komposer dan pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidato pembukaan pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Tengah, Sabtu 11/11).Perusahaan agen perjalanan online mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendirinya, DeRianto Kusuma ada dalam daftar penerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius dengan Ananda Sukarlan dan dijadwalkan untuk menghadiri acara tersebut."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer PR Traveloka, Busyra Oryza, ketika dihubungi oleh CNNindonesia.com, Selasa (14/11).Pernyataan ini juga membantah laporan bahwa DeRianto hadir dan meninggalkan acara di tengah pidato oleh Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan."Menanggapi masalah seputar pidato anies di perayaan ke -90 Kanisius College, kami menyatakan bahwa orang yang bersangkutan (Derianto) berada di luar kota untuk menghadiri sebuah acara kemenangan yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," lanjut Busyra.Garis waktu Twitter hari ini dimeriahkan oleh boikot aplikasi Traveloka karena pendiri dilaporkan berjalan keluar dan dipandang sebagai penghinaan terhadap anies sebagai gubernur yang terpilih secara demokratis.Perusahaan penyedia pariwisata online ini mengklaim bahwa mereka tidak pernah mendiskreditkan pihak lain dan memprioritaskan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Menurut pengamatan cnnindonesia.com pada 16,00, Selasa (14/11), topik #uninstalltraveloka telah dit -tweet 2,7 ribu kali.Topik ini berada di puncak topik netizen yang paling banyak dibicarakan di Indonesia

berita: This one food is certainly popular because of its savory taste that often tempts our tongue. Many think that catfish are cultivated in unsuitable waters, in fact catfish is possibleness a formidable fish species because it is equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that catfish are able to survive. live in muddy waters or waters contaminated with sewage and eat everything that is in these waters. This is the possibility of public opinion that catfish contains cancer cells because of these wastes. But we redline, indeed in consuming catfish we must pay attention to its cultivation. You need to know that the omega content in catfish is not inferior to salmon. according to research, catfish has the best source of vitamin D which is beneficial for bone health, catfish also contains protein and folic acid which are needed for pregnant women. Why do many people think of catfish as a source of cancer cells? Actually it's not the catfish, but the cooking oil that is used many times until it turns black in every frying dish. This is the source of free radicals, the source of the creator of cancer cells in our bodies. So it's not the catfish. Even the luxurious salmon, if it is processed with cooking oil that is used many times, could be salmon as a source of cancer cells as well.
berita_id: Makanan yang satu ini tentu saja populer karena rasanya gurih yang sering menggoda lidah kita.Banyak yang berpikir bahwa ikan lele dibudidayakan di perairan yang tidak cocok, bahkan ikan lele adalah kemungkinan spesies ikan yang tangguh karena dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga ikan lele mampu bertahan hidup.Tinggal di perairan berlumpur atau perairan yang terkontaminasi dengan limbah dan makan semua yang ada di perairan ini.Ini adalah kemungkinan opini publik bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker karena limbah ini.Tapi kami mengulangi, memang dalam mengonsumsi ikan lele, kita harus memperhatikan penanamannya.Anda perlu tahu bahwa konten omega dalam lele tidak lebih rendah daripada salmon.Menurut penelitian, ikan lele memiliki sumber vitamin D terbaik yang bermanfaat untuk kesehatan tulang, ikan lele juga mengandung protein dan asam folat yang diperlukan untuk wanita hamil.Mengapa banyak orang menganggap ikan lele sebagai sumber sel kanker?Sebenarnya itu bukan ikan lele, tetapi minyak goreng yang digunakan berkali -kali sampai menjadi hitam di setiap hidangan penggorengan.Ini adalah sumber radikal bebas, sumber pencipta sel kanker dalam tubuh kita.Jadi bukan ikan lele.Bahkan salmon mewah, jika diproses dengan minyak goreng yang digunakan berkali -kali, bisa menjadi salmon sebagai sumber sel kanker juga.

berita: People think that the method of pricking the fingertips with a needle can treat stroke symptoms. However, according to a neurologist at Atma Jaya Medical Faculty, Dr. Yuda Turana, that's not true. Even the pain response due to needle sticks can raise blood pressure, which risks worsening the stroke, he said, quoted from Antara, Sunday, February 25, 2018. Yuda suggested that first aid workers be rushed to the hospital so they can get help immediately. This statement was also confirmed by a Cardiologist at Harapan Kita Hospital, dr. Dicky Armein Hanafy. according to him, the finger prick method is of no worsen use at all. There is even another risk if the needle is not sterile or clean. A stroke occurs when a blood vessel is blocked in the brain. A number of signs can be seen, such as sudden severe headache, weakness, numbness, vision problems, confusion, difficulty speaking, and others. Launching the Medical Daily page, there are several ways that can prevent the disease, one of which is a healthy lifestyle. You have to start quitting smoking, exercise regularly, maintain your weight because it's linked to diabetes, and control your diet.
berita_id: Orang berpikir bahwa metode menusuk ujung jari dengan jarum dapat mengobati gejala stroke.Namun, menurut seorang ahli saraf di fakultas medis Atma Jaya, Dr. Yuda Tura, itu tidak benar.Bahkan respons rasa sakit karena tongkat jarum dapat meningkatkan tekanan darah, yang berisiko memburuk stroke, katanya, dikutip dari Antara, Minggu, 25 Februari 2018. Yuda menyarankan agar pekerja pertolongan pertama dilarikan ke rumah sakit sehingga mereka dapat segera mendapatkan bantuan.Pernyataan ini juga dikonfirmasi oleh ahli jantung di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, DR.Dicky Armein Hanafy.Menurutnya, metode tusukan jari sama sekali tidak ada gunanya.Bahkan ada risiko lain jika jarum tidak steril atau bersih.Stroke terjadi ketika pembuluh darah diblokir di otak.Sejumlah tanda dapat dilihat, seperti sakit kepala mendadak, kelemahan, mati rasa, masalah penglihatan, kebingungan, kesulitan berbicara, dan lainnya.Meluncurkan halaman harian medis, ada beberapa cara yang dapat mencegah penyakit ini, salah satunya adalah gaya hidup sehat.Anda harus mulai berhenti merokok, berolahraga secara teratur, mempertahankan berat badan Anda karena terkait dengan diabetes, dan mengendalikan diet Anda.

berita: tirto.id - Kanisius College held an award night to commemorate its 90th anniversary at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, North Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). The award was given to five alumni across generations. One of them, the famous pianist, Ananda Sukarlan. In the award, the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan was also present. Anies was also lined up to give a speech. When Anies was giving a speech, Ananda Sukarlan suddenly stood up and immediately walked out of the room. In fact, Ananda had originally received the award with Derianto Kusuma (the founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Ananda's action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other attendees. However, the incident did not last long. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the event, Ananda and a number of alumni who had walked out returned to their seats. Ananda then gave a speech after receiving the award. In his speech, the composer of Rapsodia Nusantara explained his attitude in leaving the room. Ananda criticized the committee for inviting Anies to attend the event. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught," Ananda said in a written statement received by Tirto, Monday (11/13/2017). When contacted by the Editor of Tirto, Ananda did not deny the incident and his statement. He explained the chronology of himself leaving the room where the event was taking place. “Just when Anies talked about the development of Jakarta. What kind of building, is Tanah Abang so chaotic. If it's chaotic, it's not development," said Ananda. At that time, according to Ananda, he was sitting in the second row walk of seats. When he stood up and walked to the exit at the back, he admitted, many people saw him. When he walked out, said Ananda, a number of alumni of Kanisius College also followed him. Ananda admitted that he did not invite his friends to go out. However, later, Ananda realized that the figures who came out a lot were his classmates, namely the class of 1986. "I came back in half an hour after Anies left," said Ananda. Ananda reiterated that his attitude was not a form of personal hatred. According to him, the move is a criticism of the committee. However, he didn't care if Anies was offended. "There is no personal grudge. This is a critique to the committee. Why invite someone who gets his position is different from the values ​​taught. Not (hatred) on Anies," said Ananda. This incident was also circulated in a video uploaded on Facebook. However, Governor Anies Baswedan even admitted that he did not know that there was a famous composer who walked out when he gave a speech. Anies revealed that he only found out about the incident after arriving at the office. Anies was relaxed in response to that. "According to Eros Djarot, that does not reflect Kanisius' attitude," said Anies at City Hall, Central Jakarta, Monday afternoon. The former Minister of Education and Culture admitted that he respects differences in attitudes and views. Anies also said that he gave the right to anyone to express themselves in their own way. Anies also mentioned the obligation of a governor to protect his citizens. "If then there is a negative reaction, that's just a bonus," he said.
berita_id: TIRTO.ID - Kanisius College mengadakan malam penghargaan untuk memperingati ulang tahun ke -90nya di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Utara, Sabtu (11/11).Penghargaan tersebut diberikan kepada lima alumni lintas generasi.Salah satunya, pianis terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan.Dalam penghargaan tersebut, gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan juga hadir.Anies juga berbaris untuk memberikan pidato.Ketika Anies memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan tiba -tiba berdiri dan segera berjalan keluar dari ruangan.Faktanya, Ananda awalnya menerima penghargaan itu dengan DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (seorang tokoh Yesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Farma Kalbe).Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan peserta lainnya.Namun, insiden itu tidak bertahan lama.Setelah Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan acara tersebut, Ananda dan sejumlah alumni yang telah keluar kembali ke tempat duduk mereka.Ananda kemudian memberikan pidato setelah menerima penghargaan.Dalam pidatonya, komposer Rapsodia Nusantara menjelaskan sikapnya meninggalkan ruangan.Ananda mengkritik komite karena mengundang anies untuk menghadiri acara tersebut."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan," kata Ananda dalam pernyataan tertulis yang diterima oleh Tirto, Senin (11/13/2017).Ketika dihubungi oleh editor Tirto, Ananda tidak menyangkal kejadian dan pernyataannya.Dia menjelaskan kronologi dirinya meninggalkan ruangan tempat acara itu berlangsung."Tepat ketika Anies berbicara tentang perkembangan Jakarta. Bangunan seperti apa, Tanah Abang begitu kacau. Jika kacau, itu bukan pengembangan," kata Ananda.Pada waktu itu, menurut Ananda, dia duduk di jalan setapak kursi kedua.Ketika dia berdiri dan berjalan ke pintu keluar di belakang, dia mengakui, banyak orang melihatnya.Ketika dia berjalan keluar, kata Ananda, sejumlah alumni Kanisius College juga mengikutinya.Ananda mengakui bahwa dia tidak mengundang teman -temannya untuk keluar.Namun, kemudian, Ananda menyadari bahwa angka -angka yang keluar banyak adalah teman sekelasnya, yaitu kelas tahun 1986. "Saya kembali dalam setengah jam setelah Anies pergi," kata Ananda.Ananda menegaskan bahwa sikapnya bukanlah bentuk kebencian pribadi.Menurutnya, langkah itu adalah kritik terhadap komite.Namun, dia tidak peduli jika Anies tersinggung."Tidak ada dendam pribadi. Ini adalah kritik bagi komite. Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang mendapatkan posisinya berbeda dari nilai -nilai yang diajarkan. Bukan (kebencian) pada anies," kata Ananda.Kejadian ini juga diedarkan dalam video yang diunggah di Facebook.Namun, Gubernur Anies Baswedan bahkan mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada seorang komposer terkenal yang berjalan keluar ketika dia memberikan pidato.Anies mengungkapkan bahwa dia hanya mengetahui tentang insiden itu setelah tiba di kantor.Anies santai dalam menanggapi itu."Menurut Eros Djarot, itu tidak mencerminkan sikap Kanisius," kata Anies di City Hall, Central Jakarta, Senin sore.Mantan Menteri Pendidikan dan Budaya mengakui bahwa ia menghormati perbedaan sikap dan pandangan.Anies juga mengatakan bahwa dia memberikan hak kepada siapa pun untuk mengekspresikan diri dengan cara mereka sendiri.Anies juga menyebutkan kewajiban seorang gubernur untuk melindungi warganya."Jika kalau begitu ada reaksi negatif, itu hanya bonus," katanya.

berita: Quoted from beritasatu.com, Rudiantara admitted that his ministry is ready to block Facebook and a number of other social media that are actively used in Indonesia. According to him, this step needs to be taken if Facebook and other social media cannot be invited to work together. "It's not only the account whose access is limited, but figure out also the organizers can be closed. That's why we ask the organizers of social media or OTT in general to work together to provide service levels," said Rudiantara in the socialization of the Fatwa of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) related to the Law and Guidelines for Bermuamalah. Through Social Media at the Kominfo Building, Monday (5/6). The cooperation he means is that if the government asks Facebook to block an account, Facebook must comply. It is not clear whether the Ministry of Communication and Informatics will announce what measures are used to determine that an account is eligible to be blocked. "If the government asks for certain treatment for an account, yes, please do it. Don't block things that don't have to be blocked, like Afi's case, or those that should be blocked don't," he added. Afi himself is a high school student who recently rose to fame due to his personal Facebook post about religious tolerance.
berita_id: Dikutip dari Beritasatu.com, Rudiantara mengakui bahwa pelayanannya siap untuk memblokir Facebook dan sejumlah media sosial lainnya yang secara aktif digunakan di Indonesia.Menurutnya, langkah ini perlu diambil jika Facebook dan media sosial lainnya tidak dapat diundang untuk bekerja sama."Ini bukan hanya akun yang aksesnya terbatas, tetapi juga mencari tahu juga penyelenggara dapat ditutup. Itu sebabnya kami meminta penyelenggara media sosial atau OTT secara umum untuk bekerja sama untuk memberikan tingkat layanan," kata Rudiantara dalam sosialisasi fatwa Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) yang terkait dengan hukum dan pedoman untuk Bermuamalah.Melalui media sosial di gedung Kominfo, Senin (5/6).Kerjasama yang ia maksud adalah bahwa jika pemerintah meminta Facebook untuk memblokir akun, Facebook harus mematuhi.Tidak jelas apakah Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika akan mengumumkan langkah -langkah apa yang digunakan untuk menentukan bahwa suatu akun memenuhi syarat untuk diblokir."Jika pemerintah meminta perlakuan tertentu untuk suatu akun, ya, tolong lakukan. Jangan memblokir hal -hal yang tidak harus diblokir, seperti kasus AFI, atau yang harus diblokir tidak," tambahnya.AFI sendiri adalah seorang siswa sekolah menengah yang baru -baru ini menjadi terkenal karena posting Facebook pribadinya tentang toleransi agama.

berita: Jakarta - A number of members of the Ponorogo Reyog Community (KRP) visited the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office to ask for information and clarification regarding the burning of reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burned reyog had been damaged and eaten by termites. 18 KRP representatives gathered in front of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu) office, Jl Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/10/2015). They brought 2 sudden peacocks, a barong, and a gayor with a picture of a dragon, a banner that reads "Resolute Action on Burning Reyog at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao Philippines" and an open letter to Foreign Minister Retno LP Marsudi. Their arrival was related to the burning of reog that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on 20 October. They also attached a picture showing the reyog burning. "Our arrival is to formally ask the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which is the "superior" of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao - Philippines to convey information and clarification honestly and transparently on the burning of electrocution Reyog Ponorogo's property," said KRP chairman Suyatno to reporters. Suyatno was accompanied, among others, by the Deputy Chairperson of the KRP Suparno Nojeng, the Secretary of the KRP M Syaiful Jihad, the Treasurer of the KRP Agus Susanto, the leader of the reyog group Singo Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo and the reyog artist who had performed in Davao Philippines in 2005, Suyono Gendon. After waiting for some time, 6 KRP representatives were received by Siti Sofia Sudarma, Director of Information and Media at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at 10.20 WIB. For 30 minutes they held a meeting and as a result the Ministry of Foreign Affairs promised to seek information related to the incident by forming a team to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao in the near future. "The team will further clarify the incident and we will convey the results to the KRP," said Sofia. Explanation of the Consulate General in Davao Meanwhile, in a press release from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao which was published on its website, it was explained that on October 20, 2015 the Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy the Ponorogo reog which had been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a state of disrepair. damaged and eaten by termites. "The arson was in no way an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City would also like to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits," he wrote. "The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo," he continued.
berita_id: Jakarta - Sejumlah anggota Komunitas Ponorogo Reyog (KRP) mengunjungi kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu) untuk meminta informasi dan klarifikasi mengenai pembakaran Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa Reyog yang terbakar telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.18 Perwakilan KRP berkumpul di depan kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu), JL Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/10/2015).Mereka membawa 2 merak tiba -tiba, sebuah barong, dan seorang Gayor dengan gambar naga, sebuah spanduk yang bertuliskan "tindakan tegas tentang membakar Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao Filipina" dan sebuah surat terbuka kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Retno LP Marsudi.Kedatangan mereka terkait dengan pembakaran reog yang terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober.Mereka juga memasang gambar yang menunjukkan Reyog terbakar."Kedatangan kami adalah untuk secara resmi meminta Kementerian Luar Negeri, yang merupakan" atasan "konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao - Filipina untuk menyampaikan informasi dan klarifikasi secara jujur ​​dan transparan tentang pembakaran properti Reyog Ponorogo," kata ketua KRP Suyatno kepada wartawan.Suyatno ditemani, antara lain, oleh wakil ketua KRP Sarno Nojeng, sekretaris jihad KRP M Syaiful, bendahara KRP Agus Susanto, pemimpin Reyog Group Wiro Yudho, Eko Prasetyo dan REYOG REYOG.Setelah menunggu beberapa waktu, 6 KRP Perwakilan diterima oleh Siti Sofia Sudarma, Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri di 10.20 WIB.Selama 30 menit mereka mengadakan pertemuan dan sebagai hasilnya, Kementerian Luar Negeri berjanji untuk mencari informasi yang terkait dengan insiden tersebut dengan membentuk tim ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao dalam waktu dekat."Tim akan lebih mengklarifikasi insiden tersebut dan kami akan menyampaikan hasilnya kepada KRP," kata Sofia.Penjelasan Konsulat Jenderal di Davao sementara itu, dalam siaran pers dari Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao yang diterbitkan di situs webnya, dijelaskan bahwa pada 20 Oktober 2015 Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao dipaksa untuk menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog yang telah menjadi Asset dari Konsulat Indonesia yang telah menjadi Ponorogo.sudah dalam keadaan rusak.rusak dan dimakan rayap.Pembakaran itu sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya. Penghancuran aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap ponorogo sebagai hal yang benar -benar terjadi pada petak yang benar -benar terjadi pada ponorogo yang sama -sama.menulis."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo," lanjutnya.

berita: Indeed, the Consultants General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, the Philippines are confused. They had the heart to suddenly burn the Reog Ponorogo peacock and its accompanying gamelan because it was considered an object containing idols. The actions of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia have clearly destroyed the noble cultural heritage of our ancestors and do not know about the history of Reog Ponorogo which has become worldwide and has become a cultural asset of the Indonesian nation at UNESCO. As reported by the news site Bitungnews.com Thursday (29/10/2015), a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General were seen burning the Barong Reog Ponorogo and the accompanying gamelan. From information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. Even though the cultural object is the pride of the people of Ponorogo. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, reportedly, Acting Consulate General Davao actually called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragons, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in the Bisaya Tagalog language: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's a shame that the dragon snake is so good it wants to be burned, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a source as quoted by bitungnews.com. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Cultural activist and historical object Yul Adriansyah condemned the burning of reog carried out by a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General. "It's really sad, Reog Ponorogo's property was burned because it was considered an idol," said Yul in a questioning tone. According to Yul, the actions taken by the Indonesian Consulate General have gone too far and do not respect Indonesian culture, which should be respected and promoted in other countries. "It's not even burned, I'm sad to hear that, and this is a shame for the honor of the Indonesian people who uphold the noble culture of our nation," said the man who is also a journalist. Regarding the news of the sudden burning of Reog Ponorogo, the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarified the issue. They admitted that they did burn the Reog Ponorogo but the reason was not related to the expulsion of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had burned full phase of the moon Reog Ponorogo on October 20, 2015. The Reog Ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. So what was the real reason they destroyed cultural objects by burning them? "The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a damaged condition and was eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not at all an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news of a Reog Ponorogo being deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message. For information, several media had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao allowed these individuals to burn the cultural products of the Indonesian people because they were considered to be worshiping idols.

The reog ponorogo art community in Jabodetabek, Monday (2/11) met with Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu) officials to ask about the burning of reog instruments at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines. Director of Information and Media at the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Siti Sofia Sudarma, said that as many as six reog Ponorogo administrators met with her party to express their disappointment regarding the burning. During the meeting, the community also said that the burning hurt the feelings of the Reog Ponorogo community and was a form of destruction of cultural assets that became Indonesian cultural heritage. “They also gave a letter to the Foreign Minister and asked the Foreign Ministry to clarify this case, starting from the chronology, motive, to the perpetrators. We accommodate all their concerns and will convey the letter to the Minister of Foreign Affairs (Retno Marsudi)," he told Republika.co.id, Tuesday (3/11). Siti admitted that she had actually clear up clarified to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City by telephone. The Consul General, he said, admitted that he had committed the arson. He added that the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. When Siti said the reason, one of the community members who donated the equipment to the Consulate General denied it. Members of the community said the equipment was made in 2007 and was judged not to be too fragile. Siti in the near future will send a team to review directly to the field. This step also clarifies the burning of reog equipment. "We don't know when the team will go there, but what is clear is as soon as possible. We are just waiting for orders from the leadership," he said.
berita_id: Komunitas seni Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang di Jabodetabek, Senin (2/11) bertemu dengan para pejabat Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia (Kemenlu) untuk bertanya tentang pembakaran instrumen reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina.Direktur Informasi dan Media di Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia, Siti Sofia Sudarma, mengatakan bahwa sebanyak enam administrator Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang bertemu dengan partainya untuk mengungkapkan kekecewaan mereka mengenai pembakaran.Selama pertemuan itu, masyarakat juga mengatakan bahwa pembakaran melukai perasaan komunitas Ponorogo yang reog dan merupakan bentuk penghancuran aset budaya yang menjadi warisan budaya Indonesia."Mereka juga memberikan surat kepada Menteri Luar Negeri dan meminta Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi kasus ini, mulai dari kronologi, motif, kepada para pelaku. Kami mengakomodasi semua keprihatinan mereka dan akan menyampaikan surat itu kepada Menteri Luar Negeri (Retno Marsudi)," katanya kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (3/11).Siti mengakui bahwa dia benar -benar telah membersihkan yang diklarifikasi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Kota Davao melalui telepon.Konsul Jenderal, katanya, mengakui bahwa dia telah melakukan pembakaran.Dia menambahkan bahwa pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ketika Siti mengatakan alasannya, salah satu anggota masyarakat yang menyumbangkan peralatan kepada Konsulat Jenderal membantahnya.Anggota masyarakat mengatakan peralatan itu dibuat pada tahun 2007 dan dinilai tidak terlalu rapuh.Siti dalam waktu dekat akan mengirim tim untuk ditinjau langsung ke lapangan.Langkah ini juga mengklarifikasi pembakaran peralatan reog."Kami tidak tahu kapan tim akan pergi ke sana, tetapi yang jelas adalah sesegera mungkin. Kami hanya menunggu perintah dari kepemimpinan," katanya.

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and it is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma to reporters when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (30/10). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. Even neighboring countries, Malaysia claim it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning was related fri to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar di Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma kepada wartawan ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (30/10).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan negara -negara tetangga, Malaysia mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran adalah Jumat terkait dengan idola dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: You may have heard the term bendgate. Yes, last year, after the launch of the iPhone 6 Plus, this big scandal, dubbed bendgate, surfaced in various media. This case was so excited in the world of technology because at that addition time the iPhone 6 Plus was very easy to bend. In fact, it is reported that when bent by hand, the iPhone 6 Plus immediately bends. Then, what about the iPhone 6S Plus? Does this latest iPhone also experience a similar case? Fortunately, for Apple's latest product, it is unlikely that the bendgate issue will be hit. The reason is, in this 5 minute video it has been shown that the iPhone 6S Plus is very difficult to bend. The video shows a young man who wants to bend the iPhone 6S Plus with all his might. However, his efforts yielded no results at all. It was only after he asked a friend for help that the iPhone finally curved, as reported by News.Softpedia (25/9/15). However, the two young men admitted that the iPhone 6S Plus can't be bent easily. They spent extra energy to bend the iPhone. It looks like the iPhone 6S Plus can bend because the two young men were bent in a weak part of the body structure.
berita_id: Anda mungkin pernah mendengar istilah Bendgate.Ya, tahun lalu, setelah peluncuran iPhone 6 Plus, skandal besar ini, dijuluki Bendgate, muncul di berbagai media.Kasing ini sangat bersemangat di dunia teknologi karena pada saat itu iPhone 6 Plus sangat mudah untuk ditekuk.Bahkan, dilaporkan bahwa ketika ditekuk dengan tangan, iPhone 6 Plus segera membungkuk.Lalu, bagaimana dengan iPhone 6s Plus?Apakah iPhone terbaru ini juga mengalami kasus serupa?Untungnya, untuk produk terbaru Apple, tidak mungkin masalah Bendgate akan terpukul.Alasannya adalah, dalam video 5 menit ini telah ditunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6s Plus sangat sulit untuk ditekuk.Video itu menunjukkan seorang pria muda yang ingin menekuk iPhone 6s Plus dengan sekuat tenaga.Namun, upayanya tidak menghasilkan hasil sama sekali.Hanya setelah dia meminta bantuan seorang teman, iPhone akhirnya melengkung, seperti yang dilaporkan oleh News.softpedia (25/9/15).Namun, kedua pemuda itu mengakui bahwa iPhone 6s Plus tidak dapat ditekuk dengan mudah.Mereka menghabiskan energi ekstra untuk menekuk iPhone.Sepertinya iPhone 6s Plus dapat menekuk karena kedua pemuda itu bengkok di bagian lemah dari struktur tubuh.

berita: It has been a long time since the issue of boar bristles has been used as a material for toothbrushes, but until now there are still many who do not know about it. Therefore, in this paper, this problem will be presented. The Rise of the Pig Hair Issue Around 2009 the issue had circulated but was dimmed because no facts were found. In 2012 the issue had resurfaced, but only in certain circles. we are shocked by the emergence of brushes or toothbrushes made from pig bristles. To the extent that the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush. But recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information, especially for Muslims, to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Features of the Pig Bristle Toothbrush From the information provided by the manufacturer itself, it is stated that there are toothbrushes made from sea urchins. Indeed, toothbrushes like this are very rare in Indonesia. But abroad, there are quite a lot of boar-bristle toothbrushes, with quite expensive prices. It is said that the toothbrush that comes from pig bristles is actually softer. The way to distinguish sea urchins from synthetic/plastic materials is to burn them. If burned with fire smells like burning horns, then it comes from the hair or hair of an animal, usually a pig. While the plastic material does not produce odors. (HALAL Journal No. 62/X/2006) Get to know the product before buying Dear readers, you can check the toothbrush to be purchased, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains Pig Bristle. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Once again make sure the packaging if it's from bristles, then it's made from sea urchins. Feel free to prove that the bristles are burned, if it smells like burnt hair, it means it's from pig bristles. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. slam Forbids Its Use For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. The risks of using it for Muslims are Haram: Worship is rejected, Prayers are rejected, and Hell is more it deserving (hadith). Daily Activities Related to the Use of Brushes and Brushes In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Did you know that the brushes & toothbrushes you are currently using come from? Most likely it is made from Sea urchin! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. There are other terms for Sea urchins, including: PIG, BOAR, HOG, BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH. Some Ways to Avoid Brushes or Toothbrushes Made from Pig Bristle: Use 100% natural brushes and brushes such as siwak root or synthetic materials, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. Use an alternative to brushes. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. Be aware of the type of food whose cooking process and cleaning the tools using a pig brush. The characteristics of the Pig Bristle Brush, when burned, will cause a distinctive smell like burning meat. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes are sold in white and black. But it is possible for manufacturers to process the coloring by bleaching it, as if it were any other animal's fur. May be useful
berita_id: Sudah lama sejak masalah bulu babi telah digunakan sebagai bahan untuk sikat gigi, tetapi sampai sekarang masih ada banyak yang tidak mengetahuinya.Karena itu, dalam makalah ini, masalah ini akan disajikan.Munculnya masalah rambut babi sekitar tahun 2009 masalah ini telah beredar tetapi redup karena tidak ada fakta yang ditemukan.Pada 2012 masalah telah muncul kembali, tetapi hanya di kalangan tertentu.Kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sejauh MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi.Namun baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi, terutama bagi umat Islam, untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan non-halal.Fitur sikat gigi bulu babi dari informasi yang disediakan oleh pabrikan itu sendiri, dinyatakan bahwa ada sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Memang, sikat gigi seperti ini sangat jarang di Indonesia.Tapi di luar negeri, ada cukup banyak sikat gigi berbulu babi, dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Dikatakan bahwa sikat gigi yang berasal dari bulu babi sebenarnya lebih lembut.Cara membedakan bulu babi dari bahan sintetis/plastik adalah dengan membakarnya.Jika dibakar dengan bau api seperti tanduk yang terbakar, maka itu berasal dari rambut atau rambut binatang, biasanya seekor babi.Sementara bahan plastik tidak menghasilkan bau.(Jurnal Halal No. 62/x/2006) Kenali produk sebelum membeli pembaca yang budiman, Anda dapat memeriksa sikat gigi yang akan dibeli, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Sekali lagi pastikan kemasannya jika itu dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari bulu babi.Jangan ragu untuk membuktikan bahwa bulu dibakar, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti itu dari bulu babi.Tetapi jika meleleh dan menjadi sulit, itu berarti terbuat dari plastik dan aman untuk digunakan.Slam melarang penggunaannya untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.Risiko menggunakannya untuk umat Islam adalah haram: ibadah ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Kegiatan harian yang terkait dengan penggunaan kuas dan kuas dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk mengoleskan riasan, cat, debu bersih, mengecat rumah, wajan kue minyak, dan menyebarkan makanan.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda bahwa sikat & sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan saat ini berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu terbuat dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Ada istilah lain untuk bulu babi laut, termasuk: babi, babi hutan, babi, sikat rambut bulu.Beberapa cara untuk menghindari sikat atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi: Gunakan sikat dan kuas alami 100% seperti akar siwak atau bahan sintetis, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif untuk sikat.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.Waspadai jenis makanan yang proses memasaknya dan membersihkan alat menggunakan sikat babi.Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar, akan menyebabkan aroma khas seperti daging yang terbakar.Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih dan hitam.Tetapi mungkin bagi produsen untuk memproses pewarnaan dengan memutihkannya, seolah -olah itu adalah bulu hewan lainnya.Mungkin berguna

berita: Recently, there has been spreading information that is troubling the public, namely the widespread issue of using sea urchins for the production of toothbrushes. On social media recently someone uploaded a photo of a toothbrush packaging. The presence of the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging made social media users feel restless. Because, the word "bristle" is defined as sea urchin. The Indonesian people, who are predominantly Muslims, are certainly worried about this issue, because pork is considered unclean and unclean. Using boar bristles to brush teeth is of course considered to have violated religious rules. So what is the attitude of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI)? Is it true that the attitude of the teeth in the packaging that reads "bristle" is haram? Reporting from the halalmui.org site, it is stated that the lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. MUI considers that not everything labeled bristle must come from sea urchins, because the scope of the meaning of the word is indeed so broad. The MUI official website also explains that in the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. The MUI explained that, if the ingredients used were confirmed from pigs, it would absolutely be haram. Because any material that comes from pork is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. MUI continues to explain that the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush made from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. An example presented by MUI is a product sold on the Amazon online store. If a product offered is made from sea urchins, the manufacturer will usually list “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. MUI closes its explanation by stating that brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made of pork even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still general in nature. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. An information compiled from the halalcorner.id page states that if you look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development hairsbreadth of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. Then the page gives advice if you want to make sure whether the toothbrush is made of pig bristles or something else, you should look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada informasi yang menyebar yang mengganggu publik, yaitu masalah yang meluas menggunakan landak laut untuk produksi sikat gigi.Di media sosial baru -baru ini seseorang mengunggah foto kemasan sikat gigi.Kehadiran kata -kata "bulu" pada kemasan sikat gigi membuat pengguna media sosial merasa gelisah.Karena, kata "bulu" didefinisikan sebagai landak laut.Orang -orang Indonesia, yang sebagian besar adalah Muslim, tentu saja khawatir tentang masalah ini, karena babi dianggap najis dan najis.Menggunakan bulu babi untuk menyikat gigi tentu saja dianggap telah melanggar aturan agama.Jadi apa sikap Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI)?Benarkah sikap gigi dalam kemasan yang bertuliskan "bristle" adalah haram?Melaporkan dari situs halalmui.org, dinyatakan bahwa makna leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.MUI menganggap bahwa tidak semuanya berlabel bulu harus berasal dari bulu babi, karena ruang lingkup makna kata itu memang begitu luas.Situs web resmi MUI juga menjelaskan bahwa di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.MUI menjelaskan bahwa, jika bahan yang digunakan dikonfirmasi dari babi, itu benar -benar Haram.Karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.MUI terus menjelaskan bahwa masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Contoh yang disajikan oleh MUI adalah produk yang dijual di toko online Amazon.Jika produk yang ditawarkan terbuat dari landak laut, produsen biasanya akan mendaftarkan "sikat gigi fuchs murni alami (babi). Catatan V Adult Soft (Paket 5) Warna yang Dibuat oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes" Boar adalah istilah babi Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi liar.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.MUI menutup penjelasannya dengan menyatakan bahwa kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari daging babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih bersifat umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Sebuah informasi yang disusun dari halaman halalcorner.id menyatakan bahwa jika Anda melihat kembali sejarah dan pengembangan sikat gigi, bulu yang ditemukan pada sikat gigi yang awalnya berasal dari bulu babi liar (Siberia).Namun, seiring dengan pengembangan hairsbreadth teknologi, pada tahun 1938 sikat gigi diproduksi dengan bulu nilon yang masih mendominasi sampai sekarang.Namun, tidak dapat dipungkiri bahwa masih ada sekitar 10% di seluruh dunia dari produk sikat gigi yang bulunya berasal dari bulu babi.Kemudian halaman memberikan saran jika Anda ingin memastikan apakah sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi atau yang lainnya, Anda harus mencari informasi di situs web resmi produsen sikat gigi, atau bahkan bertanya langsung ke pusat layanan pelanggan.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (Consul General RI) in Davao City, Eko Hartono admitted, the issue of burning reog art instruments was indeed carried out in Davao City, Philippines. However, the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. This was explained by Eko Hartono when asked for clarification via electronic mail, as quoted through an electronic message received by Agus. In fact, in his letter to the Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, the Indonesian Consul General gave the reason that the news of the burning of a number of reog art instruments by the local Consulate General staff was true. "Mr. Eko tidings as the Indonesian Consul General in Davao even said that he was grateful for being able to communicate (via e-mail) with the reog community in Indonesia, so they could ask for input for the procurement of a number of new reog art instruments there," said Agus Setiyoko. Agus said, reog art lovers and actors in the country still need an official and open explanation that can be read in the national media, so as not to trigger disappointment or even anger from the reog community in Indonesia. As is known, on Sunday (11/1/2015), several news spread on a number of social media reports regarding the burning of a number of reog art properties, such as gayor, dadak peacock masks and dragon head gamelan venues in a number of online media accompanied by photos of burning peacock masks. The arson was allegedly carried out in the courtyard of a house that also serves as the Indonesian Consulate General's Office in Davao City, Philippines
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (Konsul Jenderal RI) di Kota Davao, Eko Hartono mengakui, masalah pembakaran instrumen seni reog memang dilakukan di Kota Davao, Filipina.Namun, pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Ini dijelaskan oleh Eko Hartono ketika diminta klarifikasi melalui surat elektronik, seperti dikutip melalui pesan elektronik yang diterima oleh Agus.Faktanya, dalam suratnya kepada Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, konsul jenderal Indonesia memberikan alasan bahwa berita tentang pembakaran sejumlah instrumen seni reog oleh staf umum konsulat setempat adalah benar."Mr. Eko memberi kabar sebagai konsul jenderal Indonesia di Davao bahkan mengatakan bahwa ia bersyukur karena dapat berkomunikasi (melalui email) dengan komunitas reog di Indonesia, sehingga mereka dapat meminta masukan untuk pengadaan sejumlah instrumen seni baru di sana," kata Agus Setiyoko.Kata Agus, pecinta dan aktor seni reog di negara itu masih membutuhkan penjelasan resmi dan terbuka yang dapat dibaca di media nasional, agar tidak memicu kekecewaan atau bahkan kemarahan dari komunitas reog di Indonesia.Seperti diketahui, pada hari Minggu (11/1/2015), beberapa berita tersebar di sejumlah laporan media sosial mengenai pembakaran sejumlah properti seni yang dirancang ulang, seperti Gayor, Masker Dadak Peacock dan tempat -tempat gamelan kepala naga di sejumlah media online disertai dengan foto topeng merdam yang membakar.Pembakaran itu diduga dilakukan di halaman sebuah rumah yang juga berfungsi sebagai kantor konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina

berita: The Jabodetabek Reog Community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. "We want to get an official and written explanation, because in the previous clarification the Consulate General confirmed the news on the pretext that the art equipment was damaged," said Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, Monday (2/11). Agus revealed that there were three points of request for clarification consulate that they submitted to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. First, to ask for an official and written explanation regarding the case of the reog art instrument burning by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. In addition to the written explanation, Agus said, in the second point his party also questioned the dissemination of news of the burning of the reog art instrument in a number of "online" media. There are many reasons for burning because it is considered an idol. The last point, which is no less important, Agus said, was a request to the Indonesian Embassy or the RI Konken in Davao City, Philippines to publish or broadcast clarifications on the issue of burning reog art objects in a number of national media. "We also demand that the Consulate General or through the Indonesian Embassy in the Philippines ask for the right of clarification from the media who brought up the news to avoid confusion in the news that developed in the country," he said. The letter, which was written on the head of the Jabodetabek Reyog Association Number 023/PRPJ/X/2015, was not only sent via electronic message to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City. However, copies were also sent to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Regent of Ponorogo.
berita_id: Komunitas Reog Jabodetabek mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia."Kami ingin mendapatkan penjelasan resmi dan tertulis, karena dalam klarifikasi sebelumnya, Jenderal Konsulat mengkonfirmasi berita dengan dalih bahwa peralatan seni rusak," kata Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, Senin (2/11).Agus mengungkapkan bahwa ada tiga poin permintaan untuk konsulat klarifikasi yang mereka tunduk kepada Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Pertama, untuk meminta penjelasan resmi dan tertulis mengenai kasus instrumen seni reog yang dibakar oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Selain penjelasan tertulis, Agus mengatakan, pada poin kedua partainya juga mempertanyakan penyebaran berita tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog di sejumlah media "online".Ada banyak alasan untuk membakar karena dianggap sebagai idola.Poin terakhir, yang tidak kalah pentingnya, kata Agus, adalah permintaan ke Kedutaan Besar Indonesia atau Ri Konken di Kota Davao, Filipina untuk menerbitkan atau menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang masalah pembakaran objek seni reog di sejumlah media nasional."Kami juga menuntut agar konsulat umum atau melalui kedutaan Indonesia di Filipina meminta hak klarifikasi dari media yang mengemukakan berita untuk menghindari kebingungan dalam berita yang berkembang di negara itu," katanya.Surat itu, yang ditulis di kepala nomor Asosiasi Jabodetabek Reyog 023/PRPJ/X/2015, tidak hanya dikirim melalui pesan elektronik ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao.Namun, salinan juga dikirim ke Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia dan Bupati Ponorogo.

berita: Last year, Apple had a bit of a problem with releasing their latest iPhone 6 series. The reason is, the smartphone is rumored to be easily bent and looks frail. In response to this problem, Apple also introduced changes to the latest iPhone series iPhone 6s and 6s plus. One of the changes made by Apple is to use new materials in the manufacturing process. Last year, a number of iPhone 6 Plus users reported that the handset was curved. Apple admits that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to Apple, as long as users are careful, the incident doesn't need to happen. Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect its body parts. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry," said an Apple spokesman at the time. Apple finally uses the 7000 series aluminum which is claimed to be more sturdy and solid. However, after all, the issue of the iPhone being bent easily is already attached. So will the use of this new material affect the latest iPhone when it is bent? What is the toughness of the 7000 series aluminum material in the latest iPhone? Is it more powerful than the previous iPhone generation? A journalist from FoneFox also conducted a test on this latest iPhone. He decided to test the toughness of this new material. In the video, it appears that someone will bend the iPhone 6s Plus with the strength of both hands like the previous test on the iPhone 6. As a result, the body of the iPhone 6s Plus does not bend at all. Still curious about the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus, now with the help of his colleagues, the iPhone 6  Plus is trying to bend it with all his might and the result is that there is a change in the shape of the body even though it doesn't bend too badly. It only looks a little bent on the body, but the iPhone 6 Plus can still be used well. This test may not be fair. Because this bending test should be done using a machine because not all human power is the same. However, this test has at least proven that the iPhone 6s plus with the new material is more sturdy and strong. So, you don't have to worry when buying iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s plus.
berita_id: Tahun lalu, Apple memiliki sedikit masalah dengan merilis seri iPhone 6 terbaru mereka.Alasannya adalah, smartphone dikabarkan mudah ditekuk dan terlihat lemah.Menanggapi masalah ini, Apple juga memperkenalkan perubahan pada iPhone Seri iPhone 6s dan 6s Plus iPhone terbaru.Salah satu perubahan yang dibuat oleh Apple adalah menggunakan bahan baru dalam proses pembuatan.Tahun lalu, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa handset itu melengkung.Apple mengakui bahwa ada pengguna iPhone 6 Plus yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut Apple, selama pengguna berhati -hati, insiden itu tidak perlu terjadi.Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus."IPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi bagian tubuhnya. Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone," kata seorang juru bicara Apple pada saat itu.Apple akhirnya menggunakan aluminium seri 7000 yang diklaim lebih kokoh dan solid.Namun, bagaimanapun, masalah iPhone yang ditekuk dengan mudah sudah terpasang.Jadi akankah penggunaan materi baru ini mempengaruhi iPhone terbaru saat ditekuk?Apa ketangguhan bahan aluminium seri 7000 di iPhone terbaru?Apakah ini lebih kuat dari generasi iPhone sebelumnya?Seorang jurnalis dari Fonefox juga melakukan tes pada iPhone terbaru ini.Dia memutuskan untuk menguji ketangguhan materi baru ini.Dalam video, tampaknya seseorang akan menekuk iPhone 6s Plus dengan kekuatan kedua tangan seperti tes sebelumnya di iPhone 6. Akibatnya, tubuh iPhone 6s Plus tidak menekuk sama sekali.Masih ingin tahu tentang kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus, sekarang dengan bantuan rekan -rekannya, iPhone 6 Plus sedang mencoba untuk menekuknya dengan sekuat tenaga dan hasilnya adalah bahwa ada perubahan dalam bentuk tubuh meskipun tidak terlalu buruk.Ini hanya terlihat sedikit bengkok pada tubuh, tetapi iPhone 6 Plus masih dapat digunakan dengan baik.Tes ini mungkin tidak adil.Karena tes lentur ini harus dilakukan dengan menggunakan mesin karena tidak semua kekuatan manusia sama.Namun, tes ini setidaknya telah membuktikan bahwa iPhone 6s Plus dengan materi baru lebih kokoh dan kuat.Jadi, Anda tidak perlu khawatir saat membeli iPhone 6s dan iPhone 6s Plus.

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned general at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma, when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (10/30). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. In fact, a neighboring country, Malaysia, claims it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning is related to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar Jenderal di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma, ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (10/30).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan, negara tetangga, Malaysia, mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran terkait dengan berhala dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.

berita: Surely the residents of Malang City have heard or read articles about catfish which have 3000 cancer cells. The messages and writings stated that a mouthful of catfish meat was eaten, residents also swallowed the 3000 cancer cells. The message and writing also stated that catfish contain cancer cells because catfish live in a dirty way. The reason for the filthiest fish is what the readers emphasize the most. The message also explained that the nature of catfish that likes to consume all kinds of waste in the waters makes this fish unfit for consumption. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. Meanwhile in its natural habitat, catfish is also known as a very tough fish species. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that it can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. These facts have led to allegations of accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. This fact is not entirely true and can be trusted. Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association, explained that to prove whether catfish have cancer cells or not, research is necessary. Currently there grouping is no research that states if eating catfish can trigger cancer, he stressed. Meanwhile, most of the catfish sold and consumed in Malang City are cultivated in a catfish farming pond. Head of Fish Processing and Marketing Group at Sarangan Fish Supermarket, Malang City, Dm. Bambang S explained this. He said that when he wanted to supply fish, such as catfish and milkfish, he must supply them from a catfish farm. Although there are few ponds in Malang City, he takes supplies from ponds in the Sidoarjo area. Don't pick up the river. It must be from fresh water ponds where it is cultivated, he said. According to the data collected, the nutritional content of catfish is centered on high protein levels. Like freshwater fish in general. There has been no official research that states that catfish contain cancer cells like the information that has been spread so far.
berita_id: Tentunya penduduk Kota Malang telah mendengar atau membaca artikel tentang ikan lele yang memiliki 3000 sel kanker.Pesan dan tulisan menyatakan bahwa seteguk daging ikan lele dimakan, penduduk juga menelan 3000 sel kanker.Pesan dan penulisan juga menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker karena ikan lele hidup dengan cara yang kotor.Alasan ikan paling kotor adalah apa yang paling ditekankan oleh pembaca.Pesan itu juga menjelaskan bahwa sifat ikan lele yang suka mengkonsumsi semua jenis limbah di perairan membuat ikan ini tidak layak untuk dikonsumsi.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Sementara itu di habitat aslinya, ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang sangat keras.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Fakta -fakta ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Fakta ini tidak sepenuhnya benar dan dapat dipercaya.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia, menjelaskan bahwa untuk membuktikan apakah ikan lele memiliki sel kanker atau tidak, diperlukan penelitian.Saat ini pengelompokan tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan jika makan lele dapat memicu kanker, ia menekankan.Sementara itu, sebagian besar ikan lele yang dijual dan dikonsumsi di Kota Malang dibudidayakan di kolam peternakan ikan lele.Kepala Pemrosesan Ikan dan Kelompok Pemasaran di Supermarket Ikan Sarangan, Kota Malang, DM.Bambang S menjelaskan hal ini.Dia mengatakan bahwa ketika dia ingin memasok ikan, seperti ikan lele dan susu, dia harus memasok mereka dari peternakan ikan lele.Meskipun ada beberapa kolam di Kota Malang, ia mengambil persediaan dari kolam di daerah Sidoarjo.Jangan mengambil sungai.Pasti dari kolam air tawar di mana ia dibudidayakan, katanya.Menurut data yang dikumpulkan, kandungan nutrisi ikan lele berpusat pada kadar protein tinggi.Seperti ikan air tawar pada umumnya.Belum ada penelitian resmi yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker seperti informasi yang telah tersebar sejauh ini.

berita: The conversation emerged as a result of the Walk Out (WO) action of the famous Indonesian composer, Ananda Sukarlan when college the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). Rumors circulated, when Anies Baswedan gave a speech, Ananda suddenly stood up and then WO went out of the room. It is said that one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who was present at the event, also greeted Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. This was seen as support for Ananda's actions. However, the issue was finally clarified by Traveloka that Derianto was unable to attend at that time.
berita_id: Percakapan muncul sebagai akibat dari aksi Walk Out (WO) dari komposer Indonesia yang terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu/11/11.Rumor beredar, ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato, Ananda tiba -tiba berdiri dan kemudian akan keluar dari ruangan.Dikatakan bahwa salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang hadir di acara tersebut, juga menyambut Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Ini dipandang sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Namun, masalah ini akhirnya diklarifikasi oleh Traveloka bahwa DeRianto tidak dapat hadir pada waktu itu.

berita: lately there are more and more blogs and even videos on youtube that say that catfish contains cancer cells which are dangerous if we consume it, but many people still doubt the news and do not believe it and wonder if it is true that catfish contains cancer cells and dangerous if consumed. A little talk about catfish, indeed catfish is one of the fish that lives in dirty areas such as mud, sewage, muddy rivers and some even keep catfish in ponds containing human feces or feces, but this is not everything is only part of it and is the act of irresponsible people. But does catfish really contain cancer cells and it is dangerous if we consume it? Apparently NO, this is not true because even though catfish live in dirty places, it does not make this fish contain cancer mudcat cells, on the contrary, this fish contains rich and high protein and is cheap lively So don't be afraid of the cancer cells and in addition, now catfish raised by breeders who use superior catfish seeds such as dumbo or the like are safe for consumption because they contain high protein, I also really like catfish, and until now I still like to eat the fish. The point is don't believe too much with hoaxes circulating on the internet because this is not necessarily true and sometimes it's just a prank
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini ada semakin banyak blog dan bahkan video di YouTube yang mengatakan bahwa ikan lele berisi sel kanker yang berbahaya jika kita mengkonsumsinya, tetapi banyak orang masih meragukan berita dan tidak percaya dan bertanya -tanya apakah benar bahwa ikan lele berisi sel kanker dan berbahaya jika dikonsumsi.Sedikit pembicaraan tentang ikan lele, memang ikan lele adalah salah satu ikan yang tinggal di daerah kotor seperti lumpur, limbah, sungai berlumpur dan beberapa bahkan menjaga ikan lele di kolam yang mengandung kotoran atau tinja manusia, tetapi ini bukan semuanya hanya bagian dari itu dan merupakan tindakan orang yang tidak bertanggung jawab.Tetapi apakah ikan lele benar -benar mengandung sel kanker dan berbahaya jika kita mengkonsumsinya?Rupanya tidak, ini tidak benar karena meskipun ikan lele hidup di tempat -tempat kotor, ia tidak membuat ikan ini mengandung sel -sel kanker mudcat, sebaliknya, ikan ini mengandung protein yang kaya dan tinggi dan murah hati sehingga tidak takut pada sel kanker dan di samping itu, yang sekarang dikonsumsi oleh para peternak yang memakannya yang tinggi seperti halnya.ikan.Intinya adalah tidak terlalu percaya dengan tipuan beredar di internet karena ini belum tentu benar dan kadang -kadang itu hanya lelucon

berita: Toothbrushes are the most important thing in our daily lives, without a brush, we all might experience an unpleasant or unpleasant mouth. First, let's look at this information for you, especially "Muslims" to be more careful and vigilant in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal ones. When you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Remember Yes...!!! Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! Again, recheck your toothbrush package when you buy it, don't forget and procrastinate, look at it beforehand and when you buy the toothbrush you will use. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Close friends, please share that brushing teeth is done every day, there are many kinds of toothbrushes available in supermarkets or traditional markets, and there are also many materials used in making these toothbrushes. As Muslims, we must be vigilant and careful in knowing some of the ingredients or making toothbrushes that have been used for brushing teeth. Th. In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes that had some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently there has been information about toothbrushes containing boar bristles. Information for you Muslim groups to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Let's all examine the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Here are a few steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's recorded from the bristles, so made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means sacrifice it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility if using the haram: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we certainly use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake pans, to smear food.
